Summary Heading: Nice property depending on price point and what you‚Äôre looking for.
Summary: I was in the area for business and was looking to treat myself for a couple of days and was debating between this property and the Ritz. Overall I think this is a very nice hotel in a good location but does not offer a truly upscale experience like you would get at a more expensive property.   Pros:  the rooms are spacious and clean and have cute balconies. The lobby bar/restaurant has nice views and some tasty options. Staff was friendly and attentive. It‚Äôs walkable to the harbor, beach (both via a steep hill) and the lantern district. The park in front of the hotel has nice green space and beautiful views.  Yoga is offered in the mornings.   Cons:  Pool is smallish and I imagine it gets crowded at times. My biggest disappointment was that many ocean-facing rooms are marred by
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Look elsewhere, you will be more satisfied
Summary: My wife and I chose the Laguna Cliffs for a quick little get-a-way. There are a lot of options in this area but we thought we would get a real treat here. We were wrong and should have gone elsewhere.  That is a shame because this property has so much potential. The location is great and it is close to a lot of activities but then again, so are a lot of other hotels.  First off, we were very disappointed by their lackluster benefits for premium Marriott status. As a titanium member, I requested a suite upgrade using one of my certificates. We were told none were available. This was even though we could see there were still suites available to customers who wanted to pay. Ok, that was disappointing but I am not going to get that ruin a stay in a beautiful location.  As it turns
Manager Response: none

Summary: We've celebrated 3 birthdays for our daughter here and we always have the best time. For her 16th they had chocolate strawberry's with a message written in chocolate and cider with champagne glasses awaiting our arrival. They pull out all the stops! Great restaurants are nearby in walking distance and we love the pools and games (mini golf, pickle ball, ping pong), and yoga at the park in front with views of the ocean. It's a hidden gem and we look forward to celebrating many more special occasions here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I always appreciate the polite and attentive service. Starting from the valet parking attendant, to the restaurant/Outer Reef host and finally the server for our fantastic lunch. The service was excellent. Our server (can't remember her name, young girl) was a good listener regarding my food order and timely return with the food. In addition, she frequently checked on me and my friend for beverage refresh, etc. Looking forward to going back sooner than later!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I would highly recommend this resort. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The rooms were very clean and updated. Lots of great places to eat.   If you‚Äôre looking for a great massage, book an appointment with Steve. He‚Äôs absolutely top notch.  One of the best massages ever! The spa was very relaxing and everyone was so warm and welcoming.   We enjoyed lovely morning walks. Lots of great spots for pictures.   Our room was facing the ocean and the views were amazing. We had an incredible sunrise one morning.   We will definitely be returning to this wonderful resort.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful hotel with impeccable service.  Every single staff member was so friendly and helpful.  The food was wonderful.  The only negative I would say is for an upscale hotel I would have expected the continental breakfast to be a bit better.  As a Marriott Titanium the breakfast was complimentary, which we greatly appreciated but I could see how paying guest could be disappointed.   The room was spacious, the view cannot be beat and the grounds were fabulously decorated and lit for the holidays.  We would definitley come back to Laguna Cliffs Marriott again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms were spacious and clean. We had a nice patio off our room overlooking the pool. Probably wouldn‚Äôt be as nice if there was a lot of activity at the pool. It was late November so a little cool. Great location. We walked to the marina for breakfast one morning. It was pretty.Breakfast at the hotel was pricey for what it was.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: One of my favorite hotels and locations!
Summary: I have stayed at this property many times over the past 15+ years and I always look forward to returning. The location cannot be beat, and the ocean view rooms are great. Lu D., the Concierge secured my requested room before my arrival (as she has done before) - thank you Lu!  At arrival, the valet and check-in process was seamless.  Another Concierge (i don't recall her name) secured my tickets for the next day ferry to Catalina Island that I had failed to reserve timely and which had appeared sold out online. And, the breakfast buffet food and staff were on top of their game everyday. The room was excellent, clean, and beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: What a spectacular property!! This is my kids favorite hotel in Southern California... the poll area with the mimi golf and table tennis makes their stay so enjoyable while I get to relax by the pool and let the stress of work flow away  üòÄ
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lovely resort and rooms. The interiors are beautiful including the bars, event spaces, and the room. The location is high about be the marina/ beach but walkable to those areas via stairs or steep hill. Walking distance to Doheny beach and the harbor as long as you can get back via uphill staircase. Pool was nice with wonderfully attentive pool bar service -  wonderful service from Francesca and Gia. Seriously, these girls were so sweet, smiling all the time, and made this experience feel like we were really taken care of.  A lovely time in O/C that made me realize how lucky anyone who lives here is! Such a beautiful place. Thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was our first visit back in over 4 years.   Resort is gorgeous and feels crisp and clean.  We had an ocean front room with a view of harbor and one of the two large pools.   The decor is modern and very appealing.  The room was very clean with an Extremely comfortable bed and luxurious linens.  Shower and bathroom was large and great amenities.      The gym is great too.  Large with a big variety of cardio and weight machines and free weights.   Had a great workout both days.   We ate and drank at the view lounge off the lobby and food, drinks and services were great !  Such a relaxing setting.     All staff were awesome.  So friendly and welcoming.  From Susan and Jacky at the Front Desk to the bell and valet team.  Erica, Jeannie and Winona in sales/catering department are
Manager Response: none

Summary: Here for a conference. We have been very impressed with the front desk staff (Ava and Zack)- consistently friendly, knowledgeable and helpful! Housekeeping staff is great as well ( they replaced our towels daily without requests from us, and the room was always cleaned thoroughly). Comfortable bed, nice pool. Thanks for a lovely stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a great check in experience with Ava. She was kind enough to Give us breakfast after a long valet line that took us awhile to get in. Great example of customer service - her managers should give her a little praise :)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came here for the first time with our 18m baby and she had a blast! The resort is beautiful with great view and we especially love the kids pool.  The whole resort is very kids friendly and there‚Äôs plenty of space for her to walk around and explore.  The front desk made us feel very welcomed upon arrival and they offered free bottles of water. You can actually request more during the stay if you need to.   The room is clean and spacious.  Our room is next to the kids pool on the first floor which is convenient.  There‚Äôs an activity room for the kids to do some drawing and watch tv on the first floor next to the pool.   The kids pool is under 2 feet and our baby had such a great time there. I loved that she can stay in the water without a floatie.  This is her first time in the
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is in a beautiful location, on top of a cliff looking overlooking the ocean. But it‚Äôs quite a walk to the beach. If you have little kids it‚Äôs not doable. There‚Äôs no shuttle going anywhere and you need to drive. Valet parking is expensive at around $60 a day. The valet people are super nice, though. Breakfast buffet is at ~$40 per person. Rooms are small which is my major complaint. Balcony is also small. As Marriott gold, you basically get nothing. No breakfast credits, no upgrades and result fee is not waved even if you book with points. You can borrow bikes and boogie boards, but no other beach gears available.   The grounds are nice but kinda small. You can walk to the park nearby. Some doors are due for a checkup. They don‚Äôt respond to your room keys. Because of
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wonderful Resort. Sweeping Ocean Views.  Excellent Service.
Summary: Large beautiful resort high on a bluff with wonderful sweeping views of ocean and city lights from all around the perfectly manicured property.  Every staff member we encountered were friendly and welcoming.  Our ‚Äústudio style‚Äù room on the second floor was very spacious and spotless with a small balcony overlooking the arrival/valet area so no ocean view for us; still very nice! Our bathroom was huge with a NON-slip shower, decent water pressure, duel sinks and plenty of counter and storage space.  Bed was dreamy with quality pillows.  Bed and bath linens were top notch and the NON-communal bath products (yay!) were nice and plentiful.  In-room wifi was spotty.  Housekeeping was friendly and spot on.  The overall d√©cor is modern and subtle with a beachy vibe.  We had an empty
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very disappointed , you would have thought by the pictures and that it was called a resort and spa it would be nice , the front desk personal were very nice , the lobby felt like it would be luxurious resort ‚Ä¶ but it ended there.. The lobby ladies bathroom had a missing/broken door knob inside the stall which made it hard to get out , used paper towels on floor , hallways had a strange smell , breakfast items were bit covered and had flies in them , the room was small , our bathroom had visible signs of mole ,  I vent , and the shower when in use ‚Ä¶ soaked water all over the floor ‚Ä¶ it did not feel like a high end place at all .. I should have taken pictures

Summary: The Laguna Cliffs Marriott photos on all travel sites are not accurate. The swmming pools are older than the hills and very unkept and look dirty.  The room was musty.  I would like a refund. I didn't think Marriott would try to get away with such low, cheap, substandard facilities in such a pretty area of Dana Point.  K. Steinhart
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel amenities are very nice the staff is super friendly the restaurant is good the view and location is beautiful, but it‚Äôs an old hotel, you can hear everything from the room the corridor, absolutely 0 isolation. Our bathtub had some hair from previous guest which was very gross.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is due for a renovation. The staff are ok but not anything to write home about. Beds are small doubles. Parking fees are $50 on top of room rate and you have no option since resort is on a cliff off the street. We tried the bikes and they were beat up, run down bicycles plus it was too muggy.  The rooms by the pool are practical. The pool is nice. Other than the pool the amenities are more of a promise than a delivery.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wonderful staycation for us and our 1.5yo son!
Summary: My wife and I took our son (17 months old) on our first, out of town trip.  We were excited, and a little nervous to see how he'd do in a new place for 3 nights.    We were warmly and professionally greeted by Mark and Cole when we arrived in the valet area.  We had several encounters with both of them, and they were so helpful, friendly, and really took an interest in our son!  Side note, the valet is very expensive, and there's no street parking between 10pm-6am, so you're kind of stuck paying it!  The property itself is very nice, with terrific views of the ocean, and the harbor. It is a very family & kid friendly resort, complete with a "kids pool area."  Our son loved the putting green area with various toys and games available. It's really easy and nice to walk down to the
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed there over a weekend in July. We did not have a car and Ubered everywhere. When we checked out there were so many lines on the invoice what with resort fees and various taxes and meal expenses and those taxes. Only after double checking the invoice when we had returned home did we realize they charged us $46 for valet parking. We did not even have a car!!! I wonder how many people do not realize that they get charged for this in the multi line confusing invoice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Group of 25 and had great time at poolside with 15 kids doing many activities. However when it gets cold and dark your only gathering place in upstairs lounge. After spending $$$ at bar lounge - the appetizers menu lacked substance and we ordered a small delivery.  6 burritos to be split with adults as kids had eaten at lounge.    We then got thrown out for walking in with that order not even being opened.  Asked manager why and he said policy of hotel. People brought food everywhere in lobby, valet area and poolside brought in all day long.  When we ordered in a empty lounge  With only two other adults inside with us. I asked why? Policy!! I said to him you have a choice to do right by the customer- after all you have no sign , no other places for us to go with our kids. The
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was at the hotel for a wedding weekend. I will make a long story short. My husband and I sat by the pool and ordered lunch. He ordered a hamburger and I ordered tacos. The server delivered my ice tea but said my order would be coming soon. It was 12:10. Despite countless complaints which included learning the server neglected to write down my order. I was not served until after 2 pm. Even though the lunch was comped, the rudeness of all involved tarnishes my opinion of this hotel. I thought hotels were to provide hospitality!  The rooms were OK but the sheets had a bad smell of too much bleach! Never again!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was difficult to check in that I want to the ATM to get some money to tipsy valets while we went to dinner and the ATM took $100 out of my account and I had to call my bank to get my money back. Then my watch brought me a beautiful bowl of a watch for my birthday wish we were celebrating and when we left the room to check out she unfortunately left her watch in there and we went to go back to get it and they said the watch was not in the box which was empty which doesn‚Äôt make any sense so it was a disaster and not good

Summary: Lovely property in OC. We have stayed at the nearby Ritz and while we love that resort, the prices have really gotten out of hand. We loved the laid back vibe of the Laguna Cliffs resort. Wonderful pools with the BEST poolside food/beverage service we have ever experienced. They even had a very cool DJ one afternoon that was such a fun way to spend the afternoon. We had a very quiet room and never heard any noise from outside. We will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was one of the worst stays I‚Äôve had in a Marriott branded hotel years. Where do I even start?  Uncomfortable beds. Tons of light from the hallways pouring in through the door at night. You can hear every single sound from the hallway and your neighbors.  When we checked in, bathroom shower had hair from previous guest (I assume, ewww), the towels were stained, and the shower was clogged so there was an inch of standing water. Messaged the front desk and was assured that engineering would fix the clog the next day while we were out, but they didn‚Äôt even attempt, and I had to call back the next night to get it done. Summary: Stayed here last holiday weekend and had a pleasant experience.  The Asian lady at the front desk (didn't get her name, sorry) was really nice, we got to talking about how Marriott loves orchids, we have just been to the Ritz at Rancho Mirage the weekend prior where they had orchids all over.  We were slightly upgraded to 1 king bed, sofabed with pool view.  However, the room that we got had the A/C vent blowing through the sofabed and it was difficult to get a good night sleep, so we requested to be moved.  Susan at the FD was so kind and accommodating, she walked me to the room she was gonna move us to so I can see if it was suitable, now that's great customer service!  We eventually moved to a room on the 1st floor with coastal view and back porch.  It was spacious and we
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lovely manicured property with lots of ground space for kids to run around in and a park literally next door (just walk through a fence). Very friendly staff. VALET PARKING ONLY; you'll have to walk about 0.5 miles for street parking. I appreciated the comfortable bed and simply decorated room (no weird hotel art). The only problem is I'm a light sleeper and the shifting nonstop drone of an HVAC unit outside of the room kept me up most of the night. My partner, who's a good sleeper, didn't notice it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had the pleasure of staying at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort in June.  It is wonderful and relaxing place to stay.   The front desk staff are very professional and efficient.  We were greeted by the front office supervisor and he sincerely expressed the Marriott's appreciation of our choice to stay at the hotel. We were fortunate to be upgraded to an ocean view and it was gorgeous.  The location is fantastic.  You can walk down to the Dana Point Marina.  The Dana Point Marina has a number of casual dining places, a coffee house, and a great French Restaurant (Gimbels).  The resort has a family pool and an adult pool.  The hotel grounds are beautiful and well maintained.  The hotel rooms are nicely decorated and spacious.  The hotel charges a resort fee, which is a bit
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel cancelled my group meeting on 2 week notice.  They did this because another group at the hotel added more attendees on late notice.  We had a contract & room list submitted a month in advance of our stay.  This sudden change resulted in our group scrambling for another location, incurring flight change charges, & lost deposits on restaurant reservations.    Pass on this hotel.  Look for another resort that operates with integrity to host your event!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here in June 2022 as we were having our house in San Clemente repiped. We had a fabulous experience and loved how quiet our room was. We opted for a no view room which was great because the rooms with views overlook the pools which can be a little loud if you‚Äôre by the kids one! Loved how close this hotel is to Dana Point Harbor (just a short walk down the stairs). There are a lot of great food options nearby if you don‚Äôt want to stay on property. All of the staff we interacted with was top notch and we look forward to our next visit. The bed was so comfortable and the linens were phenomenal. Room was spotless and we had great Wi-Fi the whole stay.   Only negatives - $50 valet parking (no self parking on this property or nearby) and there are no Tesla chargers, which
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: GREAT! Just FYI on one thing....
Summary: This property is great!  Beautiful views!  Very attentive and friendly/helpful staff.  Brad in valet, Abby and Robert (kids pool wait staff), Jen (kids activities), Chris (front desk) Vienna (server) were all top notch!     FYI: We will stay here again BUT I will bring ear plugs.  If you are a light-ish sleeper like me just know that the building overlooking the kids pool (we were on the second floor on the west side) has  VERY POOR sound proofing.  You can hear everything - noise next door - complete conversations,  all water loudly (sink running, toilet and shower), water dripping from AC, hallway noise and pool activity.  You can hear it very clearly.  I am a light sleeper and did not sleep much on this trip.  Kids were in the pool at 8 AM on Saturday morning. It was
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here with a friend, had a lovely time relaxing, going to the spa, enjoying the marina.   Had an ocean view room - lovely view! Beautiful property up on a hill, lots of walking paths, parks, etc. This is a good choice if you want more of a resort feel, slightly away from it all.  Modern and spacious room, modern common areas.   I could have done without the required valet parking though.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that you and your friend had a relaxing stay at the resort. We are happy that you were able to enjoy the trails and ocean views. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Do you remember your perfect day?
Summary: Think about a memorable day in your life. A day where you woke up rested.  Had a perfect night sleep. Room was dark so you slept as long as you wanted. The coffee was hot and perfectly brewed.  You felt good - no aches and pains from an uncomfortable bed.  You sat out on your balcony listening to the birds and drinking the perfect coffee while looking out over the Pacific Ocean.  You relaxed in the morning sun.  You went out and had a perfect walk on the beach.  You came back and drank more coffee on the balcony and enjoyed a breakfast scone, a reward from your beach walk.  And you did walk up that massive hill.  You decide to join a yoga class overlooking the ocean right outside your room.  All this before 10 am. You‚Äôre a rock star and you feel like one too.  All because you
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that your perfect day was at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa! We are so happy that we not only met your expectations but we exceeded them. We appreciate your compliments and we hope to see you again soon. We'd love to welcome you back!

Summary: This property was a pleasant surprise. It's even nicer than in the photos. Lots of activities for kids (Mini golf, ping pong, splash park). Staff was nice and helpful. We had a great ground floor room with a patio. Restaurant has limited food options but had a kids menu with lots of options. Grab a yoga mat from reception and check out I Heart Yoga for oceanfront yoga just at the park in front of the hotel. Delightful!

We are happy you were able to enjoy all the resort amenities with your family. Thank you for your compliments regarding our friendly staff service. We hope you visit us again soon. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: me and my family decided to stay here for a weekend after we went to their spa which is amazing (less the masseuse).  Checking in was a breeze and the staff was very nice and accommodating.  upon checking in, we were told about hotel amenities briefly and was given our keys.  so we proceeded to our room.  the room was very good and we have the balcony facing the pool area (we are right at the middle of the building) and we love that so much.  it was very relaxing drinking our coffee while lounging in the chair in the balcony with partial ocean views.  the hotel itself, its amenities and its room is not the problem.  its the security in the area.  we were told that the pool is closed at 11pm.  past midnight, we heard some groaning noise so we opened our curtain to check what it
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations and the spa. However, we do regret that you felt there was a lack of response to your concern. We do NOT allow such behavior at the resort and we would address this type of issue immediately. If you have the specific time and date this occurred we would like to know so that we can look into it further with the staff. We appreciate your feedback and we look forward to discussing this further with you.

Summary: It had been years since we had stayed at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott and we were thrilled to see it's as great as ever.  It appears the hotel has recently been redone.  It was perfect for our family of four.  It's such a nice property with incredibly beautiful views and two totally separate pools.  One for adults and one for families and children.  The staff is top notch.  The food and service at the restaurant/lounge are outstanding.  I had been disheartened by the quality of some Marriott property hotels since the pandemic started.  Some other locations have appeared rundown and services have been next to nothing.  But the Laguna Cliffs Marriott looks great, has daily housekeeping (hard to find these days!), turn down service in the evening, and gives Marriott elites a full
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your compliments regarding our hotel and staff. Your safety is of upmost importance to us and we take every precaution to ensure that. We hope that you visit us again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: Excellent in every way. Super outgoing and friendly staff. Rooms and public areas were spotlessly clean. Solid Covid protocols for all staff members. Starbucks on premise. The restaurant was above average for a hotel but the menu a bit limited in scope. Beautiful ocean views from the bar/restaurant, pool areas and multiple patios. Being on the bluffs makes the view great but the 118 steps up and down to the marina,dining and shopping area could be a challenge for some. Overall highly recommend the Laguna Cliffs Marriot.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you found your stay to be excellent in every way. Thank you for your compliments regarding our friendly and attentive staff as well as the cleanliness of the resort. We appreciate your recommendation to family and friends and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Just spent 5 days at Laguna Cliffs after a last minute pivot from the Hyatt Huntington Beach due to the tragic oil spill.  Laguna Cliffs was fantastic right from the start.  We booked enroute to the hotel and arrived exhausted after a long drive -- they setup our pack and play within minutes and helped get us settled. The service from the restaurant, pool, bellhop, valet, front desk were all fantastic. If there is still a labor shortage -- you don't feel it here. Staff is eager and friendly. It was midweek, and the hotel was quite slow....but there was plenty of staff on hand should it have been busier. The room well appointed, the pools and grounds were fantastic for the kids, the view ---no words needed. The restaurant could have a more robust menu given that's all that was
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your 5 days with us. Thank you for the compliments regarding our attentive staff. Your comfort is our top priority. Thank you for your review. We look forward to having you return!

Summary Heading: A nice stay in Dana Point!
Summary: Overall we had a very good stay.  The room was nice, clean & comfortable.  The views from the hotel were excellent and the staff very friendly.  The grounds are well kept and it's nice to relax and walk around Lantern Bay park in front of the hotel.  We had dinner at Vue Restaurant and was told fireworks would come right up in front of us (since it was 4th of July).  However, the trees blocked the firework view.  It was a pretty good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the resort views and the comfort of your guest room. We regret that you couldn't see the full fireworks from your location. We hope that you did enjoy your visit with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Overall a real nice place to stay.   Easy check in.  Very friendly staff.  Clean room with a comfy bed and nice shower.   Very nice bar area with a beautiful view south down the coast and the pacific.  10 min walk to doheny beach.     Stay at this hotel w confidence.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and took advantage walking to Doheny Beach. Thank you for your compliments regarding our guestrooms and friendly staff. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Dark cave room + mosquitos = a grand at Laguna Cliffs Marriott
Summary: 9/25/2021.  On our way to the hotel at 5:00pm, I tried to check in with the app.  It wouldn't let me check in until 5:45, even though the check-in time was at 4:00.  We got to the hotel and I made this known to the front desk.   The gentleman took on inordinate amount of time checking us in and said that they were having "technical difficulties" (no internet) on the south side of the hotel, where our assigned room was.  So he put us in a different room, which I assumed would be as good as the one we booked, a "resort view" room.  Well, he put us in the worst room on the entire property.  It did not have a resort view, but a wall view, which worked to prevent any light from coming in.  It was like being in a dark cave.  The room was $1,095.95.  We had a dinner reservation to get
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Your review is very important to us. Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay at our Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa.  Please accept our sincerest apologies for the mosquitoes that inadvertently entered your guestroom.  As you can imagine, it is our daily intent to ensure each guest‚Äôs stay is enjoyable, relaxing and a memorable experience.  Pursuant to your report, our Front Desk team requested for Ecolab (an independent pest control company) to assess this situation.  Ecolab informed us that extreme heat and humidity in our region over the past few weeks has caused an increase in mosquito activity.  Please be assured this is not the norm for this area and this was an isolated incident.  We certainly appreciate your constructive feedback and hope your travels will bring you back to our resort in the future so we may ensure your next stay is a truly memorable one.

Summary: I had to share the amazing stay we had at this resort. My husband and I were here from 9/4-9/7. The moment you pull up to the hotel you are welcomed by a very friendly and efficient staff. We were helped at the desk quickly and all questions I had were answered. Our room was extremely clean and roomy! We came to CA for a wedding, but also a mini getaway. This hotel exceeded our expectations in every way! Do yourself a favor and book this hotel the next time you are planning a stay in the Dana Point/Laguna Beach area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy that you chose our resort for your getaway. We hope you had a wonderful time at the wedding and we look forward to having you return.

Summary: My wife and I enjoyed our quick getaway. Staff was extremely conscientious and considerate. We needed our room serviced before regular rounds. Five minutes after our call 4 members of the house cleaning team appeared and had the room sparkling in 10 minutes. Room is modern and very clean. We had the pool/resort view.  You will get a great view of the harbor and ocean with the ocean view rooms. Hallways are clean. Location is great. You can easily get to Laguna Beach for more action. Dana Point is a bit more quiet and reserved. Pool areas were great especially if you have a family. Very much a relaxing resort feel. We would go back again if our future plans bring us to the Dana Point area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your getaway! We appreciate your compliments regarding our friendly staff and the resort grounds. We hope your travels do bring you back to Dana Point in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: We loved this resort from the time we checked in till the time we checked out.  Our rooms were beautiful and exceptionally clean.  They offered great pool areas that our children enjoyed.  We also enjoyed the putting green and indoor game area that was offered.  We had dinner at the lounge the first night of our stay and enjoyed the offerings very much.  Every staff member we encountered were very helpful and kind especially Chris at the front desk.  We stayed here the last 2 days of our vacation and they made it hard to want to go home.  We hope to return on a future trip! Thank you for your hospitality!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed your time from start to finish at the resort. We appreciate your compliments regarding our friendly and helpful staff and we hope you visit us again in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: HUGE WEDDING. SO MUCH FOR QUIET COSTAL
Summary: Arrived  Friday Night to full blown wedding party Right outside room Was supposed to have a COASTAL VIEW HAD PARTY VIEW AND SMELLS  Management wasn‚Äôt very concerned Thought it was ok to Pay $750 a night to watch hotel. Be over run by wedding party
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We understand that your concerns were addressed by our management team.

Summary: This was our first time at this beautiful resort and we were beyond impressed! The grounds are absolutely gorgeous we have enjoyed numerous resorts and this was over the top beautiful! The restaurant bartenders were exceptional thank you so much!!!We have our next stay scheduled and can‚Äôt wait to get back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience your first time at the resort. We can't wait to welcome you back!

Summary: Just stayed with family for the weekend .  Overall nice hotel and especially good for families.  Excellent amenities for kids and couples.   The splash pad and kids activities were terrific.  Amenities include Kiddy pool, kids club,  putting green,  cornhole, ping pong and even water balloons the day we were there! The staff was mostly good.  One of the pool bartenders had a personality problem, but, besides him everyone was friendly.  Doheny state beach is within walking distance .  There is also a park across the street.  Room was pretty typical for a Marriott .  Highly recommend you get one with a balcony or patio .  Our bed did have a creaky and stiff mattress .  The cleaning was so so but updated walk in shower .  Good choice if traveling with kids.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed the resorts amenities and we are happy to hear that you took advantage of walking to Doheny beach. Thank you for your feedback regarding one of our staff members. You comments are very important to us and we will be sure to share it with our team. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: Absolutely amazing!! Beautiful hotel and location!  Lu Duffy was so nice at check in and really set my entire trip up for success. The grounds are beautiful and can‚Äôt wait to come back.  The bikes and all the other amenities were so much fun and definitely has an amazing view of the water.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that one of our associates was able to provide you with great service. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of the resort's amenities. We hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Beautiful resort - perfect for families OR couples, which I find is often hard to find.   Our kids enjoyed the DelMar pool area - in addition to the pool, it features a large baby pool, and a splash pad with attached surf boards for the kids to play on. There is also a small putting range and table tennis. The pool loungers are extremely comfortable, and there is poolside service for food/drinks. If you prefer a quieter pool scene, there is an additional pool deck located on property.   Since we were traveling with kids, we also appreciated the kids club. Thanks to Annie for keeping our kids occupied with crafts and games while we enjoyed some quiet time!   This resort was just what we were looking for - kid friendly enough so they don't get bored, but still relaxing, quiet, and
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and fond memories of the resort. We do pride ourselves in the level of customer service we provide our guests and we are delighted to hear that you experienced it. We cannot wait to welcome you back!

Summary: Overall, I would give the Marriott at Laguna Cliffs a great rating.  The property was clean, updated (rooms as well) and had beautiful views.  We stayed 4 nights here for a business trip mixed with some vacationing.  The place was like a ghost town, it seemed there was barely anyone else staying here the second week of May 2021.  We had the pool and hot tub pretty much to ourselves.  The valet was quick with awesome service.  We are Bonvoy members and only stay at Marriott hotels and have come to expect a comfortable experience with them.  With that being said, we booked an ocean view room with 2 double beds and a balcony.    The beds were TERRIBLE and the pillows were just as bad (flat with no support), I could not even believe the poor quality with these.  We have never
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Your feedback is very important to us and we will be sure to share your comments with the appropriate team members. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff and amenities. Thank you again for your review.

Summary Heading: Overvue Restaurant at Laguna Cliffs Marriott
Summary: What an amazing lunch meal served by incredible & talented server Carlos, with over 28 years of experience here! The food was truly amazing, very fresh ingredients and a billion dollar view overlooking Dana Point Harbor.    Rod and Brandon you are doing a super job with the talent and Service level at your resort. Thank you for opening back up and setting new standards for excellence in Southern California.  We will be back again soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your lunch and the beautiful ocean views during your visit with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff service and we will be sure to share your compliments with our team. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We were so happy that the Laguna Cliffs Marriott has now reopened after being closed for renovation. My husband and I live close by and have stayed at this hotel several times but mainly we come to have some drinks and food and enjoy the panoramic views of the ocean and Dana Point Harbor from their outdoor bar patio area. I had called ahead and they do limit seating and ask for reservations on the weekend.  When we entered we were greeted with a warm hello and welcome back from the bartender Christine. She has been working there for many years and always gives amazing service.   All covid protocol was in place and we felt very comfortable finally being able to visit one of our favorite places. The valet and indoor staff were very courteous and up to high Marriott standard.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review! We are delighted to have welcomed you back. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the time you spent with us and the familiar faces at the resort. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: We had a gift certificate for the spa.  We called the hotel and asked if the gift certificate could be applied to the room charge, and a very friendly staff member told us "absolutely."  We booked.  So, we arrived at check in, presented our gift certificate, and were told it could not be applied.  We recounted our conversation from when we booked.  Still no.  Spoke to the manager.  Still no - "the spa and hotel are separate."  Even though we could clearly see that it was very low occupancy at the time, they were not willing to work with us.  So, we left.  Very frustrating.    But we very much enjoyed our stay at a rival hotel that is actually ocean front in Laguna.  DISCLAIMER: This happened in Oct 2019 but I cannot select that far back.
Manager Response: Dear William C,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your experience last year. I was very sorry to hear about your frustration for not being able to use your certificate. Some certificates are issued for specific services only and may not be interchangeable. While I do not have much information about the situation as it has been a year, I would be happy to answer any questions, or look into the matter further.   Sincerely,

Summary: I have stayed at the Marriott Laguna Cliffs many times.  This time I booked it for a weekend with friends from college.  A few days before going, I checked the Marriott website and the room cost had gone down $12 per night.  I tried to re-book at the new rate, but the website had a problem and would not accept my valid AAA card for the discount I had on my original reservation.  I ended up talking to customer support, and even he could not get the website to work, so I gave up.  Here's the good part - I mentioned this in passing to Sara at the Front Desk when we were checking in.  After going out, we returned in the evening to find chocolate covered strawberries and a fancy ice bucket with champagne flutes and a bottle of Champagne! The berries were delish and I don't even
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that our front desk agent was able to brighten your day and make your stay memorable. Our goal is to not only meet your expectations but exceed them.  We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fee rates and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.

Summary: Loved the location, just a series of steps from the marina and all the shops and restaurants it had to offer. Also really enjoyed being able to bicycle around the area with the complimentary bikes available at the hotel. And, thank you, to the server who gave us a free dessert in celebration of my wife's birthday.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We feel honored that you chose our resort to celebrate your wife's birthday. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the resort amenities and the surprise dessert for your wife. We appreciate your compliments and we hope that you visit us again in the future.

Summary: A quick decision to grab lunch before leaving for the long drive to Los Angeles was the best decision of the day. The appetizer of choice is the dates wrapped with bacon. Then the tacos with the seaweed shells. Plus, the food was timely and extremely taste-full. To top it off, the amazing view from the hilltop... Basically, can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the views from our OverVue deck and all of your lunch entrees. We look forward to welcoming you back and our new restaurant, Outer Reef by Chef John Tesar will be opening in the Spring. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Our team booked a conference at Laguna Cliffs. I flew in from out of state and had no idea where I was staying. I‚Äôm so glad we stayed here!  Absolutely beautiful location, close to the beach, a lot to do in the area, and many locations for great food. We were here for 3 days and I still don‚Äôt feel like I did half of what was available!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are happy to hear that this was your first time at the resort and we left a memorable impression on you. We hope you visit us again for business or pleasure soon! We would love to welcome you back!

Summary: Very Nice Hotel, Pricy rooms & Car valet,  Great breakfst, snacks,etc.Great bed. Not enought TV channells, Long walk from room to breakfast service, especially with walker. Good nearby restauranrts.  Excellent staff.  Hotel Reno of restaurant not finished, Noisy.  Beatuiful setting. Close but not on beach,
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review and 5 stars! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you took in all the ocean views and were able to have a relaxing stay. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: Check in and out was easy. They only have valet parking which to me is annoying. The room and baathroom were very nice. The towels were pristine and fluffy. The shower stall was lovely with 2 showerheads and some toiletries. Everything looked new and clean. We didn't get a balcony but that was OK.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed our hotel and our new renovations. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My husband booked an Ocean View Full Balcony room (their highest category of room) for a quick Valentines celebration. We arrived early as we had booked a couples massage at the Spa. The front desk staff were very friendly and got us into the room early (2:00 vs 4:00). Here is where everything went wrong, our ‚ÄúOcean View‚Äù room was blocked right in the middle by a 6‚Äô pillar (see photos). We attempted to call front desk but the phone was dead, the bellhop called on his phone to see about a replacement room. Ellie, his supervisor, refused to move us to a comparable room and noted that all Ocean View rooms had obstructions, this most certainly is not the case (again see photo). I would like to point out that we are Marriott Bonvoy members - our brand loyalty made no difference. We
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us.  As a Marriott Bonvoy member you are one of our most valued guests and I sincerely apologize that your guestroom's design did not meeting you expectations.  We have 378 guestrooms at our resort with many angles towards the ocean, therefore a guestrooms appeal is always open to interpretation.  Your guestroom is categorized as one of our ‚Äúocean view‚Äù guestrooms and while we hope the layout of our guestrooms and their view will meet every guest‚Äôs expectations it is not always possible.  As you can imagine, it is our daily intent to ensure each guest‚Äôs stay is enjoyable and relaxing and I regret this issue put a damper on your stay.     Once again, we appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and hope you will continue to choose our Marriott properties during your future travels.

Summary: nice area, little uphill location guarantees excellent views on the pacific ocean. the hotel has multiple pools and a very friendly service team. you can relax and refresh, going to the beach is not far bit uphill walk in the sun gets a little exhausting
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed the awesome view and great service. We cannot wait to host you again soon!

Summary: This has a great location right above the Harbor & that's about the best things about it.  It wants to be a resort but it feels like an old Best Western.  It needs upgrades so bad we ended up checking out & staying at another property (we also had an ocean view & that wasn't even worth staying).  There's valet parking & Resort Fees - which I have no problem paying if it feels like a resort which it clearly does not.    Would be a good place for a work conference but other than that - I wouldn't stay here or recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide us your honest feedback about your recent stay. We do apologize that your stay with us did not meet your expectation. We strive to please all our guests and hope you will give us another chance in the future.

Summary Heading: Ideal Hotel for Relaxation and Beautiful View
Summary: Popular Laguna Cliffs Hotel is a perfect place to enjoy the Pacific in Southern California. Friendly staff and comfortable quiet rooms overlooking the Dana Point Yacht Basin.  Easy walk down to the harbor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our friendly staff and comfortable rooms. We hope to see you here again!

Summary: I stayed at the property several times over the course of a few weeks this winter, using it as a home base in the Laguna Beach / Dana Point in between other trips.  I had a wonderful time.  The rooms are very comfortable and the staff extremely friendly.  The views and overall ambiance are fantastic.  Very few complaints overall, but would just note that the rooms can vary significantly view-wise.  Lack of non-valet parking is mildly inconvenient, but not out of the norm for similar properties.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you had such a great time and you enjoyed our renovations. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Stayed here recently for a girls trip, it was absolutely great! Can‚Äôt say enough good things about the service we received. They Aced it on customer service in my book. Cheese board was phenomenal, breakfast delicious, and the views of the harbor were fantastic! Will definitely stay again!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you had such great service and that you enjoyed the amenities and the views. We cannot wait to have you again!

Summary: On a whim, we decided to visit and stay at Dana Point. Jordan really came through with an amazing room that had the.best.views. of the ocean. The room was clean and quiet. We had an awesome visit! Please don't pass up an opportunity to stay, you won't regret it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you decided to come stay with us here in Dana Point. It sounds like you enjoyed your ocean view room and working with all of our staff members. We hope to see you again!

Summary: absolutely amazing experience ! The hotel is beautiful but what made it more special were the people working here . Especially Jordan Holland , he welcomed us and was so kind and caring for me and my family . Thank you !!!we will be back !
Manager Response: We are so glad that you had such great service. It sounds like you enjoyed our beautiful hotel as well. Thank you for your review and we cannot wait to host you again!

Summary Heading: I am only reviewing the breakfast buffet
Summary: I have never stayed at this place (too close to where I live) so I am only reviewing their breakfast buffet. It is very good. Food is fresh, fruits are juicy and flavorful and the juices are mostly freshly squeezed and not out of a carton. Omelettes are made to order and the choice of items available for brunch is extensive and everyone will find something they like. I believe I paid $30 per person for the buffet but it well worth the price. Outdoor seating provides nice ocean views.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad you joined us for breakfast and we are glad that you enjoyed it. We hope to see you back again!

Summary: Room was adequate; nice to have a little patio and a partial view of the coast.  But, the first-floor facing-inland is very noisy so you would not use the patio or keep your door open.  Bed, towels, sheets all at brand quality.  Good number of outlets.  Internet worked fine.  Conference rooms also adequate.  Dining services average.  Location: not an easy walk to shops, restaurants or shore b/c it's all up hill on the way back; very busy streets on the way there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad you enjoyed the beds and that the internet was perfect for your conference. We hope you choose to stay with us again.

Summary: We stayed here for a 5 night family vacation.  Everything was fantastic!  Staff was very friendly.  The pools were nice.  Since we were there in October the pool was not all that active.  The restaurant was a great choice for breakfast and we had a delicious lunch on our day of arrival.  The Dana Point area is absolutely beautiful and worth exploring.  It is close to both LA and San Diego.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, we are so glad that you had a fantastic family vacation! It sounds like you were able to enjoy the on property amenities as well as the surrounding areas. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We were at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott for just one night on Christmas Eve.  The staff was very friendly checking in and we had a beautiful room on the third floor with an excellent view.  We took a beautiful walk along their paths down to the park and harbor.  The hot tubs are great and the views are wonderful.  This is a Marriott property so the beds and rooms are very comfortable.  Parking is valet only, but they retrieved our car quickly.  Had a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you were able to spend the holidays with us and enjoy the hot tubs and newly renovated rooms. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: This hotel used to be wonderful. Not anymore . The employees from the bar tender to the front desk manager are rude . The hotel is also under construction and is not noted anywhere when making a reservation Sliding glass door is a sharp leg cutting hazard . Issues with billing but that was the least of my worries. Didn‚Äôt even get to explain the complaints to front desk manger Ellie.She was the worst rude person I have ever Encountered at a hotel . Save your money and stay somewhere else . Had to crop my sunset picture because the terrible construction going on . Definitely not Bonvoy standards.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize about the experience that you encountered here at the hotel. We strive to please all of our guests and are sorry that we did not meet your expectations.

Summary: We are lifetime platinum Marriott members.  Yesterday when we checked in our room was not ready.  The man, Michael on the desk was not very welcoming.  The hotel has no concierge lounge.  We accepted a lesser room in order to check in.  The phone in the room didn‚Äôt work so we waited on someone to fix it.  Today it‚Äôs not working again.  I had difficulty sleeping because in spite of considerable renovations at the hotel the heating system is obviously very old and makes a lot of noise when it comes on right by the bed.  I would not recommend or return to this hotel.  I think we are owed some points or compensation for this stay.  Martha Quinton
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being Platinum members with us. We do apologize that we did not meet your expectations as we do try to make all of our customers happy. We hope to see you again!

Summary: As it was recently remodeled to the nines, this is THE place to stay in Dana Point (if you don;t feeling like spending $600/night). Staff is wonderful, location is great, bar/restaurant has a great view, and rooms are fresh and spacious. What's not to like?
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our remodel and our staff. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Just a get away from everything
Summary: Within walking distance of donhey beach, hotel fun, very active (wedding, wedding rehearsal, galas), room with view of ocean & excellent, great lounge. We would return again and again. Great staff and very friendly. Beautiful and pristine.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. We cannot wait to host you again!

Summary Heading: Great üëç lace for a Christmas Party
Summary: We had our office Christmas üéÑ Party there and it was wonderful! Beautiful accommodations, very friendly staff. However they don‚Äôt have a store for sundries, and they only list and describe their amenities on the TV, with h no prices or phone numbers.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so glad that you had a wonderful Christmas party and we hope to host you again next year. Check out our lobby shop next time as we have something for everyone.

Summary Heading: Front Desk Night staff insensitive and rude response to needs of guest in wheelchair.
Summary: Family Thanksgiving gathering with 9 rooms reserved for 21 people. The following is what I was attempting to tell the front desk night manager, Michael W., but he was belligerent and rude:  My first call for a reservation was made 8/22/19 for 1 room for 2 nights for my husband and myself. I called later on 11/8/19 to add a separate mobility accessible room for our daughter who is in a wheelchair. The reservation agent could not find our reservation nor any but 1 party‚Äôs reservations so I made the new reservations for both rooms and was given instructions for me to cancel the first one made 8/22/19. I, along with every one else in our party, later changed all the reservations to prepaid. When we checked in to our room, the front desk did not show the other reservation as a
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We do regret that there seemed to be a miscommunication in the room (s) you requested. We can assure you that our staff is extremely professional and understanding and as you will read from previous reviews, Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa receives great compliments regarding it's staff. We are aware of your concerns and will address them with the staff. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: This hotel may not be as fancy or as close to the beach as some of the others in the area (eg Ritz, Monarch Beach Resort), but it was certainly convenient. The PCH and the 5 are right there, and there are a lot of good restaurants and shops within walking distance of the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Am here for a work conference nearby.  Was put in a terrible accessible room (all business travelers understand this).  Got back to my room after a long day to discover the battery in the door lock was dead.  Waited nearly 40 minutes for someone from  ‚Äúengineering.‚Äù Absolutely, no urgency while I stood outside my room waiting.  I watched them walk slowly down the long hallway.  After fumbling around, they literally had to break into my room with some sort of hotel room slim jim.  I was told hotel policy is to replace the batteries in the locks (which would prevent this from happening) when they die.  I wonder if they apply the same policy to the smoke detectors?  I also seriously wonder whether this would have been issue had I not had a handicapped room - which makes this so
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize that our service was not up to standard. We strive to please all of our guests and are sorry that our response time took a while to amend the problem. We do hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: The hotel was under going some construction but the section we stayed in was very nice. The room was a good size and was well equipped and functional. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. I had all 3 meals in their lounge and found the food to be really good, and the views were gorgeous. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you had a wonderful stay! We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stay at hotels probably 30 times a year.  The two men at the front desk here are probably the nicest people we have met at any hotel. Their names Michael and Alex and they  did everything possible to make sure we felt welcomed and appreciated.  They could not be nicer.  They are an absolute asset to this company and an example of total 5 star service.  I really appreciate this hotel from having people like this.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and we hope to see you here again soon!

Summary Heading: Excellent location.  Good infrastructure but not a resort by any means
Summary: We were expecting that all the services they advertise on their website would be available but almost all the ‚Äúresort services‚Äù (bar and cafe near the pool, kinda camp, etc) were shut as we were apparently in the ‚Äúoff season‚Äù in November.  Someone did not tell their billing department who charge the exact same resort fee even though the services are curtailed
Manager Response: Dear 183dilipb,  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback about your stay. We do apologize that your stay was not satisfactory. During winter we provide pool service through our In Room Dining department. They are available during pool opening hours by picking up the phone that is located at each pool side. While some activities are available during summer and holiday seasons, we do provide all amenities included in the Resort Fee year around. These include surfboards, bicycles, table tennis, putting green, Pickle Ball and Bocce ball and many other activities. I hope you will visit us again and enjoy your time with us.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Location and View Magnificent....NOT WORTH IT!
Summary: I returned for the third time because I hoped it was going to improve.....third time was not the charm.  The location is great - right off 5 and south of Laguna with easy access to Orange County and San Diego.  The rooms were redone in the last few years so relatively up to date.  The bedding is comfortable and the rooms are clean.  But.....they just cannot get their service together.  My air conditioner was not working - I had to ask three times for the repair to happen.  I needed a room with double beds and I had accidentally booked a king.  I called and changed it directly with the hotel.  You guessed it, still had the king bed booked....changed it but what was the point of the call.  I didn't have a hot shower all three days - just luckwarm....UGH.  Sat in the bar for 15
Manager Response: Dear sctemp2,  Thank you for your review and honest feedback. We apologize that your stay with us was unsatisfactory. It is our daily goal to provide all our guests with excellent service and I am very sorry that we failed to do this during you visit. Thank you for your kind words about our valet team, we'll be sure to pass on the compliments.  Sincerely,

Summary: Great for morning walks and yoga.  There is a walking/jogging trail access from the hotel. Spa is alright.  Breakfast buffet has good choices and good quality.  Good banquet halls and lounges.  Rooms are of good size with balconies.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you were able to take advantage of our hotel activities including yoga on our beautiful lawn. We are glad to see you enjoyed the renovations as well! We hope to see you back again soon.

Summary: First of all, I never write reviews but my experience with this resort has been so terrible I had to. I booked this resort for a special weekend and it started off on the wrong foot when they could not find our reservation, front desk clerks were not helpful or apologetic about the inconvenience after about 20 minutes of not finding the booking they just randomly through us in a room that was not what we paid for, plus to find out later they charged me twice which was probably for the original room. I asked for a king bed and they gave us two full beds which I had called 3 times the week before to make sure we had amenities and services set up for my wife's birthday and our anniversary, which they dropped the ball. Concierge told me they would email me (never did) of things that
Manager Response: Dear ktm510,  Thank you for your review. I was sorry to hear your recent visit was not satisfactory. Our team strives to provide all our guests with excellent customer service and create memorable experience which we clearly failed to accomplish this time. It caught my attention that you mentioned a billing error which should be easily fixed. Please, contact us with details about the billing so that we can help resolve the issue.  Best regards,

Summary: I would have given this resort 5 stars, except that they charged my son $7 in order to park (valet parking only) in order to come have breakfast with us.  I have no idea if the valet parking is owned by Marriott or is contracted out, but considering the prices they were charging for their breakfast, I think they could have validated his parking ticket for free parking.  If they contracted out the valet service, they could have paid the parking service for the parking in order to have people come and spend more money at their resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay! Our valet is contracted out and we hope to see you here again!

Summary Heading: Did not feel like a resort
Summary: This is a beautiful location and a very nice property.  We were excited to stay for our anniversary.  The valet service was excellent and friendly.  Other than those things, there is a lot of opportunity for improvement.  Our family left us a a bottle of champagne and some treats and asked the front desk if they could arrange nicely in our room.  When we entered the room we found the Trader Joe's bag set on the dresser.   We went out to the pool on Monday and there was no service for drinks or food.  We were told the pool was technically closed because it was "off-season".  We ordered room service which was prompt and the food was tasty.  Our stay was 3 nights and our room was only serviced once and only because we called and scheduled a housekeeping service. On day of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize that you were not satisfied with your stay. We only serve food at the pool during the summer months. As for your housekeeping and customer service we hope to please you next time during your stay. If you choose to stay again we would love to show you our wonderful service!

Summary: We were staying at this hotel in October for 4 days 3 nights Wycliffe Associate President‚Äôs Conference. The front desk representative Lucy Chu did an excellent job in checking us in, making sure to call us when room is ready, suppressing us with complementary breakfast in celebrating our 21th anniversary, and went extra miles to handle our luggages in person to bring them to our room. What an outstanding service that exceed Marriott‚Äôs worldwide branding and reputation fabulously!! This made our stay an unforgettable and rewarding one!! Great service also provided by the Valet parking staffs as well as front desk staff Nick. Great facility with stunning views and walking trails. Will definitely come back again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and experienced such great service. We hope to see you here again soon!

Summary: I was so excited to be coming back to this resort because I remember it being one of my favorite Marriott resorts.  The rooms have been upgraded - they are very clean, comfortable and the location is wonderful.  There were a few things that were less then perfect, but there was always someone who at least tried to fix the problem.    I was here again for a business trip, so I ate at the "buffets."  The eggs at breakfast are just not good.  They did try to fix them, but they were basically the same (only a little warmer).  The bar was crowded because there was another company have a meeting.  There were three bartenders so we did get drinks, but I have to say the older gentleman was just miserable.  The younger gentleman did his best to make up for his co worker.  I would
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad you wanted to come back and that you enjoyed the new renovations. We do apologize that the restaurant was not up to your standards. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: My husband and I are locals and the first time we came to your hotel, went to the bar for drinks waited 25 minutes for bartender to even come to our table. After that my husband was really upset so I went to the bar and got us drinks. We decide to give your hotel one more chance so on Saturday we went again. We waited at your bar 35 minutes, no one touched our table. We went to the front desk and asked to see the manager - a man who works there said he was a manager (highly doubt) and after we explained him in a very well-mannered way, he said to us: ‚ÄúOK, goodbye‚Äù. No emotions, no ‚ÄúI‚Äôm sorry‚Äù. Terrible hotel, will never come back. And you really lost good customers because we like hanging at good places and do spend a lot!!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize that you did not receive good service at our restaurant. It is our goal to treat all of our customers with nothing but upmost satisfaction. We do hope that in the future you decide to give us another chance. We do apologize for your experience and will inform the correct departments of the situation.

Summary: I have had the pleasure of staying here several times. Each visit was better than the next! The staff is beyond accommodating and the views of Dana Point incredible.  The open air restaurant has great food and superb views.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you continue to come back and enjoy our impeccable service. We can't wait to see what you think of the new restaurant!

Summary: We were here for an outing with a group of about 25.  There is valet parking only.  Fabulous location above the harbor.  We were disappointed to have two beds rather than a king and when I asked to change was told they were 105% booked and they had made a mistake when they remodeled to have too many rooms with two doubles rather than a king.  While there was a resort fee we used nothing so that's always a sore subject.  It was so nice to have an alarm clock in our room since most hotels don't seem to offer them anymore, but ours didn't work.  I asked for it to be replaced but it wasn't.  The location is close to nice trails if one likes to hike.  I did a hike in the Headland Reserve with a naturalist (a five minutes drive) and it was wonderful as was their nature center.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Overall it sounds like you had a pleasant stay. We hope to welcome you back again soon and make the changes in order to make your next stay great!

Summary: The general vibe of the hotel is relaxing and pleasant. It's not gonna blow anyone's socks off but it's nice. This was our second time to the property for a quick getaway. On our arrival the guy at the front desk tried to upgrade us to a room for $50 that would have been more expensive than if we just chose that room in the first place.  Keep in mind that there is a combination of the resort fee + valet fee. Resort is $29 and valet is $39. It's seems so lame that they can't just combine them. There are zero other parking options for the property so valet is your only option. This property really seems like more of a business/conference property. I don't recommend this property for a pool day. They swear the pool heated to 81 degrees but it doesn't seem like it. While we were in
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. We appreciate your feedback. Our prices are competitive to the surrounding areas and with different departments we have to make sure revenue goes to the proper departments. We happily serve food and drinks at the pool during the summer and would love for you to come back and experience that. Once our brand new restaurant opens we will have wonderful options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. We do have in room dining service with a great menu that we deliver to your room. We hope you choose to stay with us again and experience all of our wonderful amenities!

Summary: My husband had a conference at this hotel last week and I joined him for the last couple days for some R & R. The hotel is older, but has been updated and didn‚Äôt really feel old! Our room was great‚Äîdidn‚Äôt love the pillows and didn‚Äôt love that there was no fan in the bathroom but besides that we really enjoyed the room. It was clean, comfortable and spacious.   The pool areas were fantastic and well-maintained. If you are wanting to enjoy the hot tub, use the Del Mar pool, not the Laguna. The jets in the Laguna jacuzzi were not that strong. Kind of a bummer, since the Laguna pool area is touted as being more adult friendly with less kids. Del Mar has a really nice area with daybeds overlooking the ocean as well. Enjoyed lounging around!   It was very close to Doheny Beach, which
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you had a relaxing stay and we hope to have you visit us here again soon!

Summary Heading: Very comfortable hotel with great location
Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel for Ohana music festival with my adult children and small grandchildren for two nights. The rate was almost double the usual rate due to the location next to the festival but I think it was almost worth it.  The service was great, especially Jordan Holland who emailed me out of the blue to help with any needs before my arrival! She was able to make sure the family was all together which made a big difference to us. Also the wait staff for breakfast was incredible, very attentive and friendly! Thanks to the valet staff as well, also very friendly. The hotel is up on a hill with amazing views of the ocean. One place to eat, small but an outside sitting area which is so nice. Bar at night was very busy due to the concert, but small overall.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do appreciate your Platinum loyalty and we are so glad you were able to stay at our beautiful property. It sounds like you had a great stay and that you were able to enjoy many of the wonderful amenities on property. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Amazing one night stay at Laguna Cliffs Marriott
Summary: This hotel is 5 star with the property, location and service.  Jordan Holland took care of us even though we only stayed one night for a wedding at another venue.  He was in contact with me prior to checking in.  And I would like to mention Aldo at the front desk.  Same excellent customer service and birthday gift.  We felt like royals.  The property is beautiful, very clean and has wonderful views of the Pacific Ocean.  The small suite we were in was very nice.  We had a couple of bites at their restaurant and it was very good.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay! We cannot wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary Heading: Don't go if you don't get an ocean view Room guaranteed
Summary: It's interesting how after reading some of the other reviews that I have experienced a similar situation with being told "we don't have a Room with a ocean view" and then they come up with one  if you persist and complain.   It's actually a very good resort and it is centralized to where you have access to a freeway the ocean the beaches the restaurants it's just a great location. If you get a good price compared to some of the other hotels in the area then great if not I suggest you save a few dollars maybe go to another hotel and use the money you have saved to eat out at the neist restaurants and enjoy the beautiful town of Dana Point California.  If money is not an issue it is one of the top 3 hotels in the area. The other 2 being the Ritz Carlton and the Monarch Beach
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We have specific rooms you can book with us and we are happy to always check our availability. We are so glad you enjoyed the surrounding area and restaurants. We hope to have you back with us again soon!

Summary: We entered the lobby and we were pleasantly surprised. The young man at the reception (Nick) was very personable and made a great small talk, ending that he gave me the best room in the hotel. I walked happily with my two kids to the room to figure out that the best room, was basically on top of the highway.  Yes, they DO have rooms with balconies on the highway. Those are the best rooms.  I called from the room and told him that I do not like to look at the highway and there was no description that says that they had rooms looking towards the highway. He told me we should look at the website as this is mentioned in the room description. Please DO make sure to make that change to your website, it is a major omission.  He said he needs to call me back, as he needs to figure out
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize that we were unable to accommodate your requests and that we did not have an Ocean View room available. Due to high volume and occupancy we strive to please all of our guests. We do appreciate your Gold status and loyalty and we hope to see you again in the future. Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: I blame this all in communication. My husband and I are out here for work/fun. He has a big presentation and had things shipped. We arrived and they automatically said his package had arrived (this is 4:00) and they will bring it to our room. We wait till 5:00-still no package. We call and they said they will bring it up. We want to go to dinner so at 7:00 we walk to he lobby and we ask where the package is at. They cannot locate it. -first point, why didn‚Äôt they say this earlier- now we ask them to text if they find it as we go to dinner because this is crucial for his presentation the next morning. We come back to the hotel at 9:00 and not only did they not locate the package, they did not know what we are taking about. So now we ask for people to assist. We ask what will
Manager Response: Dear Babylisa13,  Please accept my deepest apologies for the communications issue and delay in delivering your husband's package. We have fallen short of our goal to provide our guests with the highest level of service during your visit. Please, be assured that we have shared your feedback with the leaders of the departments involved, to ensure that we provide the appropriate coaching and ensure this is an isolated incident and corrected immediately.

Summary Heading: water splash zone for kids fun
Summary: The hotel has two outdoor pools. One of them has an awesome water splash zone. My kids loved it so much. Beside the hotel there is a good public park. Also, you can take a free trolley to tour the town. The stop is just outside of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. It sounds like you were able to take advantage of some of the local amenities that we have to offer. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Good looking property with friendly staff. New remodel made everything seem good. Food and bar were great with a view. Pool area with a view was a pleasure. Certainly no complaints with our happy stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us. It sounds like you were able to enjoy a few of our many amenities here on property. We hope to see you again soon!
