Summary Heading: Love this place but somewhat disappointed
Summary: Stayed here Sept 2 to the 5th, after Labor Day.  Was not warned that construction would be going on during this time. Noisey and  and unsightly bobcat woke us up!  Resort hotel  needs to warn guests about out such things before they arrive! Thankfully; hotel moved us and gave us an upgrade to a better room on other side of property, but lost sleep and time and time moving rooms.  Breakfast buffet very good but couldn't enjoy outside because of noise from construction.  Loved the exercise  room  Staff mostly pleasant , but better service needed from staff at breakfast..need to refill coffee.   Will likely return because of sheer beauty of area, but this did not feel like a resort this visit
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize about the construction that you experienced while you were here. We are in the process of making improvements that will be completed next month! We are glad you enjoyed our staff and will address the breakfast issue as needed. It sounds like you were able to get into a beautiful room and enjoy the property. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We spent four nights here with our family. It‚Äôs a beautiful location with gorgeous views. Two pools, one has a kid‚Äôs area with splash pad and shallow pool. Big hot tubs. We were there over Labor Day weekend and when we got to the pool there were no chairs available so we were put on a waiting list. That isn‚Äôt the best set up but we did get chairs eventually.  Rooms are lovely. There is no self-park option and valet parking is $39 per day so plan on that along with the resort fee. They had a nice kid‚Äôs lounge with games and other activities as well as a couple of movie nights for the family. Poolside drink and beverage service was very efficient. The hotel is a short ride down the hill to a great beach and park.  As a business owner, I was most impressed by the staff-no matter
Manager Response: Thank you for your review.  We are so glad that you experienced fantastic customer service and that you were able to enjoy so many of our great amenities here on property. Thank you for your compliments in regards to our staff. We are glad you enjoyed the holiday weekend and can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: Susan the front office manager was incredibly helpful with accommodating my reservation needs. The property is beautiful, albeit pricey, but you get what you pay for. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you received such incredible service and you enjoyed the beautiful property. We cannot wait to welcome you back!

Summary: Okay, This Marriott does not have a beachfront location, albeit a few minutes walk away; this Marriott in Dana Point has spent a few hundred million dollars for renovations and is a work in progress.  The property is spectacular.  The service is 5 star! I do not wish to criticize institutions, however, I love celebrating success.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed the renovations and the lovely views. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Great location on a hill above Dana Pt. Marina - Pricey
Summary: This is a very nice property and staff was superb. Especially helpful getting us booked on a ferry to Catalina. Pricey though. We were staying a few days using Marriott points, but there was an additional $70./day resort fee and $40./day parking...not covered. So, not a "free" stay with Marriott points. Still, we had a great time and enjoyed walking down to the water. Beautiful views from the lawn.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay and gave compliments to our property and staff. We hope to see you back again soon!

Summary: From top to bottom, everything was spectacular! Staff was amazing, restaurant was fantastic (the burger was so good), and the room was stunning. The pool has by far the best ocean view in all of Dana Point.
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. It sounds like you had an awesome vacation! We can't wait to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: As the father of the groom, we blocked a group of rooms for the wedding. When we checked in yesterday, the first girl said they didn‚Äôt have the rooms I had reserved. We have at least 20 rooms blocked. After a hassle, they put me on a different wing than our wedding party and the girl at the front desk said that was all they had. The girl before her told us a different story. As the father of the groom,  I am very disappointed in this situation. We still have a few more days to stay here as do all the other guests in this large wedding party.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We do apologize that there seemed to be some sort of mix up with the room block. We always strive to try and please our guests and satisfy all of our big parties needs. We hope the rest of your stay is enjoyable and please reach out if we can be of any more assistance. Enjoy the wedding!

Summary: Walk to the town with shops and restaurants below, borrow surfboards and head to the beach. This location has it all. Rooms are recently remodeled and although there is still some construction going on our room was far away from the lobby in a quiet area overlooking the pool. The views are stunning of the harbor and sunset as well. I found this to be a perfect spot for some rest and relaxation. Yoga on the lawn is a nice bonus!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you were able to experience a nice romantic getaway. It sounds like you were really able to explore the surrounding areas and the amenities that we have to offer. We are so glad that you enjoyed the renovated rooms and yoga on the lawn!

Summary: I am a Marriott member and I stay at Marriott's and Ritz Carlton's all of the time.  And i have never been treated as poorly as I was by this hotels management.   They are dismissive, called me names, hung up on me, and down right rude.   And there has been zero attempt to make it right.  There are far far better places right here in Orange County to spend your money.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, we take all guest issues very seriously and although we don‚Äôt have information on which guest this is based off the provided information we do feel we have responded each of the many ways you have decided to reach out to the hotel both directly and indirectly. We have reviewed the issue and found from multiple sources threats were actually made against the hotel which we do not tolerate and as previously mentioned. Consider this matter closed.

Summary: Great location in the center of the action and beautiful views.  Property feels exclusive and with the recent updates to the rooms and hotel, this place is a great bargain.  The breakfast buffet has a nice selection.  Every staff member was friendly and accommodating.  Great job Marriott, we'll stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our beautiful location and views. It sounds like you were able to enjoy some of the amenities as well. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: New, Clean, Attentive and Kind Staff!
Summary: I visited last weekend (Aug 10). It was very busy with weddings but there was plenty of staff in all departments. Every one was so kind you could tell they like where they worked and their bosses.   Our room was very nice, clean, and quiet. The entire property was recently renovated.   Food at breakfast and lunch was amazing! Way above a franchise hotel standard!   The spa (not renovated) still looks in new condition. Full amenities there and great products in the shop. Massage therapist was amazing. Felt rejuvenated the entire day.   Fitness center was great and had all we needed.   Valet did a good job of running the cars, never had to wait too long.   The other hotel guests were also very kind and friendly. Says a lot when the staff and clientele are great people. At the end
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your comments about our team as we all enjoy this beautiful property. It really sounds like you were able to enjoy plenty of the wonderful amenities that we have to offer. We can't wait to welcome you back again!

Summary: We stayed here for my friends wedding in Dana Point.   Rooms: beautiful decor, couches, drawers, plenty of  space. The bathroom was huge and very modern with products and blow dryers - top notch. The balcony‚Äôs are small but fun to sit on. You don‚Äôt need a balcony at this resort with all the outdoor space.   Pool: there were two pools - one for adults only. Poolside drinks, snacks and water are available. They walked around with fruit cups for us! We lounged in comfortable, cushioned lounge chairs and cabanas. The staff moved chairs and a large umbrella so the 6 of us could sit together!  Breakfast: ok possibly the best buffet I‚Äôve seen in a while. They. Had. Everything. Eggs, omelette station, fruit, pastries, Lox, crepes, cereal, toast/muffins, waffles made to order, pancakes,
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We appreciate everything you had to say. From the newly renovated rooms, dining, grounds, pools, and staff it sounds like you had a wonderful trip. We cannot wait to welcome you back here to our wonderful resort!

Summary: It is a basic hotel, and other than the proximity to the beach and beautiful grounds it has nothing to offer.  We had an executive suite and it was a basic room with windows that go to the chest level with little to no views of the ocean.  The breakfast buffet is pricy and nothing special.  Certainly you can get much better food for a fraction of the price in the city.    Overall it was a good hotel but not a resort and nothing special.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad you enjoyed our beautiful grounds. We do apologize that our rooms and restaurant were unable to meet your expectations. We take pride in pleasing our guests and hope you come to give us another try!

Summary: We stayed at this property during the California fires as we been evacuated from our home. Latina Cliffs is an outstanding property. Gorgeous views, short walk to the beach and marina. You can also score some very good hotel rates, especially if you‚Äôre traveling in the off season. Yes there is the Montage and Ritz Carlton nearby but I would go there for lunch or a drink but stay at the Labuan Cliffs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so glad that we were able to accomodate you during this difficult time. We hope to welcome you back again on a much grander note!

Summary Heading: Didn't want to leave the hotel!
Summary: We loved this hotel.  The view was wonderful.  The restaurant was temporarily closed except for breakfast but the menu available on the patio was plenty and the food was very good.  We had family and friends also stay there so gathering on the patio was a daily event for us.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you had such a great stay! It sounds like you were able to experience the surrounding views, and the restaurant. We hope to see you again!

Summary Heading: This review is difficult to pen as the place is such a dichotomy
Summary: Went for my wife's birthday and yes, it is the MOST stunning hotel in DP.  The people, rooms, setting are completely stunning.  There were a few hiccups, small and not really germane to the review but if you book using points then add an additional night with a CC, call the hotel and make sure you'd like the same room.  Don't rely on Bonvoy booking line.  With that said, stay here, get a room on any other floor then 4, all top floor rooms don't have patios and you're not alive till you can sit on your patio and look south over DP harbor.  Here's where it get's rough.  The food...it's terrible.  It's overpriced, outdated, phoned in.  The only place we saw that had good food was at the pool bar and the 17yr old chef was awesome, as was the bar service.  I spend on average 80+
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the feedback and it sounds like you love the property as well as our staff and the newly renovated rooms! We are sorry to hear that you did not enjoy the food and the prices that go along with it. We hope that in the future you will continue to stay with us!

Summary: This is a beautiful spot in Dana Point, CA. Beautiful grounds and very nice clean rooms. Unfortunately for the high prices the food is at best mediocre and worse it's very expensive.  Gorgeous views and terrific pools and good amenities such as bicycles, boogie boards etc are "included "In the ridiculous resort fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It looks like you enjoyed the scenery and newly renovated rooms. Our prices are very competitive for the surrounding area and we do apologize to hear that the food is not up to standard. Our resort fee includes many amenities to please our guests. We hope you come back to visit!

Summary Heading: Overpriced for what it is, esp with upcharges
Summary: Honestly, I might have given it 4 stars, but for the fact that they both add a resort fee _and_ insist on valet parking (rather than the garage that's adjacent and clearly was designed for self-park - this added about $80/night - it's becoming like airlines these days with all the absurd charges. Further adding to the bad taste was only two towels each day and no turndown unless requested. When I did request turndown (for the towels) they still didn't leave two sets! I'm at the beach - I shower twice a day! So, it's fine, but somewhat overpriced for what it was - room was fine, not amazing - I'd give the experience a C+ or B-
Manager Response: Dear Reviewed by BenSonoma,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay. We do have beach towels available when requested and I am sorry this was not communicated when you called. They are not part of regular service or turndown but available upon request. Please, accept our apologies for this. We appreciate your feedback about the parking and resort fees and will share it within our organization.   Sincerely,

Summary: A wonderful hotel in a wonderful location.   This is a gem of the Marriott roster with great staff and a wonderful property.   The staff are attentive and there is so much to do around the property.  The pool, access to the beach and the activities make this a hotel you want to go to year after year.  A definite keeper.
Manager Response: We are so glad you had a wonderful stay! Thank you for your review and it sounds like our staff treated you well! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This is my third stay at this hotel.  I love the activities available, pool, tennis, gym, bocce ball, rental bikes, etc.  The room is nice and had a lovely balcony.  It's an easy walk to the harbor with shops and restaurants.  I probably went at peak season as it was very busy.  My one complaint is I think the parking is too pricey and I don't think we should have to pay for WiFi .
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you had such a great stay! It sounds like you were able to enjoy the amenities on property as well as the surrounding area. Our parking prices are competitive and if you sign up for Marriott Bonvoy the internet will be complimentary for you. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The Marriott at Laguna Cliffs in Dana Point, California is a lovely escape from the hustle and bustle of LA and Orange County.  Set just behind a wonderful park with expansive coastal views, the property is large enough to provide full service and small enough to feel boutique.  We loved the decor, which seemed fresh, beachy, modern and practical (love those USB outlets!).  The pool options (kid friendly and quiet) were both great and the star of this property‚Äîthe staff.  Every single person we encountered was genuinely friendly.  During peak periods the pressure points were well staffed‚Äîthis included an assistant manager visible during both check in and check out.  We also appreciated the reasonable prices on most food and drink items, which is unusual for most OC beach
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that we were able to offer you great service and that you enjoyed plenty of the amenities in the local area. It looks like you were able to explore Dana Point as well as observe and experience all the great things that our hotel has to offer. We can't wait to host you again!

Summary: Took my mom here for her birthday weekend trip to the ocean. From the moment we pulled up the service was impeccable. They complimentary upgraded us to an ocean view room (we are bonvoy elite though) and on our last night they even sent us a chocolate cake and bottle of champagne for her birthday along with a handwritten note. Everyone we encountered from the front desk to the spa to the bell staff were courteous, professional and kind. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the area!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you were able to celebrate your mom's birthday weekend with us and it sounds like our staff members treated you well! We can't wait to host you again!

Summary: Beautiful property, great service! Was there for a work conference,  meeting space was good for break outs and the food provided by the hotel was good! Loved my room! King bed, spacious bathroom! I liked the little deck alot!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad you enjoyed our beautiful property and that you were able to experience some of our outlets and amenities. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Beautiful hotel with a better view. I had a relaxing night away. I loved the pool and the service. My server Garrett was wonderful. He took care of us leaving us to want for nothing. 5 star.  All the employees were wonderful. I can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you had a lovely weekend getaway! The attentive staff and our pool area sounded like it was a great fit to your vacation. We look forward to hosting you again!

Summary: This hotel is amazing. This is a high end hotel with a clean beachy vibe. Live music in the bar both saturday night and Wednesdays night. Check in was super easy. I have to say everyone at the front desk are super nice and friendly. They go out of their way to make your perfect. Rooms are nice and big. The hotel is just a walk away from the beach.  There is a park right behind the hotel that had a free kids movie on Friday night.  we walked to ralphs the beach and the restaurants for dinner. They have a hospitality room with games movies and fresh baked cookies for the family. They have 2 pools. This hotel is great for families with kids and for couples with out kids. Parking is expensive .
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and all the amenities the resort offers. We are happy to hear that our staff was accommodating and we hope you visit us again soon. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: Best location over looking the bay!! Valet parking great vibes in the bar free upgrade to a pool view king room!!! Staff are so welcoming we will definitely be coming back if we return to the states! !!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our location and enjoyed out staff! It sounds like you had a really amazing stay!

Summary: We have visited Laguna Cliffs Marriott on several different occassions with our family. We love this resort!  The rooms are great, restaurant is delicious and the grounds are spectacular with a view of the ocean in the distance. We did initially get a dissapointing room next to the elevator although we requested a different room the next day and received a much larger room with a view. Very thankful they were accomodating.
Manager Response: We thank you so much for your feedback and we are so glad that you enjoyed our beautiful property! It sounds like you have been able to enjoy quite a bit of it. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great location!!   Views are wonderful!  Walking is easy to the beach, restaurants, lantern district, etc.  We ate at several delicious, local restaurants within walking distance.  Lots of great walks/hikes in the immediate area; ask the front desk for a map.  Our room was nice and very clean.  Cleaning staff was wonderful!  You must valet your car, but valet is very responsive and so helpful!  The hotel is nice, but relaxed and casual.  Really quite comfortable!  Food and drinks are good and waitstaff is really great!  There was a wedding one evening and another event on a different evening.  The hotel is a perfect venue for events!  We were not bothered by noise.  One evening there was a band, which was quite good, but once we closed our patio door, we couldn't hear them.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so glad that you love our property and that all of your needs were met. It sounds like you enjoyed the renovations, the local area, and our staff! We cannot wait to host you again!

Summary: Front desk staff was super friendly and helpful. Room was very nice, partial ocean view with balcony was ok.  Views from the grounds were unbelievable.  The lounge had live music in the evening, lots of people around in general, very lively.  $29 resort fee includes: high speed internet, yoga mats, surf/boogie boards, table tennis, bocce ball, frisbee, 2 bicycles (up to 2hours), shoe shine service, putting green, and in-room mini fridge (2 complimentary bottles of water).  $39/night parking is a bit pricey but seems to be common in the area.  You could look for cheaper parking off site but the entrance to the hotel is at the top of a VERY STEEP hill.  It's worth the $ to drive up the hill!  You can take a free shuttle that stops right at the entrance to the hotel to go around
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our beautiful property and friendly staff. It sounds like you were also able to enjoy many of the on property amenities as well as the surrounding harbor. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: On a recent trip to California, we stayed at the Laguna Cliffs.  In addition to it being a beautiful location overlooking Dana Point Marina, Lantern Bay Park and Doheny State Beach, it was one of the nicest Marriott resort hotels around.  The rooms have recently been renovated and they are very well appointed.  Our room was very spacious and had a balcony overlooking the marina and park.  The grounds are absolutely beautiful!  Dana Point Trolley stops at the hotel, and  the pool areas are quite lovely! Breakfast on the outdoor patio was very nice, and food in the upstairs bar was very good. Complimentary bikes available for guests.  Staff was very professional and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to experience the local area. Thank you for your compliments about our departments and it sounds like our restaurants were to your liking. We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We spent five evenings at this resort hotel in June.  The staff equaled the activities available that included three professional bocce courts, excellent bicycles, yoga maps to an outside morning class and two pools.  Great bell and front desk staff.  Our only two complaints were that the room could not get cool enough (69 degrees was the coldest) and our newly renovated room (112) had a very poorly designed half wall shower that created an indoor bathroom swimming pool.  The twice daily maid staff continued to dry the bathroom floor without complaining.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our property and our wonderful staff. It sounds like you took advantage of all the wonderful amenities that we have to offer. We hope to host you again soon!

Summary: Gorgeous resort!  Wonderful service.  Most rooms have a perfect view of the ocean and harbour!  The pool was beautiful and relaxing, and we loved the margaritas.    As others have said, a resort fee is added which was annoying if you don‚Äôt utilize these activities.  We roads the bikes to the harbour and they were fabulous bikes.  However these activities should be rented instead of charging a fee each day,    The valet parking fee is also ridiculously expensive.  I can understand $20 or so a night but $40 is very steep.  With that said, I would gladly return and highly recommend this gorgeous resort.  Marriott does everything right, and you are guaranteed a wonderful stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and our great location. We do charge for the resort fee as we have so many different amenities to offer. We look forward to hosting you again!

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel twice and I cannot say enough nice things about it. From the location and service to the food and the amenities, it is perfect for me when I need a getaway. The rooms are spacious as are the bathrooms. The Overvue Lounge is staffed with personable bartenders and offers amazing views of the ocean. My two visits were six months apart and the bartender remembered my beer from my first visit during my second visit. I was so impressed! It definitely left me wanting to return again. I can‚Äôt wait for my third visit, hopefully soon! If you are looking for a nice getaway whether alone or with the family, look no further!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review. We are so glad that we can be your favorite getaway. From the restaurant, to the newly remodeled rooms, to our wonderful staff we are so glad that you choose us as your place to stay. We look forward to hosting you again!

Summary Heading: Great place for a family vacation near the beach
Summary: Daily charge for bikes, boogie and surf boards, breakfast and ambience is great. Near the beech and pier. Food is OK, but a bit pricey. Car is valet only and costs 40 a day. Rooms are very large and spacious.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay. It's great to hear that you took advantage of some of our wonderful amenities. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel has been an oasis of rest, calm and professionalism. The room is lovely, light and airy. The staff are exceptionally helpful. The gardens are gorgeous and the location is good. We stayed in a room on the ground floor overlooking the pool and the ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad that you enjoyed our newly renovated guest rooms and our friendly staff. It sounds like you enjoyed the location and we hope to have you back soon!

Summary Heading: Very nice... but a few important caveats
Summary: Good value and very nice property but know what you are getting into:  *This being a Marriott chain hotel, it is extremely clean and well-tended to but most areas have a very "corporate" feel. In particular, the restaurant, Vue, feels very sterile like an airport lounge. Could use some more of cozy interior design elements of the rooms, which were very nice and clean.  *Also being a chain hotel, lots of kids and families. Just make sure that's OK with you. There are two pools on the property and the "adult" pool was definitely better, more private, and more serene. The kids pool had an annoying steel drum player playing all day right outside our room. Both pools played loud music all day (note to all hotels: Guests don't need music and we can listen to our own on phones now if
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are glad you enjoyed our staff and that you had a nice stay!   In the near future the Vue restaurant will be turning into something very exciting and we hope you will come back to try out our new style and cuisine!  We had live entertainment for your enjoyment as it was Memorial Day Weekend and wanted to elevate the experience for all of our guests.  Almost all hotels these days are charging for parking and resort fees and we find our prices to be perfectly competitive with the surrounding area hotels.   We hope you come back to visit us again soon!

Summary Heading: A bit old but still very nice
Summary: More than anything, the grounds are beautiful and the rooms with ocean views are spectacular.   Service is very good. Just be aware that valet parking isn‚Äôt cheap and there‚Äôs a daily resort fee regardless if you use any amenities or not.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It sounds like you enjoyed the property and the newly renovated rooms. We hope you come back to stay with us again!

Summary: Pretty much everything is perfect about this location.   From the valet parking to the lounge to the waterside dining to the willingness to take pictures of us.   It is located close to the Harbor and is a perfect walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad you had a perfect stay! It sounds like you were able to enjoy the harbor and our dining options. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Nicely laid out, great views, clean and organized
Summary: We were staying here for a wedding that was close by.  The motor courtyard for valet is inviting, the check in was easy.  We took a top floor room with a fantastic view of the harbor.  There are some nice walking trails outside of the hotel and around the docks.  Plenty of good restaurants within walking distance.  The rooms were clean.  The down size was NO TESLA CHARGER.  I had called in advance and they told me yes, but once we got there all they had was a 110 volt charger.  You would think for an orange county affluent hotel area, they would have a couple of Tesla Chargers.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We are so glad that you had an easy check in and that you enjoyed all of our wonderful views on property. The harbor is a great spot to relax and enjoy. We do apologize of the miscommunication of the Tesla charger. We will follow up with the correct departments to make sure we relay the right information. We hope you come stay with us again!

Summary: I think this is the most lovely spot in Dana Point to stay. The property is lovely with a terrific ocean view. It has all of the amenities, including a spa experience. There is a Starbuck for early morning coffee etc. In addition, the restaurant which is downstairs serves a full breakfast. I had a great salmon dish in the upstairs bar for dinner overlooking the ocean. The food was delicious. My room was lovely and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad you enjoyed the terrific views and all of our amenities. The newly remodeled rooms sounded like it was a perfect fit to your vacation. Come back and visit us soon!

Summary: Very Peaceful retreat.  Great customer service and hotel grounds.  Walking /cycling trails with great views of the ocean and Dana point are a must whilst there. Housekeeping and meals were also above average.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that you had a peaceful stay and enjoyed the customer service. Thank you for taking the time to recognize our housekeeping staff as well as our food and beverage services. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Everything at that hotel was great. Newly renovated, great food, great service and the facilities are fantastic. The surroundings call for a walk along the ocean and harbor. Be prepared for the stairs to go up to the cliff after your walk!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay and that you enjoyed the newly renovated rooms and great food. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Fabulous spa and bar with a view
Summary: Since we are local, we have not stayed at the hotel in years but visit the spa monthly. It‚Äôs one of the nicest around and reasonably priced. Simple and lovely decor. Cozy area to rest outside complete with a big fireplace.  Nena is the best esthetician I‚Äôve had in a long time.  The bar at the hotel is great to watch the sunset. Fabulous view inside or out. The appetizers are the best. Actually, we‚Äôve been there many times and never get to the main course.  Valet parking is validated at both the spa and bar.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback. We are so glad you were able to enjoy the fabulous sunset from the bar. The appetizers sounded like a hit and we are so glad that you keep coming back. Nena is certainly wonderful as well. I'm sure we will see you back again soon!

Summary: Fantastic views. Wonderful spot on a hill. Rooms have been refurbished and done so in a stellar way. Might watch out for the slippery shower floor, could see older people struggling with it. But bar this minor issue, it was the best hotel of the year for me, so far. Enjoyed the walk down the hill (and back) to one of the local restaurants. Really an enjoyable two nights.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you enjoyed the fantastic views! Thank you for your feedback as we are loving the newly renovated rooms ourselves. Thank you for the note about the slippery floor as we always welcome suggestions. We hope to welcome you back again very soon!

Summary: Great family hotel!  Very nice staff .great pools, fun putting green.  Would stay here again in a heartbeat.  The views are amazing and the  hotel was surprisingly not very crowded.  Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your great review! We are so glad that you enjoyed the fun putting green and the amazing views! We certainly look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Great location across from the harbor where there are several casual fun restaurants and bars!  Hotel caters to many businesses for conferences so not as family friendly as I was anticipating.  Quick Iner rode to shopping and movie theatre.  Outdoor pool is cozy and partly shaded. Facing West and the Harbor.  Spa onsite was completely booked due to big group renting it out for a couple of days so suggest booking appointments well in advance. Room had a refrigerator and patio which was a nice add.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed Dana Point and that you were able to experience all of the fun restaurants and bars. The harbor is so beautiful and it sounds like you had some quality time at our outdoor pool! Hopefully next time you can enjoy the spa! We look forward to having you stay with us again soon.

Summary: From checkin to checkout the team really made us feel welcome. Our room had a beautiful view out to the ocean and could not have been quieter or more comfortable. We had 4 nights here and the location was also great to walk into the harbour but also to visit Laguna beach and San Clemente. We definitely plan to return
Manager Response: We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our check in experience. Our beautifully new designed rooms are perfect for looking out at the ocean! We can't wait to have you back again!

Summary: This was our second trip to the Laguna Cliffs for spring break. We come down here for a little escape as we live relatively close by. My 5 yr old son loves the pool and is never ready to leave. The proximity to the beach and harbor are wonderful. The culture de sac by their driveway also serves as a stop on the Dana Poiny trolley so that makes traveling convenient. They have a small park close by that we would go to when my son was smaller. The only downside is the $39/day parking fee as valet is the only option. They do bring cars quickly, 24/7 and they are very friendly. We will be back to explore the rest this hotel has to offer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are so glad that you were able to enjoy some of our beautiful amenities. Our pool is a great place for kids and we are so happy to hear that your son enjoyed it. The trolley is also a great advantage. We are so glad to hear that our valet staff was attentive and we do apologize that the fees were higher than what you expected. We look forward to welcoming you back again.!

Summary Heading: Nice & new but paper thin walls
Summary: I stayed here (room 4017) because I was attending a nearby conference.   PROs: They‚Äôve recently renovated this resort. The location was convenient & view from the main areas was beautiful. My room was nicely appointed with a beachy vibe. It was very clean, the bed was comfortable, and the water pressure in the shower (one of my pet peeves) was strong enough to quickly rinse my hair. The staff was welcoming and polite. I really liked the new advance check-in feature on the Bonvoy app, too.  CONs: The walls are really thin so I could hear my neighbors‚Äô conversations in the hallways, doors closing, hairdryers running & footsteps on the hardwood in the room above mine.  This isn‚Äôt a big issue but I found the closet odd. It‚Äôs pretty small and there‚Äôs a small set of drawers (maybe for
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write us a review. We are glad you found the location convenient and beautiful. We are also pleased to hear that you enjoyed our new room renovations and the Bonvoy mobile check in. Thank you for the feedback about the walls as we do apologize that it was not to your liking. As far as the closet goes we understand your concern, and we are glad that maintenance was able to fix your door. We hope to see you again as we aim to provide the highest quality of service to all of our guests.!

Summary Heading: If you're gay, stay away from The Laguna Cliffs Resort and Spa
Summary: If you're gay, stay away from The Laguna Cliffs Resort and Spa. It's the most discriminatory hotel I have ever stayed at. My husband and I were evicted on our second day at the resort because of our "lifestyle" and "presence at the pool" - These were their words not mine. It should be noted that we weren't scantily clad, making out or doing anything to cause guests to turn heads.  The only thing we did do was mention to a family with young kids in the hot tub at a late hour that there was another pool specifically for kids. We came for R&R and purposely picked a resort that had facilities for adults and others for kids.   Apparently that's all it took to get the manager to ask us to leave, not the pool but the entire property when we did nothing wrong. We told the manager at the
Manager Response: Dear Mathew A,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. We appreciate the opportunity and have responded to your concerns in an email from our Executive Offices which was sent on 03/12/2019. While we greatly empathize and welcome guest comments, at times the perception of the events and evaluation by both parties do not come to an agreement.     Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Fantastic property, watch the fees, avoid the restaurant
Summary: The upgraded room that were provided for our stay must be one of the nicest rooms I‚Äôve stayed in in the past few years. It was brand new, with excellent finishes and stylish decor. The view was awesome, bed was comfortable. Two reasons for four-star rating: extremely high fees (over and above room rate) $39 mandatory valet parking + $29 resort fee, in addition to the abysmal quality of food served at the restaurant for the price.
Manager Response: We are so glad that you enjoyed our beautifully renovated rooms! We are very happy with how they turned out and the views make for an even nicer touch. Hopefully you were able to try our breakfast buffet as we have an abundant amount of choices as well as many restaurants in the surroundings area. We do appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel is very quiet.  Had a room facing the water. Nice little balcony to sit and read. Super quiet. My room overlooked the driveway and I never heard a single car. Cute harbor to eat at various restaurants.  Staff was excellent. Only downsides are the $39 valet only parking (although they were super fast and helpful. Best valet staff I have experienced in a long time) and $29 resort fee. I think the concept of resort fees is such a scam. At all hotels. I wouldn't use many of the things supposedly covered by the fee like bikes and yoga mats and surf boards. The only resort fee amenity I used was the mini fridge in the room. Just put it in the room rate or charge a la carte.  So add $80 a day to whatever you think you are paying. That being said, the room was super clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so glad you were able to enjoy your balcony as well as the harbor for restaurant choices. We have a great valet team and we are happy to hear that they made your stay memorable! Even though the resort fee adds a little extra we do appreciate your business and it allows us to offer so many wonderful amenities for our guests. We hope to see you again soon and we really appreciate your feedback.

Summary: We frequent Marriott properties, and we will revisit this one.  Great property, and great location.  Be sure to get a room with an ocean view.  Rooms were very nice, as was the staff.  We did not eat on the property so I cannot comment on the food.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us. We are so glad you liked our great and that you were able to enjoy an ocean view too. See you next time!

Summary Heading: A great place to get away to
Summary: The Laguna Cliffs Marriott would be the wise choice for folks who want a break from the city, enjoy a lovely ocean view, and hang out in relative anonymity.  There's no beach, per se--the no-beach Ritz schlepps you down on golf carts, but nothing here--and the closest off-property restaurant is a long downhill, then uphill walk.  You could have a drink at the bar, we suppose, or get some tuna tacos (3 for 24 bucks), or do some put-put out back, but the chief appeal of this place is the ability to do absolutely nothing, lounging by one of the pools or sitting by the window in your room. Speaking of, ours was plenty big, the living room down a long hallway from the bedroom, and it was furnished like a modern beach house, with light fixtures and lamps you wouldn't have back at the
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our comfortable resort and modern guest rooms. We are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy the cocktails and tuna tacos at our OverVue lounge. In regards to your comments about our refrigerators, we actually do provide mini fridge's in all guest rooms. We apologize if this was not in your room during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This sprawling resort sits on a hill overlooking the harbor, and the view is awesome. Marriott just been renovated the rooms so they are spotless and attractively designed, if a little soulless.   It rained the three days I was there so I did not get to enjoy the pool and many other amenities.  My biggest issue is the food. All the restaurant options seem to serve the same menu and the food is pretty mediocre. The menu is small, smaller if you want to eat healthy, and I got bored with the offerings pretty quickly.  I was there for a conference and it fit my need perfectly.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated guest rooms. The view is definitely spectacular. Hopefully next time it won't be raining so you can enjoy all of our other lovely amenities too. We do apologize about the restaurant menu options. Hopefully next time you are able to find some places near the harbor too that suite your dining needs!

Summary: Our room was beautiful, I believe they have remodeled the rooms. We had a wonderful dinner and drinks on the terrace and the service was great! The disappointment was at 8 am they started hammering and doing repairs in the rooom above us. We were there for 1 night and I wasn‚Äôt happy with that type of wake up. I called to the front and they explained that there was a maintenance problem and they were sorry. After talking to the front desk they said they would buy us breakfast. As we left the hotel the valet attendant was arguring with a customer, it was beyond rude and unprofessional. I was disappointed because I had high hopes, it wasn‚Äôt horrible but not great either.
Manager Response: Dear Jillers22,  Thank you for your review and valuable feedback about your recent stay. We deeply regret the inconvenience caused by the unforeseen maintenance issue and hope you enjoyed breakfast. We have shared your comments with our valet team to ensure this is an isolated incident that is corrected immediately.   We do appreciate your kind words about ours staff and hope to have the opportunity to serve you in the future.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Excellent location, some details need improvement
Summary: Location is beautiful, with a great view of the ocean and in easy walking distance from the beach. The room where I stayed was wide and reasonably well equipped (but the bathroom amenities were scanty: for example, no shower cap nor cotton swabs nor bath slippers, which I would expect in a hotel of this standing). Bed was excellent. TV included Netflix. Internet access was flawless. I had breakfast at the full-serve restaurant, where the food was very good but for some reason they could not serve cappuccino (and wireless connection was not available). During the night a part of the hotel suffered from a power failure, which forced me to change room in the morning as there was no hot water. Overall, I had the impression of paying for more than I received: valet parking ($39/day)
Manager Response: none

Summary: For the price, the hotel gives the bare minimum of service. I would never return. No regular bottled water service. When I call to ask about it, I get a rude response from reception ‚Äútwo bottles when you arrive is all you get!‚Äù  Separately, no new sheets or towels in three days! Barely any cleaning at all. This is supposed to be about ‚Äúsustainability‚Äù but it becomes super clear that it‚Äôs about sustaining Marriotts money by cutting expenses at the expense of the customer. To add insult to injury, you come back to your room and except for the bed being made with the same old sheets, you can barely tell it‚Äôs been attended at all. Everything is exactly where you left it. Not tidied up like you expect from any hotel, let alone a ‚Äúresort and spa‚Äù. As for the facilities, area around
Manager Response: Dear lazfuentes,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay at our Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. It is our most important job to have a spirit to serve and I was sorry to hear that we have unfortunately fallen short of this goal. Please accept my most sincere apologies for this. I wanted to let you know that while we offer two complimentary bottles of water on the day of arrival, we are always happy to arrange additional bottles to be ordered from our In Room Dining menu, or purchase from the resort gift shop.    In an effort to promote sustainability and reduce environmental impact, if a guest's stay is less than three days we do not routinely change the sheets daily, however we are most happy to do this upon request.  Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you back again.  Sincerely,

Summary Heading: Steps away from Dana Point harbor
Summary: Hotel has good amenities.  My wife loved the spa treatment.  The hotel is walking distance to the Dana Point harbor.  Just need to find the stairs in the middle of the park to go down.  It is valet only.  The vue lounge has limited options for dinner.  You have options down the harbor at a walking distance, just wear a coat because it gets quite cold at night.  There is free yoga in the park in the morning.  Overall good experience.  As a gold member, l was a little disappointed about the late checkout not being honored.  What is the point of membership if it is not honored.  The front receptionists are great and helpful.  The lady in the concierge is not that friendly when I asked a question.  Hmm. Isn‚Äôt that their job to answer questions?
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nicely remodeled but pool music needs to go
Summary: The newly renovated room we stayed in was beautiful and spacious. And it had an amazing view. The staff was polite and helpful.  The only knock on the place is the obnoxious pool area music that plays 12 hours a day and can be heard from any room with a view. The music director should be fired. üò¨
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful amenities with nothing spared. Our group went for massages and facials and they were both glorious! Loved the eucalyptus steam room! Everything you would need is available after your treatments shower, shampoo, conditioner, lotions, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that your group enjoyed the spa services at the resort. We appreciate your compliments and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: I was attending a conference at the Mintage which was sold out and had stayed at this property in the past. The rooms appear to be recently remodeled with tons of electrical outlets and very nice bathrooms.  The resort property is beautiful and quite spread out which leads me to my only criticism which is lack of adequate signage. It‚Äôs very easy to get lost which could be remedied with better signage. It‚Äôs not easy to find the fitness center which is tucked away by the gift shop with an outside entrance.  Service is excellent and I would stay again but ask for more and better signage.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated guest room and our staff service. We appreciate your compliments. Thank you for your feedback. We provide a resort map upon check-in to assist you with directions to each of our outlets. We hope you recieved one. We will be sure to share your comments with our team. Thank you again.

Summary Heading: Beautiful property with harbor views and the ocean beyond.
Summary: We stayed here overnight on a stop over to San Diego. Its a very peaceful property with great amenities. The resort fees included, bikes, yoga mats, bocce ball and wi-fi. The room was well appointed with a couch and large screen tv. All of their bath towels were embroidered. The balcony was spacious with a view overlooking the harbor. Great check-in and valet service, we will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: New Years Eve Visit to Dana Point
Summary: Thanks to a special on Travelzoo, my husband and I decided to spend New Years eve/day at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort.   This is a large facility with three wings and two swimming pools.  When we arrived at the hotel, we found our room was not ready yet and the staff asked us to wait until 4:00 p.m.  When 4:00 p.m. came the room was still not ready and they offered us a $50 credit for the inconvenience (nice touch).  We had a partial ocean view room with a small balcony that was situated perfectly to see the sun set each evening.  The room had been recently updated and looked great (though I am still not sold on having hard wood floors in hotel rooms).  We had a chance to get massages at the hotel (nice) and enjoyed the spa facilities before and afterwards.  For families,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you spent New Years with us. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to experience our Spa. We look forward to having you back and we appreciate your recommendation. See you soon!

Summary Heading: Welcoming luxury in a great location
Summary: 118 steps up overlooking a lively harbor, the veranda is the perfect place to hang out and have lunch or afternoon cocktail and enjoy the ocean view or watch the younger guests play on the expanse of lawn.  There is plenty to do within walking distance...visit the harbor take a whale watching cruise or just enjoy marina life.  If you need help relaxing after a day trip to L.A.,the spa was staffed with friendly skilled hands ready to serve.  Ideally sited halfway between San Diego and L.A. it is a quick drive on the Pacific Coast Highway from Laguna Beach and Newport Beach, both seaside towns a treat to visit.  I would definitely make this hotel at Dana Point my Southern California home base.  We stayed in Room 137 which was ground floor overlooking the pool.  I recommend a third
Manager Response: none

Summary: For the price of the room pretty much got what was expected a decent pretty  recent   Renovation. The big down side was they were still rentavationing above and around our room at 8am and woke us up that was disappointing seeing the reason we went there was to relax after working a long holiday season and that was cut short with the early morning wake up call.
Manager Response: Dear Josh L,  Thank you for your review. I regret to hear that you were disturbed by noise around your room. We do appreciate your feedback and will certainly share your comments with our team. Your comfort is extremely important to us and we sincerely apologize for this inconvenience.

Summary Heading: Very clean, excellent staff, would come again
Summary: From the moment we are I have the staff was quick to valet the car, quick to check us in, super friendly front desk personnel. We are the next day switched rooms to a room with a deck is the third-floor pool view rooms do not have outside decks. They were very accommodating. Beautiful views and the grounds are kept Immaculate. Rooms were very clean with updated fixtures TVs carpets everything looked great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your guest room and we appreciate your compliments regarding our staffs friendliness. We are happy that you experienced the 5 star level service Laguna Cliffs Marriott Rsort & Spa is known for. We hope you visit us again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: We were going from San Diego to Anaheim/Disneyland and I wanted a Marriott property on the beach for an overnight.  I didn't want to stay at an Anaheim hotel. Found this place last minute and the pictures don't do it justice.  This place is amazing - completely shocked and thrilled with the property.  Rooms are gorgeous.  Amazing grounds to ride bikes along the beach (hotel provides) or just walk around.  We had a ground level with a patio - and it was amazing to sit and read and enjoy the outdoors.  Breakfast was probably one of the best buffets I have ever had.  Everything was absolutely perfect, which does not come out of my mouth a lot. My only comment was they had hot cider (which I love) and it  was  dangerously hot.  I told the front desk they may want to add ice cubes in
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although this is a nice SPG hotel, it does not meet the standards of most SPG resorts with spas. I would never rank this with the 4 & 5 star properties that start wood has to offer. Although nice, it is not a luxury property.
Manager Response: Dear theasylum3,  Thank you for taking the time to provide your honest review about your recent stay at our resort. As you can imagine, it is our daily intent to ensure each guest‚Äôs stay is enjoyable, relaxing and a memorable experience and we greatly appreciate any feedback that helps us improve.  Sincerely,

Summary: Location is perfect with a beautiful view of the marina and ocean from our room.  Staff is very friendly and accommodating.  Breakfast is not included and prices are a little high.  One morning we ate in house, the other we walked across the park and down the steps to the marina area and there are several places to eat.  The beds and bedding were ultra comfortable.  We were there for a school reunion and there were plenty of areas to just sit around talking.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful time at our resort and exploring the local area. Thank you for your compliments regarding our friendly staff and our confortable beds. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Magnificent Property with a beautiful view
Summary: This a wonderful property with great styling and d√©cor. The staff was excellent and room was spacious and well kept. Wonderful balcony view of the ocean and harbor from high atop the hill .  Didn't get a chance to use the spa , but it looked very nice .  They have recreational equipment available so you can enjoy the area .
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very nice even with a bad apple
Summary: A beautiful location, very scenic. A large property with great views. Has a lot of space for all different types of activities. Can be on the pricey side. Lots of things to explore to keep busy. Staff for the most part were very nice. Had a problem with the valet supervisor who chased us away from their display car even after the rest of the crew was nice enough to take our picture with the woody. The man was just plain rude and mean and chased us away like children. Very sad. Then he questioned us on where we were going like a wanna be policeman. Never have I been treated so crudely at any type of facility. A nice night turned very sour thanks to him.
Manager Response: Dear Randy2353,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your last visit. Providing the highest level of hospitality is our number one priority and we sincerely apologize for falling short of meeting your expectations. We have shared your feedback with the appropriate departments to ensure this is an isolated incident that is corrected moving forward.  Thank you again for your time and we hope you will give us the opportunity to show you our true Marriott hospitality when your travels bring you back to Dana Point.  Sincerely

Summary: Loved our visit to the Laguna Cliffs Marriott. The location was great. 5 minute walk to the beach, close drives to Laguna and San Clemente. The hotel is large. Our room was a great size. The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom large and a great tv. The room was very clean. The hotel looks new. There are a few extra fees. You must use valet parking. We had no issues as the car was available with little wait. And there is a resort fee. We used the hotel bikes and took them to the bike path that runs along the coast. There are 2 pools that looked very nice. Staff was friendly. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: My New Favorite Marriott in the World
Summary: I have stayed in Marriott properties all over the world for more than 20 years. As a former Platinum member. I'm not a hundred percent sure whether it's the Marriott itself or the location, but this is hands-down the best stay I have ever had with the brand. Everyone is happy everyone smiles everyone is glad to be of service. And in every case in every encounter with an employee they have gone above and beyond. Just a tiny simple thing like offering me a cup of coffee to go when I left the incredible breakfast buffet this morning. There's something magical about Southern California that can't really be put into words. And this Marriott property, from the fantastic rooms to the even more fantastic view of the Pacific, is a perfect reflection.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location and very good property
Summary: Beautiful lobby.  Great restaurant with wonderful breakfast buffet.  A bit pricey but really good food.  A great location which is walking distance to the harbor, shopping and restaurants.  The Marriott is a nice property.  Newly remodeled rooms.  The hallways are a bit narrow and outdated.  My upgraded room wasn‚Äôt much of an upgrade, but it was nice to have a little patio.  Overall, I would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  We are happy you enjoyed the breakfast buffet and our newly remodeled guestrooms.  We hope to welcome you back again soon!

Summary: We had to leave the monarch at Dana point as they were over sold and came to the Marriott at Laguna Cliffs. While the pool area isn‚Äôt as nice we actually enjoyed our time there! The staff is extremely friendly and pleasant. One downside is they only had a breakfast restaurant. If you wanted lunch or dinner it is served off the bar area and the menu is very limited.   Make sure you get a coastal view room as it is worth the money. We sat on the balcony and had breakfast overlooking the harbor! Overall I would highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your coastal view guest room and we appreciate your compliments regarding our staff. Thank you for your recommendation! We hope to see you again soon!

Probably the friendliest, most accommodating hotel/resort staff we have seen in a long time.  And it all starts with management as Ryan Marshall has gone over and above to make our stay special.  With just the right little gift in our room to celebrate our anniversary to the best advice on places to see and do around the area that weren‚Äôt even on our radar.  Madison at the front desk met us when we arrived and continued throughout the week with her smile, greetings and help that made this stay wonderful.  The grounds and rooms (newly remodeled) were
Manager Response: none

Summary: What an incredible hotel.  Newly renovated, the room was really fresh and new.  The views towards Doheny State Park in one of the best views is southern California.  Very friendly and helpful hotel staff, the restaurants besides the great views had tasty food and beverages.  Everything was simply perfect.   I am already planning next years return visit.  Can‚Äôt wait
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa!  We are thrilled you enjoyed our recent renovations and found the views of Dana Point to be some of the best in the area.  We are very excited to welcome you back soon!

Summary: The hotel was nice, not anything spectacular. The location was the best part. The pool was ok, and short staffed on sunday, when super busy. Monday although beautiful and people by pool no staff? This is a high end expensive resort and not staffed great. We were not happy with several of our rooms and there is a huge difference. The lowest flor is a basement and feels like it. The basic room with a balcony is small and cramped. We had to upgrade for anything satisfactory. The coffee pot is the cheapest plastic thing i have ever seen and the coffee was horrible. ( not a deal breaker, but disappointing for what they charge per night)

This is not indicative of the service levels at the Resort. We will be using your review as an example in upcoming staff training programs so that our employees can better understand how their actions can impact the guest experience.

Summary Heading: Too Pricey ?  buying a great location ?
Summary: The staff at this resort rivals those of high end competitors. Most all staff make an effort for eye contact and a friendly greeting.  But the add ons that this resort places on the bill makes a 529 dollar a night room quit quickly into a 1600 two day stay.   Full disclosure. We did have valet parking and spent 258 dollars at the spa. But that is what a vacation should include I would affirm.  Subtract the 258 and you still end up at 1342. High end price for this style of hotel is my opinion.   The family pool bar where we ordered our first $16 a cup cocktail was painfully slow on September 28.  There were 2 servers sharing stories and two young men behind the bar. It took close to 10 minutes to receive our first, And last two drinks at this bar.  They were jovial and enjoying
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our resort.  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the service you received and were able to take advantage of the wonderful amenities we have on property.  In recent surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We truly hope to welcome you back soon for your next trip!

Summary: Loved everything about this resort.  The rooms are beautifully decorated and comfortable.  We enjoyed the many pools and their spectacular views. The service was good with friendly employees. The location was convenient with an easy walk down to the harbor and Doheny beach.  The grounds and views from this resort are spectacular.  We can‚Äôt wait to plan our next visit.

We have stayed at this property many times over the last 15+ years and have always been treated royally. The staff truly made a week at Laguna most enjoyable.  fyi...we did receive
Manager Response: none

Summary: Postcard views and an excellent spot to visit. Doheny beach, the famous surf spot and the harbor.   Renovations are complete and my room was very nice with a view similar to their web page promo shot.  A bit pricey, but to be expected for a place like this and only valet parking.  Staff were good and Bartender Christine provides excellent service.  Also a shout out to front desk staffer Madison for her good service at check in.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The pros: the location offers nice views, situated on a hilltop overlooking a marina and at the top of a local park, a grassy hillside going down. The building and grounds are pretty -- this may be silly, but the vinyl siding takes something away from the place for me. The room was spacious enough. Birding out in the park was surprisingly good -- bluebirds and hummingbirds. Breakfast was good in the Vue restaurant. We upgraded to the full hot  buffet. Staff was nice.  The cons: the room looked out on the pool with a tiny balcony, no way to let the breezes in. The pool is not extensive and could quickly become busy or congested with families staying there. There was no refrigerator in the room. The mandatory valet parking is probably inevitable with the hilltop location, and they
Manager Response: none

Summary: Do not!  Do not!  Stay at this hotel.  They are under renovation.  Lovely exterior facility, but rooms are a disaster. At $600/night for an Exucutive Suite, we neither got the balcony room reserved, NO REFRIGERATOR in room (you have to request one (What you didn't in now that?  Neither did we?) ; the clunker we were sent was so old and noisey, it kept us up all night, the bathroom, while attractive, was a accident waiting to kill someone (no door and the water sprayed all over the MARBLE floor), the walls were completely bare (not a single picture or piece of decor), the couch was filthy, the furniture looked like the termites had a field day.  When I complained, there was never a "We are so sorry l.  How do we make this better?"  At $600 a night, we were totally ripped off.

Summary: I knew it was going to be nice but I did not expect the unbelievable location & views. It has a lot of character and is also very comfortable. A really great staff makes this an ideal place to stay if you're traveling anywhere close!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel to get away from everything with spectatular views!
Summary: I stayed there for 10 days to find somewhere to just relax at a great location.  For peace and quiet.  Let's first say ... it would be difficult to find a better location for a peaceful resort with a better view!  High up on a cliff, overlooking the Pacific Ocean.  Amazing.  Rooms were just renovated; very well kept.  Service at the front desk was excellent.  After asking for an upgrade, the associate juggled some things around and gave me a room with a balcony overlooking the pool and partial ocean.  Pools are excellent and the staff were courteous and helpful all the time!  Ate several times at the restaurant.  The food is very good.  The drinks are expensive, but it's a Marriott.  The only downside is that they removed the refrigerators from the rooms in the renovation.  I
Manager Response: none

Summary: We came for one day weekend gateway. We were met by a reception manager, Susan. She was exceptional.  I booked a standard room and I asked if she can put us in an ocean view room. She dedicate time looking for a room and gave us a room with a pool and ocean view. Our view was as on the front page of hotel web site. She also gave us a detailed explanation about the property.   The hotel is very nice. The grounds, rooms and all of the facilities are in perfect condition. They just finished remodeling the rooms. It is done very tastefully and in modern design. The stuff is very polite and helpful. The bedding, robes and towels are of a first class quality. Overall we had a great experiance and we will be back soon.   Highly recommended.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, excellent service, family friendly!

The property is beautiful...it has stunning views and the rooms are newly renovated. If you are traveling with children it is extremely kid friendly. There are two pools, one of which is clearly geared toward children (but it is enjoyable for the parents as well with delicious cocktails and great poolside service, and/or you can lounge in the hot tub while you watch the kids). They have a splash pad with sprays that the kids loved, a grassy area for them to run around, small putting green/mini golf, ping pong table. My kids are older now, but i
Manager Response: none

Summary: We held a meeting for 30 people at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott.  Our attendees were from all over the US, and everyone loved the setting.  The hotel has been remodeled since I first visited the property many years ago, and it is stunning.  They did a great job with the design.  It feels very upscale and luxurious but it still maintains the laid back beachy vibe.  The rooms are nicely sized and very comfortable.  Outstanding shower.  I was in the far right wing and I had a nice view of the ocean from my balcony.  The grounds are lovely and well maintained.  Really enjoyed the bar - great drinks and great food.  The staff were extremely helpful and friendly.  And I have to truly compliment the catering team - the food was outstanding!!!  When do you ever say that at a business

Summary: We were in Laguna for a wedding and we stayed at the Marriott. From the front desk to the pool staff to the Restaurant staff they were all 5 stars. Great location, yoga in the park everyday, the staff went beyond to ensure we enjoyed our stay. Rooms were very clean and large as well. You could walk down the stairs to the harbour for some great restaurants as well
Manager Response: none

Summary: Just visited the Dana Point Marriott Laguna Cliffside with our 4 year old grandson - it was fantastic! Kids amenities are great , pools, splash zone , playgrounds, you name it! Nearby marina fishing, shops , restaurants- all a short walk - we were there 3 nights and can‚Äôt wait to come back !
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Outstanding resort...shame about the 'unavoidable' $37 parking fee!
Summary: Outstanding resort overlooking Dana Point (free shuttle to the harbour area).  The quality of the hotel is 5* with brilliant quality rooms and outstanding detail...quality bedding, 55" tv, lovely furnishings.  The hotels public areas were equally impressive; pool areas were great and large fully equipped gym.  Only quibble is the mandatory $37 valet parking.  Appreciate space is limited and valet parking makes sense but when room rates are top dollar, I think this is pushing the boundaries of acceptability somewhat.

Summary: We were having a company function at this location, and its in a great spot on the coast.  Where this hotel fell well short was the customer focus as this seems to be a tourist hotel first with some desire to cater to business people.  So I have a profile on the Marriott web-site that specifies a few "likes" such as high floor away from elevator etc, and I do hold status with them.  Problem is they didn't bother to read it. The room was fine but when I tried to make a cup of coffee, no cream, sugar stir sticks,, nothing so I go back down to lobby on the way to dinner and told the front desk.  Come back 3 hrs later, nothing, so they blame housekeeping, not good.  Bright spots for me were Wilmer behind the bar,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We apologize for the unsatisfactory service you received. Summary Heading: Relaxed atmosphere with excellent rooms and awesome views

The hotel is walking distance to Doheny beach, the harbor and provides excellent access to both the 5 & 405 for exploring further afield. Bar/restaurant offer fantastic views of the harbor and Pacific beyond. Service is great and rooms are spacious, clean and again offer great views. The Spa treatments were also very good. Restaurant menus are a little eclectic - not really sure what theme they are going for - but the whole family found things to choose and the dishes were all good.

Summary: Came here for a quick weekend getaway birthday celebration and loved it. Hubby loved his experience at the spa, comfy room, great service from everyone but especially the pool staff. Thank you to Daria the fantastic pool bartender for going above and beyond, recognizing my husbands birthday and even remembering my drink order; you WOWed us for sure!  We‚Äôll definitely be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for an early anniversary/my birthday getaway and it was amazing! The room was immaculately clean. We had a partial ocean view with a balcony that overlooked the pool. The bed was comfortable. We ate breakfast at the Vue restaurant and had the buffet, which was very good. Service in the restaurant and for the hotel was wonderful. I would certainly stay here again without any hesitation. It was a little paradise!
Manager Response: none

They told us everything was fine, but don‚Äôt open the door,or the door to the patio.. the noise continued, with people opening a closing there room door, well into the nite..these doors are very heavy and loud.. They have the most comfortable lounge chairs! Make sure you get out there by 10-10:30 to grab yourself a spot.  I wish this hotel wasn‚Äôt quite as expensive as it is - 2 nights cost us $800 (Saturday night and Sunday night), plus each night it costs $37 to have your car there. Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful rooms, friendly service, ideal location
Summary: My wife and I stayed a long weekend for our anniversary. Rooms are newly refreshed and beautiful. Great fitness center. Wonderful grounds.   What made it especially nice is the location. Easy walk to the state beach or the harbor with lots of restaurants and bars. Quick drive to San Juan Capistrano, Dana Point Farmers Market, Capo Beach Church. Quick access to bike trails.   Note to guests:  If you stay here and use the pools, please keep your voices at a reasonable level, don‚Äôt fill the pool with your own pool toys, don‚Äôt be obnoxious. Think of other people nearby and the rooms overlooking the pool.    Will stay here again for sure.

Summary: This is become our go to getaway spot, excellence in every way is served up at this facility. I must say becoming a Marriott rewards member and or for that matter where ever you book to do so directly with the facility that you want better personalizes your welcome.

Summary: This resort is a good deal compared to some of the other upscale resorts in the area.  The kiddie pool section strikes the perfect balance of enough to keep the kids busy but not too much that they could get lost in a water structure jungle.  Service was great at pool and restaurants and front desk.  Brother in law got a great massage at the spa.  I find this place to be a good value.

We instead were given a 10.00 card to be used at the inhouse Starbucks.  They do however offer room upgrades, and late checked out, which were both received and appreciated.  This property makes it very clear on their website and upon check in that they do not offer self parking and that
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Pretty views, updated interior, however SERVICE WAS TERRIBLE!
Summary: The rooms are nice, the lobby is also nice. The views from the hotel are quite amazing. It‚Äôs a wonderful property. The service is not what it should be for such a nice property. It is quite possibly the worst service we have ever had in a hotel. No one had any idea about anything. We asked for bocci balls to play on the court, and 3 people sent us in 3 different directions. Housekeeping was a little below average (didn‚Äôt take away dirty glasses or leave new soap after taking the old), but it certainly didn‚Äôt affect our enjoyment of the stay. We are not big breakfast eaters
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time at the pool and were able to take advantage of the amenities we offer. Summary: Laguna Cliffs Marriott seems like 80/90‚Äôs design. But the room facilities are quite updated. Big flat TV and toiletries are great. Restaurant has both indoor and outdoor seating with a great Ocean view. The food were ok. We enjoyed staying there very much.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our updated guestrooms and facilities.  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: This was a great spa resort for our weekend getaway. The price of the hotel was reasonable for the accommodations (we booked on Priceline). The valet was nice a quick on drop off, a little slower for picking up the car, but it wasn‚Äôt a terrible wait. The breakfast buffet was really good and had a good variety. We called to make reservations at the spa and they seemed very confused. They were unable to give accurate pricing when I booked the spa appointment. It was way
Manager Response: none

Spa Service available with seasonal specials.  They have Kids program and hospitality suite with games.  Walking distance to Doheny Beach and driving distance from Salt Creek n Laguna Beach.  Free Summer Dana Pont Trolley up n down PCH from hotel to Dana point, Latern District, n Laguna.  My kids love going down the PCH on the trolley at night to cool down!    Great food options at there 2 Vue restaurants!  We all enjoyed our food and drinks!  Hotel has a Wonderful beach / resort atmosphere.  We have stayed at 3 other hotels in the area including the Ritz.  This is a good values and beautiful vacation

Summary Heading: If you are a Starwood Platinum member, don't expect much...
Summary: As a Platinum for Life member at Starwood, I'm told that Marriott recognizes your status.  Apparently, this hotel did not get the memo. Not sure if it's worth staying at the combined Starwood/Marriott

Summary Heading: Stunning Beauty, Service-Oriented Staff, Awesome Experience
Summary: Overlooking the ocean, this hotel has all the amenities. We were very fortunate to enjoy a newly renovated room overlooking one of the pools. The staff has been extremely friendly and attentive.  Meal options are a little limited, but there are tons of nearby excellent restaurants, many in walking distance.
