Summary: The place is immaculate and service is impeccable. This is a great place for kids bc of their pools- a 18 inch one with splash pads plus a more regular one on one side and then a quieter pool on the other side of the hotel. Yet you can still relax as they have full food and cocktail service poolside and they offer tons of pool toys as well as ping pong and mini golf. The website doesn‚Äôt do it justice. Rooms are good size and look like they‚Äôve recently been renovated. Great water pressure in the shower and many Tv options including Netflix. (Took us a while to figure out that the in room dining menu was in the tv though.) Beautiful grounds and views. Didn‚Äôt make the walk to the beach though, but did Walk to the marina which was convenient. The thing that most impressed me was
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you for sharing your amazing experience with us!  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the pool and all of the wonderful amenities our resort offers.  Thank you for the compliments regarding our "beautiful grounds" and "impeccable service".  We are very proud of our staff and happy to hear when our guests are as well! Was told the room was not available yet and they didnt know when it would be available.    Was then told we could go to the spa and change and use the pool for the rest of the facilities.   When my wife and daughter reached

Our highest mission is to provide the exact service and facilities that our guests want, deserve, and expect.  We regret to read about your recent experience at our hotel. Your comments will be reviewed with our management team so we may find ways to make improvements. We truly hope you will consider a future stay so that we may provide you with a stay that you deserve.

Summary: This is one of those hotels whose staff makes the hotel more enjoyable. I checked in and faced a bed-choice snafu, but the front desk manager handled a snippy version of me with absolute aplomb. Since the whole area was fully booked up, my friends and I had no choice to stay. She assuaged the situation with free breakfast for all four of us. And then it was all uphill from there. Despite it being full, every member of the staff were incredibly nice, thoughtful, and courteous. The housekeeper cleaned up a broken glass in the room with a smile. The pool attendants actually attended, making sure we had our towels, offered water, and even jumped up the moment a plastic flew away. The pull out couch was made up and ready when we came back from dinner. And lastly, the valet actually
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful compliments regarding our staff.  We are very proud of our employees and are happy to see our guests are as well!  We are thrilled to receive your "five star service" compliment as we always strive to go above and beyond for our guests.  Again, thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Was here on business at a nearby company. This is where they put up their clients.   The place was/is recently renovated. A few rooms I passed by were still being done.   The vibe here is ‚Äúcool.‚Äù The front desk staff were friendly and accommodating.   We had a late lunch in the bar/lounge. The food, I had a chicken wrap with fries, was perfect.   My room was nice and clean with plenty of space.   The outdoor spaces are nicely cared for and the fire pit/water features are nice to sit around, have a drink and chat.   The view of the harbor and ocean are nice. The wharf/pier with restaurants and bars is close and within walking distance. Walking back is uphill so good to burn those dinner and drink calories.   Some took the loaner bicycles out for a ride and enjoyed it. In my free
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience at our Laguna Cliffs Resort & Spa!  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time with us, and that you were able to enjoy our outdoor spaces.  The chicken wrap at Vue Restaurant is definitely one of our favorite food items and we are delighted to hear you found it to be perfect!  Thank you again for your detailed review, and we are excited to welcome you back soon for more margaritas by the pool!

Summary: The Front Staff service is excellent! The renovated room was beautiful and the resort grounds are lovely. Our room was located in the San Clemente wing, because of the pool it could be a little noisy. But the sound of kids laughing and having fun doesn't bother us, it would be a great wing for families because of location. My 1-hour massage was perfect and relaxing, the staff was very attentive. I hope to return!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our Laguna Cliffs Resort & Spa.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that your massage was perfect!  Thank you for the compliments regarding our staff, as it is our constant mission to go above and beyond for each guest.  We are truly excited to welcome you back!

Summary: Maybe we just got lucky, but we had a great time at this hotel. Our room was newly remodeled, the staff from the valet, check-in, pool and resort were great. We loved taking the bikes out and riding down to the San Clemente Pier. The closeness of the ocean and other activities was great. Nothing to complain about. Great views of the ocean, other guests and their kids were very respectful. Will definitely be back. One complaint, the mattress wasn't all that great.
Manager Response: Thank you for all the compliments regarding our hotel and staff.  We are happy you were able to take advantage of the amenities we offer and had the chance to explore our unique community.  We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Not up to Marriott standards, even after the 'remodel'
Summary: Room, property, service all were just so-so. I came here for a conference and was given a newly remodeled room. However, there was a family next door and I could hear everything they said and what they were watching on TV as if they were in my room. More disappointing was that two Marriott staff members reacted as if it was the family's fault and offered to ask them to quiet down. I explained that the problem was Marriott's, not the family's since they weren't shouting or speaking loudly, they were just talking to each other.   The other issues with the room: the bed was only comfortable on one side (I think the side on which most people sleep was worn down) and there was no tub, just a shower. No tub is fine for me when I'm traveling on business, but if I was here to relax at a
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your detailed experience at our Laguna Cliffs Resort & Spa. We apologize for any of the inconveniences you may have undergone during your stay and want you to know that these shortfalls are being addressed by our leadership team in order to ensure success with every guest's experience.  We do have rooms available with bathtubs, which may be accommodated upon request.  We are also just an eight-minute-walk to Doheny Beach (0.3 miles) but apologize that no one shared this information with you.  Again, we value your opinion and feedback and hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: The hotel has great location in Dana Point. The rooms are ok. The hotel is being remodeled and we stayed at one of the newly remodeled rooms. The bathroom and shower are nice, bed is comfy and it has laminate or vinal flooring rather than nasty carpet. That‚Äôs great but the person above us was walking with high hills and we can hear them walking around their room üò¨. Check in staff was curious and attentive. My biggest issue I have is the venue. We did our annual school gala, which I was one of the chairs for. Our rep at the hotel was terrible, she didn‚Äôt know anything and we had to keep bugging her for answers. During our event, there was also another business conference going on at the same time, a wedding and a graduation. Can I just tell you that this hotel is small and can
Manager Response: Thank you for hosting your event with our resort for your annual school gala!  We take pride in ensuring all events through the resort are flawless for you and your attendees.  Please note your event was of utmost priority and were the only event in our ballroom that evening.  The Resort does feature other food and beverage outlets that guests can enjoy (Vue and OverVue), which is where these other events may have taken place.  We hope your event was a success for the school and your attendees, and we do appreciate being a part of such an important gala event for your school.  Thank you!

Summary: I travel a lot and am super picky with my Hotels.....this location was absolutely wonderful, clean, great location and great restaurants and spa! I highly recommend this hotel! Just wish the weather would have cooperated more...you will not be disappointed with this location be aware that there is some partial room renovations going on.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Quick one day stop at Laguna
Summary: Stopped at Laguna for one night of business at this great resort. From the moment you see the scenery surrounding the property and the genuine welcome greetings of the reception you know you got the right place. Room is new, good in size and very clean. I used the fitness center which is a bit outdated but the hotel is renovating a new one from what I understand. The SPA was great to use. Overall would definitely come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments!  We are delighted you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you back very soon!

Summary: We stayed in room 4008 in the San Juan Capistrano wing, and could not have been happier.  The hotel was booked to capacity, yet the rooms were very quiet.  Check in was fast and friendly, the room was airy and the bed was great.  It has a large screen TV in the room, buy why you would look at it with the great view of the ocean is beyond me. The bathroom is well layed out, and the lighting on the mirror was outstanding. Roomy walk in shower.  Check out was easy via the on-screen button.    We would recommend this location to anyone
Manager Response: We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay at our Laguna Cliffs Resort & Spa!  Thank you for taking the time to share your review and for complimenting our guestrooms and property views.  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: This hotel is in an excellent location.  Views are exceptional.  The white roses near the Adirondack Chairs are beautiful.  The pool area and grounds are well maintained.    Valet and check-in experience worked well.  The mobile valet feature was a nice touch and definitely speeded in the retrieval of our vehicle.  Newly designed rooms are nice.  The carpets have been removed and the beds are extremely comfortable.   The remodel team did a nice job on the rooms.    My one huge complaint is that we choose this resort for the spa facilities.  The spa has very limited hours.  Something like 9:30am to 6pm on a regular day.  On Sunday, late afternoon, I went to the spa to check out the facilities.  Did a quick tour and they looked nice.  Knowing that the spa would be closing soon, I
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our Laguna Cliffs Resort & Spa.  We appreciate your compliments towards our property and our staff, and are happy to hear you enjoyed your guestroom.  Due to an unexpected repair, our Spa was closed on Monday, April 23.  This was a one-time occurrence, and normally our Spa is open everyday (seven days a week).  We sincerely apologize and regret that this information was not delivered to you in a timely manner for your convenience. As you can imagine, it is our daily intent to ensure each guest‚Äôs stay is enjoyable, relaxing and a memorable experience and we regret these shortfalls put a damper on your stay.

Summary: We checked in today for a three night stay. I wanted to write a review ASAP because I had been nervous about our stay after reading some reviews. This resort is awesome! The newly renovated rooms are beautiful, the staff is so friendly and helpful and it‚Äôs close to great restaurants and beaches! Elijah, at the front desk, checked us in and he was so nice and helpful...definitely got our stay off on the right foot. The valet, Cole, and others are so nice. Bartenders were super friendly, too...are you noticing a trend? So happy we chose this resort! We will definitely be back, but planning to enjoy our next three days this time!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments!  We are very proud of Elijah and Cole and it is always nice to hear our guests are as well.  We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new guestroom enhancements and your overall stay with us!  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: First class for a business stay
Summary: This was one of my favorite stays in California by far! Everything was very nice from the lobby to the room. I loved how the room was decorated with a surfer vibe and the fun message painted on the wall when I opened the closet. It was a short and easy walk to the beach from my room after work, and the view from their resort was beautiful!   The room was very spacious and modern (the shower didn‚Äôt have a glass door and was just an opening, which was interesting but didn‚Äôt bother me). You do have to valet your car here so expect to spend some money there, but that‚Äôs to be expected from a nice Marriott resort. The gym was one of the largest I‚Äôve seen for a hotel. There were several cardio machines and enough space for some unique weight machines you may not see as often in hotel
Manager Response: We are so thrilled you enjoyed your recent stay at our Laguna Cliffs Resort & Spa! We are happy to hear you loved the room d√©cor and surfer vibe! Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary: We really enjoyed our time at the Marriott Laguna Cliffs resort.  It was the first time we traveled with our nine month old and it was a great experience.  We were lucky enough to stay in one of the newly remodeled rooms.  It was very nice, the faux wood laminate floor wasn't really secure, but it did the trick and looked nice.  The room was always really nicely taken care of by the staff.   The valet and the front desk staff was fantastic and always very attentive and helpful.  Be warned though, they do no give you free breakfast with your Gold Elite+ status.  They'll give you a voucher for a free appetizer or a $10 certificate to use at the on site Starbucks.  I wish they would honor the free breakfast, but it's all good. I feel that a lot of the other reviews on here are a
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Sad stay for a nice resort
Summary: I wish I could give this place a higher rating because the grounds and views are so beautiful but sadly, for our type of weekend, it was only meh.  My girl friends and I planned a weekend trip away and were really excited to have a weekend of relaxation with no fret.  Sadly, this was not the case from the beginning.  The rep that checked us in did not speak English well and this may have been the  cause of some issues.  She claimed they offered us an "upgrade" to the room that has nice windows to the outside.  I assumed she meant doors, i.e. to the balcony.  When I got to the room, I realized she literally meant the room had windows -- not sure why that was something to boast about.  Also, the beds were full sizes, which were too small for 2 to sleep in.  I called and asked if
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are so pleased that you felt the hotel was gorgeous and we aim to please our guests in every way. We are so sorry that you felt the service was not up to par with the surroundings. Clearly, we missed the mark.  We will be using your review as an example in upcoming staff training programs so that our employees can better understand how their actions can impact the guest experience. Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests and we hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule.  We will look forward to welcoming you back to our resort in the near future so we may ensure your next stay is a more memorable and enjoyable one.

Summary: I have to agree with other reviews that the hotel rooms are run down. This is not a Category 8 hotel, sorry to say. There is a resort fee (of which we didn't use any of the amenities - bikes, yoga mats, etc) and parking fee since only valet is available. We are Platinum Elite guests and did not receive a free breakfast, which is always offered at every Marriott we visit.  Most important part of the hotel room is the bed and it was terrible. No mini fridge in the room. There was a cabinet, where one obviously used to be, but has been removed. We were offered an anniversary drink and dessert which was a nice gesture, but were told we would have to pay tip & tax on it. Not great to receive a gift and have to pay for the tax and tip - something Marriott could easily cover. It's the
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay at our Laguna Cliffs Resort & Spa.  We apologize if you were unaware of the valet only service and resort fees.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  As a resort property our guestrooms do not have refrigerators; however, we do offer refrigerators if a guest requests one and would be happy to deliver them to your guestroom.  We regret to read about your recent experience at our hotel. Because of feedback we have received from our customers, including those on Trip Advisor, we are now in the process of making updates to our hotel which does include a guestroom renovation. Your comments will be reviewed with our management team so we may find ways to make improvements. We truly hope you will consider a future stay so that we may provide you with the experience that you deserve.

Summary: I booked three rooms for our company and all of them were upgraded by the super friendly front desk staff. We all had decent views and newly renovated rooms. A big problem though was that the room did no longer have a fridge and no cork-screw. One has to wonder what the wine glasses are for when the hotel seems rather stingy on the supplies. There was no restaurant to have dinner at, the only option was the huge overcrowded and ear-ringing causing noisy main bar. It took quite some time to get service which was not the fault of the personnel, they were simply understaffed and ran their tails off to keep everyone at least semi-happy. Room service was overpriced. A big plus was the breakfast buffet, reasonably priced with a very nice selection and some of the best berries I had in
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our resort.  We are happy to hear that you had a pleasant experience with our front desk staff and that they were able to upgrade your three rooms!  As a resort property our guestrooms do not have refrigerators; however, we do offer refrigerators if a guest requests one and would be happy to deliver them to your guestroom.  Our OverVue restaurant menu is available from 11 AM to 12 Midnight daily, and we are thrilled to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet.  As you can imagine, it is our daily intent to ensure each guest‚Äôs stay is enjoyable, relaxing and a memorable experience and we truly hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Like a mini Hotel del Coronado
Summary: This resort, like most, charges hefty fees for parking and resort.  But the grounds are so beautiful and the amenities so delightful that a short stay doesn't make that huge a dent in the pocket book.  The lobby spaces are on a par with the level we have come to expect from a Marriott resort level property and the people we encountered were helpful and pleasant.  And the location!  The views just never got tiring.  Marriott was a high bidder on some of the artists' painted elephants (they have 2) that culminated the competition and fund raiser to save the elephants in 2013.  The curbside assistant gave us all the background on their 2 delightful acquisitions.    We recently finished a visit to Hotel del Coronado and, although the interior does not resemble its older inspiration,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our resort and the beautiful views that surround our location!  We look forward to welcoming you back soon and creating more memories for you in the future!

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed at this Marriott in the past and have had fairly good experiences.   This time, not so much.  While the grounds are still beautiful, the room was more run down, with marks all over the walls , stained worn out carpet etc.  we were given a room on the first floor and were told that they were doing some renovations which could be heard from that room. They said it was from 9 am to 5 pm.  I said that was fine, however at 7:55 the next morning the jackhammering started.  When I called the manager she offered to take my resort fee off.  What a disappointment.   The management clearly isn‚Äôt focused on customer service.  I sincerely doubt I will come back here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your constructive comments regarding your recent stay at our property.  We were delighted that you have stayed with us in the past and to have you as our continued guest; however, please allow us to extend our sincere apologies for the unacceptable maintenance of your guest room.  Please be assured this incident has been addressed with our Director of Housekeeping so he can personally review this guestroom with his team and provide the appropriate training to ensure this does not happen again in the future.  We hope you understand that the upkeep of our guestrooms is of the utmost importance and we have a detailed maintenance program in place to ensure the quality and cleanliness of each guestroom is always of the highest satisfaction to our guests.  We usually receive fine compliments from our guests and hope that you look upon this isolated experience as outside of the norm.  It is our daily intent to ensure each guest's stay is above and beyond their expectations and we regret these shortfalls put a damper on your visit.  We truly hope to welcome you back.

Summary: If one is planning to be on the water from Dana Point harbor, this is an ideal location.   Marina, charter boats and tour boats very close by, as well as many restaurants.   Whale watching tours are walking distance; I recommend Capt Dave‚Äôs.   The hotel is nice, adequate amenities, good views and pleasant staff.    If the southern Cal beaches are your desire, perhaps considering staying on Laguna or near Aliso instead.    There is some hiking nearby.   Valet parking and resort fee add up, so be aware of these extra charges
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and the kind words about our Resort's location and staff.   I hope your travels will bring you back to our resort in the future so we may have another opportunity to welcome you the the Laguna Cliffs.

Summary Heading: Terrible Management - Not what it used to be!
Summary: I was a guest here overnight, and also volunteering my time and money supporting a charity event recently. The front desk staff was great. The bar staff was friendly and great during our lunch. I had a lovely chat with the F&B Manager during my lunch, she was amazing. Unfortunately the rest of the management was curt, petty, unwelcoming and far from accommodating. One manager in particular, Brandon, was unnecessarily difficult, and made the mistake of treating myself and other volunteers like we were not his concern. Little did he know, we were all hotel guests as well. I was not alone with my feelings regarding the overall tone from management. It left such a bad taste in my mouth, that I didn't even stay the night, and just went home after the event. Never again, will I
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review and compliments regarding our Front Desk staff and F&B Manager. We regret that you were not satisfied with the services you received from one of our Managers. We can assure you that our staff is very professional and attentive to all guest needs and we do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: We found everyone on staff to be friendly, professional and extremely helpful. Check-in was a breeze. Valets wore smiles well. All seemed like they genuinely liked what they do and enjoyed helping clients and each other.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent location . Around 90 minutes from LAX depending on traffic. One can walk down to the beach. Activities water scooters, kayaks, whale watching, cycling or just lasing on the beach or around the pool. Good restaurants walking distance from hotel. or one can drive down along the coast to laguna beach.  Friendly staff.  All inclusive package is good value. if not one can eat in surrounding restaurants. Rooms to a good standard.  Hotel good venue for Business as well as a family break. nearest church. St Edward the Confessor Catholic Church  33926 Calle La Primavera, Dana Point, CA 92629, USA Phone: +1 949-496-1307
Manager Response: none

Summary: Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort is a lovely vacation spot with beautiful, spacious grounds, an airy lobby that instantly put me in a vacation state of mind, and talented staff that just about fall over themselves in an effort to assist guests. My favorite experience was enjoying appetizers and cocktails in the lounge while being entertained by the live band in the lounge. The music was terrific and brought many folks to the dance floor.  My least favorite experience was the room I supposedly was upgraded to and the encounter I had with the front desk agent. When my husband and I inquired about the complimentary room upgrade (a platinum elite benefit) at check in, we were offered a room in a section of the hotel said to be nearing the end of renovations. Would we object if there
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review and for being a loyal Marriott Rewards member. We regret having falling short of your expectations and for the inconvenience you experienced. There was definitely a misunderstanding and we do apologize for that. We are happy that you enjoyed the resorts lounge and great staff service and we hope we did not damper your stay. We do hope you visit us again in the future. We would love to welcome you and your husband back.

Summary: Ideal location for vacation, but I was traveling for business and found the room needed attention ie:missing half a curtain, mattress too short for tall person and torn/worn room materials. Pros- Quiet and most room have a partial ocean view, great coffee/quick breakfast at bar, gym, nice staff (exception check in).  Easy walk to marina and shops.   Good, but limited menu in bar for dinner.  Coffee maker with supplies!  Clean room, well stocked.  Lovely grounds.  Cons- Very limited menu at bar near TVs during the week.  No choices in room if not requested in advance.  Rooms showing wear and tear (missing half of curtain, torn bed skirt) Internet kept trying to get me to upgrade for $10-15 day.  Most amenities weren‚Äôt used on business trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great views from water-facing rooms, great place to host a meeting
Summary: I stayed for 3 nights during a work event.  The rooms are a little dated, but fine.  Had trouble with my key twice (and yes, I know to keep it away from my phone, magnets etc... it's just dated technology) but the staff were very helpful.  Actually, the staff in general, were A+.  The people helping us set-up the meeting were excellent.  Everyone we met was lovely.  The food was good, the meeting "snack time" food provided as terrific.  Overall, I don't think anyone in our group had a single complaint.  A slightly nicer breakfast (for the $25 pricepoint) and some more up-to-date room features (glass showers, spa-grade soaps) would push this hotel into a 5 star review.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that the staff was helpful and friendly. We couldn't be happier to hear that we not only met your expectations but exceeded them. We appreciate your feedback and will certainly share your comments with our team. Your opinion is very important to us.

Summary Heading: Very nicely maintained hotel, excellent location, superb amenities and engaging staff
Summary: Spent a weekend with our kids who really enjoyed the resort. The room we were in was spacious and well maintained. The hotel and grounds were in pristine conditions. The staff attentive, friendly and engaging. The pool has fun water activities for the kids who had a blast. One can tell that management is on the ball at this beautiful resort. Well done!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort, but check your bill
Summary: We stayed because of a IAPPA conference. When we checked in the gal told us that they waived the $25/day Resort Fee, and our Internet would also be FREE. We paid $179/night. Most of the  staff was very friendly. We didn't have time to use the pool or hot tub. They put a bill under your door the last night you stay. Check it carefully, because they put a $15/day internet charge on our bill, when we were told it was FREE. They took it off, but not until the guy at the front desk informed me that I was wrong, but they adjusted my bill anyway. Next time, I will get it in writing. Is it FREE or not? Make sure the staff is consistent.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stunning grounds, very clean and renovated rooms. Excellent service by all. The in room dining was very good and quick. Unfortunately the girl who does facials was not working the next day so we couldn‚Äôt get spa appointments. The 35$ parking is standard and should be expected for this area and there is no internet usage like some state.  I highly recommend this resort- but book early if you want a spa appointment.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you visit us again soon and hopefully this time you will be able to experience the great wonderful estetitians at our Spa. Thank you for your compliments and we look forward to having you here.

Summary: Our couples massage was the ideal way to be shed the cares of the work week. I was grateful of the cheerful service at reception, and of the attendants - it was easy to transform ourselves into creatures of luxury, even if for only a few hours. Our massage therapists are among the most intuitive, adept and skilled we have encountered. We emerged as new persons.
Manager Response: none

Summary: For the location and the price and the kind staff,  this hotel has always been a gem.  Finding out and seeing that the rooms are getting a refresh is just what the hotel needs. The wings are closed where work is starting so it never bothered us. We saw metal framing for drywall so maybe more is happening then new sofas.  Hope so.  The bar and restaurant can certainly use a refresh as well of that is in the cards.    For the time being : enjoy the friendly staff and very nice grounds as well as  Good size rooms ( old small bathrooms) nice housekeeping including turndown and a great cocktail at the bar.  Which also desperately needs a redo.  That being said..We thought the whole place had stepped up its game since our last visit . The spa and gym continue to be  first rate. We are
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here at room 346.  Place is beautiful with staff pretty friendly.   If you are "upgraded" to ocean view, be sure to  ask them for ear plugs in case the fog horn goes off all night like it did for us.  Ruined my night's sleep.   Overall room was nice and location is beautiful.   The park across the hotel was nice for a walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that your stay with us on New Year's eve was great. Thank you for your compliments regarding our friendly staff and beautiful location. We do regret your sleep was interrupted by the fog horn. Unfortunately, this is nothing the resort has control over and we do apologize that it kept you up.

Summary Heading: Beautiful room and the best bed
Summary: Our check in was bumpy. They weren‚Äôt as nice as I‚Äôm used to at Marriot. But managers Anthony and Maclean ensures the rest of our stay was beautiful. Desiree at the front and Ashley at the bat. Everyone was very cheerful. Ricardo in housekeeping was efficient and patient with my many request. The sheets are gorgeous. The room had an amazing patio! Right by he oil.  The breakfast was delicious and fresh. We will come again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I‚Äôve stayed at this Marriott on multiple occasions and was saddened to see the state of disrepair our room was in.  Spiders in the bathroom, filthy floors, toenail clippings under the sink, dirty room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Please allow me to extend my sincerest apologies for the lack of cleanliness you experienced in your guestroom. As you can imagine, it is our goal to not only meet the guests' expectations, but to exceed them. We have clearly missed the mark during your stay and will be discussing your comments with our Housekeeping Team as your opinion is very important to us.

Summary: Enjoyed our stay at the Cliffs Marriott. If you don‚Äôt mind not being directly on the beach, this location was perfect. The hotel is beautiful! Really nice property, beautiful rooms, clean...perfect! My only complaint was I had to ask twice for extra towels and three times for an extra pillow. Drinks overlooking the water on the patio is perfect, especially to watch the sunset. Great value, lots of restaurants and shopping nearby, a close ride north to Laguna.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Come back to see us soon!

Summary: Had a very pleasant stay at the Laguna Cliffs resort, which is undergoing a refresh. Our room was comfortable, even if showing a bit of wear that will no doubt be addressed in the remodel. Staff are courteous and helpful, and the pool areas and fitness center are clean and well appointed. Location is also phenomenal, adjacent to a park and an easy walk down to the harbor and restaurants. This is my fourth stay at the property, and I have always had a great time. I especially appreciate the nice fitness center.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We are so glad that you chose to come back and stay with us during the Holiday season. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: This hotel is so great sometimes I feel it‚Äôs better to stay here rather than the Ritz at Laguna.  The location is perfect.    I have stayed here 6-7 times.  Almost every room has a terrific view of the ocean or pool..  Many rooms have balconies.    This week, they‚Äôve decorated for Christmas and the hotel lights up beautifully at night.  The lighted up Woody wagon is a sight to see.  Morning walks are beautiful.  The hotel is adjacent to a park and in the mornings the locals have a yoga session that anybody can follow.  You can walk down access the pier below.  The restaurant below and at the deck are exceptional.  The waitresses at the bar are friendly & helpful.  I was pleasantly surprised with the food here, always terrific.  The valet dudes here are quick, always courteous
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your wonderful compliments about our staff. We, too, agree that our staff is some of the best around. We are delighted to hear that we are one of your favorite hotels in California and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great spot in need of some updating
Summary: The staff here were really great, from the front desk to the valet to the lounge. The views from the lounge and some of the rooms are wonderful. We also had breakfast at the restaurant downstairs, which was very good. The first room we looked at was huge, but the ocean views could only be seen if standing - weird! The second room was nice with a balcony (which I recommend). Again, the views were at a weird height and taller chairs were provided on the balcony to enjoy it. The bathroom, though clean, had a torn shower curtain, dented cabinetry and a damaged wall. The bedskirt did not fit the bed- again, weird. Loved that they provided surfboards, bikes, etc and wish I had had time to go to the spa. We plan to return - this hotel deserves a little love!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I'm more of a boutique hotel person than huge Marriott property lover. But, I do like this hotel when I come to OC. I will say that I do feel nickel and dimed here as they charge for absolutely everything and offer very little, if anything complimentary. I travel here often on business and I sometimes opt to stay at other places just because I don't feel like every sneeze is being charged. But, I do like the comfort of the location and everyone is friendly. The lobby restaurant is also enjoyable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a very nice trip to Dana Point to relax and see family. The outside property and views are five star and will make you want to come back. The rooms were good and kept clean, but could use some updating. There was rust on the bathroom counter tops and some of the tile dated, but overall very good and if they get that updated as well as the parking situation squared away this could be a five star property. It was nice that they had surf boards available for use as part of the resort fees. The staff was friendly and helpful and it was an easy in and out. The location is wonderful and an easy walk down to the Dana Point Harbor where there are shops and restaurants. Our family will come again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy that you were able to take advantage of our resort amenities however, please allow us to extend our sincere apologies for the unacceptable maintenance of your guestroom.  As you can imagine, the upkeep of our guestrooms is of the utmost importance and we have a detailed maintenance program in place to ensure the quality and cleanliness of each guestroom is always of the highest quality.  Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests and we hope you will look upon this as an isolated incident and not the norm.  It is our daily intent to ensure each guest‚Äôs stay is enjoyable, relaxing and a memorable experience and we regret these shortfalls put a damper on your visit to our resort.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Dissapponting not a resort!! Should call themselves one
Summary: Went for a long thanksgiving weekend  Try to book spa appt online before arrival could only book one type, booked a specific massues. When I arrived at the spa told them about booking issues and was told  its really not the way to book appt. then was told my massuese was off that day and when i showed the reservation. I got a ‚Äútold you so‚Äùabout booking online. Next is the the rooms housekeeping. I was there for three nights never removed my banana peels, used plastic cups, coffee cups can of soda from the mini bar which funny that was charged very promptly Not that In expect them to pick up my clothes but every hotel I stay in usually folds the clothes left out on bed or chair barely got the bed made . Next pool side service... again this is a resort, chairs were great and thats
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share feedback about your experience at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We regret having fallen short of your expectations, as well as our own. Our team prides itself on addressing the needs of each guest we encounter to ensure they have a pleasant stay. Your comments will be shared with our team to help us improve upon any shortfalls or inconsistencies. Our Resort is synonymous with providing an exceptional experience for our guests, we certainly hope you'll reconsider giving Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa another opportunity in the future to restore your faith.

Summary: The Laguna Cliffs Resort exceeded my expectations immediately. We are only on day 1 but felt compelled to comment. The check-in was BY FAR the most welcoming experience our family has ever received from a hotel. My 3 little girls were given stuffed animals 7 steps in the front door. Every employee from the bell hops to front desk were quick to welcome with big smiles. Tiffany and Thea at the front desk were total pros and did everything to make sure we were set for a great family weekend getaway. The grounds are immaculate, my girls were swimming butterfly in the pool and we played ping pong and pitted on the green and are looking forward to Bocce tomorrow. Both the bar and restaurant look very inviting and the views are so relaxing.  We totally scored with this gem of a
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that our staff not only met but exceeded your expectations. We couldn't be happier that your weekend getaway was perfect from the moment you checked in. Thank you for your compliments and we do hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: we came here several times and we enjoy always the good food on the terrasse and the great view from there. when sitting inside: the air-condition is very cold. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel/resort is one of my all time favorites. The view from the hotel overlooking the ocean is fabulous.  The grounds feature beautiful flowers and the pools are wonderful. The fireplace inside the lobby offers a great place to relax and watch the fire.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that we are your favorite resort of all time! Thank you for your wonderful compliments. We cannot wait to welcome you back!

Summary: Summary:  (1) The staff is extremely polite but not empowered to address, let alone remedy, any problems you might have during your stay.  (2) The room descriptions are a blatant lie, borderline fraud (see attached pic). (3) The hotel and room interiors feel like an old Vegas hotel that has fallen from grace. (4) Grounds are pretty  I booked a room at Laguna Cliffs because I was attending a friend's wedding. After seeing all the pictures online, I decided to turn it into a mini-vacation. I had booked my room 2 months in advance and opted for their third most expensive option (out of 4 available) which was described as "partial ocean view". This room cost ~$100 more per night than their base rate and ~$50 / night than their pool view. I'm attaching a picture of what partial ocean
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We apologize for the unsatisfactory service you received. Our job is not only to meet the guest‚Äôs expectations but to exceed them. We value your opinion and comments greatly and we take every review seriously, we will be addressing your concerns with our team.  Our Resort is synonymous with providing an exceptional experience for our guests, so we were happy to hear you felt the food was lovely at the restaurant and that you enjoyed the beautiful scenery of the property. We certainly thank you again and we hope that you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Staff who talk but don't listen
Summary: Throughout my stay in this hotel, I had to ask front desk staff to stop talking over me and LISTEN to what I was saying, this from the moment we checked in and several times throughout the stay. We Checked in late after flying over from London with my family. I had asked for adjoining doors but was told they 'don't guarantee' them. We were tired so accepted two rooms with an agreement to change them the next day. Got to the temporary rooms and guess what? both rooms had adjoining doors but to others guests rooms. How hard can this be to organise? We booked this accommodation months in advance.  Next day this was sorted but not without speaking to a further three staff, there was no pro activity from the staff in this regard but they seem to think that they are doing a great job
Manager Response: Dear Marklorr,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa with us.  As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. It was very concerning to hear that our Front Desk and Valet staff did not provide the level of service that you - and our Resort expects. It is our job to have a spirit to serve, one that is genuine and caring which clearly was not what we portrayed during your interaction, and greet all guests at every encounter. While we do our very best to accommodate as many room requests as possible, sometimes due to high occupancy levels we are not able to accommodate all requests. I understand how frustrating it can be when traveling with a family not to have connecting rooms. We appreciate your time and feedback and our apologies again.  Sincerely,

Summary: My niece had a wedding nearby in San Juan Capistrano and a group of us stayed at this hotel.  The reception team that greeted us were friendly, but never really acknowledged our request to have rooms near each other, which was a little frustrating.  It was nice that the rooms had small patios.  The rooms themselves were fine, possibly a little dated.  No mini refrigerator is in the room and this is disappointing.  Our room was 105 and it had a partial ocean view that was negatively affected by the constant drone of some large machinery that could be heard when the patio door was open.  Other reviewers noted the resort and parking fees which are substantial add-ons.  One extremely frustrating item is how long it took to get our car - you have to park there and pay, but the delays
Manager Response: Dear SLindseySanDiego,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay at our Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. I was sorry to hear that we were not able to accommodate your request for rooms close to each other and the noise you heard outside your patio. As you can imagine, we do our very best to accommodate as many guest requests as possible. Unfortunately, we were not able to do so in your case due to the high occupancy. We have shared your comments with our team to better our service in the future. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you in the future when your travels bring you to Dana Point.  Sincerely,

Summary: We had a lovely room to relax in after a wedding. The location is right along the beach. Rooms are top shape, great bedding, room service and attentive staff. Good for families and couples. Great pool scene
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5-Star Review! We hope to see you again very soon.

Summary Heading: Good Location, Nice Views, Excellent Staff
Summary: This hotel is in a convenient location for exploring the region.  We had a very nice 2nd floor room with a small balcony and nice ocean view.  The hotel does cater to small conferences and weddings so you can expect some noise and "activity" if your visit co-incides.   The staff were uniformly friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Views, location and staff.....but a few things drop my rating
Summary: So let me start with all the good things. This is in a fantastic location in Dana Point with amazing views across the harbor and out to see. We were lucky to have an ocean front room with a patio so the space was excellent. Looked like some of the side views maybe more restricted. It is an easy walk down to the harbor where there are some good restaurants and just nice to walk around. Also very close to the beach and, if you head the other way, well worth walking up to the Bluff Head Trail which has great views. The resort itself is very smart with a spacious reception area and a nice bar with, if you sit outside, great views. The restaurant looked nice but with so many others nearby we decided to walk out. We used one of the pools that was really good. Nice temperature and
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really wanted to like this property. From senior staff to restaurant/bar personnel to concierge to check in to housekeeping to parking, all were personable and helpful. Food and drinks were good, delicious even in several cases. Sheets were luxurious.  However... There are places that are worn and in need of repair. Some were mechanical issues. Some were a missing drape or holes in another. Dirty couch. Uncomfortable bed (2 different rooms).   For $400+ a night each room, + $37 & tip for parking, $15/day for Internet each room, etc etc - in my book, that just shouldn't be.  The coup de gras was a party and/or wedding not far from our room. There was no getting away from the EXTREMELY LOUD MUSIC. (I'm shouting because that's about what we had to do to be heard in our own room.)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind comments about our staff. As you can imagine, the upkeep of our guestrooms is of the utmost importance. The property has a detailed maintenance program in place to ensure the quality and cleanliness of each guestroom is always of the highest quality.  We do understand that you came during a busy time and we are fortunate to have these busy weekends, we regret though that it wasn't the quiet you were looking for. We appreciate your feedback.

Summary: rooms good but could use a refresh  pool areas good but could be improved by better in week service/clearer telephone instructions  vue lounge very good and fine location and views .Vue restaurant not so(poor menu and sloppy staff)  room service very good
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location and very good Marriott.
Summary: I stated a lot of Marriott properties. This property has a fantastic location and the rooms facing the ocean all have a partial view with the trees blocking most of the view to the south. The bar scene was very active on a Friday and a Saturday night. The rooms are small but the rooms facing the ocean all have a really have a decent view.  The service was reliable and friendly. The facility is within walking distance of the  beach, harbor and some local restaurants and shops. We had a very nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 4-Star review! We are glad that you could experience a variety of things to see and do in and around our hotel. Thank you again for letting us know you enjoyed the service during your stay, we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary: This is a great bluff top location with beautiful views. Located next to a park with many walking trails. It is a short walk to Doheny Beach and Dana point Harbor. Parking is valet only, $37 per day. It is a very well kept and gorgeous hotel. Unfortunately, everything that you buy there is ridiculously overpriced, such as; bottled water in your room - $6, cocktails - Irish coffee $13, Manhattan up - $18, food - just went offsite because it was waaay cheaper. To their credit, the $25 resort fee (per room, per night) included use of bikes, boogie boards, surfboards, yoga mats, shoe shine service, tennis, and putting greens. We ended up around $300 per night when you included the valet and resort fee. Bring your own booze and eat offsite. If I wasn't there for a special event, I
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, shame about all the extra charges
Summary: I completely agree with previous reviewers in that the resort fee combined with the valet only parking is a bit galling. It feels like Marriott are adopting a budget airline approach to their charges and I would prefer more transparency.   We opted for the breakfast included rate and the buffet breakfast was excellent. Room was standard issue Marriott, but the bed was very comfortable. Nice pool areas and the sun loungers are also extremely comfortable. Its a great locations, lovely views of the ocean and the facilities are all of a very high standard. Overall we really enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Geraldine,   Thank you for taking the time to complete the Guest Satisfaction Survey in regards to your recent stay at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. I was happy to hera you enjoyed the buffet breakfast at our Vue restaurant!  We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fee rates and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical

Summary Heading: Great location, nice property, but they nickel and dime you to death
Summary: When I go to a Marriott resort, I have high expectations for quality and value. Indeed, the hotel is nice, the room was nice, the staff was nice, and the location is great. However, we felt nickel and dimed in a way that is unseemly for a hotel of this caliber.   We got a nice deal via a third party service and stayed at this hotel for 3 nights, and one of the perks of this deal was that the 3rd party had negotiated a removal of the $25 resort fee. However, on arrival we were informed that the only option for parking was $37 per night valet parking, and when I said I'd never been informed of this, they said it was on their website and well, your resort fee was waived so that takes care of most of it, right? Um, no, no it doesn't. That was a savings we were expecting to enjoy,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are very thankful for your loyalty to the Marriott brand. We are delighted that our staff was both friendly and helpful to you during your stay. Your feedback is very important to us. Our job is not only to meet the guest‚Äôs expectations but to exceed them. We value your opinion and comments greatly and we take every review seriously. Our team prides itself on addressing the needs of each guest we encounter to ensure they have a pleasant stay. We apologize that the parking and resort fees were not clearly visible on your confirmation e-mail. We hope that you were able to enjoy the inclusions of the resort fee (bikes, surfboards, Wi-Fi, etc.).   Your comments will be reviewed with our management team so we may find ways to make improvements. We truly hope you will consider a future stay with us.

Summary Heading: Beautiful location but the property doesn‚Äôt do justice to the Marriott brand
Summary: Perched right at the top of the cliff overlooking the ocean the views are spectacular, the hotel however could do with a lot of improvements, the room we stayed in 105 was really small with a balcony that didn‚Äôt really offer any special views, the bathroom needs some renovations and they could do with a better restaurant for sure. The only highlight id say is the Starbucks  on site to get your morning cuppa.  My rating 2.5 / 5   Would I go back ? Not likely .....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy the beautiful scenery of the resort. We appreciate your feedback and will certainly share it with our team. As you can imagine, the upkeep of our guestrooms is of the utmost importance and we have a detailed maintenance program in place to ensure the quality and cleanliness of each guestroom is always of the highest quality.  Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests and we hope you will look upon this as an isolated incident and not the norm. As you can imagine, it is our daily intent to ensure each guest‚Äôs stay is enjoyable and memorable and again I apologize for these issues which in turn put a damper on your stay with us. .

Summary Heading: Lovely view but they rip you off
Summary: Be prepared to pay $25 resort fee, $37 parking and $24 each for breakfast. The management lies about this being clear on their web site. Go find it. Breakfast suggestion:  go to Stacks which is adjacent to hotel for best breakfast in town.   We went whale watching. The crew was great but saw nothing. They gave us passes to try again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fee rates and will certainly take your comments under review. We are sorry to hear you were not aware of our parking fees as we inform guests in a few different areas regarding these fees.  On the confirmation you received for your guestroom our parking fee and resort fee is noted under your room rate.  In addition, the parking fee and resort fee is noted on our website under amenities.

Summary: My wife and I are celebrated 2 years of marriage and decided to get a nice room at Marriot‚Äôs Laguna Cliffs Resort and Spa.    Upon arrival, we were informed there was one option for parking (valet), which cost $37 every 24 hours.  I informed the hotel attendant and manager that I would simply find other arrangements for my car.  After asking for my car and keys, the valet kindly said not to worry, the car was parked already and I would NOT be charged for parking.  My wife and I arrived late and checked out as planned the following morning.  However I WAS charged for parking ($37) and they refuse to remove this charge.  In addition: my wife was informed breakfast was included in our stay.  We later found out (fortunately before breakfast) this was not the case and the buffet was
Manager Response: Happy 2 year Wedding Anniversary. Thank you for taking the time to complete the Guest Satisfaction Survey in regards to your recent stay at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We apologize if you were unaware of the valet fees. For the guest‚Äôs convenience, we clearly state that we provide valet service only on our website. We also state all of the fees on our website as well as the confirmation e-mail. Please accept our apologies that what you experienced did not meet your standards , we will address your feedback with the appropriate staff.

Summary: The hotel was excellent, great location with good facilities. The food was good and the room was clean, comfortable and quite spacious, although the view could have been a little better. Sitting outside eating breakfast watching the hummingbirds was a joy. Some things were overpriced though. I never understand how anyone can justify a charging $37 a day for valet parking and a bottle of water was $6 with nowhere to get it cold, needless to say we failed to take advantage of that offer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review, it was our pleasure having you with us and we appreciate your compliments about the resort! We value your feedback regarding our parking rates and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  Thank you again for your review. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort was a great stay for a girls trip. My friend and I arrived for an overnight girls trip out of LA. The drive was beautiful through Laguna Beach to Dana Point. We were welcomed warmly and shown directly to our room overlooking the park and beach. The hotel property is clean, well maintained and the staff warm and welcoming as well. Rooms are well appointed with modern amenities. Our balcony had seating for two. The Spa was nice. The fitness room well outfitted and spacious. We had dinner at the hotel restaurant and the food was very good. I would highly recommend this property.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A great stay with a few niggles
Summary: I stayed here for 10 nights and enjoyed every minute of it. My room was spacious and clean.  I had a beautiful view of the ocean and easy access to one of the pools.  Every single employee I came into contact with was very helpful, responsive, and friendly - they really went out of their way to ensure that they provide all guests with a pleasurable stay.    I really enjoyed using the pool - the temperature was always perfect - even at night. The gym was also very well-equipped and clean.  Breakfast was also delicious and sitting outside on a sunny day while enjoying your morning coffee and meal was a treat.  Unfortunately, the room soundproofing was pretty poor.  Every sound made in the neighboring rooms was audible and the noise was very intolerable every time the guest(s) took
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to complete the Guest Satisfaction Survey in regards to your recent stay at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa.  As we pride ourselves on delivering a memorable hotel experience during your travels, we have unfortunately fallen short of our goal during your recent stay. I was sorry to hear that you have experienced shortfalls in service. Please accept my apologies that you did not receive an itemized receipt of your mini bar charges. If you could provide me with your contact information I would be happy to send you the receipts. You can contact the Manager on Duty at (949) 661-5000.  Sincerely,

Summary: I travel frequently. To be honest, Marriott to me is a kind of a standard brand that generally offers  a comfortable room with a few more amenities than a Hampton Inn. Mainly a full service restaurant/ bar. I was traveling to the area to attend a horse show with my west coast based college age daughter.  I suggested the Ritz (where I have stayed several times) but to her point she thought it was not worth the higher rate since we weren't going to spend much time there. So. We got the following: $37 a day for valet only parking. Which was a nightmare of traffic. Kind of like the 405 at rush hour. Charged a $30 resort fee. For nothing we used. Yet I still had to pay $10 per day PER DEVICE to connect to wifi. The rooms were tired and worn.  Our mini bar had no key and after a long
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We appreciate your feedback and will certainly share your comments with our team. Your comfort is extremely important to us and we apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us. We apologize if you were unaware of the valet only service and resort fees. For the guest‚Äôs convenience, we clearly state that we provide valet service only on our website. We also state all of the fees on our website as well as the confirmation e-mail. We hope that this did not pose an inconvenience to you in any way. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: Stayed here with my family in August. Location was great and views were fantastic. Hotel was clean and staff was very friendly. Overall a great experience. Pools were nice and the views of the ocean and marina were great. Only negative to our stay was that the rooms only had double beds. With a family of 4 including two teenagers it just wasn't enough room to get a good nights sleep. I'm sure it's fine for families with smaller children but my kids were miserable trying to share a double bed. I also had issues as I am tall and my feet hung over the end of the bed. Other than the sleeping arrangements the rooms were spacious and clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Susan & Nadine helped make my husband's reservation for the night before our wedding. They did NOT disappoint! Their email communication and personal follow up to ensure that he and his best man had the most relaxing and top notch experience was A+++! Gorgeous hotel rooms and even more beautiful views. Thank you to the amazing staff -- Susan & Nadine!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review, we are very delighted to hear that our staff was able to accommodate your husbands reservation. We hope to see you in the future.

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay at Laguna Cliffs Marriott
Summary: So this is the second time I have stayed at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott in Dana Point.  I give it 5 stars.  I would give it more if allowed.  The location is beautiful, the hotel is very well maintianed and I loved the food.  However, it is the atmosphere of the hotel that makes it so good in my estimation.  The staff is unbelievably friendly and cheerful.  Their greeting, friendly attitude and quickness to offer asistance is evident with every hotel employee I encountered during both stays.  It makes for a nice stay. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that this was your second visit with us and that you enjoyed every minute of it. We are happy to hear that our staff was friendly and accommodating. We take great pride in the high level of service our staff provides and we couldn't be happier that you witnessed this first hand. We appreciate your recommendation and we do look forward to having your visit us again.

Summary: A wonderful coastal property that is well managed and genuinely focused on making your stay brilliant. Mahalo nui loa. Loved our boat cruise out of Dana Point Harbor and visiting antiques stores in San Juan Capistrano. Can't wait to return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great views is first and foremost. The bar is indoor/outdoor, and the outdoor portion is spacious and offers the best views on the premises. The rooms are great and cleaned often and well. Only issue was that some rooms are quite far from the front desk and if your key card fails (mine did a few times) it's kind of a pain in the butt. Anyway, location is great - lots of great shops and restaurants on walking distance, lots of free trolleys for things further away, and a quick Uber ride will take you to a plethora of adorable and fun beach towns. Oh! Two pools, a hot tub, a spa, two restaurants, room service - you don't even need to leave, though I do recommend exploration. Enjoy!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to take advantage of the amenities. We hope you visit us again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: Stayed here for two nights last weekend.  The hotel is fantastic.  Everything you need is right here.  Well manicured grounds.  Yoga in the morning.  Two pools.  The one we sat at had bar and food service.  The drinks were delicious.  The food was exceptional.  Our room was very clean.  We had a lower level room that walked right out to the pool.  Ordered room service both nights- came quickly and the food was delicious.  Hotel bar got a bit crowded Saturday night but, there was a fantastic band playing that was very entertaining.  Starbucks on premises.  Valet parking.  Free wifi.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel from driveway to breakfast
Summary: This is really a lovely hotel experience.  The view locations are stunning. There is a park just across the way. The hotel staff is exceptional.  The rooms are nice but not overly fancy although thI grounds were outstanding. They had live music in the restaurant and bar area.  The breakfast bar was really nice.  The location is spectacular.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your nice compliments regarding our exceptional staff service and breakfast buffet. We value your opinion and we do hope you visit us again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: We had a wonderful 4 night stay here in late August.  The staff was really top notch.  Views were beautiful.   We stayed in a lovely room with a partial ocean view and nice patio.  Our children enjoyed the pool with the water features, ping pong and putting green.  Enjoyed proximity to the harbor. Good breakfast at Stack's Pancake House.  Relatively easy drive to Disneyland from there. $37 parking valet fee was high. There is no self parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wish I Could Have Enjoyed More of the Resort
Summary: I stayed at this property for 2 nights in late August as part of a business trip that brought me to the area. Because of the length of my meetings, I didn't spend too much time at the resort, but the time I spent there was great.   My room was pretty clean, though the carpet shows some wear and could stand to be shampooed. The bathroom had plenty of space for me, and I liked my patio overlooking the pool. The bartenders at the bar in the lobby were excellent and I had several meals there during my stay. I loved the close proximity to the harbor, too.   The service at the hotel was excellent. They quickly brought me a toothbrush when I realized I forgot one, and the valet quickly brought my phone charger to me from the car when I left it behind. The valet parking service was
Manager Response: none

Summary: I so wish that I could have enjoyed this property more.  First off, my bad for booking a road trip to southern California during the summer time and staying at this property during a weekend.  The room itself was decent, bathroom had wear and tear.  I did love the outdoor patio, which had a partial view of the ocean.  However, the room was located right next to the kiddie pool area and weddings took place right in front.  While I am not opposed to any of those things, I was really hoping to have a nice quiet relaxing weekend.  Quiet being paramount.  Valet was a chaotic mess, you have no choice but to Valet at $37.00 a night, which I was aware of and had no problem with as they stated I would be able to have in and out access with minimal wait for car.  Well that was not to
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. Your opinion is very important to us and we strive to make every guest feel as comfortable as we can. We do understand that you came during a busy time and we are fortunate to have these busy weekends. We regret though that it wasn't the quiet you were looking for. We appreciate your feedback and we do hope you visit us again during the year. May we suggest that you maybe request a room away from the pools the next time you visit us. Perhaps that would be more to your liking. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Extra charges... Too far from beach
Summary: I was told by the front desk before booking that the beach is a 5 minute walk away. It's more like 15, down a steep slope, across a highway, through a parking lot. Not exactly beach front... Also, I know this is a "hotel thing" but I can't stand exorbitant resort fees and parking charges. This place has the nerve to tack on 30 dollars for a "resort fee" (although they offer virtually no perks beyond a normal hotel) and 37 dollars for parking. RIDICULOUS.... The rooms are fairly standard, if a little bit on the run-down side. The staff at this hotel is their shining achievement -- I had nice interactions with everyone working there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff service. We apologize if you were unaware of the valet only service and resort fees. For the guest‚Äôs convenience, we clearly state that we provide valet service only on our website. We also state all of the fees on our website as well as the confirmation e-mail. We hope that this did not pose an inconvenience to you in any way. We do regret that our staff said the beach was 5 min. away. It is a little walk and we make sure we clearly state that we are an ocean-view property and not a beach-front property. Your opinion is very important to us and we do hope you find it in your travels to stay with us again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Marriott could turn this from good to great ..
Summary: Stayed here for a week in August 17 as part of our family road trip vacation.  Location: quite far south of LA (90 minute drive to LAX) and beyond Laguna Beach which we enjoyed immensely last year. Hotel has a hillside location and shares its grounds with a local public park, which means the drive is often full of local cars looking for park/beach access. No direct beach access but short walk to both the beach and the marina.  Check-In: We got there at 7pm on Friday and it was chaotic. The team really struggle at peak times and we saw this a number of times during the week, including check out. One gripe - mandatory valet parking at $30+ per night! This is just stealth rate tax and really grinds me. Consider allowing self-park or put it in the rate Marriott!  Room: we had a
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that your son enjoyed the amenities of the resort and you found the hotel to be family friendly. We appreciate your feedback and will certainly share your comments with our management team. We do apologize that the leak in your toilet did not get fixed during your stay. We can assure you that the engineering team has fixed this issue. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: Lovely hotel with 1 pool for kids and 1 without which is a plus. It's calm and relaxing. We were upgraded to a sea view room with balcony. In the resort fee you have access to different activities like surfing, bodyboard, tennis court ...  Also the concierge Maggy was really nice and helpful regarding activities !  Loved this place and would happily come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the resort amenities and the helpful Concierge staff. We look forward to having you back. See you soon!

Summary: Hotel, pool and rooms are beautiful. Really enjoyed the adults pool with the fabulous lounge chairs and great views. The only drawback was the size of the beds in the rooms as they seemed much smaller than typical full size beds and the towels were really old! Either way, we'll return at a later date.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have been driving through CA for two weeks and completely fell in love with Dana Point and this property so much we stayed here twice during our trip.  During both visits we had fantastic ocean balcony rooms. Valet was prompt and most attendants could give directions and recommendations. Room service was prompt and delicious. Dining outside at the "upstairs" restaurant was okay- sitting next to the fireplaces is heavenly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that we were your travel spot twice in two weeks. We couldn't be more pleased to hear that you not only enjoyed your guest room but also the staff service. Thank you for visiting us. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful View, Walking Distance to Doheny and the Marina
Summary: Stayed in July 2017.  Had a 'pool' view room that also had a nice view of the ocean.  While it backed up to PCH, I didn't hear any traffic noise at night.  Great for a family, it is a beautiful hotel.  On the ocean side of both pools is a nice green space with lounge chairs.  Near the check-in desk, the hotel serves a full Starbucks menu, including pastries.  Very relaxing vacation!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location within walking distance of great food, from breakfast, lunch to dinner. They had 2 pools one had a splash pad for the kids. keeping most of the kids to second pool which was nice.  I do not like that you had to pay a large resort fee on top of the Valet service. Making our weekend away cost way more than what we had budgeted. The room we had was a first floor room which put us close to the pool making it very easy to get all our stuff to the pool everyday.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is amazing! It has so much to offer their guests. The free boogie boards, surf boards, bikes and other activity gear. They make your stay easy!  The pool isn't huge in fact it is really small but the ocean is just a quick drive.  My room was amazing, a balcony over looking the ocean! It was perfect!   I definitely recommend this hotel for business people or families you will not be disappointed.  The service was phenomenal from everyone!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to take advantage of the resort amenities. Our goal is to make your stay as comfortable and pleasant as we possibly can. Thank you for your recommendation. We hope you visit us again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: Spent a few days at this resort for a conference. Overall, this was one of my better conference experiences. The staff was wonderful. Breakfast, lunch, and dinner buffets were above average. The view is spectacular and walking distance to the marina. Rooms were really clean, new, bed was outstanding, and the small balcony with a view of the ocean was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ok hotel, but just something missing - atmosphere
Summary: Located in a beautiful location, with a magnificent view of the ocean. Near a few restaraunts and shops - not a lot. At time of check in- quite busy, with tourists yelling at each other at top volume while standing in line. Room not ready around 2 pm - unfortunate after lengthy travel to arrive. Had to sit in bar to wait for room to be ready - despite offer to get us when it was ready, didn't happen - going back after a wait "oh I was just about to get you"... Not likely.  Unfortunately most rooms are in a horseshoe around pool, so peace and tranquility - not so much. Reasonable service. Great plus was free use of bikes - lots available - recommend if you stay. Valets and bell people not overly helpful about rental process though, and trail directions. Getting back up the hill
Manager Response: Dear Trav3lgur,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa.   One of our key priorities is to provide the highest level of friendly and courteous service. While it was a pleasure having you here as our guest, your feedback regarding the service our team provided caught my attention. I am very sorry to learn that the quality of your arrival experience did not quite meet your ‚Äî or our ‚Äî expectations. Please rest assured that your comments have been shared with the team in an effort to improve our service.   Thank you for being a valued guest and we hope to serve you again whenever your travels bring you back to Dana Point.   Best regards,

Summary: I was here for a four day retreat with my husband and had a great time but I recommend that you never stay in a room with adjoining door. No insulation and you can understand every word the people are saying next-door. Had to call security to quiet the family of 5 with crying baby at 10 pm. So loud.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We deeply regret that your neighbors disturbed your stay with us. We are happy to hear that our Loss Prevention team was able to come and assist with your needs but we apologize for the inconvenience you experienced. Your opinion is very important to us and we want you to leave with fond memories. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.
