Summary: Laguna  Cliffs in Dana Point is an outstanding property located on a bluff overlooking the ocean. The service provided from the moment we come up the driveway was superb. I simply cannot say enough about the employees and their attentiveness and attention to detail. Our room was a spacious room on the first floor with a large patio sufficient to hold a lounger and a couple of chairs. The sliding door to the patio had a screen door so that if we should choose fresh air in the room, we could have that without bugs! The food and drink we had was very good and the prices were resort typical. The rooms contained plenty of electrical outlets and had easy television hook-up for games or Roku. In room coffee maker and safe is appreciated. My only complaint is that there is a mandatory
Manager Response: none

Summary: I've stayed here twice. It's clean, beautiful, well landscaped, and very courteous. I feel a million miles away but the waterfront harbor is at your feet a d dining options are plentiful. My only complaints are the air conditioner is loud (I'm a light sleeper), the valet parking at $35 nightly seems a bit steep, (the Ritz and Montage are less I believe) and because they are always fully booked, getting your vehicle can be an issue. The way it's run seems a bit disorderly, but truly I absolutely love this hotel. Every staff person is so professional and courteous, from valet, bell hop, waiter, concierge, front desk. This place is a hot spot on our revisit list. Check it out if you've never been!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you have visited us twice and that we are officially on your list of places to come back too. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Great setting, good 4 star property if price is not an isue
Summary: We stayed here a few days as it was convenient to the Catalina express ferry, the harbor, San Juan Capistrano, etc. This is a 'typical' upscale Marriott (not that this is a bad thing). Rooms and facilities are nice. NO parking other than the (pricey) valet. There was a conference and a big wedding here when we stayed, but the staff handled it all well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This resort is fabulous. Great great service, wonderful amenities, we had a really top notch experience.    Nigel at the front desk was absolutely fantastic. Rosaly in the spa was skilled and provided excellent service.  My room was cleaned before 9am every day and the turn down service was also amazing.  Our wait staff at dinner Thursday night was courteous, professional, and pleasant.    Overall, the experience was truly first class.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This Marriott property is really one of the best in orange county. The rooms are very comfortable and spacious. The staff is very nice and courteous, being very attentive to all needs.  They have a resort fee that I wasn't able to take advantage of because I was on business but looks like there is lots to do with it. I would highly recommend staying at this property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and recommendation. We hope your business trip was successful and we look forward to having you back for business or pleasure the next time you visit Orange County.

Summary Heading: Mrs C Dukes, End of Summer Vacation
Summary: Absolutely beautiful place to vacation! Our hotel accommodations were excellent! The only unfortunate incident we encountered was addressed in the fastest, most courteous fashion. Thank you , Yolanda and Mrs Lou!! Our three year old son had plenty of activity! We rode bikes on Balboa Island Boardwalk, went whale watching at Dana Pt Harbor, went to Ocean Institute  Tall Ships Festival for children, Baby Beach at Dana Pt Harbor, train station and Petting Zoo at San Juan Capistrano, San Diego Zoo and played at a playground across from hotel called Doheny State Park! The concierge ladies, Mrs Lou and Mrs Maggie gave us wonderful advice and information!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you and your son had a wonderful experience at the resort. We are happy that our Concierge staff was able to assist and help during your stay with us. We look forward to having you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: Stayed here for several days to get some relaxation from the rat race.  There were a few things good about the area, and hotel.  Katlyn (front desk), Grant (pool) and most of the bar staff, but that is about it!  The hotel is very costly for what you get.  Nothing to brag about for the money other than location.  You need to know that you are charged a 25.00 resort fee, and 100% valet parking fee of 35.00 each day.  My husband is handicap, and we parked our car ourselves 50 feet from the door.  A big fee for parking in handicap.  Also, one of the things that I found odd was the lack of knowledge of the area by the staff.  There is a small shopping area at the base of the hill, and places to eat.  The staff did not tell us that you could drive down and park.  They suggested that
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. Our intention is to provide exceptional service throughout the entire resort and for you to not feel inconvenienced in any way. Your review is very important to us and we will be sure to share your experience with our management team. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: We stayed here for our wedding night and it was a terrible experience. We had a guaranteed king size bed that we had reserved 2 months in advance. I had called earlier that month to tell them we would be checking in late because the wedding would end at 1am. Everything was ready to go. When we arrived at the Marriott after the wedding, still in our wedding dress and tuxedo, they informed us they had given our room away! There were no king rooms available even though we had a "guaranteed king size room" and that the word "guarantee" is used loosely. I told them I had called them a month ago to say we would be checking in late and he said sometimes messages don't get passed down to them and there's nothing they can do about it!  The customer service was horrible. They said there
Manager Response: We understand that you have spoken to many people at the resort and beyond regarding your concerns and that they have been addressed. Please know that we care about your experience and want to resolve this issue. If you need any further assistance please do not hesitate to call our Hotel Manager. He will be more than willing to speak to you and help resolve this issue.

Summary: I have been to this property twice in 2015. The first time was over a holiday weekend and it was still great but very busy. The second time was a nice quiet Sunday and Monday and it was even better! Me, my husband and our 2 kids played at the pool and in the water features, played ping pong, lounged on the day beds overlooking the ocean from the top of the cliff and enjoyed our lunch. We were all so tired out we ordered room service and ate on our balcony overlooking the ocean and night stars. The service was friendly, the food totally acceptable, the room spacious and updated and the property itself kept very well. It is also within walking distance of the beach, restaurants, a little animal museum and a kids park. A great little get away less than an hour from LAX.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A view is a view is a view-- but--
Summary: Thinking of "where to start" is like waiting for the next wave-- This is a good property just by virtue of it's location on the bluff above the  Dana Point Harbor.  Great setting, great view.  I arrived on a Friday and stayed until Sunday--  The first room I was sent to was not made up.  In fact it looked "out of commission."  It was a LONG walk to the elevator from the desk which I had made with my luggage.  A cleaning staff person called to the desk and I was told to return to the desk-- a long schlepp.  No apology, no automatic help with luggage--  The next room was a room with two double beds.  I had specified a King Room.  I understand there was a heat wave and the hotel was full.  But I was traveling alone to visit people in the area and didn't want two beds in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and detailed feedback. We appreciate your suggestions and we will share your comments with our team. Your experience is very important to us and our goal is to make you feel very comfortable during your visit.

Summary: Average size room with standard amenities. The resort grounds and the views are gorgeous. It's within walking distance of the Catalina Ferry and several good restaurants. We would stay here again as an option to staying in Laguna.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel with view of the ocean.
Summary: I stayed here with my husband for a company event.  The room was a little outdated, but it had a patio and a view of the ocean if you turned left.  It was pretty humid inside the room which was strange.  The resort itself is pretty nice-- nice finishes and architecture in the lobby area.  The grounds are small but it sits right on a park which has a lot of grassy areas to walk around and chill.  It's within walking distance of the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope your business meeting was a success. We are happy to hear that you and your husband were able to enjoy the resort and we appreciate your feedback. We hope you visit us in the future for a longer stay so you can enjoy the amenities of the resort.

Summary Heading: California: The Fabulous Marriott Laguna Cliffs Resort in Dana Point
Summary: If you're looking for luxury, incredible service and friendly, helpful staff, the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort hits the mark. Situated on the top of a hill across the street from the Pacific Ocean, you have the most magnificent view- 360 degrees, 180 of which is the beautiful California coastline from San Diego to Los Angeles--- and the resort is just minutes away from Laguna Beach and Orange County offerings. The front desk attendants were friendly, efficient and professional, and the valet service was great. The cashier, Kasey, was most helpful and always went out of her way. We really felt welcome and well cared for, and a little pampered. A+/5-Star
Manager Response: Thank you for your A+/5 Star review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were completely satisfied with your experience at the resort. We appreciate your compliments and we look forward to welcoming you back. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: My boyfriend and I celebrated his birthday here - it was a beautifully run hotel with fabulous amenities. The room was large, clean, and comfortable. We enjoyed breakfast on the balcony and overlooked the ocean. I would highly recommend this for anyone looking to stay in Dana Point.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: An Awesome Stay and Great Customer Service
Summary: We just stayed here Wednesday through Saturday before labor day weekend. The weather was a bit cooler than it has been lately (72/clouds) and our plans were to spend time at the beach and pool, but it ended up being fine. A few degrees warmer would have been perfect!  We traveled with our twin toddlers - 20 months old. It was an ideal vacation. The pool with the splash pad is PERFECT for toddlers, they had a blast. The pool side service was great - the girls had delicious lunches every day while running around in the water. The adults got served delicious pina coladas. The servers were so friendly and totally had no issue with the toddler destruction and cleaned it all right up.   The walk to the beach is easy (there is a steep climb back, we brought strollers the second day
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review! We are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful experience. We hope you visit us again soon. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Unfortunate stay with quite dishonest behavior by
Summary: Very dishonest security and managers. Excessive fining. Extreme profiling and prejudice by staff members. Many extra fees. Inconsistent information between different managers. No loyalty to marriott rewards members. The majority of the staff are very unfriendly and rude. Would not recommend this hotel. Staff is quit
Manager Response: We want to offer our apologies for any misunderstandings or unfortunate incidences you experienced. We value every guest and we want to know how we can rectify this problem. Please contact us directly and ask for our Hotel Manager, Eric Medor. We want to hear more and resolve this issue as quickly as we can. Thank you.

Summary Heading: not up to par for a Marriott property
Summary: We were quite disappointed in this Marriott. The location was nice and the most of the personnel were friendly and responsive. However, the room was very small, the carpet was stained and dirty, the tub/shower did not drain, the hot tub was not working, the WiFi quality was poor, and there was no refrigerator in the room. Additionally, the $25 per day resort fee and mandatory $35 a day valet service were excessive. Just not what I have come to expect from Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are are happy to hear that our staff was friendly and responsive to your needs but we are dissapointed that your room was not to your liking. We will be sure to share your comments with our team.

Summary: I usually stay at the St. Regis when I'm town but because it's Labor Day and their rates were insane.  This hotel isn't bad and the rates are reasonable.  The pool is okay.  There are 2 but they are both really small and the chairs fill up really quick.  The service is great and the employees really do care.  I can tell.  The food is fair.  It's really basic and nothing to write home about.  The rooms are clean and fresh but again, fairly basic and really nothing that will blow your skirt up.  The location is great though being so close to Dana Warf.  Overall, the hotel isn't bad and I'd stay here again but only if it's a last option.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are happy to hear that our staff was able to accommodate your needs and that you experienced great service during your stay. We hope you enjoyed the harbor and we do hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Paid for an ocean view room, which we got. But the balcony was a small triangle shape that barely fit to high chairs which had you face away from the ocean. Completely worthless balcony. The room was nice, nothing special. You definitely are paying for the location. The pool is quite small. $18.00 to watch a movie, REALLY. We are Marriott owners and I am a past Marriott employee (8 years), so I have been to quite a few Marriotts around the country. This was OK but there are better Marriotts out there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and will share your comments with our team. Your opinion is important to us.

Summary: We stayed here for one night while in town for the Food and Wine Festival at the St. Regis Monarch Beach Resort. This is a 5 star hotel. It is elegant, gorgeous views, spectacular service. Room was lovely. Had the breakfast buffet which was excellent and very reasonably priced. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Laguna Cliffs Marriot was a great place to stay and enjoy time with old friends! Everyone was so friendly and helpful! We loved sitting by the pool and being served by such nice people! The rooms were comfortable and overlooked the harbor below. It was a great place to stay within walking distance of great restaurants and shops.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort for your "Girl's Getaway"!  We're delighted to hear you enjoy our resort and all it's amenities and also appreciate your kind feedback regarding our associate's.  We'll look forward to welcoming you and your friends back soon!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here to celebrate our anniversary.  It was the perfect place for us to indulge and celebrate.  We loved the plush top bed.  It was so comfortable.  Even more than ours at home.  We also LOVED the amazing view of the ocean from our room.    The location of this hotel is amazing.  We went for a jog along the ocean and some of the local pathways.  It was a treat!   All of the service team was very helpful here and the breakfast buffet was great.  We loved the made to order waffles and omelettes.  We would definitely love to come back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My sister and I went to Laguna for the Pageant of the Masters and wanted to stay in a hotel with more "grounds" that most of the hotels closer to the site of the Pageant.  The Laguna Cliffs Marriott is actually about 30 minutes away (with summer, Saturday traffic) from Laguna, in Dana Point.  We were not there very long (less than 24 hours) due to extenuating circumstances (flat tire needed repair), but did enjoy our brief stay.  We were on the main level of the hotel with a balcony and peek views of the marina/ocean.  Our bedroom had 2 queen sized beds, with luxurious bedding.    Pros:  bedding, layout of room, strong shower, nice strong hair dryer, pool and amenities.  Cons:  cleaning (there was a Goldfish cracker in plain site on the floor next to the bed - I refrained from
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here recently for our 25th anniversary. The hotel was sold out, so there were no room upgrades available. Instead, the hotel provide us with complimentary breakfast buffet during our stay. Additionally, the hotel was very kind to send us an anniversary card, champagne and chocolates each night. We don't drink alcohol, but it was a nice gesture and appreciated. We had some challenges with our AC, but the staff was very nice and helpful. Because of the challenges with our AC the hotel offered to provide complimentary valet during our stay. Great location. The hotel has some of the most comfortable beds of any Marriott I've stayed in. The service here, particularly the valet service, is excellent. We plan to visit again.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your 25th Anniversary...what a wonderful reason to celebrate!  We're delighted to hear you chose our resort for such a special occasion and that our team recognized your anniversary in such a special way!  We will look forward to welcoming you back in the near future!

Summary Heading: Great Resort, Close to it all
Summary: My first time here since they remodeled several years ago and our entire family of four enjoyed our 6 night stay. The rooms are very nice and well maintained, the amenities (spa, bikes, wifi, gym) are numerous and the pools are great! Food choices are also excellent with grab-and-go breakfast (including Starbuck's Coffee) and both a casual bar dining area and higher end Vue restaurant. For everything the resort offers, the location is walking distance to TONS of local restaurants, beaches, boat rental, Catalina Express and shopping. I will note that every trip from the hotel is down a rather steep hill, so every trip back is up that same steep hill - but we loved it as it gave us some extra steps/calorie burn. One not to miss is Coffee Importers; great coffee and breakfasts! The
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Fantastic!  The most comfortable bed in the world!
Summary: We decided to splurge for one night of our week long vacation and stay at this incredible resort.  We were not disappointed!  The room had an amazing view and the bed was so comfortable that we didn't want to get up!  Only disappointment was the ala carte fee of $27.50 for "resort fee and tax" especially since we only stayed one night and did not use any resort amenities.  Even the $35 valet parking was a bit steep.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were heading to San Diego and had the chance to stop by and stay for a night. It worth it and we wish that we stayed longer. If we knew it, we would cancel the trip to San Diego and just stay in this hotel. However, as all hotels in CA, it is expensive!
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us before your trip to San Diego.  As you mentioned, summer is considered "peak season" along the Southern California coastline.  However, if you have an opportunity to sign up on our webpage, we'll keep you informed of our resort specials throughout the year.  We'll look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Stayed here two days before a quick trip o Catalina Island. Great location and very accommodating staff.   Public park adjacent to hotel and short walk to shops and ferry to Catalina Island.  Stairway on far side of park leads to marina area.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us before heading over to Catalina!  We appreciate the compliments regarding our staff and will be sure to share them with our team. We hope your travels will bring you back to our resort again!

Summary: We stayed for the weekend. Great location, very good rooms. First night stayed in Del Mar wing. good sized room, but no balcony, facing the tennis courts. This wing has the kids play area next to the pool. Next day moved to Laguna wing overlooking pool with a balcony. much more enjoyable. Opt for the package which includes the buffet breakfast great deal and very good selection. In addition to room rate there is a$25 resort fee and if you drive you must use valet parking $35 extra. The concierge named LU bumped this resort from 4 1/2 stars to a 5 star. Arranged our room upgrade, got us a reservation at a booked restaurant and extended our checkout time.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us this past weekend.  We appreciate your kind feedback regarding our resort as well as our associate, Lu!  We'll be sure to recognize her accordingly.  We'll look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: The hotel is set in a beautiful location, ideal for a relaxing break ( or wedding as there seemed to be a few taking place during our stay) . we opted for 2 adjoins rooms, both spacious with the most comfortable beds ever. There was a mattress liner on mine and it made for the best nights sleep I've ver had.  There were 2 pools, again lovely and relaxing . We stopped by the pool for children, it was quiet during the day but got busier during the afternoon.  The bar areas are lovely , with great views out over Dana Harbour.  The hotel is pricey, and the additional resort tax and car parking make it expensive. We parked our car on the road , although a walk back to the hotel it did make our stay cheaper.  When I first booked the hotel ,we didnt have breakfast included, but I saw a
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort as the "relaxing" part of your California and Nevada tour!  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay here in Dana Point and will look forward to welcoming you back to Southern California soon!

Summary: I couldn't have spent my birthday in a better place. This hotel is located in a beautiful cliff-steps away from the beach, good dining, and with beautiful views. The staff was very kind and attentive. The hotel was very family friendly-kids loves it. Everyone there was very welcoming. I will return!
Manager Response: Happy belated b-day! We couldn't be more grateful that you spent your b-day weekend with us. Thank you for your wonderful compliments...we wouldn't have wanted you to celebrate anywhere else. We hope to see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great place for Food and relaxation.
Summary: This place is great! If you are looking for a special adventure and great food. Book a room or just stop and get some food from the restaurant. Make sure and book early. We wanted to go earier but they were booked so we moved our vacation so we could stay here.  Glad we did.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We thank you for your loyalty and moving your vacation around in order to stay at the resort. We are delighted that you did and we couldn't be happier to have you as our guest. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Beautiful Hotel in perfect setting next to Lantern Park. I cannot criticise anything about this hotel. Fantastic reception/ check-in by Kaitlin (Trainee) who was most helpful. All the concierges we met were fantastic, especially Maggie who helped us book a whale watching and dolphin trip from Dana Point harbour (a five minute walk away). This was great and we saw a couple of Micky whales and hundreds of dolphins. Tip: this trip is half price on Tuesdays! 2 things to be aware of at hotel. Parking at $35 per day. Valet parking is only option offered and nearby parking on street is not allowed overnight! Also, a $25 + tax resort fee is added per night to your bill. This covers use of hotel surf boards, bikes, tennis court, shoe shine service, WiFi etc. WiFi is free for Marriott
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your review. Nothing can put a bigger smile on our face than to hear you had an amazing experience at the resort. We couldn‚Äôt be happier. We appreciate your compliments and we will be sure to share them with our team. We hope you visit us again soon. We‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary: We stayed in the Del Mar wing of the property.  The room was clean and spacious.  There is a balcony with a very slight view of the ocean.  The only issue we had with the room was that if one likes to sleep with the air on, the air will blow directly in your face, thus we slept with the air off.  Perhaps this would not happen in other rooms but it was the case in ours.  The property is beautiful, with a Woody surf wagon in the valet area.  The pool is clean and relaxing.  We had a buffet breakfast at the Vue and as the name implies, the view is a great way to wake and have a meal.  The staff is wonderful.  Everyone is helpful with a wonderful smile.  The fitness center is small but clean with enough equipment to get a cardio workout in, i.e. don't expect to continue your weight
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments and feedback. We hope you visit us again in the future and try our spa and take advantage of our complimentary bike rentals.

Summary: Loved this hotel we had our wedding reception here and it has the best views of the ocean!! The restaurant food is amazing and the service is fantastic! Only complaint is the rooms can be small depending on what you book, but they make up for it with the views!
Manager Response: Congratulations on your marriage! We are delighted that you chose our resort to have your wedding reception. We couldn't be happier that you found the food and service to be fantastic. We hope you visit us again in the future, we'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: The wife and I used some points for a long weekend and selected the Laguna Cliffs Marriott.  Worth every point and I would actually pay to stay here too!  Great location with a great view.  The resort is perched above the Dana Point harbor which is great.  Nothing to do with the hotel, but the restaurants surrounding were good not great.  There are ample choices so maybe we chose poorly?    As for the resort - the grounds, spa, pools, lobby were all 5 star.  The food was surprisingly good too - not the average hotel fare.   Our room didn't have a balcony, but we survived :).    The spa was great - steam sauna, dry sauna and a whirlpool.    It is 'kid friendly' but since school was approaching the little varmints were limited.  They do have a separate kids pool as well.  The GM
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you and your wife visited us for the first time and enjoyed your stay. We couldn't be happier that you found our resort to be inviting and the service to be superb! We are happy to heat that you enjoyed the spa and the pools and we hope to see you both again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: I go to California every year for a week in August! I have stayed al over Laguna and have stayed at the St. Regis  and Ritz Carlton.  Never and I mean never have I had such amazing service or staff at any hotel. From the valet to the front desk, cleaning people to bar .....everyone is absolutely amazing!!! Friendly courteous professional staff. It is so kid friendly and most of all parent centric!  The food is very fresh and good and the room service doesn't break the bank! The kids loved it!  They have two pools!  I used the kids pool and it was awesome. The splash pad was so fun for my boys!  Skip the Ritz and the St Regis makes you feel like you owe them for staying there. If you want clean, reasonable, fabulous staff, great food and stunning views this is the place
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and for you kind comments. We truly appreciate your compliments regarding our resort and friendly staff. We understand the importance of 5 star service and we hope you visit us again soon. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: had high expectations for this resort.  small children everywhere.  couldn't even go into the hot tub without little kids swimming in it.  photos of rooms deceiving. our room was small and no balcony.  food was mediocre. waitress left us sitting for quite awhile.  not sure where she went.  just didn't come back. flagged down another waitress to get check and leave
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We regret that you were disappointed in the fact that we are a family friendly resort. One of the unique features of our resort is that we cater to families, couples and business travelers alike. We do appreciate your feedback and your comments regarding the service in our restaurant. We will be sure to discuss this with our team.

Summary: My daughter and I took a last minute trip to southern California and decided on the Laguna Cliffs Marriott after reading a few reviews.  The property is well maintained and the staff is very courteous.  I do have to give a "shout out" to Linda at the concierge desk.  Linda helped us plan our daily activities such as a trip to San Diego, Catalina Island and LA.   The location of  the Laguna Cliffs Marriott is ideal as it is not located in the high tourist areas and is across the street from Doheny State Beach. Very enjoyable experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you and your daughter enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was able to recommend activities for you both. We enjoy creating memories for our guests and we hope you visit us again in the future to create more.

Summary: Loved the location, the grounds, the staff.  Two pools, one was great for families, the other for adults.  Staff kept dry towels available and were helpful. Both areas though had spider webs and spider egg sacks on many of the back of the chaise lounges.  Pool area could've been kept up more during the day such as  old french fries left on tables and a stray band aid left on deck.  Bedroom was in a convenient location and they brought in a refrigerator for us because we had two kids with us and lots of snacks. We did have to deal with very loud wedding outside until 10pm (3 in one day), hot bedcoverings that didn't offer a thin blanket instead. We had two 'full size beds', not queen size...which left my 6' husband's feet hanging off the bottom by at least 3 inches and hardly any
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and will certainly bring this to the attention of our pool staff. This is unacceptable in our eyes and we will be sure to take care of this immediately. We do have a 10:00 pm curfew for weddings and we are happy to hear that the noise ended at exactly this time. We apologize for any inconvenience. We hope you do visit us again in the future.

Summary: This hotel has a great setting, nice location & friendly staff - and that's about it.   We've traveled a lot and stayed in many Spa Resorts but this was average at best.  We arrived at 3:15 and finally got into a room not the right one but into one at 5:30.  We missed going to an event at the park down the road just not thinking it would take  2 1/2 hours to check in - very chaotic.  Couldn't give us the room we wanted because  there were not available.  We went for dinner and drink on the patio of the upstairs restaurant and that was nice and somewhat reasonably priced.   Went back to the room with no balcony as we requested to relax and there was a wedding on the lawn below our room - drum beating ceremony and then a DJ until 10:00 -  The next day they moved us to a room with
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to take a moment and apologize for the inconvenience you experienced and your unsatisfactory stay with us. We can assure you that your opinion is extremely important to us and we understand your concerns. We truly care about each and every guest and we know that your main goal was to come to a resort to relax and get away from the desert heat. We hope that you do consider us again the next time you are in Southern Orange County.

Summary: Our room was located pool side on the first floor which was really nice and convenient to go swimming. Outside of our room was a table with two chairs which was nice to relax. The room was decorated nicely but felt a little small for the two beds and pull out couch. It was disappointing when my husband and 2 sons went to lay down to sleep and their feet were at the edge of the bed, they are not taller than 6'1". Shortest beds we ever slept in. Both nights of our stay we smelled marijuana in the hallway staff was aware and not sure how that was handled but not what you really want to smell when you are on vacation with your kids.The pool was nice and enjoyed by all of us. The staff was very attentive. The walk to the beach took about 10 minutes going there but longer on the way
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the pool view guest room. We do want to inform you that we are a smoke free resort and that we did in fact take care of the smoking matter you referenced in your review. We have the best interest of all of our guests and that is why we strictly enforce the no smoking rule. Thank you again for your review and feedback. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Noisy  hotel with well trained staff
Summary: There is a lots of outside noise  / cars, pools ,public events in the park / . Rooms are older , just about average . Staff is nice and well trained  .Valet only .Decent restaurant . Spa is average and overpriced.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and review, we appreciate you sharing your experience with us. We value your opinion and will certainly share your comments with our team. We hope you visit us again during your travels.

Summary: I stayed for business and loved every minute. The views are amazing; great location for running by the beach and the gym was a perfect choice when it rained (very unusual in the area) Bed was super comfortable. All the staff nice and willing to help and assist. Coffee available by the lobby was a good choice. The whole atmosphere was very nice.  The highlight of each day was breakfast with a view. Gracias!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your business trip with us. We couldn't be happier to hear that you were able to enjoy breakfast outside and take in the ocean views during your visit. Whether it be business or pleasure, we hope you visit us again in the future, we'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: We spent an enjoyable 4 days at this big resort.. Very nice exercise gym and Spa. Rooms were very clean and housekeeping did a super job. Great guest service from Marissa. I called a number of times with requests and she handled immediately. Gene, front desk manager also very helpful. Beautiful grounds, 2 pools and much more. Restaurant with daily dinner buffets was good but not great. Ask for a AAA rate and save $$. We would go back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your compliments and we hope you were able to schedule a spa treatment and enjoy the spa sauna and steam room during your stay. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: The Room is Small and there is n√∂ balcony and that is dissapointing for the Price we pay.The good Thing is that it s located about 15 minutes by R√∂ntge beach .The Whole Thing is Big and there are a Lot of choices of activities .I recomand this Hotel for 1 Night Maximum too expansive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We appreciate your feedback. We do want to clarify that all of our rooms except the rooms on the fourth floor do in fact have balconies. We regret that you did not have a balcony on the 4th floor. Thank you again for your feedback, your experience is very important to us.

Summary Heading: Not exactly what I was expecting
Summary: First off, I thought the service was amazing.  From checking in, the valet service, bellmen, bartender, etc.  Everyone was very helpful, nice and accommodating to us.  We had a very nice view from our balcony room so I cannot complain there at all.  I guess I just expected more from this hotel since it was billed as a Resort & Spa and because you are charged a $25 resort fee each day.  We checked out some "beach" towels one day to take to the beach but they were basically the size of our bath towels so we could have just taken those instead.  I wouldn't consider this a Resort & Spa hotel at all but rather a Conference Center & Wedding venue type of hotel due to the very large ballroom located in the hotel.  (There were weddings taking place on both days we stayed there).  I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that our staff was welcoming and that you were impressed by their wonderful service. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your guest room and the ocean views. We do appreciate your feedback and we would like to inform you that our resort fee also offers many additional amenities to all of our guests, including complimentary bike rentals, surf board rentals and game rentals as well as bocce ball and many other activities including tennis, etc. We do hope that you were able to also take advantage of our beautiful and relaxing spa. We hope that you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Average Marriott at Better Than Average Location
Summary: Stayed here for a couple nights on a business trip. They had a friendly hotel staff and all the the usual appointments you expect with a Marriott. My room was good sized and clean for the most part, except the shower inside the bathroom. There was a dark color "almost black" at some of the caulk joints where the shower floor met the walls. I did let the front desk know so hopefully they've taken care of it. Another thing I found strange about the shower in addition to it being small was there was no where to put shampoo, soap, etc... no ledge, no built in holes in the wall nothing...I had to bend down and put stuff on the floor. WiFi speed was average for a hotel and room noise was ok. The bed was comfortable and my room had a slight view of the water which I really wasn't able
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your review and we have addressed the issues you have brought to our attention and are working to fix these problems immediately. We regret that your experience was not wonderful. We certainly hope you'll reconsider giving the resort another opportunity in the future to restore your faith.

Summary: We were offered a room on the lower level and our patio was steps to the pool entrance which was fantastic.  We grabbed some bikes  (as part of the resort fee) and took a nice ride around the harbor and beaches.  I was a little disappointed about the food options...the Vue lounge was pricey and the food was nothing great.  We didn't even bother with the hotel restaurant because there are too many other options outside the hotel.  Oh and this hotel would not be recommended for anyone who has trouble walking  if they are planning to walk around town - the hill to the hotel is rather steep and there are 118 steps to the street level.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and your compliments. We hope that you visit us again in the future.

Summary: Our room was not ready at the 4 pm checkin - and they did not offer us any free drinks in the lounge as we waited.  The bed was so uncomfortable - it was sagging in the middle and so soft.  When the air conditioning was on in the evening, it was so incredible noisy that I couldn't sleep. There was an "earwig" bug that was crawling around my bathtub - ugh. It was a rainy weekend (July 18) so no one was swimming in the pool and I had a ground floor room with a patio, but didn't matter - no noise to complain about.  I wouldn't recommend staying here until they upgraded the mattresses.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We regret that you were disappointed with your stay. Your opinion is extremely important to us and we will be sure to address your concerns with our team.

Summary: Everything went perfectly for our little 2-night "staycation" here.  We arrived before noon in hopes of sticking our luggage with the bell hop and hitting the pool  It turned out, our room was ready -- and they even moved us from our assigned room to exactly where we wanted to be.  Everything went perfectly from there on out.  The property is gorgeous and well-maintained.  Text the valets and your car is ready.  Late checkout?  No problem.  We were extra-ordinarily happy with our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We couldn't be happier that you had a perfect stay with us. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: We stayed on a busy weekend. The resort is set high above the harbor. Our room 1042 at the end of the Del Mar wing was far away from the main lobby and was luxuriously furnished and spacious. Fellow tripees, the Del Mar building is close to the children's pool so it can be noisy, especially if you wish to leave your windows open. Same with the San Clemente wing. If you have children, rooms facing the pool in those wings will be exciting. If you desire peace and quiet, stay in the quieter Laguna or Capistrano wings surrounding the adult pool. I have attached a property map. Our room view was nice, with an oversized first floor balcony.  We had drinks at the Vue bar just off the lobby each night before walking down to the harbor for dinner. The service was fast and friendly and
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to use the services we provide our guests. We appreciate your compliments and we do hope you visit us again the next time you are in Southern California.

Summary: The Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort is beautiful with two pool areas, one for adults and one for families, as well as lovely grounds and very attentive staff.  The ocean view from our balcony that overlooked the adult pool was nice.  This hotel is away from Laguna Beach, about an eight mile drive, but there are some restaurants and shops within walking distance, down a long flight of stairs.  The marina and beach are also down this hill as well.  I was expecting to be closer to the beach and Laguna Beach.  If you are looking for a place to get away and decompress, this is the location for you.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy that our staff was able to take care of your needs and that you enjoyed the two outdoor pools. We do hope you visit us again for another decompressing vacation.

Summary: we stayed here the night after our wedding. Once you get there make sure you go and reserve some free bike rentals and checkout the marina in the morning. They go quick!  Not sure if the spa is worth it because of the cost, but im sure if youre staying here you have some money, so i would def go ahead and try it.   We had ocean views from our window and we enjoyed our stay very well and had an excellent weekend. will stay there again.   Make sure you look into groupon they have great deals and you still accure the points from staying there.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your marriage! We feel honored that you chose our resort to stay at. Thank you for the wonderful compliments and we hope that you visit the spa the next time you visit. You will not be dissapointed.

Summary: we were here for almost a week and loved everything about it! The hotel is clean, comfortable, best pillows, and  the staff is amazingly attentive. The proximity to marina, park, beach, restaurants is good. A bit of a drive or trolley ride to shopping (10 min), but not bad. We will return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed a week with us. We hope we made you feel right at home. We look forward to having you back again. See you soon.

Summary: This is a very high end Marriott hotel/resort.  It seems more like a Ritz.  Rooms are spacious and overlook the ocean, which is right at the bottom of the hill.  Giant lawn in front of the resort that leads down to the ocean.  This is a great vacation spot when visiting Laguna.  You are away from the strip but are still really close.  The spa is worth a trip. Very professional and experienced staff.  One of the best steam rooms I have ever sat in.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you left the spa feeling relaxed and rejuvinated. We appreciate your compliments and we hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a few nights. Nice place, rooms were nice and the beds we really comfortable. Service was fantastic as well. Great location and the say to get to. One issue I did have was that I could not use my own phone internet and had to use the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our comfortable beds and fantastic service. Unfortunately your personal Wi-Fi connection does not transfer anywhere other than your home. Every destination you travel to will need a different Wi-Fi connection. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: /what a neat place this is!  Overlooking Dana Point Harbor and the Pacific Ocean.  So many restaurants within walking distance - and of course the boat to Catalina Island is right there for easy access to a day on the Island!  The staff at this hotel was  so friendly and helpful.  Rooms very comfortable also.  Valet parking only and the rate ($35 a day) was about $10 higher than we've paid at other hotel properties.  Not sure why it has to be that expensive.  But do hope we can stay again soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fee rates and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We truly hope you visit us again, we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: A friend and I recently stayed here over the Fourth of July holiday weekend.  The grounds are beautiful and meticulously maintained.  The rooms appear to have recently undergone renovation and are quiet, even near the pools.  The ocean views from the property are panoramic, as one might expect from the elevated location.  But one element I wish to emphasize is the extraordinary customer service one finds at this resort.  As an example, we experienced a problem with the air-conditioning unit in our original room.  When it could not be resolved, we were immediately moved to another room without hesitation.  One morning while awaiting a table for breakfast, a kitchen employee stopped to ask if we desired a beverage while we wait.  I asked for coffee, and within minutes he provided
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments regarding our exceptional staff. We appreciate your compliments and we couldn't agree with you more. Our staff is exceptionally attentive and curteous and their number one goal is to make your stay as pleasurable and comfortable as they can. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: This hotel has great service and fabulous location.  Resort fee includes fun stuff like bikes, surf boards, etc..  The staff is friendly.  You can't beat the location for shopping and surfing.  Dana Point is one of my favorites.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our great staff service and the beautiful ocean-view location of Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We hope you were able to take advantage of the complimentary activity rentals and we are pleased to hear that Dana Point is one of your favorite spots. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: I guess sometimes when your expectations are not too high you could be very pleasantly surprised .And that was the case with this beautiful property.  The rooms were nice and  nicely situated around the pool area. The adult  pool could be a lot better but it was just good enough to enjoy the beautiful views . But the best thing about this hotel was the staff . Our group was 17 people and a lot of demanding kids . The staff around the pool were as 5 star as 5 star gets. Polite , pleasant , fast , precise with every demand and supper friendly. It was as if you were in a four season property . From the people at the door and the lobby to the managers and the  waiters and everybody who worked there ,were as helpful as you can get. We stayed there for the couple of days of the 4th of
Manager Response: Thank you for your great compliments regarding our staff and their pleasant behavior to their helpfulfullness. We take great pride in the high level of service we deliver to our guests and as you could see during your visit, our staff is always one step ahead. We are delighted to hear that we exceeded your expectations and we cannot wait to welcome you back. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I would like to take the time to give you a brief summary regarding my stay at your Hotel.  I was very disappointed in the level of service your Hotel had to offer.   I expected so much more from a luxury Hotel and our trip was essentially ruined.  My daughters and I arrived on Sunday, June 28 for a two day stay, celebrating my oldest's 17th Birthday.  We arrived early and were able to check in around 11 am. ( I was very happy about that)  The man at the front desk who checked us in did not offer any information about the Hotel nor did he go over any of the charges.  Never did he explain the Valet Fee or the destination fee.  He did not give any information about where the pool was located, restaurants or anything for that matter.  He simply asked for my credit card, issued keys
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Quality Style from a bygone era
Summary: Our room faced the harbor/ocean. I woke up to a gentle fog horn and harping seal in the distance as the fog rolled in. Ahh! I was so relaxed,. By night, a large private party had a 1890's theme. Great classical musicians played both classic and modern tunes with excellent craft. I watched as guests arrived to the valet and all the guests having such a wonderful time; all, from my 3rd floor balcony room..That's when I realized this is what hotel service and comfort was like many, many decades ago..  .
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to here that you enjoyed your stay at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are pleased that you left relaxed and rejuvinated. We hope to see you again the next time you are in the Dana Point area. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: A dismal stay at an extraordinary resort
Summary: My wife's family has been coming for many years (since the 80's) and have loved it ever since. This time around was really a let down and I truly hope it is not the standard going forward.   We arrived on the fourth of July and signed up for the BBQ on the lawn before the fireworks went on. Our first shock was the price of the BBQ, it went up to $99 per person, crazy pricing considering what you get. After much discussion, we decided to eat inside the restaurant instead of the BBQ. They had normal items and you could get the BBQ if you wanted. We sat down at 7PM. Ordered at 715PM. Food hit the table at 840PM. Yes you read that right, over 1 hour for food. All I can say is, WOW. We were very polite and waited patiently about one hour before we started asking where our food was.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We want to start off by apologizing for the wait time you experienced when dining with us on the 4th of July. Although we were extremely busy we understand that you had to wait longer than you expected. Regarding the music we provided at the resort, this was something complementary for our guests and had no coordination with the fireworks display that the city put on. We provided live entertainment for our guests during the BBQ and it was completely seperate from the city's fireworks show.  We do apologize for the uncomfortable mattress and the AC unit not working. This is a complete disruption to your stay and we have had maintenance repair these items. We understand the frustration you experienced and we truly apologize for the inconvenience. We have notified our staff and your comments are extremely important to us. We want you to know that as you expressed earlier, this is not the norm for the resort but an exception that happened during your stay and we are extremely sorry. We know you've had many wonderful experiences at the resort during your previous stays and we hope we can restore your faith once again.

Summary: Property is located on a cliff with a view of the ocean. Location was easy walk to the park, where they had movies on a big screen in the evenings, as well as the beach.  Grounds and public areas are nicely maintained.  Lobby is beautifully done and modern.  Room unfortunately did not have the same feel; it felt dated, especially the bathroom. When the shower was on, a smell arose from the drain.  Also found some dirt on the sheets. Though not expecting much of a view as we were in a "resort view room," half of view was blocked by another building and other half overlooked a tennis court that doubled as a parking lot.  Fun family pool with a splash zone. Kids loved it, though the pool area started getting shut down around 4.30-5 pm (may have been because a wedding was getting
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are delighted to hear that our staff was attentive and was able to assit you during your stay. We appreciate the compliments regarding the grounds of the resort and do apologize for the unkept items you found in the room. We will definitely take a look into this and we want to assure you that this was definitely not the norm for our resort. Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: With just 5 days' advance notice, I planned a 2 1-2 day road trip to So Cal over the 4th of July holiday. Our usual spots were sold out. Then I found the Marriott Resort in Dana Point. We were pleased with the accommodations. The young and energetic staff at the pool could not have been more accommodating and attentive. Kudos to Ryan, who manages the pool and bar area. Tremendously hard-working gentleman.  His team was incredibly busy trying to keep up with beverage and food orders. The valet team was also polite and attentive.   We were expecting a more walkable location with shops to visit and many food choices nearby. However, the resort's location on a cliff just above Dana Point Harbor was not exactly convenient to a downtown area. You needed to drive to find a more lively
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you visited us for the first time and were pleased with your accommodations and our staff service. We appreciate your feedback and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed the 4th of July fireworks, BBQ and live entertainment at the resort. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: This property is set on an amazing cliff with an amazingly beautiful view of the Pacific Ocean. The property, rooms and grounds are very nice. The staff is very helpful and friendly. This is a lovely property to get away for a very romantic weekend. Close to lovely restaurants and ocean activities...
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that we created a memorable romantic weekend for you. We appreciate all of your lovely compliments and we hope that you visit us again in the future.

Summary: Spent two nights in a "Resort View Room", which overlooked tennis courts. Room was spacious with a King Bed, sofa, chair and desk. The mattress was good. We ate breakfast as part of a group wedding. Food was also good. Cannot comment on the restaurants as we did not eat in any of them. There was a convenient coffee bar that served Starbucks Coffee and some pastries in the front lobby area.  You can take your food outside and sit on the patio, which overlooks the beautiful harbor. When you arrive, you will need to use valet parking if you arrive with a car.  The valet service was quick because of the option of texting your car number ahead of time. We appreciated not having to wait around for the car. Valet parking was 32 dollars per night. In addition to the room rate, there is
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy to hear that you were able to retrieve your vehicle quickly from valet using the texting option. We appreciate your compliments regarding the guest rooms, overall location and the the convenience of our outlets. We hope you visit us again and try one of our two restaurants during your next stay.

Summary: I had to go to this venue for a wedding after spending a week in Montreal. The difference between the two hotels could not be more extreme. In Montreal I paid a fair price and received more than I was expecting. Sadly the Marriott failed to meet the service I expect of their brand, especially being a resort and an expensive one at that.  For paying almost $400 a night I was shocked that wi-fi was not included but rather $20 for basic speeds. Guests are forced into using the valet service. While the valets do a good job I think I should have a say if I park my own car for free or use their service if I'm paying so much a night. The breakfast was very overpriced and seems like highway robbery. The room was average at best and the AC was broken (multiple weeding guest told us the
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We apologize that you felt we underdelivered and didn't meet your expectations. We do appreciate your review as your opinion is extremely important to us and we value what our guests are saying.

Summary: Great Location with much to do within a 10 mile radius. Easy to get to/from John Wayne Airport via Pacific Coast Highway. Extremely helpful staff and concierge service, bright open lobby, easily accessible activities, fast valet service, balconies overlooking water (wither ocean or pool). Held a wonderful family brunch on the Vue Lawn with excellent food and service. Dislikes were the resort fee, resort fee tax (come on...just include it in the room rate),  and sometimes the front desk was understaffed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our helpful staff. We hope you had a wonderful family brunch and we hope you visit us again in the near future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Very nice, but they add on too much $$
Summary: This is a very hotel, good views, nice clean rooms, staff is friendly ( not as much as they could be) the gym is first class and very clean and maintained. The restaurant bar area is nice with great views. But you pay dearly for those views. $10 for a beer, $4 for a regular coffee to go. Had the natcho bites for an app very pretty, but match is should be finger food not some pretty thing that requires a fork and knife. Burger was good, fries crisp but at 18 bucks wasn't the best ever, frankly Carl's burger is every bit as good if not better. For that much money I shouldn't even had thought about Carl's... I booked it on line, I think the time has come to require what the actual rate is ( like airlines) tax over $25./ resort fee $25 parking $35 there are no other options to park.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We appreciate your feedback and for sharing your experience with us. We thank you for your compliments and we do hope you visit us again shoudl your travels find you in the Dana Point area.

Summary: We stayed a few nights at the Laguna Cliffs in mid June of this year and we were pleasantly surprised. The property has a lot to offer and is perfectly located. It is situated in Dana Point which is a great area to begin with. Across the street is Doheny state beach and marina which you walk to in about 5 minutes. The property itself has two great pools, bikes for your use, fitness center, restaurant over looking the ocean, and a park. This is really a gem of a property owned and operated by Merriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that your stay exceeded your expectations. We too refer to our resort as the hidden gem...we're delighted that you discovered it and we hope we can welcome you back again someday.

Summary: The location of this hotel cannot be beat, except by the Montage Laguna Beach, but it is half the price. The location makes it easy to get to restaurants and beaches, and a 12-15 minute ride to downtown Laguna.   Pros: The rooms were large and clean as made up early each day, two pools make things less crowded, Starbucks served in the hotel, workout facility was fantastic in size and machines offered.  Cons: The food was sub-par at best. The breakfasts needed salt and any other flavor possible, the drinks were watered down and pricey, while the parking staff was attentive, there was always a line to talk to the  front desk, as they would have one or two working at a time.
Manager Response: Thank your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful ocean-views of the resort and all the amenities we provided including the fitness center and two outdoor pools. We do appreciate your feedback and we will share your comments with our team. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: So bad, I wouldn't stay here for FREE!
Summary: I had secured a stay at this resort while i was in town for my cousins wedding. After a day of travel to get there, my family and i were exhausted and just wanted to sleep. It took forever for the front desk to sort out our room and get us set up. When we finally got into our room, we were ready to crash. Our room had 2 double beds and a fold out couch. I called the front desk to order linens for the couch as my family occupied the beds. When I unfolded the bed, I discovered the mattress was covered in .....blood! someone had their menstrual cycle on the bed and housekeeping didn't even clean it. I spoke to the manager of housekeeping to express my disgust, she came across aloof and disconcerted with the matter. They were unable to switch our rooms as there was a convention in
Manager Response: We apologize for the oversight and it is completely unacceptable and  we have notified management to get this corrected immediately. We take responsibility for the oversight and we can assure you that we have put a team together for a detailed inspection of all rooms moving forward. We again apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: This hotel really strives to give the guests a no stress, casual, yet elegant experience/atmosphere.  I am a Marriott platinum member,  and they really do a nice job there as well...upgrades to nicer rooms when possible. Nice rooms with a little bar area and real wine glasses...an extra touch, robes too. I love the porches and if you can, the ocean view rooms are very nice. Nothing more zen for me than to sit on the porch at night with a glass of wine or morning with coffee and breakfast and take in the California ocean view. The grounds have two pools, a full service spa, a full service restaurant and a bar that is awesome with a nice menu and ocean view!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that  you enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy that our staff was able to upgrade your room and that you left with wonderful memories. We appreciate your compliments and hope you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice resort, comfortable rooms, great views
Summary: I went to this resort for a banking forum and my significant other came along to play golf.  The facilities were very nice and the grounds were beautiful.  We had several meals on premises and the food was truly fantastic.  This place is pricy, but sometimes, you get what you pay for.  We would definitely go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you and your significant other enjoyed your stay with us. We hope your business meeting was a success and we are delighted that everything was fantastic during your stay with us. We look forward to welcoming you both back.

Summary: This hotel-resort made us feel like visiting royalty. We got a personal tour of the property from the head of guest services and top-notch service through our stay. They were very accommodating when we want to switch rooms and we wound up with a beautiful poolside room - perfect for a romantic getaway.   This hotel is perfectly located overlooking Dana Point Harbor and the Ocean and the grounds are beautiful. The hotel staff could not have been friendlier or more helpful! We're definitely going back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed a romantic getaway with us and that our staff was able to switch your room to one that was to your liking. We appreciate your compliments regarding our friendly and accommodating staff and we cannot wait to welcome you back.

Summary: We stayed here with a bunch of girls for a bachelorette party. The rooms are nice and spacious. The beds have pillow toppings on the mattresses and are super comfortable. They were some of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept in. The only downside was that the beds were double size and not queens. Bathrooms were nice size, lots of counter space.   We had the buffet breakfast which had a lot of selection, including an omelette bar. You could also order a la carte.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you and your friends enjoyed a bachelorette party at the resort. We hope you were able to visit the spa during your stay and if not, may I suggest you do a girls spa day. We know you will leave feeling relaxed and rejuvinated. We appreciate your compliments regarding our comfortable beds, we hope you all visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel with great amenities
Summary: I just stayed at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott for a week on business and it was very nice.  Here are my pros and cons.  PROS  -two pools; one for families (with a little water park) and one for adults. -great fitness centre with lots of different machines -the hotel is in a great area overlooking the water and the marina -the room I was in had a little patio with a nice view -they also had Surf boards available for free that you can take down to the beach. It's only a 10 minutes walk away. -they have things like boche ball as well. -friendly, helpful staff -it's a close walk to the beach and there a lot of restaurants down there (for breakfast I highly recommend Stacks on PCH. It's a 10min walk from the hotel).  CONS  -the hotel bar is very expensive. (I personally had $8+ beer
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are happy to hear that we could provide a beautiful stay for you during your 5 day business trip. We appreciate your feedback and hope that you do visit us again for business or pleasure. See you soon.

Summary: My husband and I recently stayed here for a vacation. The service was amazing! The staff were very friendly and helpful. The food was really good, and the atmosphere was beautiful. We were very relaxed while staying there, and I loved the amenities such as the gym, spa, yoga, and tennis. The beach was within walking distance, and we enjoyed having easy access. We plan on going back, and I look forward to it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We appreciate your wonderful compliments regarding the staff service, the food and the ocean views. We are delighted to hear that you were able to partake in the many amenities we provide and we cannot wait to welcome you back again. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel at Dana Point CA
Summary: Starting with the Valet Parking attendants to the bell boy,  Reception desk and delivery of bags to the room it was a first class experience. As a senior with gold membership we had price and facility advantages nearly unequaled in the industry. 25 % off the standard rate and 20 % reduction on most anything else except alcohol plus several freebies on top. Can't understand though the reasoning behind charging for in-room Internet to non gold members when they could build such great goodwill without collecting the few bucks. (Marriott is not the only chain doing it though, so I guess they all love the opportunity to gouge their guests for something few want to or can do without.)  Abundant breakfast buffet or a la carte. Very attentive service. In-room service excellent and
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to welcoming you back. Thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive staff. We will be sure to forward your comments to our team.

Summary: Absolutely loved everything about this resort. Staff were extremely helpful working out a couple of issues with our room and everyone was very friendly. Great menu that satisfied our family including our 2 & 4 year old, so many options and fantastic restaurants. Kids loved the splash pad and hot tub. We will be going back for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we cannot be more pleased that your entire family had a great time at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We hope your children were able to enjoy the family dinner buffet and complimentary movie nights on Saturday. We look forward to having you all back again.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for our 46th anniversary.  It was awesome, great breakfast buffet, beautiful grounds, staff very nice and friendly.  Good food in the area and lots of things to do.  Would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Wow! Congratulations on your 46th anniversary. We are delighted to hear that you choose our resort to celebrate this special occasion. We are happy that we could make your stay a memorable one. We look forward to having you back.

Summary: I've stayed at the Laguan Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa three times in the last 2 years. Excellent! Service, location. If you want it, need it or request it, they are there for you. Clean, courteous, food is reasonably priced, brunch so very good, entertainment. Staff - attentive. Kid friendly too.   Bonita Boersma
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and for being a loyal guest of ours. We truly appreciate your business and nothing is a bigger compliment than to have you return multiple times to our hotel. We truly care about you and want to create your home away from home during your stay with us. We appreciate your compliments and cannot wait to welcome you back again. See you soon.

Summary: Booked through expedia , paid a lot for 2 nights but was worth it ! View,wharf,valet,surrounding ,speedy service , excellent breakfast buffet to name a few. inspite of my busy fashion show event nearby enjoyed everything nearby esp whale watching trip .
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the views and the breakfast buffet that we offered in Vue Restaurant. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: We have stayed at this resort many times over the years.  We have always found the property to be clean, well kept, comfortable, first rate.  The staff is always friendly and welcoming.  There is always some type of ocean/marina view from the rooms, and most of them have balconies and/or windows that open to allow fresh cool ocean breezes in!  No matter how busy they are, it is always peaceful and fairly quiet when we have been there.   Granted, it can get busy with weddings and vacationers during the summer, but we have never felt the noise level was too loud.  There is a nice park surrounding the property, and you are within easy walking distance to Dana Point Harbor and a variety of good restaurants.  We recommend the Harbor Grill!  The resort itself has a nice bar and
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review and recommendation. We are so grateful for your loyalty to our resort. You are truly appreciated as one of our guests and biggest fan. We cannot wait to welcome you back soon. We‚Äôd love to have you return.

Summary: This is an excellent hotel and resort. Everything has an attention to detail that is so rarely found today. This hotel wants their guests to be comfortable and they will go to great lengths to achieve it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. What a wonderful compliment. Our staff cares and will go the extra mile to make you feel right at home. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: The hotel is nice, the views are great. It feels a little discombobulated with two different wings and the mix use of the lobby/coffee shop/live music at night. The restaurant is so so. Staff, some was excellent, some was not as connected and genuine. Overall a good stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you had a nice stay with us. Thank you for your feedback, your opinion is extremely important to us and we will share your comments with our team. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: Loved this place, recently attended a multi day conference here. Staff was accommodating and professional. They even brought heaters out to flood the deck with warmth on a breezy spring evening dinner. Banquet team was first class. Concierge and front desk staff provided a lot of great recommendations and knowledge about activities in local area. Landscaping was impeccable, provided great photo opps in a beautiful setting overlooking the ocean. I'd get married here or consider hosting a memorable event at this resort.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that we exceeded your expectations during your business trip at the resort. We are happy to hear that our banquet staff was first class and accommodation. We truly hope you choose our resort for your wedding day. What an honor that would be. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Don't get me wrong the location is great. I would suggest to try to see what events they have going on before booking. The hotel was very busy with a wedding going on a Saturday. There contract crew starting setting up a tent not to far from our room at 5:30 in the morning. They had 2 big events that weekend and not enough valet staff. 25 minutes to get the care our of Valet. We had enough after saying something to the staff they said they will waive the resort fees?Not! When we checked out I said something then they waived them. I will be looking for another hotel if we stay in Dana Point
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our location. We regret that the events at the resort were disturbing to you. Your stay is extremely important to us and we take the guest‚Äôs best interest at heart when making decisions for events at the resort. We truly apologize if you were inconvenienced in any way.

Summary: We booked our trip through hotwire to save money and ended up getting a price of 162. After taxes and fees it was about 195$.   When we arrived at the hotel, we were told there is a 25$ resort fee (on top of what we paid.) parking is an additional 35$, valet only.  Even with a handicap placard, the price is still 35$. We had 2 cars... Great.   We were placed in quite possibly the furthest room from the hotel. The AC was broken, we called to have them fix it while we were leaving to attend a wedding. When we came back it was 1am, the room was hot, it wasn't fixed. The engineer came at that time and said the AC wouldn't work for 3 hours. He gave us a fan. We argued with the hotel about this and all they did was refund the parking. They felt they had "done enough."  They sure did.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize that you did not have a satisfactory stay. We want to start off by saying we are sorry to hear you were not aware of our parking  and resort fees as we inform guests in a few different areas regarding these fees.  On the confirmation you received for your guestroom and on all third party websites. We clearly state these fees upfront so that there are no surprises. We understand the inconvenience of the air conditioning not working and although it took three hours for the A/C unit to work again, we are happy that our maintenance staff was able to fix this problem and provide a fan. Your review is extremely important to us and our goal is to have you, as our guest have a wonderful stay with us. We regret that this was not the case. We do hope that in the future, you give Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa another opportunity to restore your faith.

Summary: I stayed here on my way down to San Diego. They require you to valet your car which I wasn't too excited about. The valet staff was chuckling amongst themselves all the time and when I called down to ask for my car to be ready they said they were too busy and couldn't bring it around until I physically came out to the curb. For a pricey upscale hotel I thought that was ridiculous. Also they were peeling off the wallpaper and repairing the wall right outside my room and woke me up. The hotel seemed empty so I don't really understand why they put me near an area that needed maintenance. For the money I wish I stayed at the Montage instead. Oh they also charge a $25 resort fee. It was raining all day so there was no opportunity to use the grounds.l so that was a wasted $25.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us.
