We understand that the maintenance near your room was disturbing and we want you to know that our front office staff would be more than happy to switch your room if occupancy permits. Your comfort is extremely important to us. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.

Summary: I m accompanig my boyfriend who's on business at the laguna cliff. The hotel is high on the hill and the views are lovely.  Can see the ocean and the harbour.  . Are very luxorious and the bed soo confortable I don't want to get up. Enough things to do in the area to be entertained for few days.  Nice walk along the harbour and the very long beaches are nice things to do in the morning.  The hotel has two pools and one hot tub. Just outside the hotel there is a public park where yoga classes are held once a day.  The fitness centre is large,  clean and very new.  The spa bit expensive for me but looks super.  I didn't give it 5 star because I didn't enjoy the food very much.  I m veggie and found that not many options were availeble  The rioms
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you are visiting us and having a wonderful time. We appreciate all of your compliments and hope that you enjoy the rest of your stay. We look forward to having you and your boyfriend return in the future. We hope his conference was a successful one.

Summary Heading: A Resort in a First Class Setting !
Summary: As we drove in to Dana Point, the incline brought us toward a beautiful park leading to the breathtaking Laguna Cliffs Marriott.  With proper mannered valet attendants waiting to take the wheel, we were greeted in a professional manner as we entered through the doors of the hotel. Looking to the rear left is the entrance to a beautiful and modern lounge with a casual bar facing several intimate areas to relax and enjoy a drink. Bar waitresses are sweet and kind. The fromt desk members warmly and gently offer greetings and give that sense of really glad you are there.   The rooms are summer looking like and have quaint a balcony that overlooks a grand land of beautiful lawn. We enjoyed  seeing a very large wedding  and all day into night reception.   The swimming pools are nice
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our "first class setting". We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us from start to finish. Creating memories for you is priceless for us. We are proud to be your "Number One" Marriott hotel. We cannot wait to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Nice getaway for Doheny Blues Concerts.
Summary: Past five years we've stayed here for this concert venue on the beach. Rooms are cozy, water is warm and the staff is well trained and very personable. The Marriott jacks up the price and the $35 a day valet fee, resort fee irks me but they got you. Love jamming in the bar scene with live music and dancing after a beach day by the Blues bands.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that we are your home during the Doheny Blues Festival. Thank you for your compliments regarding our friendly and knowledgable staff. We do appreciate it. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our bands at OverVue. We do hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Setting and Grounds, Mediocre Room
Summary: It is a very big hotel, described as a "Resort" by the fellow who checked us in and explained that we would be paying a mandatory resort fee.  I think many of the rooms have beautiful views.  We had a view, if we stood, of the cars driving in to check in, and at night the headlights of the cars brightened our lives and room unless we totally closed the drapes.  Sitting on our deck we could see the roof of the floor below us and the parapet wall above it.  The room itself was fairly large, clean, well appointed, and a little musty.  The pool on our wing was modest in size for a resort. (As we had reserved our room well in advance, we were disappointed.).  The hotel is sited on a Hill overlooking the bay.  One can walk down the hill to a number of restaurants on the water or to a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the location and beautiful ocean views of the resort. We appreciate your feedback regarding our guest rooms and we apologize that it did not meet your standards. We do hope you visit us again in the future and maybe stay in one of our larger suites.

Summary: The location is stunning; walkable to the restaurants at Dana Point Harbor. Good work-out up and down the steps but not great for the less-able. The rooms are old fashioned i.e. shower still over a redundant tub. Grey bath towels that had that yukky "hotel laundry smell." (the pool towels were in much better condition!) Paper thin walls; we could hear the next door room flush the toilet! Lovely! No kettle in the room to make tea; no fresh milk. I asked for a kettle and got a thermos jug of tepid water. One day US hotel F & B managers will understand that you need boiling water to make tea, not just hot water! They had the cheek to try to charge me $5 for hot water and a slice of lemon! Wifi - don't bother paying $15 for hi-speed Internet. It is slower than the normal wifi ( $10
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciatey your feedback and will certainly take your comments into consideration. Your stay is very important to us and we do apologize that you left dissapointed. We try our best to accommodate our guests as best we can and we certainly know how important it is to be comfortable during your time away from home. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: Had a family reunion here recently and had mixed reviews of my stay.  The Hotel grounds were quite lovely.  Had an Ocean Front room, but the beds were a little over used and the restaurant food was not up to par. The rooms were quite expensive too and they charged a huge resort fee!   They did have a lovely pool and jacuzzi area that we enjoyed and a short walk to Pacific Beach was convenient.  It was centrally located and a short drive to downtown Laguna Beach to the North and San Clemente to the South.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for your family reunion. We appreciate your compliments and are delighted to hear that you were able to take advantage of our pools. We do appreciate your feedback and will definitely share them with our team. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: We stayed at this Marriott May12 through 16 on a Travelzoo rate. This rate included the resort and valet parking fee of $60. There was bad communication between the hotel and Travelzoo. I had to argue the point to get the rate I booked. The hotel staff  and Marriott customer service wanted to charge me the extra $60.  The hotel sits up on a hill. You are not far from the Dana Point Harbor but you better prepare for some difficult walking. The hike down has 118 steep stairs. If you are unable to walk it or don't have a car be prepared with a lot of cab fare. The hotel has no shuttle and they won't help. The room had a coffee maker but only two individual packs of coffee were left. I left a note asking for at least four coffees (2 each) and still got only two. None of the maid
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your comments and will definitely share your comments with our team. We have a 24-hour At Your Service department that can assist you with any requests that you may have including more soap and coffee. We also have a helpful Concierge staff as you noted that would be more than willing to contact a cab for your transportation to the Dana Point Harbor. Many of our guests prefer to walk and enjoy the beautiful scenery down to the harbor but should you ever need a cab our Concierge is more than willing to assist. We apologize for the inconvenience for the mix-up in the Travelzoo rate, we are happy to hear that our team was able to adjust the price for you. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: I have stayed at this resort with my husband.  This time, I was staying by myself as we are building a home in Dana Point .  I have been staying in the area numerous times for the past six months as we live 300 miles away. My "usual" spot was not available for one night, so I selected this property.  Although I was greeted nicely, I was given a room that required me to walk past all the conference rooms, which had many males standing outside the rooms.  Then I was provided a room with a dripping shower.  It was quickly attended to, but the property's engineer who came to check out the dripping shower, which had completely drenched the bath mat folded on the tub, asked me if I had recently taken a shower.  I told him that I had just checked in...so he went into a description of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to take a moment to thank you for being a loyal guest of ours and we're sorry to hear that you felt uncomfortable with where your room was located. Your comfort is of upmost importance to us and if we were not in a sold out situation, we would have been more than happy to switch your room. As you know, our resort is designed for leisure guests, business meetings and families. We regret that you did not feel comfortable walking past the meeting space and having your room located with a pool view that was next to a gathering spot. Please know that in the future, we could easily accommodate your needs if you ask in advance.  We apologize that your shower was dripping. We are happy that our engineering department was prompt in their response time. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.  Your comments are very important to us and we will definitely share them with our team.

Summary: After busting my tail on 30 planes this year it was great to have business in Dana Pt. the work our facility is great and the views are splendid.  Even when it started to rain cats and dogs it was very relaxing. Not what I expected,...but definitely what I needed.   Day 1 is in the books...2 more to go!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that we were able to be your sanctuary as you finally rested after traveling for business. We are happy that you enjoyed the ocean views and the serenity of Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We hope you visit us again in the future for business or pleasure. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: My husband and I spent 4 nights here and found it to be centrally located for southern California, modern and comfortable.  Fitness room was more than adequate, pool was fine, views were nice.  Bed was very comfortable.  We mostly had breakfast at the hotel which was great, a la carte or buffet.  All in all it was a great hotel and we would return.  Only criticism was front desk.  We arrived late and had to wait for the friend who actually had booked the room for us to show up and give his identification.  We understand security, but there wasn't even an attempt to make us comfortable.  We had to just stand around and wait and we had just travelled across the country.  We would have expected a bit more hospitality and graciousness in making us comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you and your husband had a pleasant 4 night stay with us. Our front desk team is extremely cautious of our guests security and therefore the identification process is a requirement to check a guest in. We appreciate your understanding and patience. Your comfort is extremely important to us and we will definitely address your concerns with our staff. We truly care about your stay. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for a business meeting but it became a pleasant surprise. Astonishing view, friendly staff, nice food...everything was perfect. i strongly recommend this hotel if you plan to stay near aliso viejo, laguna beach, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. Nothing makes us happier than to hear we were able to make your business trip, a leisure trip. We thank you for your kind compliments regarding our pleasant staff, ocean views and good food. We hope you do visit us again whether it be for business or pleasure.

Summary: Of all of the hotels I have visited over the years, this place makes the top five. Started on my arrival to hotel six hours prior to check-in. I had been up very early for a long flight. I had a conference beginning in a couple hours and prayed I could get a room prior to check-in so I could take a short nap. The front desk associate was very understanding and found me a room.   Food was excellent and very friendly helpful staff. Turndown service is not common anymore so it's a fun luxury. Location is picturesque. Every morning I walked along the path to the beach
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are happy to hear that your stay with us was outstanding from check-in to check-out. Your compliments are very much appreciated and we feel honored that we are on your top 5 hotel list out of all your stays. We hope you visit us again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: We stayed at the cliffs the first week of may. Staff was very nice, rooms were comfortable and the views were amazing.  It is a little walk to the beach, but it only takes 5 minutes. We enjoyed a lot of relaxing by the 2 pools, and ate the breakfast buffet daily, which was very good. The pool chairs were very comfortable, and there was never more than a handful of people at the pool. It was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and visted our pools during your vacation. Thank you for your fine compliments regarding our friendly staff and amazing ocean views. We hope you visit us again for another relaxing stay. We look forward to having you back.

Summary: I stayed here with my family for a spring break weekend. We got a special deal on hotels.com for a poolside special. The rooms are standard size with a couch on the side, and French doors that open to a small patio that leads directly to the pool. However, we had to walk through the hotel all the way to the back for this location, but we thought it was worth the tradeoff. The pool was warm enough in early spring and the hot tub was great. The view is terrific. Pool towels are available poolside. The toilet was new and its top button got stuck, but hotel maintenance was very prompt in coming to address the issue. The beds were soft and comfy. Water and snacks are placed temptingly in the room, but are of course priced highly. It is possible to use the bar refrigerator in the room
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you spent your spring break with us. We are happy that you enjoyed the beautiful views from our pools and the amenities provided both poolside and at the resort. We hope you visit us again in the future, we'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: The hotel is nice but it is not a resort. Free Wi-Fi is provided but there is a 27.50 daily resort fee. On parking, there is a $35.00 daily parking fee and no option except to park way down the hill on the parameter of the park grounds.  So when you book, be sure to factor in $62.50 daily up charge before you even go up to your room
Manager Response: We apologize if you were unaware of the valet only service and resort fees. For the guest‚Äôs convenience, we clearly state that we provide valet service only on our website. We also state all of the fees on our website as well as the confirmation e-mail. We hope that this did not pose an inconvenience to you in any way. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: We stayed for part of Spring Break. I liked that although it was fairly full, it didn't seem crowded or noisy. Loved the short walk to the beach, though there are much nicer beaches a short drive away. Hiking back up the road could be a challenge for some. Bocce in the neighboring park was a nice surprise. There is also a daily donation yoga class in the park that is very well attended. It is a moderate walk or short drive to restaurants and the marina, although the on-site food offerings were fine for a couple of meals. I didn't like unexpected fees like mandatory valet (we had two cars and there is no on-site parking) and resort fees on top of that. And the pools were nice but several of us got mouthfuls of chemicals while swimming in both pools.  I would probably return but
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you stayed with us during your Spring Break and enjoyed the resort and nearby activities of Dana Point. We are delighted that you were able to take advantage of the beach and pools during your stay with us. We hope you do visit us again the next time you are in Dana Point.

Summary Heading: George from the Bar is top notch
Summary: We are having a great stay at the Laguna Cliffs and the worker at the bar, George, went above and beyond to make sure we had a great experience. He wheeled over heaters and even brought me a blanket so that I could sit outside and enjoy the evening. He was exceptional and just made my trip. Well done George!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We appreciate your kind compliments regarding George. We will definitely share your comments with him. We are happy to hear that he was accommodating and made your trip. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here last weekend, it was a special occasion for us. We booked a pool view room. They accommodated us with a beautiful romantic room with a partial ocean view. Everyone was really friendly and accommodating. We ate at the lounge and it was lovely, the food and the atmosphere, the outdoor area at night is magical. The spa looked lovely and had a wonderful store of high quality organic skin care and candles. The hotel was clean, luxurious and convenient to town which was quaint and fun to explore. It also wasn't huge, it was a nice size that gave it an even more intimate ambience. We had a wonderful time. We would definitely return sometime if the occasion arises to be in Laguna again. If you are seeking luxury without having to pay a fortune, stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you and your boyfriend enjoyed a celebration at the resort. We couldn't agree with you more about the magestic feeling of OverVue deck. We cannot wait to welcome you both backfor another memorable stay.

Summary: This place was beautiful and luxurious. I stayed for a meeting and all of us talked about how the pillows are like clouds. We had lunch outside and the views were spectacular. Also walking distance from local bars and shops and the marina. The hotel was very updated and clean and we couldn't have asked for anything more.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy a good night's rest during your stay with us. We know how important it is to be traveling for work and be away from home. Thank you for your compliments regarding our beautiful ocean views and our clean and updated resort. We appreciate your comments and we hope you visit us again for business or pleasure. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Absolutely Stunning Views, quiet and peaceful stay!
Summary: Husband and I visited the property, we enjoyed our stay.  The views are absolutely breath taking, stunning sunsets.  The beds were comfortable, EXTREMELY soft beds, you literally sink in.  The carpets could use a good cleaning, but overall nice rooms.  Spa and fitness center were a bonus, they provide water and healthy snacks (apples and bananas, etc).  Clean spa facilities, well kept, very friendly staff.  Great bar area with great menu options!  Very relaxing atmosphere at night, they have a beautiful fire pit with seating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you and your husband enjoyed a peaceful stay with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the fitness center and all the amenities included. We hope you were able to watch the beautiful sunsets from our OverVue deck while dining with us. We hope you visit us again the next time you are in Orange County.

Summary: Very nice hotel, helpful staff and great views. Whale watching and nice restaurants within walking distance. Short scenic drive to other beaches and sites. Could do without annoying resort and parking fees though. Really added to total bill even on days that reward points were used.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you were able to take advantage of the nearby resort activities. We thank you for your compliments regarding our staff and beautiful resort. We hope you visit us again the next time you visit Southern California.

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay with hotel staff that went above and beyond
Summary: My husband and I visited the resort over our anniversary. Enjoying the time here so much we wanted to extend our stay by an added day. Knowing there was a large convention at the hotel we knew the odds were slim. Stopping by the front desk we spoke with the night manager, Ellie. Not only was Ellie able to extend our stay but gave us the same great rate. After helping, my husband mentioned it was our anniversary and heartily thanked her. The next night after returning from dinner we found a desert table with champagne flowers and dessert set up for us with a wonderful card wishing us Happy Anniversary. Tears flowed down my face as this gesture meant so much to both of us. Thank you Ellie. This resort will always be by first choice in Dana point.
Manager Response: Happy belated anniversary. What an honor that you and your husband choose our resort to celebrate such a beautiful occasion. We are happy to hear that our staff was able to provide a memorable vacation and celebration for you both. We are delighted that you extended your stay with us and we are thrilled that we are your Dana Point hotel of choice. We would love to welcome you back. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel on a bluff overlooking the ocean!
Summary: We were in So CA for a wedding, and this was the hotel the wedding party chose as the main place for people to stay.  Originally I thought it was way too expensive, but we were able to use points.  This is a large, bustling hotel.  You can actually just stay and enjoy the amenities without even leaving!  There are two nice pools and a water area for kids.  Our room with a king bed was beautifully appointed. The bed, however, had a trench in the middle and was way too soft.  I think the mattresses are well used.  They also shook when the other person moved, and we are not large people!  The toiletries were top quality, and the room was spotless.  Linens were very nice and crisp.  I loved the two chairs in the room, where we could sit in the morning with our coffee.  I have to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and all of the amenities that we provide. Thank you for your compliments regarding the beautifully appointed guest rooms and the two outdoor pools. We are happy to hear that we made a great first impression on you. We do appreciate your feedback and will share your comments with our team. Your opinion is extremely important to us and we hope that you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Certainly not up to Marriott standards
Summary: I recently stayed here. The property definitely needs a facelift. The room and interior carpets are drab and, in my wing, not vacuumed during my 4 day stay. I know that because a goldfish cracker was smashed in the middle of the hall when I arrived and it was there when I left.  Walls in room and halls are scraped and dirty. Valet parking is ridiculously high priced (and slow) considering there is no self parking option. There were kids playing and screaming right outside the room every afternoon and evening.  I blame that more on parents' lack of control of their children.  The "enhanced" wifi in my room was incredibly slow.  The staff, however, was always friendly.  I am a Platinum Marriott Rewards member, so I spend as many as 100 nights/year in Marriott properties. I've
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review. We are pleased to hear that our staff was friendly throughout your entire stay with us. We are disappointed however, that you were not completely satisfied with the cleanliness of the resort. We appreciate your feedback and will definitely share your comments with our team. Everything should be immaculate during your stay with us and we take your feedback very seriously and this is no exception.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel with staff that doesnt care
Summary: The hotel is beautiful but the staff doesn't care at all. I requested a room on a high floor and was checked in to a ground floor. When I asked front desk they told me they couldn't do anything about it as they were fully booked and they didn't receive my request but oddly enough it was specified in our reservation made on hotels.com. The breakfast buffet was not worth the 23 dollars per person and service was poor and didn't seem to care. I was charged 90 dollar a day for an upgrade that I didn't request upon check out. The manager assured me they had taken the amount out and apologized. When I got back home I saw they had charged the full amount on my credit card, and when I called the hotel to ask about it the phone operator was unbelievably RUDE and condescending. It made me
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We regret that you felt our staff did not care about your request to have a high floor guest room. We want you to know that your stay is very important to us and we do everything we can to accommodate your requests. Floor requests and bed type requests are not guaranteed when booking but are identified as ‚Äúrequests‚Äù at time of booking. Unfortunately, during a sold out situation, we are unable to grant all requests. We do appreciate your understanding.  We apologize that you were charged an additional fee for your room upgrade and the inconvenience of having to reverse the charges. We are happy that this problem was resolved. We want you to know that Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa is synonymous for outstanding customer service and you will see this by reading past customer reviews. Your experience was definitely not the norm for Laguna Cliffs and we hope that you consider giving us another chance to restore your faith in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but showing some age
Summary: Beutiful on the outside, a little dated on the inside.  Room was decent, bathroom needed a vent/fan.  large gap under entry door let in noises from the hallway. My trip fell during spring break, so the put a couple near all the families with kids, not thrilled to hear babies crying and kids whining.  We were also near the kids pool, had to walk through the hotel and over to the other wing for the more adult pool...  not fun. Water pressure in the shower was lacking, and no mini fridge in the room....
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and will share your comments with our team. Our guests enjoy the two outdoor pools that we offer and each is unique based upon the guest‚Äôs preference. One has the kid‚Äôs splash zone and the other does not. We want to thank you again for your comments and we hope you do visit us in the future.

Summary: So I stayed at the Marriott this weekend. I was in town for a job interview, and required a Taxi to get to Irvine. (I was a bit unfamiliar with OC, so I wasn't sure if Uber was as common as in NYC, so taxi it was!) I ordered a cab from the concierge and after 15 minutes, an unmarked town car finally showed up. The concierge reassured me that it was definitely a taxi and NOT a town car, so I got in.   20 minutes, and SIXTY DOLLARS LATER, I was in Irvine. I thought that perhaps taxi's were just expensive in OC, but I was wrong. My ride back from Irvine cost a grand total of $23 with an actual taxi. I was pretty annoyed, so I asked the concierge why it cost so much and how come they ordered a car instead of a taxi. Visibly annoyed, the concierge replied with a heavy attitude,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We deeply regret that you had to spend an unexpected $60 on your cab fare to Irvine. We do want to inform you that the cab ride from Dana Point to Irvine is approximately $60.00. We are not quite sure why on your way back you were only charged $23.00. We can assure you that our Concierge are seasoned professionals and extremely knowledgeable. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are delighted to hear that despite this incident you enjoyed your stay with us and we do hope you visit us again in the future. We appreciate your recommendation.

Summary: My family and I stayed at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott for a short spring break stay. The hotel was very welcoming in all areas. Greeted right from the start with the valet. Upon checking in the staff upgraded us to an ocean view room. Our rooms weren't ready but they called us when they were done. Our rooms were average rooms but clean. My room had 2 FULL size beds which were comfortable but small.  Who has rooms with full size beds today? I requested 1 king room but it wasn't available. The bathrooms were clean no sign of mold. The room also offered a safe for you belongings.  The hotel offers 2 pool areas. Both are very nice with lots of lounge chairs and tables. The main pool a great children's play area with lots of water features and a kids pool. Now here is my one
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We are honored to hear that you enjoyed your Spring break with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your guest room and the Vue Restaurant. We appreciate your feedback and will share your suggestions with our team. We look forward to having you stay with us again.

Summary: Beautiful setting on the ocean.  Rooms were large, clean and comfortable.  They actually upgraded our room which was appreciated until at night we found the room was over some large air conditioning units which made it hard to sleep.  Enjoyed the bar (quality drinks), but the food served at  the bar was average at best, while the service was good not great.  Have stayed there before and will again.  Valet parking is very costly even by Calif. standards.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful ocean-view property. We regret that the noise from the air conditioner made it hard to sleep. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We look forward to having your return again. Thank you again for your review.

Summary Heading: Not sure if they truly care for their customers
Summary: The positives first- beautiful location and place. Lobby and grounds are immaculate. Swimming poo is not up to a "resort standard" in terms of the size and the landscaping. Rooms are smaller and cramped. There was a dead spider in the bathtub of my room. With $25 daily "resort fee", one would expect consistent wifi, however that was not the case with their "enhanced speed wifi". The in-room coffee/tea are not replenished unless u ask.  The worst experience for me was my missing wrist watch from my room and nobody seeming to care much about it. I had placed it on one of the desks/night stands and went missing! And all you get for these issues is a verbal apology. I am disappointed with these experiences so far  on my 3 night stay. My family is joining me today and I hope it is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our resorts location and found the grounds to be immaculate. However, we apologize for the shortfalls your described.  Our resorts amenities are always open to interpretation and while we hope our pools and guestrooms will meet most guest‚Äôs expectations I regret it is not always possible.  We were also sorry to hear of the challenges with your wifi as we‚Äôve had significant enhancements throughout our resort and I will bring your concerns to our Systems Manager for his immediate attention.  We also apologize that you found our team to lack empathy for your missing watch.  Please be assured we have a caring and considerate team and we do not take missing items lightly.  Our Loss Prevention Team is extremely proactive in trying to resolve any guest issues and confirmed that they did in fact try to locate your missing watch. As you can imagine, we understand the importance of your valuables and have a strict protocol in place when trying to locate missing items.

Summary: The room is big and the bed is comfortable. The location is very good, we actually can just walk to the beach park(which otherwise you have to pay a parking fee if driving). Lobby has a nice bar, and outdoor seating area. Overall, we had a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the comfortable bed and spacious room. We couldn‚Äôt agree with you more, the resort is perfectly located within walking distance of the marina and shops. We hope you visit us again in the near future, we‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary: I have stayed at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott several times for short trips.  The hotel is quite large but nice and many rooms have lovely views.  It is quite a hike to the waterfront, down a lot of stairs, but still a pleasant walk, assuming you're in decent shape and have some time.  The grounds are lovely and the hotel is adjacent to a local park that makes it feel even nicer.  The rooms themselves are nice/average, many with small patios and ocean views.  The walls are a bit thin, however, so be hopeful that you don't have a noisy neighbor!  Be prepared to pay for valet and resort fees - like many beach towns, parking does not come cheap!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had an opportunity to walk down to the harbor and enjoy the beautiful Lantern Bay Park right outside the resort. We are delighted to hear that you have visited Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa several times. We look forward to having you back for another trip.

Summary Heading: Nice property at an OK destination
Summary: We drove up from San Diego to stay at this Marriott the first Saturday of March.  It was our first visit to this hotel and to Dana Point.  The hotel seems to be ideal for weddings and events, but not much else.  It does have two swimming pools I am sure are nice in the warmer months.  The location of the hotel is more than a short walk to a beach or to downtown Dana Point.  Note: valet parking is your only option.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that your chose to stay with us for the first time. The resort is ideal for all travelers including families, couples, staycationers and business travelers alike. We have a variety of amenities and activities for all to enjoy. We hope you visit us again the next time you are in the area.

Summary: I really enjoyed this hotel resort relaxing by the pool and chilling. I had the lamb at The Vue. Meat fell off the bone and was tender. Full service spa. I drank the mellow Josh Cabernet - by the glass. The beds and pillows are very comfortable. We shut the air conditioning off and let the fresh air in. The park and marina is right across the street. Fast food restaurants are around the block. A rib shack looked good but we didn't try it. There's restaurants in the marina area also. I feel like I'm in Europe. Nice relaxing get away.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are pleased to hear that you had a relaxing time at our pools and enjoyed our Spa. We look forward to having you back again.

Summary Heading: Perfect end to a short business trip
Summary: My husband and I had a business trip to San Diego and ended the week with a wonderful 2 nights at the Laguna Cliffs Resort. The weather was incredible which made the stay even better. It was such a relaxing 2 days sitting by one of the 2 pools and watching the ocean down below. We drove up the coast to dinner and breakfasted outside at the resort. We loved meeting Cynthia and Nicky, the hawk  hired to stop the sparrows sharing our meal. The resort staff were courteous and professional. We will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you and your husband were able to enjoy a vacation after your business trip at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are happy that you were able to relax and unwind with our beautiful weather and ocean views. We look forward to having you and your husband return and we recommend trying the Spa the next time you are here. We know you will surely leave feeling relaxed and rejuvenated.

Summary: Needing a reprieve from Ohio weather  my daughter and I stayed here for two night for an extended getaway after a conference she attended  in Anaheim.  How glad we were that we chose this hotel! Aside from the lovely location every staff that we came in contact with was very friendly and helpful. The pool and hot tub area were simply beautiful.  Yes, the parking and resort fees are a little unreasonable and it would be nicer if they just included these in the price of the room from the beginning, but at least they do state this on their website so it wasn't a surprise. Very convenient to the Mission at San Juan Capistrano if  you're interested in history.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you and your daughter stayed with us for the first time and left with wonderful memories. We appreciate all of your compliments and we are happy that we could be the perfect getaway for you and your daughter for two nights. We hope you visit us again the next time you are in Southern California.

Summary: Very nice hotel.  Nice staff.  Nice food.  Nice grounds.  Not so nice extra charges. $35 valet parking "Valet Parking Only"-$35 a sign says.  "Resort Fee" $25.  So an extra $55 should be added to your reservation in your head when you  book online.  Why don't they just include those costs that are not optional instead of adding them later on when you check out.  Bad business policy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our friendly staff, tasty food and beautiful property. We apologize if you were unaware of the valet only service and resort fees. For the guest‚Äôs convenience, we clearly state that we provide valet service only on our website. We also state all of the fees on our website as well as the confirmation e-mail in order to inform our guests of all charges prior to booking. We hope that this did not pose an inconvenience to you in any way. Thank you again for your review. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: My fianc√© and I stayed here for valentines day. It was just a one night get away and it was a lovely stay. The highlights are the views, and the rooms with their own balcony's are great. They also offer a lot of outdoor seating around the property which is nice. If you get the breakfast the buffet is great and the outdoor seating is gorgeous. Another highlight is the beach is walking distance and they offer free bike rentals and other activity rentals. Overall it was a great stay. One of the downsides was the attendant in the spa was very very rude- The spa itself was nice though.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you and your fianc√© choose the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa to spend your Valentine‚Äôs Day. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the panoramic ocean views of the resort. We apologize for the unpleasant encounter you ad with our spa attendant. We take every review very seriously and we will be sure to speak to our staff regarding your review. Laguna Cliffs is synonymous for great service and we hope you take this incident as an exception and not the rule. We look forward to having you back again soon.

Summary Heading: No follow through to emails, phone calls, or social media
Summary: This is a review of what I was hoping would be a stay at the hotel, but since no one would return my emails/tweets/posts it never happened.  I have tried of contacting this hotel at least 8 to 10 times.  I have wanted to ask some questions about Marriott Platinum benefits and some other packages for an upcoming trip my family and I have to Dana Point/San Clemente area.    I have followed them on twitter, and sent at least 6 messages requesting that someone contact me or send me an email that I could submit a few question to - no response.  This is after someone from the hotel posts almost daily to their twitter page.  I have gone to their Facebook page and left a message requesting an email address - no response.  Again, ever day or so their page is being updated by someone
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to start off by thanking you for being a loyal Marriott member. We check our messages daily on our social media platforms and we have not received a message from you on Facebook or Twitter. We apologize that these messages have not come through but as you can see from other posts we do respond as best we can to as many messages as we can. We are more than happy to answer any questions you may have at the property or through our corporate office. We want to assist you in anyway we can and we would be more than willing to answer any of your questions. Again, we are sorry that the messages were not received by our staff and therefore left unanswered. If you choose to call us again, please call our reservations department directly and someone will assist you. We apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary: I stayed there this past weekend and the resort is gorgeous and well maintained. You can't beat the location.  I used the salon and it was great. The bar area outside has great views and I received great service.  My suite was clean and very comfortable.  Ok, for the downside, they charge a $25.00 per day resort fee and valet is $32.00 a day. They offer no other option for parking and that's terrible. I don't mind paying for valet, but on Sunday when I checked out, I waited a very long time to get my car. The resort was hosting a private event so it was a mess. I believe this has to be a constant issue, so I would like to see the management solve this problem. I was angry about paying the $32.00 that day for sure since the valet service was POOR.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the resort and it‚Äôs beautiful location during your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and will be sure to share your comments with our team. We want you to be completely satisfied with our service levels throughout the entire resort. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: The location was perfect for the relaxation and surfing we were looking for.  The staff was very helpful in assisting us with locations and contacts for lessons.  The food at the hotel restaurant was excellent as well.  We had a great corner suite overlooking the pool and with a view of the ocean (the hotel is not ocean front but is a short walk away).  This is a great place for a relaxing getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. Yes, we are the perfect location for surfing. We hope you enjoyed the beach and the warm weather during your stay. We are glad you enjoyed the restaurants at the resort and the beautiful ocean-views. We look forward to having you back for another relaxing getaway.

Summary Heading: A great place for a staycation
Summary: We stayed at this resort for a quick weekend get away and loved it! Located conveniently and gorgeous ocean views. It is lush and clean. We felt like we were in the tropics. Wonderful customer service and the rooms were clean and updated. The bed was extremely comfortable and heavenly! We used the spa services which were also great! I will definately stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that your weekend getaway was a memorable one. Thank you for all the lovely compliments and we look forward to having you back!

Summary Heading: Beautiful resort, with a few negatives
Summary: We recently stayed at the Marriott for three nights with a Travelzoo special rate. The resort was very nice, with beautiful harbor views. We were upgraded to a poolside room - also very nice, although I would expect it may be noisy in season based on our experience one day. All staff were extremely courteous and professional - from front desk to restaurant and lounge to valets to housekeeping.  I can understand previous reviewers being upset over the $25 daily resort fee and $32 daily valet fee. Fortunately these were waived with the Travelzoo rate, but I would feel ripped off if they weren't. We had the buffet breakfast for $23pp at the Vue Restaurant  -- very good but not worth that price. We also had two light dinners at the Overvue Lounge, and they were very good and also
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding our curteous and professional staff. We are happy to hear that you were able to experience both of our restaurants. We hope you visit us again the next time you are in Southern California.

Summary: Laguna Cliffs is a beautiful hotel situated at the top of a hill. It is a good location with amazing views.  The rooms are large and the beds an extremely well appointed. As other reviewers have pointed out, the showers are very disappointing (I was disappointed by poor water pressure). The hallways were also noisy and you hear everything in your room; although the noise quieted down around 9-10pm. The resort fee is questionable especially when the weather limits outdoor activities ($25 isn't justified for just the weight room). Overall, fantastic hotel, but needs a few tweaks to be considered amongst the best.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the resort's views and location. We appreciate your feedback and will share your comments with our team. Your opinion is extremely important to us and we appreciate your suggestions. We hope that you visit us the next time you are in Southern California.

Summary: Great resort but a little clunky part of Dana point not due to the resort but the lack of beachwalk opportunities. Staff, rooms, restaurant, presence is all solid. Price is appropriate and all u need from a marriot . Yoga on the green at 10 am:)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and took part in the Yoga in the park. We look forward to having you back in the future.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel for a wedding with a relatively large contingent of guests. While the grounds are nice, we had issues with a food service manager, specifically being harassed by the manager of the restaurant right next to check in. We were sitting in the lobby with outside food, which we had previously eaten & then put away - it was sitting in bags next to us while we were talking, at which point the manager came up to us & told us no outside food was allowed and we had to go up to our rooms. When we informed her that we were just conversing now and that we weren't eating, she raised her voice and started quoting made up health code rules, which were especially absurd given that we weren't in the restaurant. Then, after we ignored her, she called security, who fortunately
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to take a moment to apologize for any discomfort you may have felt during your visit with us. Our focus is to keep our guests safe and healthy, which is why the Manager on duty mentioned the health code to you and your friends. We do not allow outside food brought into our restaurants (Vue and OverVue lounge and deck) and we do appreciate your understanding. We want to assure you that our staff is extremely professional and courteous and their main concern is the comfort and safety of our guests. We again want to take a moment to apologize for any inconvenience.

Summary: Okay. Great location, great views, you really wanna like this place but just not up for prime time.  First, I am a Platinum Elite member of Marriott and secured the reservation months ago. Arrive at 3:20 PM to the most disinterested front desk woman I've encountered in a long time. Asked if the suite I reserved was ready. At first she said they had no suites, then asked about the ocean front view, paused on that and said my room was not ready. We told her we had an event to attend in less than two hours. She said that it had to be ready by 4. No offer of anything, perhaps another room....she simply delivered all this with a very dazed and confused look.  Room was not particularly well maintained. Looked like we received a handicap accessible room as holes were drilled into the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your fine compliments regarding our ocean views and beautiful location. We want to thank you for your loyalty to Marriott and for your business. We regret that your check-in experience was not satisfactory and seamless. We here at Laguna Cliffs provide all of our guests exceptional service from check-in to check-out and we want you to know that this was definitely an exception and not the norm. We will be sure to address your concerns with our staff. We appreciate your feedback and take every review seriously. We hope you give Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa another chance to restore our faith. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Bad Restaurant Service - Great Hotel and Location
Summary: This hotel is in a beautiful location in Dana Point, CA. The hotel is large and a great semi-resort destination. Walkable to the beach. We have been here about five times in the past year and a half.   The one thing that is always a constant is the terrible restaurant service. (This does not include Vineny in the upstairs Vue bar - she is fantastic). Each separate time we have been here the service is very sub-par. The F&B managers have been rude  and unaccommodating. At an empty Vue restaurant we have waited upwards of 30 minutes to be seated and a waiter show up at our table. The reservation system and room booking system is not good either.   We have contemplated coming here for lunch/dinner on many occasions and decided against it due to our regular bad experiences with
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We regret that you did not receive good service at our Vue Restaurant. Your experience is of upmost important to us and our goal is to seat everyone in a timely manner. We understand that our host was ready to seat you upon your arrival but that you wanted to sit outdoors on our patio, which is what caused the additional wait time. We apologize for the inconvenience but we do have to seat guests in order of reservation time and reservation request (indoor and outdoor seating). We appreciate your understanding and you can certainly be sure that we have addressed your concerns with our team. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate your business and we do hope you return to Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel almost ruined by awful shower!
Summary: I recently stayed one night at the Marriott Laguna Cliffs in Dana Point, CA.  Unlike many who stay here for vacation or conferences, I was here just for one night on business.  So right away, I have to complaint about the $25 per resort fee.  I was not there to use ANY resort services other than WiFi which I should have for free as a Platinum Elite Rewards member.  Very UNCOOL! Plus, there is no Concierge lounge and I was not offered free breakfast coupons instead.  Also uncool! There's no doubt the hotel itself and the grounds are beautiful.  The views of Dana Point harbor and the town from the hotel cliff are just stunning.  I was upgraded at check-in to a mini-executive suite which was very nice.  The suite consisted of a separate sitting/work area with a large ornate table
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy that you enjoyed your spacious suite, with our fast Wi-Fi speed and comfortable bedding. We are sorry to hear that the showerhead was not to your liking. We appreciate your feedback and will share your comments with our team. Your opinion is important to us and we want business travelers like yourself to be  comfortable and enjoy all of our amenities. Thank you again for your review and we hope you will reconsider Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa for your next stay.

Summary Heading: Great customer service and beautiful hotel
Summary: I organized a conference at the Laguna Cliffs for my company.  Everything wet off without a hitch - every need we had was catered to.  I was very impressed with the service.  The sleeping rom assigned to me was quiet and on the Del Mar wing with an ocean view.  It was gorgeous.  Too bad I had to spend so much tme in the conference.  Great food - and lots of vegetarian options!  The hotel is adjacent to Doheny State Park, and the ground border the park, so it adds to he activities - you can even play bocce (the front desk will let you borrow balls).  The restaurants are the Marina are a brisk walk (uphill on the way back); but the front desk will arrange for free transportation if you prefer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that your conference was a success and that our team was seamless in the execution of the meeting. We know how important a good night‚Äôs sleep is and we are happy to hear that you not only enjoyed your quiet room but you also were able to enjoy the beautiful ocean views. We hope you visit us again and spend more time enjoying the serenity and beautiful panoramic views of the resort. We look forward to having you back for business or pleasure.

Summary Heading: Mixed experience, on balance good, some rough edges
Summary: Ideally, I would give this Marriott Resort 3.5 out of 5.  I chose 4 because the staff and managers were very nice and tried to remedy the things that went wrong.  We visited this resort for two nights in February 2015, reserving two King bed rooms with a pool view, one for my wife and me, the other for a couple of friends.  The rooms were fairly standard for a Marriott, modern, well appointed, and reasonably but not perfectly clean.  Beds were quite comfortable, if a bit soft for my taste.  To sum it up, this place is expensive and may not quite rise to the level of luxury I would expect for the price, but it is a nice stay in spite of everything (see below).  Some key obsevations, with details below:  - pool view rooms cost $30 more per night and do not necessarily offer any
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear that you addressed your concerns with our staff and that most of your needs were taken care of. We are here to make your stay as pleasurable and comfortable as we can, so your input is very important to us. We will share your comments with our team and we thank you again for sharing your experience. We are delighted to hear that your wife was extremely satisfied with all of her spa treatments. We hope you both visit us again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: This resort had stunning views of the ocean, and was very luxurious. We were able to walk to the marina and restaurants nearby. But mostly we just enjoyed the pool, walking around the grounds, and having dinner in the restaurant. We felt pampered, and would definitely go again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you left feeling pampered and relaxed after your stay with us. We cannot wait to welcome you back for another luxurious stay. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: I was traveling on business (Marriott points junkie) and decided to go out of my way to stay here. Glad I did. Felt welcome from check in to departure. Clean and spacious room, a robe, nicely appointed room and bathroom fixtures...more than I expected.  Had time to use the fitness area, which was loaded with everything I needed; much more than just the basic treadmills, etc.  My only disappointment was that is was really foggy and didn't get to see the killer views of the Pacific and the beautiful boats just down the hill in Dana Point harbor.  For whatever reason the rate was better than than other business-brand hotels in the Irvine area, so this was well worth the extra time on the freeway to get here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you really enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive staff and the resort guest rooms. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the amenities of the resort and we hope you visit us again on a less foggy day so you can see the magnificent stretch of the Pacific Ocean. It will be a very unforgettable scenery. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This is a pretty middle of the road hotel.  The rooms are standard Marriott - no charm at all - but they are comfortable and clean. I had a nice view on the Pacific Ocean. Bar and Restaurant are okay but nothing special. There's a conference centre connected to the hotel so i can only imagine there's a lot of convention or business people around. Valet parking is efficient.  When you come here, it's to sleep here - not to spend a romantic vacation - at least not in my opinion.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a nice stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and would like to let you know that we have a ballroom as well as additional meeting space but we do not have a conference center attached. We also provide many amenities for couple‚Äôs to enjoy such as a couple‚Äôs massage in our Spa as well as a romantic dinner in our ocean-view, Vue restaurant and we highly recommend a drink on our OverVue deck. In addition, we provide guests with complimentary bike rentals, etc. should you choose to take a stroll along one of our many biking and hiking trails. The harbor is also a great location that is within walking distance for couples to enjoy a romantic stroll along the marina or to rent a boat or even watch the sunset. We hope you come back again and enjoy one of these activities during your next stay.

Summary: Came from cold snowy Alberta to get some sun and ocean views. Both rooms we were given had no balcony...one of us was able to switch rooms but my mother wasn't so was stuck with no balcony.  I had asked at the front desk just for a cupcake or little cake for my daughters first birthday. They brought a mini cheesecake when I specifically asked for no cheesecake. I could have just ordered that off the menu.  We sat by the deserted pool with no service. The kids "splash zone" was turned off....Pools were freezing.  Our bathroom sink backed up and filled the room with a sewage stink while my daughter was napping.  Staff was really nice. Food was good. In room dining needs a bit more of a selection. And the shrimp cocktail was pitiful. Can't believe the price for this place. Resort
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to start off by apologizing for the unsatisfactory stay you experienced during your visit with us. We want to inform you that your review is extremely important us and we take great pride in the high level of service our staff provides to our guests and we are very disappointed that you did not experience this. We wanted to address some of your concerns. We regret that all of our rooms do not have balconies and we can assure you that are staff would be more than willing to change your rooms, should occupancy permit. We are happy to hear that we could change at least one of your rooms. We do have a designated telephone by the pools for our guests convenience should you happen to want to order food or drinks. Our splash zone is typically turned off during the winter months but we would be more than happy to turn it on. We again apologize for the lack of service you received when you visited our restaurants and will be sure to share your concerns with our team.

Summary Heading: Fire alarm went off every 2 hours
Summary: I have been trying to sleep since around 7pm because of jet lag; the fire alarm went off at around 9pm and 11pm for three times each. The broadcasts given when the fire alarm came on were not informational. It turns out that there was a technical issue with the smoke detecting system... We would like to be compensated for the lost sleep, at least by having a complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the inconvenience of the alarm system going off yesterday evening. We understand the importance of a good night's rest and unfortunately, this was a technical issue that was not done on purpose. We hope you accept our apology.

Summary Heading: Classy relaxing hotel near the harbour
Summary: Stayed here early Oct 2014-luxurious rooms which are well appointed, spa themed. Overall feel is colonial American- white wood, slatted windows- shades of Hemingway's St. Armond's Circle in Sarasota. Cool marble decor in main lobby- short walk down to the harbour via steep steps or winding graduated path (take the path!). Breakfast was the best I have had anywhere- that is a real tribute to the chefs and waiting staff who go out of their way to be helpful and efficient. I must complement the hotel on the quality of the freshly squeezed orange juice and the quantity (dear old Michael Winner would have said "EPIC"). Main breakfast buffet best anywhere- best omelette preparation and attention to detail. Highly recommend fruit and (dare I write this?)- the Danish pastries- such a
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review! We are delighted to hear that your stay was excellent and that you experienced the 5 star service that we provide to our guests. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the food in Vue Restaurant, OverVue Lounge and OverVue Caf√©. Your opinion is important to us and we are couldn‚Äôt be happier to hear that your experience was great. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Business or pleasure the view is always wonderful
Summary: Want to get away for the weekend or have a business meeting the Marriott Dana Point doesn't disappoint.  Nice rooms overlook beautifully landscaped grounds and of course the  Pacific Ocean as your backdrop. Rooms with views will fill up, so plan early. It's a busy place on weekends so room service is not a good choice if you are hungry. Also take advantage of walking to near by Dana Point Harbor, the Pier and Shops for or for famous Wind and Sea, Mai Tai if you like!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. You couldn't have said it better, Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa is the perfect location for business, pleasure, couples, family getaways and much, much more. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. The views are spectacular from any angle of the resort. We look forward to welcoming you back for business or pleasure any time.

Summary: We spent Christmas at this hotel. Aldo on reception was a wonderful host and we couldn't have asked for more. The pool area was great - heated pool in winter. Our room was simply perfect and the staff were truly wonderful. Wouldn't stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: What a delight! We are honored that you stayed with us on Christmas. We appreciate your wonderful comments regarding our ‚Äúperfect‚Äù resort and staff. We are happy to hear that our staff created a memorable experience for you during your Christmas vacation. We couldn‚Äôt be happier to hear these wonderful compliments. We hope you visit us again next Christmas or sooner.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, so much to do!
Summary: I visited the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa last week for five nights for a work conference and it was an amazing experience (and not just because it was sunny & warm in Dana Point and -3 degrees at home in Cleveland)!!!  The resort is beautiful--the rooms are very nice and the views stunning (we had a partial ocean view room on the 3rd floor overlooking the pool). We enjoyed having a balcony with a sliding door that we could leave open and let the breeze come in! The staff we met with were also very friendly and helpful, including the valet, the front desk folks and the room service staff. It is worth noting that many of the housekeeping staff didn't seem to speak great English, but this wasn't a problem for us. We didn't eat at the resort much. We ordered room service
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that we were able to provide you with 5 star service the five nights you were here. We are also very happy that we could bring you to warm weather. We are pleased that your conference was a success and that you enjoyed all the different meals we served. Your experience is very important to us and we cannot wait to welcome you back for business or pleasure.

Summary Heading: Great views, great food, and lots to do
Summary: I was very pleased with my stay. The resort is located a short walking distance to the beach and a lot of great restaurants. It's nice they have bikes ready to hop on and go along with surf boards/boogie boards to use. It is a great place to take a family, there are things to do for everyone! The spa is beautiful and the food and service is wonderful.  I would definitely visit again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you were able to enjoy our bikes and surf boards when you visited. It truly is nice to be so close to the beach and have access to riding paths all along Dana Point. We look forward to having you return and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Incredible Location; Great for Active Travelers
Summary: We stayed here for one night, but we definitely got more than our money's worth. The resort's location on top of a high hill with sweeping views of the ocean and coast is incredible. We loved all of the options for being active. Yoga in the park that is literally in the front yard of the resort, bike rentals, state-of-the-art fitness center, etc. The spa is very nice and the facial I had there was one of the best I've ever had. You can tell this property does a great job of hiring the right people. Although we didn't have dinner at the on site restaurant, we did love its breakfast buffet. It seems like every seat in the restaurant has an amazing water view. Our room was clean and definitely met our semi-high standards. We will be back the next time we're in Dana Point. That's
Manager Response: none

Summary: Despite being to the area many times before, I had no idea this place existed.  We did a couples get-away while the kids were with the grandparents and the Laguna Cliffs was perfect.  To begin, the price is really reasonable for the quality of the room and the resort.  The staff was extremely friendly, everyone from the valet to the lady at breakfast was obviously committed to customer service.  I am almost hesitant to write this review as I want this place to remain a secret.  I had to work the next day but my wife went to the spa for a massage and she was impressed with every aspect of it. I am 100% satisfied and will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are so delighted to hear that you discovered this perfect ‚Äúgem‚Äù for a couples get-away and we couldn‚Äôt be happier to hear that your stay was perfect from beginning to end. We appreciate your fine compliments and will be sure to share them with our staff. We hope you and your wife join us for a couple‚Äôs massage the next time you visit. We look forward to welcoming you back. See you soon.

Summary: Just stayed there 4 nights for a conference.  What a beautiful place!  Excellent service, comfy beds and a great resort view too!  Close to many attractions including a beach, whale watching and many charming towns.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We hope you had a successful conference! Thank you for the wonderful compliments. We hope you visit us again for business or pleasure in the near future. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This property is nice and the room was fresh.  Nice check in and bartenders/bar nice. But the multiple other service level failures I had (and reported) while staying are leaving me completely dumbfounded and frustrated even though I am already gone from there.  There was a mini bar charge on my folio and I never even opened the mini bar.  Did a manual count and there was nothing missing.  huh?  in their defense the charge was removed but I always wonder how many don't catch these false charges.  I sent myself a fedex package for a work meeting in CA which was confirmed signed for and delivered.  I called the "At your service" on the phone and asked for it to be delivered to my room.  They found it and said it would be delivered to room right away.  Waited 30 minutes and called
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We deeply regret that your shipping and delivery experience was bad at the resort. We clearly missed the mark and we apologize for the frustration and inconvenience we caused you. We work with many companies, business travelers and  leisure guests and we completely understand the importance of deadlines and urgent matters and we do not take these matters lightly. We will share your concerns and frustrations with our team again to ensure that this does not occur again in the future. We hope you see this incident as an exception and not the norm for Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We pride ourselves in the high level of service and attention to detail  we provide our guests and this is definitely not an acceptable standard. Thank you again for sharing your experience with us.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights and were very impressed.  This hotel was a splurge for us, so we waited until we found a good deal that included the resort and parking fees.  We felt that we received a great value for the price.  The location is fantastic - up high on the cliffs, next to Lantern Bay park, with beautiful views all around.  We asked for a quiet room, and were given a very comfortable, peaceful, 3rd floor, pool-facing room in the northernmost wing of the hotel - well away from the family pool and children's facilities to the south.  The customer service was excellent, the grounds were well maintained, there's a really good gym on site and wonderful running and hiking right from the hotel.  Valet took our car when we arrived, and we didn't drive again until after we
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and congratulations on your marriage. We are delighted to hear that you spend part of your honeymoon with us. We love celebrating special occasions with our guest and we are happy that we made your honeymoon memorable. We hope you visit us again. We‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Great family hotel with excellent amenities
Summary: We stayed for 3 days/nights, arriving on Christmas Day. The staff was very warm and welcoming, from the valet to the bellman to the check-in staff.  We had two connecting rooms, one double and one king, which were generous in size with full size showers (no bathtub).  We decided not to pay extra for an ocean view room, so we faced the tennis courts. The rooms were very quiet and the beds had pillow tops and were very comfortable.  There are 2 pool areas, one geared more for children. Both were well maintained with beautiful views.  We enjoyed the buffet breakfast in the morning, and the jazz band playing in the lounge in the evening. We also used the bikes and the fitness center.  Be aware of the fees, both for parking and the services fee, but since were one family in 2 rooms
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you and your family thoroughly enjoyed your stay with us. We are pleased that you were able to enjoy all the amenities the Resort offers including the complimentary bike rental. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and we hope you and your family visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Some Places want to be more then they are.
Summary: Don't get me wrong this is a nice hotel, but I have to say it really nickle and dime you and at the same time try to say it's a high end resort.  I believe they lie about their true rates and I think the State Attorney General should look at hotel practices and make them change their bait and switch tactics.. Let me give you a couple of examples. This is one of those hotels that post a rate and then say you have have to pay a $25 "resort: fee in the middle of winter when many of them are not usable.  Then they have the only parking lot in the area so they also charge you $32 for that too.. they are not in the middle of LA or NYC... so a rate you think you are paying you need to add an additional $57 on to.  Also during the winter they don't even open their main restaurant.    I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize if you were unaware of the valet only service and resort fees. For the guest‚Äôs convenience, we clearly state that we provide valet service only on our website. We also state all of the fees on our website as well as the confirmation e-mail. We want to be sure our guests are aware of all of our fees prior to booking. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fee rates and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  Thank you again for your review.

Summary: Surprised my children for Xmas and we went and had a fabulous time.   The entire staff was excellent from Aldo when I called the week before to Brian at check in to Kaitlin in the coffee bar.  The valets were wonderful as well and always so pleasant and accommodating.   It was expensive (for wifi, resort fee, valet, etc.)  but worth every penny...for the exceptional experience we had.   Hope to return in 2015!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful time at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa during Christmas. We appreciate your compliments and we will definitely share it with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back in 2015!

Summary: What a great place to spend Christmas.  This hotel is first class with great service from all the staff!!  My family (4 adults) and I stayed 6 nights over Christmas week.  We were looking for a place to ease back and enjoy the holidays and have some nice weather.  Even though the locals kept complaining about the cold, we enjoyed each day and ate on the patio for breakfast and dinner several times.  Perched high above the Dana Point harbor, the view is awesome and the walk down to the harbor or the beach is no problem.  The walk back up is a little more work :-)  The food in the Vue and OverVue restaurant/bar was great and enough variety to mix it up.  Valet parking only, but the team that parks and retrieves the cars were great and fast.  Didn't use the SPA or the pools, but
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I spent a weekend here at the end of November. The hotel property is absolutely beautiful. We found a great hotel rate since it was late in the season, but were a little surprised by the resort fees for all of the activities we COULD have used if it was summertime, but wouldn't be needing at the end of November. It would be nice if hotels made the resort fees optional. If you are there for just a nice place to sleep, but don't need the boogie boards, yoga matts, etc, why should you have to pay for that.   Parking is valet only, and that adds another cost. Still it was a beautiful hotel with comfortable bed, bedding, and pillows. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed over Christmas at the beginning of our honeymoon and this place was excellent! beautiful resort, awesome access to the harbor, and wonderful people (especially Susan :); we received amazing chocolate covered strawberries and champagne to celebrate ! Loved this place! it was all around an amazing experience !!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and congratulations on your marriage. We are delighted to hear that you spend part of your honeymoon with us. We love celebrating special occasions with our guest and we are happy that we made your honeymoon memorable. We hope you visit us again. We‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary: This is a beautiful property, no doubt. Well maintained, well staffed. Comfortable rooms etc... But I have grown tired of being nickel and dimmed at resorts. You find a hotel on line, like the rate and reviews. Then you find, there's a resort fee, a very expensive valet parking fee ( no other options) but a tourism tax. Then a go cup of coffee ( just plain coffee) is $4.00  Hotel room need to start doing what airline now do, here is your rate including taxes.this place went from $179 to over $229. Just charge the rate!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments regarding our beautiful property and comfortable rooms. We appreciate your feedback and would like to inform you that we clearly state all of our fees on all websites, including third party sites. We also list all of our fees on your confirmation e-mail. We want our guests to be completely aware of all fees upfront prior to booking. We appreciate you sharing your ideas with us and will definitely relay it with our management team. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: The Laguna Cliffs Marriott is certainly an elegant hotel.  The public areas are magnificent. The staff is constantly at the ready to help ‚Äì and they great you at every turn.  The rooms are really ‚Äòso so‚Äô. Our room on the third floor has no balcony, four small windows (one of which will not open), and the room size is smaller than what one would expect at a hotel like this.  We have tried the restaurants, and they are OK with no outstanding dishes, but certainly high prices.  The mandatory resort fee is exorbitant.  The same could be said for the valet parking (mandatory) (is it 38$/night?).
