On the bright side, the Internet is included in the ‚Äòresort fee‚Äô (the only useful thing that is included ‚Äì we passed up the yoga mats and other items that are unlikely to be attractive to
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments regarding the elegance and helpful staff at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are happy to hear that our staff made you feel right at home and that you found the city of Dana Point to be worthwhile.  We regret that you found the valet parking and resort fees to be unreasonable. After conducting many surveys of other properties along the coast, we have found our resort and valet fees to be more economical than the others. Our guests take full advantage for the complimentary Wi-Fi as well as the complimentary activity rentals that we provide including; bike rentals, surfboard rentals, bocce balls, etc. Thank you again for your review. We appreciate your feedback and will take your suggestions into consideration.

Summary: A picture perfect location overlooking the harbor and ocean vista!  My room had been newly renovated.  Very lovely and comfortable.  The down comforter and pillow-top mattressr were awesome.   For me it is all about quality bedding and a good night sleep. The Christmas lights and activities at the harbor were an added bonus. I will definitely be returning.  Only down side:  fees, fees, fees!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We understand the importance of a good night‚Äôs rest and we are delighted to hear that you slept comfortably. We love the IlluminOcean light festival in the harbor as well and we appreciate all of your compliments. We cannot wait for your return visit.

Summary: This is a nice place, but the fees are remarkable. There is a hefty "Resort Fee" as well as a $32 daily valet charge, which significantly adds to the quoted price. I am very disappointed at the service received by the Front Desk, and by the in-house reservations department. I haven't been given the run-around like this by Marriott ever before. I had a few simple questions, and got passed around, asked to call back, and promised return calls that never came. I have cancelled my reservation, and will not stay at this property again. I have stayed here several times in the past, and never had these issues before. (They couldn't even find my reservation, even though I had the confirmation number and the auto-generated email from them) Marriott.com showed a price over 6 nights of
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We regret that you experienced some difficulties trying to make a reservations with us. Your opinion is extremely important to us and we are sorry that you had to cancel your reservation because of the issues you experienced with the nightly price of your stay. We certainly do not want you to disappoint you. We understand your loyalty to Marriott and our resort in particular and we want to thank you for that. Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests and we hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule.

Summary: I spent three nights here for a work event. I want to come back when I can really enjoy this hotel. Smooth check in. When asked if two double beds were OK, I said that I'd prefer a king - not being snooty or demanding. I'd be OK with two doubles, but really would prefer a king. So, I got upgraded to a king with a partial ocean view at no extra charge. The partial ocean view was a full view in my book. The room was a tiny bit tired, but absolutely OK and the view was wonderful. Overlooking the pool and very much an ocean view. Small balcony with a sliding glass door that stayed open most of the (limited) time I was in my room.  Marriott's support of our three day event was great. I wasn't involved in the setup or management of their services, so I don't know how smooth things
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that our staff was able to upgrade you to a beautiful ocean-view king room. We are happy to hear that your business event was a success and that our team executed the meeting seamlessly. We look forward to having you back for a vacation so you can see and use all of the resorts amenities and we look forward to having you here next month.

Summary: You know (usually) what you are going to get with the Marriott brand. That's comforting when you're booking in for a special occasion such as Thanksgiving. We called ahead and asked for an early check in. They said no guarantee but come around 1pm. We did and we were checked in. We loved that. The hotel staff were delightful even though it was Thanksgiving and they were probably missing their families, you would never have known it.   We got to the room and had time to walk round and then admire the balcony view when we received a call to check we were happy with room. My partner was impressed with their care.   That care ran throughout our stay. Just the one day but it was always there. The thanksgiving buffet was superb as was breakfast.   The grouns are really beautiful with
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy that we were able to accommodate an early check-in for you. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff service and we want you to know that we truly do care about making you feel right at home every day of the week, holiday or not. We cannot wait to welcome you back.

Summary: The location is beautiful, right across from the beach, still need to cross a major street but it is walkable.  Right outside of the hotel grounds in the park there is Yoga in the Park tuesday and thursday mornings and what an incredible class and experience.  Probably one of the most memorable classes I have ever done...and I'm a yoga instructor so I have done lots!!  The hotel itself is starting to show its age, its a very pretty resort, but the beds are creaky and the rooms are kinda smelly.  WE just found the lack of parking options, paying exorbent fees for parking and resort fees was way too much considering its one of the more expensive hotels in the area to begin with.   Kids had a great time in the pools and we enjoyed ourselves.   We stayed a week, and were a little
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We‚Äôre very happy to hear that the Yoga class in the park was one of the most memorable classes you have ever taken. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We deeply regret that our staff was not able to upgrade your room. We would be more than happy to upgrade our guests if we have the availability. Unfortunately, that is not the case all the time if we have high occupancy levels. We apologize if you felt that our front desk staff was condescending in any way. Your comfort is extremely important to us and we will be sure to share your concerns with our team. Our staff is recognized for their professionalism and their kindness to our guests. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We do hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: Coming to this place since 20O0. Having witnessed several chances. IT IS NOW A NON SMOKING RESORT.That's great! The Spa is only for Elite Members,but if you have no treatment and just use the facility the Relaxation room is still Tabu! Under the health aspect this is a bit confusing.. HANDICAPPED PARKING IS NOT FREE LIKE IN OTHER Hotels. It is very inconvenient to have vale PARKING as disabled person.  You need to rush to get in the car what is kind of stressing. They have some disabled spots. They are all the time blocked by a chain.
Manager Response: none

Summary: A beautiful facility situated at the top of a hill overlooking the Dana Point harbor and coastline.   Staff was particularly friendly and helpful.  I'll highlight three instances:  1) I called front desk for a rollaway bed for one of my sons, and was told that the loveseat in the room was a sleeper sofa.  They sent someone up to make up the bed, and it was perfect.  It saved us the rollaway bed fee of $20 per night.  2) At the lounge, where one can purchase Starbucks coffee and various items for breakfast, I worked up the nerve to ask for a real cup & saucer for my hot tea. (You tea drinkers know what I'm talking about here.)  The lady at the counter brought out a generously-sized teacup & saucer, and told me that I could get a free second cup, since it didn't hold as much as
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and detailed stay. We appreciate all the wonderful compliments and we are happy to hear that you had a great experience with us. We cannot wait to ‚Äúwow‚Äù you again! We look forward to having you back.

Summary Heading: While location is great, service lacks
Summary: The disappointment started with check in. One host struggled for 15 minutes to check in the couple ahead of us before someone else finally offered to help. The other 5 people milling out must have been too busy watching the ocean evaporate. We had also called DAYS in advance to confirm a pack and play and minifridge to store milk for our 2 year old. Upon getting to our newly refurbished room with a partial lovely view of the ocean, we discovered NO crib and NO minifridge. An hour and several phone calls later, the only person working on the entire property  showed up singlehandedly pushing a fridge and a pack and play.   Thankfully, they sent a birthday treat of champagne and strawberries to enjoy in the dark while little baby slept. Why they didn't bring it sooner simply defies
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to take a moment to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced both at check-in and after. We understand the urgency  of having the crib and mini-fridge inside your room when you are taking care of a 2 year-old. We also apologize that you had trouble getting some help with renting the bikes. Our staff is very well trained and knowledgeable about the equipment at the resort and we deeply regret that you had to wait around to find someone with an answer. We will definitely share your feedback with our team. In regards to the ants in your room, unfortunately during the warm season and on  rare occasions, they find their way to our resort, but we can assure you that our team can help with this immediately. We again apologize for the inconvenience.

Summary Heading: The view is worth every penny!!
Summary: Amazing hotel with an unbelievable view from every room! Gorgeous rooms with ultra comfy beds! Very clean and the staff is super friendly. I had my wedding there - November 1st 2014 and it was spectacular- brick view area is the best! Everything is top notch!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Accommodating-They Want to Get it Right-Though fees on top of fees!
Summary: Summary  I gave five stars, despite systemic billing issues that made my stomach sink and that I experienced, too, because the property is amazing, staff were friendly, and everyone was accommodating and supervisors went out of their way to make up for errors and miscommunications.  We were looking for a calm, easy going resort with spa, gym, onsite food and drink, and family activities.  The Marriott met and exceeded our expectations and requirements.  I booked our stayed for a party of six, four adults, one young adult and 14-year-old daughter.  I came across the negative reviews after booking and had some anxiety before coming to the property, and I was turned off by what I consider to be defensive responses by management to critical reviews.  While en route to the property I
Manager Response: Mark, we are delighted that you visited the resort for the first time and experienced 5 star service. We apologize for the errors that were made on your bill, we know that can cause a scare and an inconvenience to you and your family. We appreciate your patience as we corrected the mistakes. Thank you for sharing your stay with us in detail, we enjoy hearing about our guest's activities and what they enjoyed doing during their visit. We appreciate your feedback on the day use spa fee and will share this with our team. We are happy that your entire family was able to enjoy the spa facilities for the day. We look forward to welcoming you all back and appreciate your feedback and review. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Wow, so beautiful, the grounds, the location, beach at walking distance, plenty of paths around to enjoy the beautiful view. You can enjoy the sun set from the hotel terrace, and have dinner at the same spot after. The service every where was great, everyone was very polite and making an effort for the guests to have a good time and to enjoy this beautiful facitility. The rooms were spacious, nicely decorated, ours had a balcony with a view of the water, very nice. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and recommendation. We are happy to hear that our staff made a memorable experience for you during your stay with us. We appreciate all your wonderful compliments and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: I have been to this hotel many times and I am never disappointed . It's location in Dana Point above the harbor is just perfect. The hotel is a very good standard Marriott hotel the beds being ultra comfortable . It had a lovely outside pool and a starbucks in the reception area. Decent gym if you want it and many other facilities including a spa. It is not cheap to stay or eat and drink here. Even starbucks has a healthy increase in prices. Parking is by valet only and very expensive . Nonetheless I will be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your loyalty to the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We truly appreciate your business and we cannot be more delighted to hear that your stay is pleasant every time you visit. We cannot wait to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: A nice mix of pleasure with business!
Summary: The hotel property is very nice and relaxing.  The rooms are a little tired and could use some updating.  The staff was very nice and attentive.  The food served in out meetings was fine, not spectacular.  There was a $100 mistake on my bill, as I was charged for valet parking and didn't have a car with me.  It was fixed without any issues as I was checking out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you had a nice business/leisure stay with us. Thank you for your feedback and we are happy to hear that your parking fee was adjusted. We hope you visit us again for business or pleasure.

Summary: First and foremost, this is a resort property. If you are not comfortable paying resort fees and valet parking, you might want to choose another location. The property also does not have a club lounge so Marriott gold and platinum members will miss out on this perk including free breakfast. If you want to try something other than the onsite restaurant, Stacks pancake house is within walking distance and a solid option. The resort itself has a great theme, location and views. Just enjoy the setting, relax and have a good time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your compliments and we look forward to having you back in the near future.

Summary: I decided to spend a special birthday celebration in a city that I once lived, but hadn't been back to in many years.  The Laguna Cliffs Marriott resort and spa in Dana Point was the ideal place to spend my two days. The resort is quite large and grounds are expansive.  We were greeted by a very friendly staff and when they found out it was a special birthday we were upgraded to an ocean view room and sent a bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries from the extremely thoughtful staff. The room was large and clean and had the most comfortable bed I've ever slept in anywhere! The balcony was a wonderful place to have coffee in the morning and to watch the sunset in the evening.  Breakfast was included in our room rate, and the buffet was varied, plentiful and
Manager Response: Happy Birthday! We are delighted that you spent your birthday with us at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are delighted to hear that your room was upgraded and that you enjoyed your surprise amenity from the resort. We are happy to hear that you had a very comfortable sleep in our beds and that you enjoyed the views from your guest room. We appreciate your recommendation and we look forward to having you return to Laguna Cliffs.

Summary: I was at this resort for a business meeting.  It is in a good location, near the beach.  However the hotel does nickel and dime you, but I guess that is expected for a resort.  The hotel charges a resort fee of $25 per night over and above what ever room rate you are paying.  There is no self parking so your only choice is valet which is $32 per night with in and out prevlidges.  But that is with most hotels in cailfornia where there is a parking charge.  Room was clean and nice size.  Housekeeping does turndown service, but has to be requested and amazingly no additional charge.  Hotel Internet connection can be iffy, keep loosing connection and IP address from their wifi access point, their tech people couldn't figure out why there was issues
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that your business meeting was a success. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate your compliments regarding our guest rooms. We do apologize for any Wi-Fi issues you experienced during your stay with us. We are surprised that you had some issues and we are glad to hear that our IT Manager was available to assist. We know that can be frustrating. Thank you again for your review and we hope you visit us again for business or pleasure.

Summary Heading: Beware of staying at this hotel.
Summary: I stayed here for a wedding in late October, I will say that until checkout everything was pretty nice.  A bit annoying that there is no parking and you have to valet ($30), but whatever I knew that going in.  Upon checking out I noticed a $250 fee added on my room, so I contacted the operator and was transferred over to the hotel manager.  She (I wish I could remember her name) informed me that the charge was for smoking on my hotel patio.  She goes on to tell me that I was warned three times for smoking on the patio.  Simply false, nobody ever mentioned anything to me about smoking, one big reason for this?  My wife and I do not smoke.  I should point out that security did talk to me more than once for noise (I had a bluetooth speaker in the room), so I believe this is why the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to take a moment to apologize for any inconvenience experienced with our staff during your stay with us.  We are aware that you were addressed in person, on multiple occasions for smoking, and our resort is a non-smoking resort and the policy stands firm for every guest. We abide by these rules as they are instilled by Marriott. We appreciate your understanding.

Summary Heading: Not what I was used to for a Marriott
Summary: Just leaving the hotel after a two night business meeting. First impression? Desk asks us if we are checking out. No, we are checking in. Forgot to give us a minibar key so back to desk for that. Message blinking on phone but no instructions or button to recover the message without dialing zero that no one answered until second call. Very comfortable beds. I like to sleep with sliding door open for fresh air but no way to turn off heat or air control. Main Bathroom light goes out with a timer. Ugg! It was annoying when I was laying in the bathtub in the dark. Asked the consierge about a dinner we had scheduled if it was plated or Buffet and she took my name and number to let me know but never bothered to call. The workout facility was adequate but there was no way to wipe down
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to start off by saying we apologize for the consistent mishaps during your stay with us. We value your opinion and take your review very seriously. We do want you to know that we will be addressing your concerns with our team to insure that this does not happen again. We do want to assure you that our air conditioning units can be manually adjusted and we apologize if you were not able to adjust the setting. Please know that our At Your Service department is available 24 hours a day to contact someone should you have difficulty with the unit. We also provide the minibar key upon request only. In regards to the fitness center, we do provide towels to wipe down the machines and we do have attendants that clean the machines on a continuous basis. Thank you again for your review and for bringing your concerns to our attention.

Summary: relaxing stay in the heart of Southern California.  This is a beautiful property, though not on the sand the views are stunning.   Decent size rooms/everything u need plus mini bar except our room only had 7 hangers.   Tiny balcony with beautiful ocean/marina view. $32 per day to valet car +Resort fee $25.  Resort fee includes bike rental, yoga mats for the free classes in the park, surf & boogie boards, etc.  Other than parking I think price is really reasonable. Restaurant was only open weekends, there is a lounge that is available -Starbucks bfast, plus lunch & dinner weekdays & weekends in a beautiful patio & lounge.  No executive club lounge because it is a resort property but we received a $10. gift card to use at will.  There is a hertz rental onsite & I rented midsize
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments and summary of your stay with us. We are delighted that you had a relaxing time and we hope you visit us again soon for another exceptional service experience from our attentive team.

Summary: Pros-location is great with fantastic views of the ocean and still close to expressways. Rooms are very nice and up to Marriott Standards. Nice pool and hot tub.  Nice health fitness facility.  Cons-$34 for valet parking and no self parking offered.  Can understand the valet parking because there is not a lot of room to park but $34 a little bit too stiff.  Resort fee is $25 which is becoming the standard at all Marriott resort hotels. Not much you can do about it. Breakfast buffet $24 per person. Save yourself the money and walk to Pancake house down the street for breakfast.  Not direcly on the beach so you have to walk 1/2 mile to beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the pools and the 24 hour fitness center. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  Thank you again for your review. We hope you visit us again the next time you are in the Dana Point area.

Summary Heading: There is SO much they could do better
Summary: The hotel and setting are pretty. You do feel like you are on vacation when you drive up.  Please note that we booked on Priceline and paid much less than another person in our party who booked with the hotel directly. We heard about the extra fees and decided to try Priceline to offset some of those costs and fortunately worked out well.   Our family member who paid full price plus quite a bit more for an upgrade was given an absolutely awful room with no view (the upgrade she paid for was for the view). She was given another room but that also didn't have a view. The third room seemed to be much better and I will give them credit for trying.  The valets are very nice but the mandatory valet parking is annoying. It adds a lot to the cost of you stay if you are here several
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We understand that our team was able to provide a room to your family that was to their liking. We are very disappointed that you found items left in the room from a previous stay. Our housekeeping department does a very thorough cleaning and inspection in every room, every day. Please know that this was an exception and not the norm for what you encountered. We also want you to know that our staff is always willing to help and we regret that you did not get this impression from some of our team members. As you will read from previous reviews, our staff receives great praise for their attentiveness, kindness and willingness to help our guests. We thank you for sharing your experience with us and we will be sure to address your concerns with our team. We do hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: This was our third stay. It continues to meet our expectations of Marriott properties. Most of the rooms even though "resort view" have a partial ocean view. I'm looking at our bill: Fees and taxes came to $45.80 and parking was $32. Unfortunately, no viable self-park options here unless you are willing to hike a ways up/down a steep hill. We continue to prefer Marriott due to consistency - haven't had a bad experience yet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being a loyal Marriott visitor. We are delighted that you‚Äôve stayed with us on multiple occasions and we hope that you continue to do so. We look forward to having you back!

Summary Heading: I love this place but they really nickel and dime you
Summary: Okay so I booked a room for $200 on a hotel site.  Fair price for one person spending about 12 hours in the room total.  I wanted a nice and safe place to stay.   Laguna Cliffs is all this.  But then the extras are tacked on.  Parking: $34.  REALLY $34 is that necessary.  If I was there a few more hours then I would have had a another hotel fee (for maybe using the pool).  I think it was about $15.    Okay that is my major complaining on the hotel.  The view and property are lovely.  The rooms are updated and clean and comfortable.  Although there was no sound on my tv for the standard channels.  So no Fallon or Kimmel that night.  Anyway this place is really nice if money is not object.  But if was my dime, I was on business, I might think about exploring other options.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments and are delighted to hear that your stay was nice. We apologize if you were unaware of the valet service fee and resort fee. For the guest‚Äôs convenience, we clearly state that we provide valet service only on our website. We also state all of the fees on our website as well as the confirmation e-mail so that our guests are aware of all charges prior to booking. We hope that this did not pose an inconvenience to you in any way. Thank you again for your review. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Really struggled on whether to give 3 or 4 stars here. Really I'm at a 3.5. Overall we had a great trip. This hotel is beautiful. Our rooms were pleasant, although we didn't receive the rooms we actually booked. Staff is helpful, albeit snooty. Valet is punctual. Breakfast is plentiful. Fees are incredibly high.   We booked two rooms for three nights using credit card points. Herein lies the problem. If you're not paying the hotel directly, be prepared to get the runaround a bit. We didn't book through Priceline or Hotwire or a cheapo site. We used nearly 400,000 credit card points for the rooms. The same points could get me a week in a 4 star resort in London (have done this...not even comparable in value!!). Points are valuable!! Anyway, I booked 2 rooms more than a month in
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that your trip was overall a great experience. We appreciate your compliments regarding our helpful staff, punctual valet and pleasant room. We appreciate your loyalty to the Marriott brand and we can assure you that we appreciate your business however you book with us. We treat every guest with the utmost respect and we apologize if you received any treatment contrary to that. Your opinion is very important to us and we want you to know that we will share your concerns with our team. We wanted to address your comment about the fees you inquired at the resort.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We again thank you for your business and hope you choose to stay with us in the future.

Summary: I recently stayed at Laguna Cliffs Marriott for a business meeting.  I have to attend several of these meetings throughout the year and this was definitely one of the best.  The rooms are large and comfortable.  The bar and patio area was a great meeting spot with coworkers and the food was amazing.  The meeting rooms were close to the rooms so you did not have to hike very far in the morning.  The park and wharf area are within walking distance.  They gave our group options for entertainment and dining.  The view is amazing and it is in close proximity to Orange County Airport.  I would definitely like to have additional meetings at this location.
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. We hope your meeting was a success and we are delighted to hear that our resort was definitely one of the best. Thank you for your compliments, we cannot wait to welcome you and your team members back for another meeting. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed here as it was the host hotel for a wedding. The first thing I will say is that the hotel and grounds are beautiful. Our room was nice with a little balcony with two chairs and a glimpse of the ocean :). The fact that the park and harbor were  across the street made for a lovely scenic morning run! However, I do have two issues. The first is that on the desk was literature stating that the resort has all these amenities that come with your room.. sorry folks, unless you were paying close attention, that wifi and bike weren't free.. that's what that $25 per day resort charge on your bill is. The second issue is in regards to charges on my bill. We had gone to the pool with other guests and had food and two adult beverages.Our waiter mistakenly put a rather large number of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful ocean and park views from your guest room. We apologize for the inconvenience of the charges made to your room. Our staff is very efficient and prompt and we are happy that your problem was resolved by one of our team members. Thank you for your feedback regarding the resort fee. We clearly state our resort fee on our website and on the confirmation e-mail you receive from us. We regret that you did not see this statement. We never like our guests to be surprised by a fee and therefore state all fees very clearly. Thank you again for your review and we hope that you visit us again the next time you are in Dana Point.

Summary Heading: One of the best Marriott's I've ever stayed at....
Summary: We live local to this property and STILL spend nights here just to unplug, relax at the spa, enjoy the views and drinks at the bar or feast on wonderful gourmet meals.  Ever since they renovated the property and brought in a new top chef, this property easily competes with any of the much more expensive properties along the Southern California Coast.  You'll be happy you stayed here and be looking forward to returning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that your experience at Laguna Cliffs was top notch. Nothing pleases us more than hearing how our local guests enjoy staying with us for rest and relaxation. We look forward to having you visit us again soon.

Summary: we stayed two wonderful nights 3days this resort took exceptional recognition of my birthday unbe known to me cake,bottle of champagne,two breakfasts, staff exceptional valet service excellent,beauty of the surroundings simply beautiful
Manager Response: Happy belated birthday! We are delighted to hear that you celebrated your birthday with us. We are happy to hear that our staff recognized this special day and treated you to some amenities. We hope you enjoyed it. We look forward to having you back in the near future.

Summary: Trying to find a luxurious, convenient and clean hotel in Orange County with reasonable rates is hard to fine.  I was pleasantly surprised when we drove up the driveway.  The welcoming experience from the valet, bellman and Stephanie at registration was of the utmost excellent service.   Iaian our bellman seemed genuinely interested in our plans.  The room was extremely clean.  The balcony with the ocean view was incredible.  No dust on the chairs or railing.  The bathroom smelled fresh and clean.  I loved the room and the bed was heavenly.  The restaurant Vue has a gorgeous view of the ocean and the food is excellent.  My husband and I will be coming back for a mini vacation soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that your experience was superb from your drive up to our friendly valet staff to your check-in process. Our staff‚Äôs genuine care is present from your very first encounter. We appreciate your wonderful compliments and we can‚Äôt wait to welcome you and your husband back for a mini vacation.

Summary: Stayed here for several days.  The good: Rooms were large, clean and well appointed. Feather top beds are very cushy, if you like that sort of stuff. Balcony rooms are especially nice with views of the sea. All staff was friendly and helpful. Concierge was very accommodating. Pool and hot tubs were very nice, including comfortable lounge chairs. Easy bike or walking access to Dana Pt. harbor and nature preserve. The bad: No self parking and valet parking is $35/day. $25/day resort fee (which includes wifi connectivity) is a rip off. Restaurant and bar is expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your compliments regarding our great staff service and the helpfulness of our staff. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area.

Summary: I only stayed 2 nights but it really left a good impression on me. Just driving up the hill to this hotel makes you feel like your approaching a castle. Valet is the only option here but the guys do a really good job. The lobby is large and gives you a very clean, beach, feel.  My room matched everything I had seen around the property. This is NOT one to those hotels that spend all their money on the lobby or everything else but the rooms. My room was large and very clean. All the furnishing, decor, and carpet were spotless and seemed brand new. The price was high but definitely worth what I paid. I had a very comfortable King size bed with high quality linens. I could tell that the sheets were special because the feeling when I laid down was like heaven.   Staying at the Laguna
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. We are delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us. Thank you for your kind compliments regarding our spotless resort and our attentive staff. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the d√©cor of the entire resort from the lobby to the guest rooms. We cannot wait to welcome you back. See you soon.

Summary: Stayed here 4 days in August for business. Hotel nice, clean, pretty pools. Hot tub way too hot. Nice view overlooking water. Bit out of the aw from town however free shuttle is offered to go to town to explore. Downtown area is artsy with terrific restaurants. Can catch the free return back to hotel. We rented a driver to explore nearby areas that shuttle did not go to. Food was buffet and really good considering how many people we were. Overall nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your business trip with us. We hope that it was a successful meeting. We are happy to hear that you were able to take some time and explore Dana Point. We hope you enjoyed  the city as much as we do. We look forward to welcoming you back for business or pleasure the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Usually it takes me a while to get my opinion registered, however wanted to let you know about the park construction going on next door.   First, I would highly recommend this resort. It looks and feels new and I had to ask if it was recently built.  (Apparently, it was renovated more than 10 years ago.) The public spaces are expansive and nicely decorated. There is plenty of light and an overabundance of fountains and marble. It will lift your spirits to be there. The public spaces are situated to overlook the park and the ocean. The room hallways are expansive, brightly decorated and flawless. FYI, the room wing hallway carpet is very well padded and may make it difficult to wheel a heavy roller bag. The service is very good for the price paid.  Reception: The front desk was
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate your compliments and for taking the time to point out the various areas of the resort. We enjoy hearing about what activities are guests took part in and what they recommend. Our resort was renovated about 4 years ago and we thank you for the pointing out the beauty of the landscape and newness of the property. We appreciate your feedback and we would love to welcome you and your wife back for another top notch resort experience.

Summary: This hotel is very clean.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  We enjoyed playing tennis and loved the room service.  The pool was excellent.  I ended up ordering one of the robes like the one in the room because it was so comfortable.  The only issue was when we showed up for our scheduled tennis court time and found the court full of cars from the valet.  The concierge was very apologetic and re-scheduled us.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that our staff was friendly and helpful during your stay with us. We are delighted that you were able to enjoy our two outdoor pools. We couldn‚Äôt agree with your more, the plush robes are extremely soft and you feel relaxed the moment you wear it. We regret that you had to reschedule your tennis match. We hope you had a good game and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: This was our first time to the pacific coast and we selected a Marriott property (tried and true for us). We loved the beautiful property, proximity to beach, pool area, spacious room,and children activities. They played a children's movie in one of the conference rooms and served snacks/popcorn!  Didn't love the lack of suggestions from the concierge, but Google helped us out :)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your loyalty to the Marriott brand and we couldn‚Äôt be happier that you discovered us for the first time. We are a family friendly resort and it delights us to hear that you and your children experienced all the fun activities the resort offers during the summer months. We hope you visit us again soon. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa.

Summary: This is a very nice little get away hotel in Dana point. Nicole is our receptionist , she is beautiful nice and friendly. She tried to get me and my bf into the room that have ocean view and she waives the 25 dollars resort fee for us. What a lovely girl.  The hotel is only 5 minutes walk to the restaurant and shop. We love it here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you and your boyfriend enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your compliments regarding our friendly staff, we will be sure to share your comments with our team. We hope you both visit us again in the near future.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel in Dana Point, CA for a conference.  It is a typically Marriott as far as the hotel goes.  However, the views from the entrance (late 1940's Woody automobile) to the balconies are extraordinary.  I mention the hummingbirds as when I took my morning coffee on my patio, they were there each morning flitting back and forth in the flower garden outside my patio.  Very relaxing, which is what this hotel is all about for guests.  Good location for SoCal and compared to Laguna Beach or Newport Beach, not as packed in the summer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that your experience at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa was extraordinary. We cannot  be happier. We couldn‚Äôt agree with you more, our resort is very tranquil and yet in the heart of Southern California. We look forward to welcoming you back to your ‚ÄúHummingbird Heaven.‚Äù

Summary: What a great place from which to explore Southern California! San Diego just to the south and the heart of Orange County to the north. Arriving at the hotel you drive up a landscaped path befitting of what can be expected in Southern California. On arrival at the Porte Cochere the Valet attendants are more than willing to assist. The lobby is airy and the Front Office staff were more than welcoming. The guestrooms are very casual, with a near beach house feel and ambiance. There is dining available at the hotel, as well as a great pool area. Views from the property can range from garden to ocean. Make use of the bicycle rentals for an even more memorable experience. For those who are not prepared to spend the money for the St. Regis or Montage, this is a perfect alternate.
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your 5 star review and wonderful compliments regarding our attentive staff and our beautiful resort. We thank you for your recommendation and we look forward to having you back for another ‚Äúwow‚Äù experience.

Summary: Staying at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort in Dana Point, CA, and it's a lovely property, but man I'm ticked. There's a problem with my door that they knew about last night and were supposed to fix today. But when I got back from a day filled with meetings not only did they not fix the problem, the cleaning staff failed to close my door and I could push it open without using my key. Thankfully no one came in to steal my computer, wallet, or me but what a lousy and dangerous service failure at a place my hosts are clearly investing quite a bit in for a very special event. I could never recommend a place like this to anyone as it fails to ensure its guests' safety.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to address this issue right away. If you are still concerned about this issue please contact the Front Office Manager. We want to resolve this issue right away and your safety and comfort is of upmost important to us. We can assure you that we take this very seriously. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

Summary Heading: Wedding Weekend with Great Customer Service and Location
Summary: We stayed here over a weekend for a family member‚Äôs wedding. After reading some of the reviews online, I had some reservations, but the hotel and its staff surpassed my expectations. The location of the hotel was excellent. There are views of the harbor and water, but the beach is a short walk from the hotel. For most people this should not be an issue. We were staying with a two-year-old, so we did not walk down to the beach. We spent most of our time at the kid's pool.   The resort has everything you could possibly need on-site, just remember that most of these services are overpriced, for the convenience. The additional nickel-and-dime fees are annoying.  Resort fees ($25/day) and valet parking ($33/day) fees add up fast. Don‚Äôt forget to add those fees to the price of the
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We couldn't agree with you more, our staff will make anything happen and your satisfaction is important to every one of our staff members. Thank you for recognizing their efforts and professionalism. We are delighted that you left with fond memories. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: We stayed here last week, for four days and experienced the absolute best customer service of our entire two week trip, and the three other places were exceptional! Check in was friendly and very efficient (thanks, Nicole!). We'd been driving for a few hours from Santa Barbara, along the coast, and through LA, and were pretty worn out when we arrived, 3 hours before check-in. Nicole worked hard to change things around and get us to a gorgeous room, within minutes. The views of the harbor were stunning, and the room was large, airy, and wonderfully quiet. Nicole later sent a basket of fruit, chocolate, and champagne, welcoming us, after our long car ride. A few days later, we spoke with Jeffrey Knightsbury (sorry, may be Kingsbury), who helped us immensely with an issue too long
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that our outstanding customer service showed in every outlet of the resort. We are happy to hear that your 4 days with us was the most memorable during your two week vacation. We do anticipate our guests‚Äô needs and we are at your service 24 hours a day. Our goal is create a memorable experience for each and every guest. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: the location is great  - although the beach is a walk down the hill and back up again  the views are fabulous and it is lovely to walk out to the park morning or evening and look at the view. This hotel is a big con terence and wedding machine so although the staff were lovely  - having asked for a quiet room I was woken twice dint he night with revelers screaming down the corridor - the water in the bathroom taps stank of sulphur and was slightly off-putting  i also waited in the restaurant for about 20 minutes to be served but the food was good and once noticed the service was quick and pleasant
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your morning and evening walks to Lantern Bay Park. We apologize that some of our guests woke you up in the middle of the night. We can assure you that we want our guests to having nothing but sweet dreams and a good night‚Äôs rest. Unfortunately, sometimes a few loud guests can interrupt that and we are available 24 hours a day to assist you in any way. Our At Your Service department can be of assistance at all times. Thank you for sharing this with us and we appreciate your kind compliments regarding our staff service. We hope you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: This hotel provides everything at your fingertips - a wonderful view, a great spa, a tasty restaurant, a cozy bar, and lots of other amenities.  The service from all areas of the hotel was terrific.  You will fall in love with the hotel and with Dana Point.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful getaway and fell in love with Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We appreciate your kind compliments and we look forward to having you back.

Summary Heading: Fantastic start to our amazing holiday.
Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights at the start of our USA West Coast Road Trip in July 2014. We arrived about 8pm and checked in with no problems and a friendly reception. The hotel was immediately impressive and our double ocean view room on the first floor was well presented, good size and immaculate. The beds were comfy and all round, everything you would expect of a Marriott. Gorgeous pool and grounds with relaxing atmosphere. The gym was good but could benefit from some heavier free weights. The location is excellent, private, quiet and only a short walk to the harbour and also local shops and restaurants. Would highly recommend this hotel. Only warning would be the resort fee / valet parking charges which are compulsory.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that we made your first impression of Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa and the West Coast, a memorable one. We appreciate your kind compliments regarding our attentive staff and our immaculate rooms. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed all the amenities that Laguna Cliffs has to offer. We thank you for your recommendation and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future. We hope the rest of your road trip was pleasant and beautiful.

Summary: This is a great Marriot, located up a cliff overlooking the ocean the views are pleasant. Stayed for business but could have been here with family as well. Service is first class, food quality (even buffet style) is really good, above average vs other chain hotels.  My room was spacious and very clean, comfortable bed and had a partial but good view of the ocean.  You can get here by taxi , it is a 30 min or so ride in carpool lane down 405 from John Wayne Orange County airport.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel. Stunning area and views. Great service. Clean. So wonderfully located. The only drawback is that you HAVE TO Valet park your car @ 32.00 a day. No self-park lot, no overnight parking on the street.  Valet service on two occasions had us waiting up to 1/2 hour for our car. Shameful service with no offered compensation. And when taking your car in and out, you have to tip over and over again. What???.... but the rest of the hotel was stellar.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stayed with us. We regret that your wait time to retrieve your car was long. We apologize for the inconvenience. Our valet staff works very hard to get vehicles to their owners in a timely manner, however, on rare occasions, there may be a longer wait time due to the volume of guests coming in and out of the resort. We appreciate your compliments regarding our great service and we look forward to having you back.

Summary: I have stayed at this property several times. It is in a great location and has excellent views of Dana Point Harbor. Typically the staff is very professional and attentive. During my recent stay the pool staff seemed stressed out and distracted; it was difficult to get service. The property and pool area needs some attention and updating (deep cleaning, concrete repair, painting, numerous pool chairs with straps broken).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you are a frequent visitor and we appreciate your loyalty. We regret that you did not have the excellent service that you typically encounter during your visits to Laguna Cliffs. We will be sure to share your feedback with our team as it is important to us that every guest is completely satisfied with the service levels of our staff. We hope that you look at this incident as an exception and not the rule. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: First, the bright spots: The building and grounds are beautiful. The concierge was great. We dealt with two women and both were fabulous. The breakfast was delicious and not that expensive. And the servers at breakfast were very nice and very helpful. The valet is very good.  Next, the not-so-bright spots: The room was ok and clean. There are two pools and they are ok. One is very noisy with kids and the other is much quieter. So, at least that is a good feature. Except you have to walk a lot to get anywhere.  Last, the poor spots: Access to the beach is not user-friendly. The hotel provides no service or help with regards to the beach.  The remaining hotel service is not good. At check-in, the person was friendly and seemed helpful. A couple of days later, I asked for change to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you found the resort to be beautiful and our staff to be friendly and helpful. We appreciate your compliments regarding our valet service and our servers. We regret that you encountered an odd experience with our front desk team. We can assure you that they are at your service 24 hours a day and our team is extremely professional and helpful. We thank you again for your review and appreciate your feedback.

Summary: Just returned from a 4 day conference held here. The property is gorgeous with beautiful views of the ocean. We happened to meet the executive chef while having drinks who was quite courteous and informative. The appetizers were exceptional-must try the short rib sliders. The desserts were fabulous too. We also ate the breakfast buffet which was delicious. We all decided that we would return to the hotel (need to save up some $$$$ first :). One recommendation-upgrade the beds, We all agreed they could use new mattresses.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Overpriced first of all, and no water available in the rooms.  The Vue was pricey and the buffet was not worth it.  $5 for coffee is such a rip.  Also, the last morning we were there, the city was chopping down trees and made a lot of noise.  I called the front desk and they told me they can't do anything about it because it's the city.  However, can't the hotel at least warn us that the city would be making this noise early in the morning so we can be ready for it and go to bed earlier the night before?
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and your opinion is very important to us. We apologize for the loud noise in the park that disturbed you during your stay. The resort did not know that the noise would cause an inconvenience to our guests in any way. We definitely notify our guests if we are aware of any issues that may be of any disturbance. We appreciate your understanding.

Summary Heading: Excellent, if you can afford it and ok w large hotel ambiance.
Summary: Great for a wedding celebration weekend.  Full service, responsive pleasant employees, comfortable rooms, well-furnished, resort fee of $25/day and parking ($32+/day) not included in room price but includes wi-fi; expensive for those not used to $300+/night.  The place is big, the lobby floor noisy when accommodating many people, but rooms are well-insulated from noise.  Easy access to state park beach--walk there you can, or drive (parking $15 if you don't have a CA state park pass).  No shuttle from Longbeach Airport (50 miles), John Wayne airport closest one (22 miles).
Manager Response: none

Summary: Even though this hotel is minutes away from my home, my family has many uses for it. On the 4th of July it is a walk up from the water fights that go on in the Dana Point Harbor. A cliff side seat with music and popcorn and you have view of the city, harbor, Catalina, and beyond on a clear day. There are several pools & spa, towels waiting for you and food served on the weekends outside.  The rooms are clean and crisp with a nautical theme. Room service is not too bad.  The inside bar/restaurant serves drinks and tapas. The spa menu is full of great treatments to enjoy, including a gym and tennis courts. Parking is kinda of a pain, but just valet it and forget about it. Excellent location for a wedding. Plenty to do and look at in the area for guests. It is adjacent to a
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Property Needs a Deep Clean! Management needs to wake up!
Summary: We stayed one night because my husband had a business conference here. There were some nice positives: Warmly greeted by the valet and they quickly took our bags. The front desk was friendly and told us we'd been upgraded to a bigger room with a pool/ocean view. The room was quiet and slightly larger than we had expected with two sliding doors opening out to the pool. The conference area was adequate and clean. The hotel is beautifully perched on a cliff overlooking the ocean and there are great views from the restaurant, pool and bar. It's in a good location for exploring Dana Point. With it's full service spa, the Laguna Cliffs is a good alternative to the other VERY pricey hotels in the area.   The negatives: While our room was clean, most of the furniture is worn with nicks
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you stayed with us for a business conference and were able to experience our resort and friendly staff. We want to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced due to the maintenance issues you described.  Our staff is extremely conscientious and attention to detail is critical. We want you to know that this is definitely an exception and not the norm for Laguna Cliffs. We will be sure to share your experience with our team to ensure these issues are addressed immediately and corrected as necessary. As I‚Äôm sure you are aware, we take great pride in providing a high level of service and quality to our guests and we were truly sorry to hear of these shortfalls which in turn put a damper on your stay. We certainly hope you'll reconsider giving Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa another opportunity in the future to restore your faith.

Summary Heading: Good choice for a stay in the area
Summary: Spread out on a slope above Dana Point Harbor, many of the hotel's rooms afford beautiful views over the yacht harbor and the coast line. Check-in was quick with staff from front desk, valet, bell captain station, and pool side without exception aiming to please.   Our carpeted room #146 was a rather long walk from the lobby. Being at ground level, one level down from the lobby it came with a veranda with two chairs and a lounge chaise. Facing southwest, we were treated to a glorious California sunset sky each evening. The room was clean, the carpet spotless, and the king bed comfortable. Something we had never seen in any hotel of any star class, pillow cases were by far too small, causing pillows to stick out some 6-8 inches. The bath with shower curtain tub somewhat dated the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your kind feedback! We certainly appreciate your 4 Star Review and are happy to hear that your enjoyed your stay with us as well as the beautiful sunsets each evening! We also appreciate your kind remarks regarding our Front Desk staff being quick and aiming to please as well as the great comments regarding your In-Room Dining experience.  We‚Äôll be sure to share this with our associates. We  also appreciate your constructive comments regarding your guestroom and will be reviewing this with our Director of Housekeeping. We look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable trip in the near future.  Also, please don't hesitate to mention to the Front Desk agent that you‚Äôd prefer a room closer to the Lobby and they‚Äôll do their very best to accommodate.

Summary Heading: Charming Resort, on a cliff over Dana Point
Summary: Its a great resort for a romantic getaway, with out kids. Good walking trails down to get a closer look of the harbor, but no beach access. Weve stayed here many times over the last 16 years, and always are treated nicely.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 16 years of patronage to our Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa!  We are delighted to hear that you've found our resort to be a great "getaway" and will look forward to welcoming you back soon.  We're glad you're enjoying Dana Point Harbor and would like to recommend for direct beach access to please visit the famous "Doheny State Beach".  It is located directly across from our front entrance, off Dana Point Harbor Drive.  http://www.dohenystatebeach.org/

Summary Heading: Wonderful stay saved by extraordinary service
Summary: As I got closer to the hotel, I had this sudden realization that I didn't recall receiving a confirmation reminder from Marriott.  When I pulled over to check my account, I realized that I did not actually have a reservation!  There is something about the Marriott website that sometimes tricks me -- I reach what is the second to last page of their reservation system and think I've completed the application.  I thought I had cured myself of this habit, but hadn't been making many Marriott reservations recently.  Since I was so close to the hotel, I decided just to show up and explain my plight.  I was entirely honest that it was my own fault.  I could not have been greeted more graciously by the amazing Lu -- she's primarily the concierge, but sometimes works at the front desk.
Manager Response: Thank you for the WONDERFUL review!  We are so appreciative of your kind feedback regarding our associate's proactive service and will be sure to share your comments with her.  We are so happy to hear that you and your niece had such a memorable stay with us and will look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: Everything is great about this property except the parking. They don't have enough parking and you must pay valet fees that are high. We had long waits for our car. Also the resort fees are excessive. But it's a nice place with great views.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback!  We're happy to hear you enjoyed our resort and its beautiful ocean views.  We apologize for any challenges you encountered due to delays while retrieving your car from valet.  Please be assured our parking structure can accommodate all our resort's parking needs; however, we will be sure to share your feedback with our Valet team to ensure they take corrective action where necessary.  We will look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary Heading: Should be called a Courtyard and nit a resort and spa!
Summary: What makes this property  worthy of being called a resort and spa? It is more like a courtyard marriott. Guess they are justifying the daily resort fee. Lobby is clean an has a modern look. Rooms are your basic rooms. Pool is small and beach is a long walk away. So why us it a resort and spa!? In front if the hotel are a handful of bikes,surf boards and biddy boards that what you get for your resort fee. And if you are lucky enough to get room 343 check out the ants all over the shower. The hotel sent at tech to my room who just soared my bathroom with a mystery liquid. Nice. Like I am going to send my kids in their nice. Stay away from this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your constructive feedback.  As you can imagine, a resort's appeal is always open to interpretation and while we hope our resort will meet the majority of our guest's expectactions, we understand it is not always possible.  Many of our guests often compliment us on how our resort and staff exceeded their expectations and we apologize that this was not your experience.  Thank you for your review.

Summary: This resort didn't disappoint. The view was beautiful and you're close enough to the beach, you can make the short walk to the water if you don't mind the uphill return. The rooms are nicely appointed. The food was very good and the balcony is very nice for a nightcap.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review!  We are delighted to hear that your enjoyed your stay with us and we'll look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Summary: We had a lovely room with a balcony that looked out to the water at a distance.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The pool was refreshing. We were disappointed that breakfast was not included since the rates were a little high.  Parking also cost extra but I believe that was due to space constraints.  There were lots of restaurants and other sights nearby either within walking distance or easy driving distance.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us!  Thank you for your complimentary feedback regarding our friendly and helpful staff as well as your guestroom and its view.  For future reference, we often offer room packages that come with breakfast.  Please mention to the reservation agent that you're interested in these packages and they'll be happy to review these options with you.  We'll look forward to welcoming you back again soon!

Summary Heading: A rant on ants and more ants...
Summary: Yes, it is summer but there is just no excuse having ants in our room. Arrived for a dear friend's son's wedding being held at another venue. Unpacked and found ants in the bathroom. Called the front desk and they had someone come up. Not wanting to change suites since we were all unpacked, we went out for a bite and returned back to our room to find ants on the bed and in the sheets. Clearly the problem is in the hotel's laundry. Called the front desk again to have them change the linens and get rid of the ants. Upon our return, the aunts were gone.   The following morning we asked to speak to the manager and requested that they give us some consideration on the room rate. She said she would take 50% off the first night.   Returned to our room at 11:30 am and our room was not
Manager Response: Please accept our sincere apologies for the unfortunate issue you described.  Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests and I hope you will look upon this as an isolated incident.  We take great pride in providing a high level of service and quality to our guests and I can assure you that this is not the norm and has since been corrected by our pest control service.

Summary: On the plus side: excellent breakfast buffet with friendly service, hilltop view of the harbor/marina, well kept grounds, good maid service. Now the minuses: the mandatory resort fee and expensive valet parking were the major drawbacks and will likely result in our not coming back here again although we are loyal Marriott customers. It is irritating to require the fee and then turn around and say that the wifi fees are complimentary. We used none of the items (bikes, boogey boards etc.) included in the resort fee -not a good deal. Would prefer an upfront increased daily charge rather than all the "hidden"  charges which detracted from an otherwise pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your kind feedback. We were delighted to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet, our resorts beautiful ocean and harbor views as well as the service provided by many of our associates.  We also understand that you were disappointed with the additional fees incurred when staying at our resort.  Please be assured we do our very best to clearly inform our guests about these fees prior to arrival by including them on your confirmation e-mail as well as listing them on our website under Guest Services. Thank you again and we will take your constructive feedback under review.

Summary: We spent 2 days and 3 great nights at Laguna cliff. This was a very relaxing stay. All people were very kind and nice with us and the kids. They have all you need to enjoy your stay with the kids ( surfboards, sand toys, boogie boards....). They even are showing a kids cartoon on Saturday night. The restaurant was good and at a reasonable price. You can also walk to several restaurants and also to the beach I definitively recommend this place !
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. We are happy that you and your family enjoyed participating in the complimentary activities the resort provides to its guests. We appreciate your recommendation dn we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: The only good thing avout this place is the proximity to the harbor and the beach. Rooms are dated, a/c is loud and bothersome and the floor plan of the hotel is confusing and ugly.. It's also expensive...
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. We appreciate your feedback. Your opinion is extremely important to us and we will share your comments with our team.

Summary: Another fabulous staycation at Laguna Cliffs Marriott  We lucked out with the gorgeous weather - and with Brandon W.  Brandon helped me get a cabana pool side which was reserved for us until we arrived, a fabulous room next to the pool so we had easy access to our stuff ~ and most of all, he was super nice about it all and seems like he truly enjoys his job.  The staff by the pool look like an ad for Ray Ban ~ super sweet and attentive guys. Food was amazing, their signature drinks on point and they were fast! I didnt have to drink a watered down drink at any point since they kept checking on us.  Rooms clean as always  - a fabulous deal for 250 a night.   The only thing I BEGGGG of you guys is to add more vegan options to the breakfast buffet. Maybe tofu scramble? Or vegan
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are happy to hear that your enjoyed your stay with us and that our staff was efficient and helpful. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff and we appreciate your feedback. Your opinion is extremely important to us and we will be sure to share with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back for another fabulous trip. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Had a great 4 night stay. The staff were friendly and accommodating. Pool's were great and grounds immaculately kept (lots if hummingbirds in hibiscus). Had breakfast on 2 days which was delicious, especially Bradley's omlettes! Only comments were that there is very little hanging space in the bathroom for wet towels etc and that it was quite difficult to pay for drinks on the terrace when in a larger group. All in all though, a great experience!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful 4 night stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and we hope you visit us again in the future for another great experience at Laguna Cliffs.

Summary: Our room was very nice. The hotel was a bit dated and the service was very mediocre. The pool was nice, but on the small side. My son ordered a club sandwich off of the pool menu and it was in a box, cold with what looked like raw bacon. I asked the server when it was made and he told me 3 hours prior to it being served. It was $18.00. I did get him a cooked to order sandwich, but I had to complain.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you were pleased with your guest room. We can assure you that the sandwich your son ordered was not made 3 hours prior to it being served. Our sandwiches are not premade at this resort and we apologize that the information you were given was incorrect. Every order that is made comes out of our kitchen fresh. Our culinary team prepares everything the moment the order is placed not prior. We appreciate your comments and we will be sure to share this information with our team.

Summary: Our stay at the Marriott Laguna Cliffs was a very enjoyable experience. The staff was extremely knowledgable about the area and you were always treated with a smile. The valet staff was extremely friendly and helpful each time we arrived and left. The concierge was soo helpful in planning each day and her recommendations were so helpful. The rooms and hotel were extremely clean the restaurant was great and in the evening was relaxing. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and for your recommendation. Nothing is more satisfying than when our guests recommend our resort and tell us they can‚Äôt wait to come back. We appreciate your compliments regarding our friendly and helpful staff, we will be sure to share your compliments with our team. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: We just stayed at this hotel last weekend.  We initially had a room with a view over the highway which I was not thrilled about - but we were able to get moved to a better room the next day.  The first night there were three weddings going on - each appeared beautiful.  It is a very beautiful location to have a wedding.  Or even just sit on the deck with a drink as the sun sets and watch someone else's wedding going on right below on the property.   Yes, we had to drive different places but that wasn't a problem at all.   The pools were fantastic and the pool staff was equally fantastic.  They were very, very helpful and went out of their way for us.  I really appreciated that kind of customer service.   We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you experienced superb service throughout the entire resort. We couldn‚Äôt agree with you more, the beautiful weddings that take place on the property draw you in and the sunsets are picturesque. We hope you were able to capture these moments, because they truly should be cherished. We  look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: This is the best hidden treasure in CA! Great views of the ocean and beach as well as great accommodations and cuisine. We have been coming here for over 10 years. It has gotten a bit expensive with both required valet parking as well as resort fees! Those fees add up quickly, especially for families.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that we have become your destination getaway year after year. Nothing makes us happier than to see our guests return. Thank you for your wonderful compliments and feedback. We appreciate your loyalty to Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa and we look forward to welcoming you back again next year.

Summary: We love this resort. Very family friendly. The restaurant is great for breakfast but go to the Marina for dinner. Loved the views from our room. We took some wonderful walks along the Marina and Doheny. Two double beds was a bit tight for a family but not a big deal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you loved the resort and the family friendly activities we provide. We hope you visit us again so we can create more memories for you and your family.

Summary: When Vegas got to 115+ for 7 days. We left and came here the resort was great rooms not crazy priced on short notice. We stayed for a week great pools and walking distance to the beach. This is a great family hotel and great bars. You are short drive from everything it was a great a hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us after experiencing hot weather in Las Vegas. We hope that the ocean breeze and cool nights gave you and your family the comfort you needed. Thank you for your lovely compliment regarding our family friendly resort and the convenience of the location to nearby attractions. We are happy that you stayed with us for the first time and we definitely hope it isn‚Äôt your last. We hope to see you and your family again.

Summary: Right on the beach with beautiful views. The buffet breakfast had a huge variety of fresh tasty things. The pool is very family orientated but a clean, nice pool with great service. The room sizes are great. The only negative is the price of daily wifi which was expensive if you were travelling from out of the US or on a business trip. Overall a pleasant trip with excellent service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We are Marriott premiere guests and they gave us a nice upgrade when we arrived. Front desk staff was friendly and efficient. The views from the room were gorgeous, harbor one window, pool the other. The resort fee is $25 and then tack on $32 for mandatory valet. Ouch! During routine times the valet is prompt, but during checkout/checkin you wait and wait... The pool staff is friendly and available, but cocktails are pricey. We did not eat at the resort since there are so many other good and better priced options available locally. The room was clean, well apppointed, and had everything we needed. The bed was a bit soft for my taste; but the pillows were nice, I like mine on the squishy side.We would stay there again, especially since they are pet friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being loyal Marriott Members. We appreciate your business and we thank you for your feedback. Thank you for your compliments regarding our friendly and attentive staff. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the pools during your stay and although we regret you didn‚Äôt dine with us, we are pleased to hear that you found a variety of restaurants that pleased your palate in the harbor. I would like to bring to your attention that we only allow ADA service animals to our resort. We look forward to welcoming you back again. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: This hotel is located on top of a hill with gorgeous view..The problem is that nothing is close to it.  You need a car to go visit in town or go to Laguna Beach. There is a shuttle bus available..but I found not user friendly (need more info and maps at hotel for guests) There are a handful of places to eat in Dana Point one can walk to. The beach is located down the hill and across the road...I would say a brisk 10 min walk.   The bar/lounge could work on faster and more attentive service..The employees were very friendly when you could get served. Again..nice location..great views..but a bit off the beaten track for me.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you stayed with us and found our views to be gorgeous. As you mentioned in  your review, the Dana Point harbor and marina are within walking distance from the resort and there are many shops and restaurants in the harbor. Renting a car is always an option here at the resort and we provide these services directly on our property for all of our guests. We appreciate your feedback and thank you again for your review.

Summary: Laguna cliffs was manicured to perfection - almost too perfect. Service was impeccable if slightly overbearing - particularly the pool staff who were obviously reliant on tips and were intrusive at times. The nearby marina and beaches were excellent and gave a real taste of OC life - good food options in Dana including a fantastic thai, and blue whale watching another highlight.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and found the service to be ‚Äúimpeccable.‚Äù We want you to know that our staff‚Äôs primary goal is to make your stay as comfortable and pleasurable as they can. They truly take care of all guests because they care, not because of any compensation. We are happy to hear that the you experienced the real OC by partaking in some of the outdoor activities that Dana Point has to offer. We look forward to having you back.

Summary: We are planning our wedding at this location. It is set on the hill above the Dana Point Harbor and it is a very beautiful place. The staff is nice. The red roof is modeled after a Cape Cod style which is beautiful. They have updated the grounds but there is some work yet to be done. The drinks have above average names but don't offer the variety I would like to see. I'm looking forward to staying here in a few weeks!
Manager Response: Congratulations on your engagement. We are delighted to hear that your wedding will be at our resort. We thank you for you‚Äôre the wonderful compliments regarding the beautiful grounds and we are sure your wedding will not only be spectacular but memorable as well. We look forward to having you stay with us in a few weeks and if there is anything we can do to make your stay more pleasurable, please do not hesitate to ask. Congratulations again and see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great time  in an excellent resort
