Summary: We spent nearly a week in this supreme resort. We have enjoyed every minute. Nice rooms, excellent service and much comfort all around the resort.  The breakfast buffet was topclass and for every other meal or for drinks it was also a pleasure to be in the restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that we were your home away from home for one week. We are happy that you enjoyed every minute of your stay with us. We hope we created lasting memories and we do hope you visit us again the next time you are in California. We would love to welcome you back.

Summary: Very nice stay at this hotel which is ideally located. Room are nice and clean. Lots of very nice and fresh options for breakfast. Recommend you look for a room with a view towards the harbour and the sea. Definitely a very nice hotel!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that your stay was ‚Äúexcellent.‚Äù We strive for perfection and we cannot be happier that we achieved our goal. Thank you for your compliments regarding our nice guest rooms and beautiful views. We hope you visit us again the next time you visit the US. We‚Äôd love to have you back.

Summary Heading: Back again after four years, and the resort is still flawless
Summary: Just returned from a long weekend with the family. We had a great time and consider this place to be like a second home. The resort looks and feels fresh. Food is excellent, especially the breakfast buffet. We have nothing bad to say about this impeccable resort.
Manager Response: Welcome back and thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that your experience was flawless and you found the resort to be impeccable and fresh. We appreciate your kind compliments and we hope you visit us again sooner this time. We‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Okay - probably would stay somewhere else next time though
Summary: Out stay was okay - here are the details:  Room - very clean with a comfortable bed, nice balcony, view was pretty good - a small ocean view  Pool - so/so, for a place in Dana Point near the ocean, I would expect more.  Pool service was AWFUL.  The waiters were very slow and ignored us most of the time.  When we ordered chips and guac it took 30 minutes to come.  Room service - very good actually, would recommend  Resort itself - mediocre - for the prices I would expect more.  If you can get a deal under $200 per night I would stay here, otherwise I would probably skip it
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy that you enjoyed the comfort of our guest rooms and the beautiful views of the property. Thank you for your compliments regarding our room service meals and staff. We regret that you didn‚Äôt experience the outstanding service our staff provides to its guests. Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa is synonymous for the high level of service we provide and we want to inform you that your experience was definitely an exception and not the norm for the resort. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: This was hotel # 2 on my 40th birthday California celebration. Spectacular! Only stayed one night definitely want to visit again for longer. Property was spectacular! The views, the pools and my room with a balcony amazing! Walked down to the marina that evening-beautiful.
Manager Response: Happy belated birthday! We are delighted to hear that you celebrated your 40th birthday with us. We love creating beautiful memories and we hope that we can continue creating new ones. We look forward to welcoming you back for a longer, spectacular stay. See you soon.

Summary Heading: Great pool area - kids loved it
Summary: Stayed 2 nights recently at the Marriott. Overall, a good hotel. Rooms fine although the rooms facing the pool have a better view. Only issue with our room was a very noisy air conditioner. The pool area is excellent and great fun for the kids. I was however pretty annoyed by the "resort fee" added to our bill, despite the attendant when I checked in saying the wifi was complimentary??? It's enough to make me dodge staying at a Marriott again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you and your children enjoyed your stay with us and that your children had fun playing in the pool and splash zone. In regards to your comments about the resort fee; our resort fee includes complimentary Wi-Fi but that is not the only inclusion. We offer our guests complimentary activity rentals including bikes, boogie boards, surf boards, game boards, tennis and more. We also offer complimentary shoe shine. We hope you visit us again the next time you are in the Dana Point area.

Summary: My wife and stayed at this hotel for 7 days this summer. The location for the view was quite spectacular, however, if you wanted to walk to the restaurants or down to the beach, be prepared for a strenuous hike up a large hill. This is the same hill that affords the spectacular view. Can't have it both ways so take the view. That being said, the location is quite nice. The staff seemed very friendly and the facilities were also very nice. The room was very comfortable and it was nice to have a small balcony. Overall, I would recommend this hotel.   The downside :   I think the biggest complaint is the wireless service. In this day and age, wireless should be free of charge. I believe there are whole cities that have free wifi. This hotel has no free wireless service at all. Not
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you spent the week with us at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your guest rooms and encountered our friendly and attentive staff. In regards to complimentary Wi-Fi access, our guests receive complimentary Wi-Fi in the lobby and surrounding areas including the Vue Restaurant and OverVue Lounge. The resort fee includes complimentary Wi-Fi in your guest rooms as well. We apologize for the fire alarm being set off throughout the night. You are correct, this does not happen often at all and we appreciate your understanding. We never want our guests to experience a disturbance during the night and we again appreciate your understanding. We look forward to having you come back and we appreciate your recommendation.

Summary: Overall a typical marriott resort , great staff, nice facility, great location . Being on the first floor near the pool had some advantages but this place needs to do something about the carts they use to transport supplies , it sounded like a thunderstorm every time they rolled by, which was at least 20 times a day. I am sure the folks on the second and third floor heard it too. It startled us in our sleep at least 5 times. Otherwise nice place
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your compliments. The comfort of your stay is very important to us and we apologize that the carts woke you up in your sleep. We have never received a complaint about the noisiness of our carts but we will be sure to address this with our staff to ensure that it is more quiet so that we do not interrupt future guests. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We hope you visit us again. We would love to welcome you back.

Summary: My wife and I spent 5 nights at the Laguna Marriott as part of a payoff trip with my company. They always put us at nice resorts and this resort did not disappoint. The rooms were nothing fancy, basic room, ours faced the pool on first floor although we could not see much due to the vegetation but that really was not a big deal. What was a big deal was how awesome the resort staff was and how great they were attending to anything we needed. Every staff member we had contact with was friendly, cordial and always greeted us with a smile and comment! We only had breakfast at the resort and one other meal which was part of our company package but what we did have was good. The staff at the pool bar was over the top friendly, when we had time for the pool. The views from the resort
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments regarding our attentive and friendly staff. We are delighted that you enjoyed your company trip at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa and we couldn‚Äôt be more happier to hear that every part of your trip exceeded your expectations. We hope you do visit us again for leisure or business the next time you visit California and we know new memories will be created that will last a lifetime.

Summary: After staying at the JW Marriott 7 years ago and taking a ride down the PCH to Laguna.My Wife and I made it a promise to take our children to Laguna when we could get them all together.Seven years later we finally had the opportunity and were looking forward to this week long vacation.Well we were in for some major problems.Upon arrival,which after a 5 hour flight and hour and a half drive we could not check in until 5pm.Ok but there was one major problem,our daughters room had mud strewn throughout the tub and an empty Tampon container in the trash can in the bathroom.Our room had an air conditioner that we were told by maintenance could not go lower than 68???????it was at 78 when we entered the room and the heat was on.We were going out to dinner anyway so i thought it would
Manager Response: We want to take a moment to apologize for the problems you experienced during your stay with us. Your experience was clearly an exception and definitely not the norm for our resort. We set high standards for our staff and most of our guests compliment us on how we exceeded their expectations. We recognize that you have already spoken to our management team and they have addressed this issue. Thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Marriott resort and spa ‚Äì Dana point California
Summary: Although the property is aging ‚Äì it is being kept up fairly well. The location looks awesome. Difficult walk down steep hill to the beach ‚Äì difficult 118 steps to the harbor. Great scenery facing the ocean as well as from a boat looking back to the property!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We enjoy hearing the activities our guests participated in during their stay with us and it sounds like you got a little workout going up and down the 118 steps. We hope you enjoyed the scenery and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This is a very nice hotel in a great location with a beautiful view. The rooms are very clean and comfortable and the service was very good. It was a tight squeeze as we were put in a King Room with a pull out that was the size of a twin and there  were 4 in our family. One of my children slept on the floor on the cushions. It was a crowded summer weekend and there were not any extra pillow or blankets. The outdoor space was beautiful however the quiet adult pool had many children running around. I would recommend this hotel to people who like a big hotel with pool services.  As others have stated the valet service is a bit pricey and wish they allow self parking. We had a great view from our room and watched the fireworks on the ocean which was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We couldn't agree with you more, the views are stunning. We recommend that you try and book a double room the next time you visit so that your children can rest comfortably. We hope that your family visits us again soon.

Summary: We visited this hotel with 3 kids under 5... It was fantastic!  I have not been to this hotel in almost 10 years... It has been remodeled to be more "family" friendly.  (Although, there is a separate wing with a 'quiet' pool if you need a break from the kiddos - or traveling without.) Best features:  1) Everything was clean (room, bathroom, lobby, and pool areas)  2) Food was good!  Breakfast boasts berry bowls, a build your own (a chef makes it) waffle and omelette station.  Dinner was surprisingly good (our expectations are usually quite low for hotel chains).  3) The views are nice (this is not the Montage, BUT you can still snap some great ocean views from atop the bluff). 4) Our personal fave for the kids was the splash pad (water features the kids can play in- think
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We are delighted to hear that your entire family enjoyed their stay with us. We are happy to hear that you came back to visit the resort after the renovation and you were able to experience all the family friendly activities that are offered here. The kid's splash zone and complimentary movie nights are a huge hit with all of the children. We hope you were able to enjoy the family friendly dinner buffet in our ocean-view, Vue restaurant as well. Thank you for your lovely compliments. We cannot wait to welcome your entire family back again! See you soon.

Summary: We checked in and were given a room with a view straight down the highway :( Changed rooms to a pool view which had a nice view but an odd smell (I think it was the feather duvet). Speaking of the duvet, it was very thick which was un necessary as it was July and meant we had to have the air con on at night. This was a very old system which maintained the temperature by shutting off and rebooting through the night. Unfortunately this was very noisy. Credit must be given to the very helpful lady at concierge although most of the staff were very friendly. Reception staff could do with a refresher course in customer service. The location of the hotel cannot be beaten and as other reviewers have said, there are steps that lead from the hotel to the harbour where there a shops, bars
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you found our staff very helpful and friendly. We are happy that you enjoyed the resort's close proximity to the Dana Point harbor and Doheny State Beach. We apologize for any inconvenience the air conditioning created during your stay. Our intention is to have our guests enjoy the temperature of their room by adjusting their air conditioning to the temperature they desire. We look forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary Heading: Not on par with other Marriott Resort and Spa experiences - many little things a sign of overall management issues
Summary: We recently stayed at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott for 2 nights of our 10 day trip in CA exploring the coast from San Fran.  This property was the worst experience of the 5 resorts and high end hotels that we stayed in starting with a late night arrival and finding that our room type request was not being honored.  So we had to settle for a king room and a sofa pull out to enjoy the "ocean view" that is advertised.   This was not ideal with our 2 kids in two and the delays in getting bags to our rooms and sheets for the pull out did not get us off to a good start for the room overlooking the driveway vs the ocean.  The series of little things continued during the stay with the finale being on our departure morning when it was discovered that our rental car battery was dead because
Manager Response: We appreciate your review and regret that you did not enjoy the view of your guest room. All of our rooms are not ocean-views and we have never advertised this to our guests. We have different room categories including resort view rooms, pool views, partial ocean view and ocean view. If you were in a resort view room then your room does not include an ocean-view. We recommend that our guests book an ocean-view room when making their reservations, so they can enjoy the beauty of the Pacific Ocean while resting in their guest room. We regret that you did not experience the high level of service our entire staff provides to our guests. As you will read from previous reviews, we receive many wonderful compliments regarding our staff service. In fact, our guests go out of their way to compliment how friendly, caring and professional our staff is. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: We had no issues with this Marriott. Great service, clean, beautiful and everything works. Their location is great too but its important to have a car because you are going to need it! the best beach is not the one across the hotel, (too may rocks but great for surfing)  you have to drive few minutes.. You are also close by car to Laguna beach and  San Clemente (even closer) both places are so beautiful! the problem with this hotel is that I find the valet parking very expensive, basically the same of Beverly Hills! but you are going have  to pay it if you want to see the area properly. The hotel is located on a 'cliff" so keep that in mind if you are not in shape! I though I was in shape until I started climbing the road up to the hotel from the beach! (again, you will need a
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear how wonderful your stay was at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are happy that you were able to visit the nearby beaches and cities and that you found the area beautiful and convenient. We look forward to welcoming you back and we hope to see you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Excellent staff, still wonder about the beds
Summary: I have been back to this property a few times since my last review and it is still a great property with an excellent location.  Had a minor issue (double billing) that was promptly addressed.  The two things that were ever-so-slightly disappointing where these:  1.  At every other Marriott hotel (actual Marriott brand) a Platinum-level Rewards member gets a basic breakfast (or buffet) for free.  The breakfast buffet here was virtually identical to the two Marriotts where I had stayed earlier this month.  It offered made-to-order omelets - which they also did at the Las Vegas Marriott where I was the night before.  But it wasn't free.  No, it wasn't even close: $24.95 (plus tip) for a single buffet.  The same one I got for free at every other Marriott property.    2.  The beds,
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that you are a frequent visitor of ours. We appreciate your loyalty to Marriott and we thank you for your feedback. Your opinion is extremely important to us and we will share your comments with our team. Thank you again for your review and we look forward to having you back.

Summary Heading: High end Marriott that will impress but small problems
Summary: We were impressed with the general property of Laguna Cliffs.  As we drove up the hill we saw people gathered around by tiki torches enjoying cocktails on a cool California evening.  The bell man could not have been nicer and every valet we encountered was courteous and efficient.  We had the buffet breakfast, which is a little pricey but when you consider the gorgeous view it is worth it. It includes an omelet station, smoked salmon and bagels, fresh fruit, scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, etc.  The pool and hot tub area was clean and well attended with nice people passing chilled water and towels.  One complaint is that our room's air conditioner never worked properly.  Since we were flying in from the east coast we were too tired to worry about it the first night.  The
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We appreciate the details of your stay and we are delighted that our friendly staff not only met but exceeded your expectations. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the amenities of the resort and the state of the art fitness center.  We regret that the a/c did not cool your room to the temperature you desired but we can assure you that all air conditioning units do work properly. Sometimes guests leave their sliding door open, which will cause the air conditioning unit to work harder causing the cold air to escape outside and the warm air from the outside to come in.  Thank you for your suggestions. We will definitely share your experience with our team and we hope you visit us again the next time you visit California.

Summary: Was there for a business meeting. Property was very nice. It is walking distance to the beach. It has an open air feel like in Hawaii. Food was above average even for a big group. Front desk and wait staff all were very nice. And helpful. I would go back on my own.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We hope you had a successful meeting. Thank you for all your compliments and nothing makes us more happy than to hear our guests wanting to return to Laguna Cliffs. We are happy that you enjoyed the beautiful scenery of the resort and our courteous staff. We look forward to welcoming you back for business and leisure. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful location, and fun for a small family
Summary: My wife and I are three teenagers tried this resort for our summer vacation this year, as we love to hit the beach with boogie boards and enjoy vacation on the sand and surf. Typically, we rent a beach house near Newport Beach, but this time we thought we would try something different.  Pros: beautiful resort property, excellent service from valets (required) to desk and concierge help -- super professional.   Pool is nice and has other water features for the younger kids.   Restaurants abound nearby both walking distance and a short drive.  Cons: the beach you walk down to from the resort (Doheny) is very scenic, but plan to wear your shoes if you go into the water as there are lots of large and small rocks. Not the sandy-bottom beach or surf we have been used to at Newport,
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We are happy to hear that your family enjoyed your stay with us and that you discovered the resort for the first time. We enjoy hearing about our guest's excursions during their stay with us and it sounds like you were all able to take advantage of the beach and harbor that are within walking distance of the resort. We are glad that are staff was able to accommodate your needs by providing your family with a suite. We hope you visit us again during your next family vacation.

Summary Heading: Wouldn't even know that I was at a Marriott
Summary: I know I have friends who love their Marriott rewards, but I am not a Marriott customer. However, I had an event in Dana Point and a friend highly recommended staying here and so I did.  I wouldn't have even known it was a Marriott.  This place was well appointed, the room was large and the bed was comfortable.  I enjoyed lunch on the deck with the view of the sea.  If you don't have a room with a view, there are plenty places on the property where you can enjoy it. The property was clean and loved all the bunnies that would come out to check on things. I would have tried the restaurant for dinner, but didn't have time.  There are comfortable chairs and lounges all over the place.  I was right by the family pool and hadn't even realized the property had a second pool. My room
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We are delighted to hear that you were highly impressed with the resort and all it's amenities. Your comfort is key and we are happy to hear that you were not interrupted during your entire stay and that the amenities we provide created a very seamless and convenient experience for you. We do believe that our resort is perfect for any type of traveler; business, couples, families, and more. We cater to all and we are delighted to hear that you will be back with your husband. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: We visited this resort in June and had a wonderful time.  The grounds of the resort were very clean and the flowers were beautiful.  Staff was very friendly, the valet staff was wonderful and very helpful with directions and recommendations.  They were always smiling and friendly.    The concierge gave us coupons to get into the San Diego Zoo, along with directions from the hotel.   Which I thought was very nice.    We had our 3 & 6 year olds with us they loved the pool, the splash pad was so cool.  It has two surf boards that you can stand on and it makes the fountain come on so you feel like you are in a wave surfing.  They also have a very large circle pool that is only 1.5 feet deep which is great if you have small kids.  We did not take advantage of the Kahuna Laguna kids
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that our family friendly resort was a big hit with your two children. We know how important it is for the entire family to enjoy a family vacation and we believe that Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa provides something for the entire family. We look forward in having you back and we definitely recommend the Kahuna Laguna Kid's Club and Spa during your next visit. See you soon.

Summary: My husband and I tried this place thru a deal on living social.  We were quite pleased. Very clean and nice room.  GREAT location.  We could walk to restaurant's and shops which was so nice. CLOSE to the beach which was also a plus.  Upon arrival, an employee or two were not the friendliest and I was a little discouraged but the rest of the employees the rest of our stay were great so maybe a person or two were just having a bad day.   We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are so pleased to hear that our staff was able to make your stay pleasant. We are happy that the you were able to take advantage of the resort‚Äôs close proximity to the beach and harbor shops. We appreciate your recommendation and we look forward to having you back.

Summary: best location for a hotel we could see the ocean from our room there are bars and restaurant around you can eat and drink. super nice weather in July. every thing in this hotel is great except the fact that there is no self-parking and you have to use valley . and the cost I believe is $32 per day which is an extra that we didn't think of. it is located on a hill and there are restrictions for parking around the hotel eventually we ended up using the valley. they will charge you around $25/day resort fee over all the other stuff keep it in mind it can add up to a huge amount.if you are reserving online make sure to get the breakfast too it is awesome and cheaper if you get it online.  waitress asking for tip even we use the buffet, weird ha? overall we enjoyed our vacation pool
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and all the amenities Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa has to offer. We are glad that you not only enjoyed the warm weather of Dana Point but that you were able to visit the park and beach that is within walking distance. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in Southern California. See you soon.

Summary Heading: Great Location- Book Early for best rates
Summary: We stayed at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott over the 4th of July holiday.  First let me say that we booked in January and got a great deal.  I understand the hotel was sold out so people who booked later paid almost double what we paid.  It is a great location.  Up on a cliff with the Dana Point Harbor on one side and the beach on the other side.  It is a considerable walk down to the beach so plan for that.  The hotel loans surfboards and boogie boards as part of your resort fee which is a great service.  The pool was nice and they have a spash zone for the kids.  We did have a couple of issues with our reservation before check-in and we received a call from the hotel manager (who then remembered us at check-in).  The service was great all around.  They set up chairs for the
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your 4th of July weekend with us. 4th of July is a very popular weekend for us, so we are happy to hear that you booked early and were able to enjoy all the amenities and festivities with us during this holiday. We are happy that you had a memorable experience with us. We look forward to welcoming you and your family back for another visit.

Summary: Stayed here on our family trip up the California coast. Sure it was a little expensive but well worth it. The food quality was excellent. The room was excellent. The view was excellent. The pool was beautiful. My wife and daughter took advantage of the spa and were treated very well by the staff there. All the staff seemed to go out of their way to make us feel welcomed and taken care of.   The only blip was a waitress at the upstairs restaurant who we had one evening and got our order wrong. The next day we had her again and she again didn't get the order right.   One particular good service story was that the sink in our room was draining very slowly. I mentioned it to a hotel employee and when we went back to the room for a moment there were two staff working on the sink to
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are happy to hear that everything was ‚Äúexcellent‚Äù during your stay with us. It‚Äôs a pleasure hearing how our staff provided a truly memorable experience for your entire family. We are delighted that your wife and daughter enjoyed their spa service. We believe there is no better way to relax. We would love to have you all back for a longer stay of time and we look forward to it. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed at the Laguna Cliffs for 4 nights.  The trip was 1/2 business and 1/2 pleasure. Fantistic location with amazing grounds. Even though the hotel is in Dana Point ,Laguna Beach is right down the road. and I recommend checking it out. The marina and all of the 15 plus restaurants are a 5 minute walk down a scenic pathway or by the stairs. Ate at the resort and at Johnnies Famous and every meal was top notch.  Every single staff member, regardless of their function, was polite friendly and respectful as if their sole purpose was to make you as happy as possible. The marina area is a must see. you could easily spend several hours walking through the public marina area.  Doeheney Beach is also right next to the marina and a very nice beach and picnicing area
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy a few nights of leisure activities during your business trip. Thank you for your wonderful compliments. The resort is truly situated in a perfect location, on the cliffs, yet walking distance from the beautiful Dana Point harbor and marina. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and were able to take some time for yourself and tour the city. We hope to see you soon, whether it be for business or pleasure or both.

Summary: Our family of 5 stayed at the resort from July 2nd - 6th and wish we would have stayed longer!  The resort grounds were beautiful, right by the beach and close to many restaurants.  The room was nice and clean and the kids pool area was perfect for them.  Taylor at the front desk checked us in and she was very friendly and professional.  I can't say enough good things about Luis at the front, he consistently went above and beyond to help us out and get us information.  While we had a great stay, he really made it excellent.  Marriott - you have a wonderful employee in Luis!  We would definitely recommend this resort and it would be my first choice if we were back in the area!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you and your family had a memorable stay with us. We appreciate the wonderful compliments about our staff and we will be sure to share it with our team. We have an exceptional staff here that care about our guest‚Äôs stay and you were able to experience this first hand. Thank you for recommending our wonderful resort and we look forward to welcoming you all back soon.

Summary Heading: Nice Resort However Quality Control Needs to Improve
Summary: We stayed here for a couple days for a wedding.   This is a very nice resort.  Spacious rooms, nice amenities and friendly staff.   I was surprised that there were so many problems with my room upon check in.  When we arrived, one of the two lights in the bathroom were burned out.   We called right away and they came within the hour to replace.  However they left the fixture partially dangling from the ceiling.  Then when we went to bed, we noticed there wasn't a top sheet on the bed.  Again, another call to the front desk however we used a different phone and discovered it didn't work.  Within the hour they put the sheet on.   Then in the morning when I went to make coffee, I noticed there were no condiments for the coffee (stir stick, creamer, etc...).  Had to make another
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you joined us for a wedding and experienced our resort and the friendly staff. We want to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us. Our staff is extremely attentive and attention to detail is critical. We want you to know that this incident is definitely an exception and not the norm for Laguna Cliffs. We will be sure to share your experience with our team to ensure that this does not occur again. As I‚Äôm sure you are aware, we take great pride in providing a high level of service and quality to our guests and we were truly sorry to hear that the missing items in your guestroom put a damper on your stay with us. We certainly hope you'll reconsider giving Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa another opportunity in the future to restore your faith.

Summary: Beautiful resort and very welcoming. Our room was ready when we arrived and the bellman was very quick in getting our luggage to our room and helping with directions and answering questions. We set out to explore and thought we would walk to the beach. As we started to walk down to the beautiful rose garden we realized it was not a trail to the beach and it is a steep hill so we thought lets go get the car and drive down. When the valet brought the car around he asked can I give you directions we said we are driving down to the beach and he said well if you don't mind driving about 10 minutes there is a beautiful beach that is not crowded so we were like yeah.. It is called Thousand Step beach or Table Rock Beach. You park on the main street and walk down the stairs (it is not a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We love creating wonderful memories for our guests and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed the beach our valet staff recommended. We look forward to having you back and providing you with another memorable trip. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, also very expensive
Summary: Granted, the July 4th weekend is a popular time to visit, but the rooms were very pricey for the size of the rooms.  Everything was well appointed and very posh, it felt opulent yet cozy at the same time. Nice views over the park and Dana Point harbor.  The walk to the harbor is not far, but the stairway down can be hard for older patrons or people with bad knees.  The staff was friendly and helpful, which was especially hard during the stressful holiday period.  We had breakfast at the VUE, again very pricey but the food was good.  The bar was nice and had a great band in the evening. Our only complaint was the beds.  We had four people in a room with two double beds, but the mattresses had deep depressions in the middle leading us to all roll into the middle. So I agree with
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you visited us during the 4th of July weekend and felt the casually yet sophisticated vibe of Laguna Cliffs. Thank you for the compliments regarding our friendly and helpful staff and the beautiful views from the Resort. We appreciate your feedback regarding our beds and will certainly take your suggestion and share it with our team. We do hope you and your family visit us again soon.

Summary: I had visited this property many years ago and was back in the area for a special occasion, so I wanted to check it out again. It has been dramatically upgraded and preserved over the years. My check in experience with Brian at the front desk was excellent and seamless. The grounds are well manicured and it was pleasant just getting reacquainted with the property. The view from many parts of the property is timeless and the sunset grand. The staff was helpful and friendly. I had drinks in the Overvue lounge/restaurant at sunset and it was a delight.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that your visit with us was superb! We are thankful that you remembered Laguna Cliffs from a couple years back and that you were able to see the renovation that took place a couple years ago. Thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive and courteous staff, we will be sure to pass on the wonderful praise. I couldn‚Äôt agree with you more, the sunsets on the OverVue deck are truly breathtaking. We look forward to you next visit with us.

Summary: Upon arriving to what we thought would be a beautiful resort it went down hill immediately.  Had to wait over 30 minutes just to check in.  Only two clerks available and there was a line of people waiting to check-in.  When we finally began to check-in they told us our room could not be ready for another 45 minutes to an hour.  Check-in is at 4:00 PM and they could not accommodate us.  We had an appointment and needed be elsewhere and we felt stuck.  The clerk "Amber" was very wishy washy and just wanted to rush us through.  She even said if we wanted to go somewhere else she would be happy to cancel our reservations.  She then told us there was a room available from out of the sky and since we were running out of time, we took it.  Got our luggage and went to the room and saw a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize for the inconvenience of your wait time for your guest room. We know that this could be frustrating, especially if you have an engagement you need to attend to. We try our best to have all our guest rooms ready at check-in time as efficiently as we can but there are times where due to high business levels, there is a wait time. Again, we apologize for the inconvenience and we want you to know that we are working as quickly as we can to make sure the guest rooms are all ready at the appropriate time. We never like to see our guests leave disappointed and we hope you have the chance to visit us again to experience the beautiful amenities and customer service that Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa has to offer.

Summary Heading: Laguna Cliff's Revisited - Changes to the menu
Summary: This was my second stay at this property.  It was a romantic getaway.  The last time that I stayed here (previously reviewed) the food was AMAZING, the bartenders creative and wonderful, and I couldn't have been happier.  I am sad to say that the chef that amazed me before....has moved on.  In his place is Chef Thomas (formerly of the Cosmopolitan in Vegas).  Chef Thomas id known for his pastry expertise, However, I was there for lunch and dinner.  Previously I was kept captivated by the food, this time we left the property in search of food.  The spa is fantastic.  David, who works reception in the spa was wonderful and accommodating.  The spa treatments that w received were wonderful.  Pricing was not too bad, as we paid $310 for two massages.  The fitness room is the best
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you had a wonderful spa treatment. We hope you left feeling relaxed and rejuvenated. We are delighted to hear that our fitness center was one of the best you‚Äôve ever experienced. We cannot agree with you more, the equipment and facility is top notch. We regret that you did not enjoy the food at our Vue restaurant but we can assure you that we have one of the best culinary teams at the resort and a huge fan base. We value your opinion and we hope that you give Vue Restaurant another try. We look forward to having you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice views, helpful staff, beds need work
Summary: My only real complaint would be the beds, felt like I was sleeping at an angle all night, they need to upgrade the mattresses at this location.  The views are fantastic and nothing beats drinks on the patio. Every meal I had here was fantastic, breakfast, lunch and dinner. Upstairs restaurant staff is very friendly and always smiling. Regular staff need work on greeting guests though, surprised front desk staff weren't outwardly smiling and pleasant. Some staff while walking through the lobby would smile and say hello, but others would duck their head and try not to make eye contact. Valet fee is ridiculous, but staff was always friendly out there. Beach is a short walk down the hill and easily doable in the morning for a stroll. Restaurants are also down the steps and easily
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the panoramic ocean views of the resort, while sipping your drink. OverVue deck is one of my favorite spots of the resort as well. Our friendly staff is always at your service and ready to assist in anything you may need. We hope you enjoyed the beach and marina during your stay and we look forward to having you back.

Summary Heading: Exceptional experience from start to finish
Summary: My husband, 10 year old daughter and I stayed at the resort for 4 nights recently. My husband has been battling leukemia for some time and we were given the okay to take a family trip and wanted to get back to Dana Point. We chose Laguna Cliffs Marriott based on the amenities knowing that some days we may need to stay on-site. Were we ever impressed! The location is perfect, easy to access and beautiful views. We had a partial ocean view with a balcony/patio (room 1015). The beds are comfortable and the furnishings were comfortable. The room was very clean and spacious. The breakfast buffet came with a package we purchased and we enjoyed it every morning while dining outside on a beautiful patio. Every single employee we interacted with was friendly and helpful.  We did spend
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are honored that you chose the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa as a family vacation destination during this difficult time. Your compliments are very appreciated and our goal is to your entire stay as comfortable and pleasurable as we can. We are delighted to hear that your experience was exceptional from start to finish. We are happy to know that our staff was able to accommodate your needs and that the service level you experienced went far beyond what was expected. Wishing you and your family all the best. We are looking forward to your next family vacation to Dana Point.

Summary: I loved this place so much from a vacation in 2011 that I booked another vacation there from May 15 thru May 24, 2014.  The time there was phenominal!  The staff, amenities, food, drinks, cleanliness, decor and overall experience was unforgettable.   My friend and I attended the Doheny Blues Festival, spent a day at the beach, had full body massages on our Spa Day, dined at the View and Overview Restaurants, utilized the concierge service more than once, shopped in the unique gift shop as well as the Spa giftshop and relaxed at the pool. Loved the food (all the time!)...Room service was timely, the meals were plentiful and hot and they also have wonderful buffets at breakfast and at times, during dinner hours.   This hotel is located in such a unique spot...While there we took
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and for visiting us again for the 2nd time. We are thrilled that your stay was ‚Äúphenomenal.‚Äù It sounds like you enjoyed all the amenities the resort has to offer and more! We love hearing about our guests adventures and it sounds like you were able to experience quite a bit during your stay. We are so grateful that we were able to create such beautiful memories for you and we cannot wait to welcome you back for more. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: WE stayed 1 week from June 15-22, 2014.  We were attending a wedding and I wanted to stay somewhere that the kids would enjoy (7 & 5 Year olds).  Kids loved the pool and the hot tub as well as the sprinklers.  We only saw 2 kids in the kids camp one afternoon out of the entire week and my 7 year old thought it would be too kiddish! We arrived late on sunday after flying in, and unfortunately the only room available at that time was facing a tennis court and parking lot.  Aldo who was really nice at front desk told us to come by tomorrow and they would move us to a room with a better view no charge.  We went the next day and sadly the manager told us that if he moved us there would be a $30 a night surcharge. So we decided to stay! The hotel was very nice the staff was friendly,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We are delighted to hear that your family enjoyed our kid-friendly resort. Our Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club is a huge hit with all of the children and we know your 7 year old would have loved it too! We hope you were able to take advantage of our complimentary movie nights at the resort. Families enjoy this time together as kids do too! The next time you are here, be sure to take advantage of our complimentary boogie board rentals and bike rentals. We know how important family activities are when traveling in the summer and we have beautiful beaches and trails within walking distance of the resort. Thank you for your feedback regarding our beds, we will definitely share your suggestion with our team. We would love to welcome you back again.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights to celebrate our 10th anniversary.  Couldn't have asked for a better experience. The location is simply breath taking! Rooms are clean and well kept. Enjoyed delicious crunchy French toast on our private balcony while enjoying the beautiful ocean view. I mentioned to my husband my craving for iced lemon water prior to our arrival and within minutes of our getting to the room, room service had delivered a pitcher of iced lemon water! Service was exceptional. They brought an outside furniture love seat up to the fireplace so we were able to sit together and enjoy the fire while also enjoying delicious creme br√ªl√©e and tea from room service-all while snuggling under the stars by the fire! Hotel is just a short walk to the beach where we were able to jet ski
Manager Response: Thank you for our 5 star review and congratulations on your 10th anniversary. We are delighted to hear that you celebrated this special occasion at Laguna Cliffs and we are even more delighted to hear that we truly made our experience a memorable one. We couldn‚Äôt agree with your more, our staff takes exceptional care of all of our guests and we love hearing about the instances that stand out to our guests. We will definitely share your wonderful experience with our team and we look forward to providing another ‚ÄúWOW‚Äù vacation, the next time you visit Dana Point, CA.

Summary: Loved this Hotel the rooms are spacious and clean upgraded for $90.00 to a Ocean view well worth the money. From our arrival to our departure the service was exceptional. The food was very good we had dinner in the Vue very nice outside under the stars with a lovely fire beside the table . Full room service and SPA nice pool area again the service at the pool was very good.  There is a $30.00 daily Valet fee and a resort fee of $25.00 which we were aware of, flowers and gardens are well kept the ocean breeze fantastic. Super convenient location close to the Marina and Beach we enjoyed whale watching and were able to view Blue whales,Dolphins and sea lions .WOW !  The Hotel has complimentary Bicycles  and other unexpected amenities. The Gym facilities are top notch with modern
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you were extremely pleases by the service you received from our staff. We are happy to hear that you had an exceptional experience and we appreciate your recommendation. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort. Please visit us again soon. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Worst experience in the history of our travels!!!
Summary: My husband wrote the prior review " shocked" . Laguna cliffs responded by saying they are addressing our concerns. In fact they are not .  Not Marriott corporate office which are just liaisons ( you can't get past them) or the hotel are addressing our issues. The hotel apologized but then once we contacted corporate the hotel did a 180 saying we basically were in another reality. Like my husband said stay at The Ritz it's worth every extra penny to be treated like a human being and you are guaranteed a great experience. Even when my children got hurt due to their negligence they did not care enough to give us insurance information to get them help. Even though we called daily . We only received the information after we got home.  The insurance company won't even call us back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Watch for sales at this great property on Travelocity
Summary: Marriott matched my price that I found on another site and gave me an additional 25% off so I paid $88 on a Saturday for a $250 room.  Ask for a room with an ocean view.  The property is really nice, a great place to bike from with the ocean close by.  Bring your shoes because they will shine them as part of the daily $25 resort fee.  They also charge $32 per day for parking.  If you are a Marriott gold member, you can use the spa for free.  You also get to use their bicycles at no charge as well as boogie boards.  This is a great family vacation spot.  I took my 14 year old for his promotion to high school.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we were able to upgrade your room to an ocean view. We are delighted to hear that you took advantage of the complimentary bike and boogie board rentals and that you were able to utilize them during your stay with us. Congratulations to your 14 year old who will be heading to high school. We hope you all visit us again for another family fun vacation.

Summary Heading: Still in shock. Horrible, inexcusable, horrific, terrible management
Summary: First let me start by saying we are Platinum Members which speaks for it's self in the Ritz Carlton world this would matter in the Marriott world it means absolutely nothing.let me say we came last year and had a great time and were excited to return for our anniversary, Father's Day and my husbands birthday.  We planned this trip all year we also used 175,000 points to pre pay the 6 days. After day one things turned really bad very fast. Here is the letter we sent to all the Marriott executives.  Hi:  First let me say I am a platinum member and have been loyal to this brand as long as I can remember. We stayed at Laguna cliffs last year when the Ritz was booked. We had a great time and decided to return for our anniversary, Father's Day, and my husbands birthday combined. Here
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. It seems that you have addressed your concerns with our team and sent a letter to Marriott Corporate as well. We know your concerns are being attended to.

Summary: Stayed here for a conference.  The staff did an excellent job with casual food service, grand dinners, and coordinating all the arrivals and departures.  The conference facilities and tech support had only one "hitch" with a blown projector bulb in the middle of a presentation, but staff fixed it on the spot.  My own room was quite nice with a patio view to the pool. The hotel sits up above the beach itself which gives great views and an excuse for a bit of a stroll down the stairs (or road) to the beach and/or boardwalk.  Afternoonn conference sessions were opitonal, right? A perfect setting for a corporate conference.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that your conference was a success and that you not only found the resort to be perfect for conferences but that you also enjoyed a little leisure time as well. We couldn‚Äôt agree with you more, the resort is ideal for both business, leisure and/or family vacations. We have it all for every type of traveler. We hope that you visit us again in the future, whether it be for business or pleasure.

Summary: This hotel is the amazing. I love the view. And your a short 5 minute walk to the beach. The hotel room was clean and very nice and modern. The hotel was clean, modern, and staff were so friendly. There are no cons about this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and for rating us as ‚ÄúExcellent.‚Äù We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Your opinion is extremely important to us and it means a great deal to our entire staff that you found nothing wrong with your stay. We aim for perfection and our guests comfort and satisfaction is our upmost priority. We hope you visit us again the next time you are in Dana Point, CA. We‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: Excellent way to end a vacation
Summary: We ended a weeklong hectic San Diego family vacation with one night of relaxation at Dana Point.  This hotel was a perfect way to unwind (after all the attractions of San Diego) and prepare for the drive back to AZ the following day. Going into it, travelers need to fully read and understand the fees involved.  Yes, valet is required and not cheap.  Yes, there is a resort fee.  Marriott is very clear about these fees so they came as no surprise.  And, the valet service was very prompt and courteous, so I don't have a problem with the charge.  As for the resort fee, it covers the WIFI and fitness center, as usual, but it also makes available other nice features (bicycles, board games, outdoor games such as croquet, beach items such as paddle boards, etc). Check in was very simple
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that we could provide that sanctuary you needed after a busy week in San Diego. We enjoy hearing what activities are guests enjoyed during their stay with us and it seems like you and your family took advantage of the complimentary activity rentals that is included in your resort fee. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your guest room and it‚Äôs beautiful location as well as the 2 pools. We hope we were able to help you unwind and prepare for your trip back to Arizona. We look forward to your return visit. See you soon.

Summary: I reserved the room a month ago and asked for Ocean View?  Upon arrival , I had to view four rooms before I found one suitable.  Three of the four were ready but not what I requested.  The fourth had two double beds instead of King. Erin really worked with me to get the room, but we waited almost two hours for it to be ready.  Now this was a surprise for my husband for Father's Day and a travel time of two hours from our valley home.  We were already tired and having to wait so long was difficult.  Since we were early, I said that we would wait, but they should have had the proper room from the beginning.  The first room  over looked the busy and noisy pool. The second was like a cave with four foot wall on balcony.  The third one overlooked the street and smelled.  When we got
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and compliments regarding our wonderful staff. We appreciate the praise. We apologize that you did not like 3 of the 4 rooms you were shown. We are happy that we had the rooms available so that you could choose one that suited you and your husband best. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed Father‚Äôs Day Brunch in our Vue restaurant and that we were able to make dinner reservations for you as well. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: This place is really nice. The rooms are generous and the staff is great. Only complaint is you can't smoke on your patio or balcony or you'll be fined $250. There is only one little designated area outside across from the entrance of the hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our beautiful resort and our great staff. We do have a no-smoking policy and we do guide our guests to the designated smoking area as you stated. We hope you visit us again in the near future. We‚Äôd love to have you back.

Summary: Do not stay here. So many issues. Did not get the king. Terrible pool, uncomfortable chairs all old and stretched out. Sat a pool an hour and waited for the cocktail waitress. She never came. Asked to cancel my room to transfer. They refused and said I had to stay a night. Went to take a bath and couldn't. There was hair and pubic hair in shower and drain. Called to report to mgr. No call back, no offer to send house cleaning, no clean room. No apology. Gross and terrible service.
Manager Response: We want to take a moment and apologize for your unsatisfactory stay with us. We are very surprised to hear that you did not receive a call back from the Manager as our staff is very quick to respond to guest issues. Your experience is very important to us and we do not take your review lightly. There is no excuse for uncleanliness in your guest room and we will address this with our team immediately.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel & Views were breath taking!
Summary: The Hotel was fantastic,they papered you from the time we arrived until we checked out.  The only thing I didn't like was paying for daily parking & having to use to valet,every time you left the property.  Parking was high,you could of parked down the street,not convenient & on a Steep hill!  The rooms were great!  The beds & pillows were out standing.  Food & drink,music too all in walking distance~ Dana Point was a fantastic find!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are happy that your experience from check-in to check-out was pleasurable. Thank you for your compliments. We hope you visit us again the next time you are in the Dana Point area.

Summary: I just completed my 5 night stay at Laguna Cliffs Marriott for a business trip. I have mixed feelings about this place. Some of the staff were super nice and helpful while others were just downright rude and uncooperative. The hotel operator last night was pretty snarky with me when I inquired how to retrieve a co-worker's belongings that she left behind. I'm not sure what all of the attitude was about.  And prior to my arrival I called to request pictures of certain conference rooms because I needed to see what the layout would be for our meeting and they wouldn't send them to me. They acted like I had requested top secret information which was bizarre. It's too bad that the bad experiences are the ones that stand out for me since it's reason enough for me never to return or
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. As you mentioned in your comments, it seems that you had one bad incident with our resort operator and it left a sour taste in your mouth. We apologize that this one incident stood out to you and ruined your stay with us. We would be more than happy to share pictures of our conference room with you, as they are posted on our website as well. There may have been a miscommunication with our At Your Service department when you made this request.  Our Resort is synonymous with providing an exceptional experience for our guests, so we were happy to hear you felt the resort itself was nice and we certainly hope you'll reconsider giving Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa another opportunity in the future to restore your faith.

Summary: We recently stayed for 5 nights at the Marriott Laguna Cliffs. It sits up high on the cliffs, with a nice view of the coast. Grounds are well manicured and lush with vegetation. Pool area is attractive and functional. The hotel room we had was spacious and clean. Most importantly, the service from each and every employee was not only friendly and helpful, but we never passed an employee without being greeted. We were here for a 3 day business meeting, and thus had several buffet meals (breakfast, lunch and dinner). Food was delicious for each and every meal, far above what we have generally experienced at large group-oriented buffets. The only negatives: bed was sagging and air conditioning unit was noisy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us. We hope that your meeting was successful. Thank you for your wonderful compliments regarding our attentive and courteous staff. We could not agree with you more, we believe we have the best staff in Orange County and every person on our team truly cares about your experience. We are happy that we left a great impression on you and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are in the area for business or leisure. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Have to walk a ways, but worth it.
Summary: Stayed here with two teenagers for Spring Break, and we all had a good time.  You have to walk down the hill and a ways to the Beach, Marina's, restaurants, etc....but it opens up quite a bit of Food and Beverage options.  Hotel was very nice, and we were upgraded to a pool room, which had a great view of the pool and ocean in the distance.  Took the whale watching tour which was interesting, saw a couple of whales, some dolphins and sea lions...overall was just a good boat ride too up and down the coast.  Hotel restaurant was good too.  Would recommend this hotel, we had a great time, just be advised it's a hike up and down the hill to the beaches/marina.  If you are in good shape, it's no issue.  The room was very nice and clean and modern amenities.  All of the staff seemed
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your Spring break with us. There are many activities to do both near and at the resort, which gives our guests a multitude of options to choose from. We love hearing what activities are guests partake in during their stay with us and it sounds like you all had a great time experiencing the whale watching tour as well as the shops and restaurants in the harbor. Our goal is to make sure you are completely satisfied with your stay and our caring and professional staff did just that. We hope you visit us again soon. We look forward to welcoming you all back.

Summary: The Laguna Cliffs Marriott resort and spa is located high on a bluff overlooking the Pacific ocean with a seemingly endless horizon. There is a large local marina. I was here for a business conference. The room was exceptional with a king size bed, sitting area, balcony, overlooking the pool. There's a very high-end spa associated with the complex and I wish I had traveled here with my wife.  The value was incredible, given the banquet rate. There is valet only parking with a daily fee, which is expected for this level of resort.  I think a great place for celebrating a special occasion.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope your business conference was a success and we truly appreciate all your compliments. We are ahppy to hear that you enjoyed the resorts location and your spacious guest room. We look forward to welcoming you and your wife back for a leisure stay and we highly recommend that you visit the Spa the next time you are here.

Summary: This is a beautiful Hotel, great location. It's on a cliff overlooking Dana Point Harbor. Shops and Restaurants nearby. We had a corner room with an ocean view. The room was clean and larger than most but the bed was a little too soft for our liking. The staff was very courteous and professional. We had the breakfast buffet and was very good (great service). My wife and I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you enjoyed the ocean views from your guest room, we know how beautiful the views are. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet and the great service. We look forward to welcoming you and your wife back.

Summary: We stayed here for my husband's birthday. We live somewhat locally so I'd describe this as a "staycation".  I can't complain about much of anything- thus the 5 star. The room, though a little small, was clean, quiet, the beds were comfy and we had a nice view. The A/C was a little noisy- but we sleep with a noise machine so it didn't bother us. I had requested a king bed/ocean view- but I was informed both in my reservation and on the phone there was no guarantee I'd get it because they were pretty booked. We did get doubles- with a single bed it would probably feel a little roomier. Valet is not optional and there are resort fees- but this is not out of line with any other hotel in the area. (And they are clearly stated on the reservation).Plus the resort fee includes bike
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that you choose to celebrate your husband‚Äôs birthday with us. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. Thank you for your wonderful compliments regarding our exceptional staff service and the beautiful resort. We are happy to hear that you retrieved your bottle of wine from the cab ride and that you are looking forward to your next stay with us. We hope you next staycation is longer so you can enjoy all the amenities the resort has to offer. See you soon.

Summary Heading: Parking/Resort fees add up to (with tax) around $80-90 MORE than nightly rate! Total shame.
Summary: This is a charming hotel property upon a small hill with great grounds and views.  The rooms have been refurbished within the past decade and are about on par with a 4* in the area that won't really amaze you.  When I booked the room, I noticed there was a resort fee.  And extra $25 (PLUS TAX) WHY can't they advertise the total night room cost WITH the resort fee included as you are going to have to pay that anyways? Its false advertising.  As if that isn't bad enough, they charge a parking fee of $32 A NIGHT! Are you kidding me? So, that's $57 (NOT including tax) that is tacked on your bill which is also taxed with the total bringing your ACTUAL nightly cost to around $80-90 MORE than advertised.  Its absolute robbery.    This is a total shame because the property was in a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. As you mentioned in your review, all of our fees are noted and clearly stated on the website at time of booking and on confirmation e-mails. We are upfront about all of our fees so that no guest is surprised. You are right that we mention our pricing is ‚Äúcompetitive‚Äù, in fact in recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.

Summary Heading: Excellent Service, Made My Parent's Anniversary Special
Summary: I booked my parents a stay at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott for a 40th anniversary present.  I had requested a room with a king bed because the reservation stated it was not gauranteed.  Since it was their anniversary, I wanted to make sure they got a king bed.  The manager, Cari Kalapis, quickly got back to me and told me they would for sure get a king bed.  Upon arrival, not only did they get a king bed, they were also wished a happy anniversary and were upgraded to a room with a ocean view.  They told me the grounds were beautiful, which I knew since I do yoga at the park right across from the resort.  They also enjoyed walking around the harbor, which is literally accross the street.  I wanted to thank the staff at Laguna Cliffs Marriott for making my parents 40th anniversay a
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that your parents celebrated their 40th anniversary with us. We are happy to hear that our staff was not only able to accommodate your request of a King Bed but that they exceeded your expectations by providing an upgraded room for your parents. It is always a pleasure to make our guest‚Äôs stay a memorable one and we are so happy to hear that we did just that for your parent‚Äôs anniversary. We hope you all visit us again soon.

Summary: Charming hotel.  Short walk to harbor, nice restaurant/bar and outdoor seating area.  The main downsides to this property are the parking ($32 a night!) and the resort fee ($25 plus tax).  I know resort fees have become routine for hotel chains, but it seems to me if you are booking a hotel- that should be part of the nightly price.  With those charges and taxes, we paid close to $100 more a night than our room price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our resort and the beautiful views of Vue Restaurant and OverVue Lounge. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Stop! Do not pass GO! If you don't want to hear the person in the next room peeing don't stay at Laguna Cliffs Resort
Summary: I came to Laguna Cliffs resort for one night assured by my initial phone call that the high priced room I was paying for was "on the ocean" , and given that I had an important business presentation the next day, a good restful sleep was of course the most important requirement. But that was not to be. There is absolutely no soundproofing between rooms, so if someone dropped a quarter on the floor in the room above it registered below like a brick dropping on your head...kind of a drag after midnight when you realize that the quiet you expect in a posh Marriott hotel by the sea, is actually has paper thin walls so that you hear every single sound the people above and next to you are making...ear plugs didn't cut it.  I might as well have been in bed with the people next door. Did
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We understand that you spoke to someone who claimed your room was ‚Äúon the ocean.‚Äù We have a highly trained and professional staff at the resort that will state the room types as partial ocean view or ocean view but not ‚Äúon the ocean.‚Äù Nowhere is our resort description ever described as being on the ocean and our staff does not express this to our guests either. We have a very honest group of individuals working at Laguna Cliffs and we regret that you were misinformed by a third party. We do apologize for your restless night as we know how difficult and frustrating it can be to not sleep, especially if you are on vacation and expecting a good night‚Äôs rest. We truly care about your experience and we will be sure to address this issue with our team. We never want our guests to leave disappointed and we do have our ‚ÄúAt your service‚Äù department available 24 hours a day to assist with any concerns you may have, including a room change if needed. We again apologize that you did not sleep well and we appreciate your review.

Summary: Everything about our experience here was incredibly pleasant, especially the staff.  Kudos to Jason, the valet, for the warm welcome and Luis, the bellman, who was incredibly helpful.  The hotel itself is lovely with two large pools, an adequately equipped gym, and a great location overlooking the Dana Point Harbor.  It was easy to get out and walk to local cafes and shops.  As we were there for a conference, I only wish we could have stayed longer.  The room was nicely appointed, and we enjoyed sitting outside on the balcony.  There was so much space in the room that I could do my yoga practice!  The air conditioner was very quiet.   Overall, it was incredibly pleasant!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that your conference was a success. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff and resort. We will share your wonderful compliments with our team. We hope that the next time you are in Orange County, you will visit us again for a longer, leisure stay. Until then, take care and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: This resort was a perfect family option. We stayed in a typical hotel room (although I believe they offer multi-bedroom options as well) overlooking the pool area. Our room (as well as the other's I believe) had a balcony that looked onto the pool as well as a nice sitting area with a small sofa that folded out and served as the perfect sleeping area for our three year old. The deck was a great place to hangout after our little guy fell asleep. The pool has a great area for kids including a kids pool and two spray areas that our son adored. There were lots of kids to play with, plenty of seating, bar/food service at the pool as well as a few lawn games available. We found it easy to access all the surrounding communities. Between the pool, nearby beaches and nearby towns there
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that you and your family enjoyed your family vacation with us. The resort is definitely family friendly and with the opening of our seasonal Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club, children just don‚Äôt want to leave. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the various nearby outdoor attractions, including the park and marina. We do in fact have a 11:00pm curfew at our pools. They do close so we can assure our guests get a good night‚Äôs rest. We look forward in having you and your family visit us again when you are in the area.

Summary: We had made reservations online 1 month in advance for a room with a King size bed. In the comments/instructions box, I had indicated that it was our wedding night and that if they could do anything special, it would be appreciated and I would be willing to pay for it (champagne, flowers, strawberries, whatever they could do). Not only did they not acknowledge my request for anything special, when my husband and I showed up in our wedding gown and tux the night of our wedding, THEY HAD GIVEN OUR ROOM AWAY!!! They only room they had left was one with 2 full sized beds. Parking was $60 for 2 nights and when I spoke to a manager to ask if I could at least have free parking for this, he declined. He gave us a free breakfast instead. I've never had a could experience at a Marriott
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to start off by congratulating you on your marriage. We regret that the room you requested was not available when you checked-in. Our staff is extremely efficient in trying to meet all of our guests requests, however, when making the choice as to the type of bed (king or double) you prefer, we specifically state that we cannot guarantee the room type but can request it. I know that this was a special occasion and we would definitely make this happen for you and your husband, unless we were in a sold out situation and we had no choice. Your experience is very important to us and we truly did not want to have you leave disappointed. We will share your concerns with our team.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this property at the beginning of the month for a friend's wedding. Beautiful facilities, a short walk away from some great shops, and very pleasant staff. There were quite a few weddings going on there through-out our stay, and from an operational perspective, it looks like they've got a great team.  The furnishings in the rooms were slightly outdated, but still very well appointed and beautiful. But if you're spending your vacation in Dana Point in your room, then you're crazy. Beautiful location. We woke up early each morning and watched the sun rise from the pool deck. Mountains on one side and ocean on the other, you just can't beat it, especially for the price. This was followed by a morning walk down to the marina.  The only thing that bothered
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you were able to experience the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa during your friend‚Äôs wedding. We do have a great team and we take great pride in the level of service our staff provides to all of our guests. I must assure you that our staff is extremely professional and trustworthy. We are sorry to hear that your USB charger was missing from your vehicle. We thank you for sharing your experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary Heading: Good Choice if you want to spend a weekend in Dana Point
Summary: The hotel has a good location with decent views of the water (note that it's not on the water, there's a big public park and rocky beach between the hotel and the ocean). And the ocean views from the rooms are limited. We had long lines at check-in but the room assigned on the third floor had a decent view (no patio/balcony) and was spacious. The interiors have been renovated and kept up to date but the bathroom felt old and outdated. Service from the staff was good (we enjoyed the cafe/restaurant and the pools). They charge a separate parking/valet fee, resort fee, and internet / wi-fi fees. Note that the hotel doesnot have any self-serve parking. So overall, I had a pleasant stay at the hotel and would return if I had to stay in Dana Point.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your recommendation and we thank you for your compliments regarding our staff service. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We were not expecting such a lovely hotel, great location, and friendly staff.  My 10 yr old daughter and I took a short get away R&R trip and loved our stay.  Really kid friendly, and safe. We were both happy with pool and activities.  The staff was very friendly, the room was very comfortable, and we had fun.  Lots of places roll their eyes when they see you with a child but we were welcome and really taken care of.  We'll return for sure.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you and your daughter had a wonderful stay with us. We are definitely a family friendly resort and we are so happy that you both visited Laguna Cliffs for the first time. We hope you visit us again in the summer, where all of our children‚Äôs activities are in full swing, including our Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club, complimentary movie nights for resort guests (including complimentary drinks and snacks) and of course our family dinner buffet, complete with a chocolate fountain. We look forward to welcoming you both back soon for another memorable stay.

Summary: It is such fun place to be with all the weddings on the cliff and the range of pools. The ambiance is great even fi some of the other guys are obnoxious and annoying. The staff are so nice and helpful, the food is great and the beds and rooms are so comfortable. It is in the ideal position with the beach right below it and shops and restaurants near by. The nearest shopping mall is amazing too so i was very happy with my experience! i really recommend it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that you had an ‚Äúamazing‚Äù stay with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the ambiance and that our staff was able to accommodate your needs.
