Thank you for sharing your experience with us and we hope you visit us again the next time you visit California.

Summary Heading: Beach front luxury is indeed a luxury...
Summary: If you love Dana Point or have always wanted to visit this jewel of Southern California, then this could be a great place to visit it from. The pros of this hotel include: Dana Point, view of the beach, walking distance to a beautiful public park, fine dining on site, wonderful service and the quality you expect with Marriott.   When you drive up, be prepared for a ~$30 mandatory valet fee along with expected tips of course; and don't forget the additional ~$30 resort fee. So when you are booking this room or considering other locations, add in an additional $60 + a day.   One final thing, this hotel overlooks the beach from a hill top. This means a beautiful and expansive view and also means a very steep walk back to your hotel if you decide to walk to the beach or local
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you visited our ‚Äújewel‚Äù. We cannot agree with you more, our resorts expansive ocean views and exceptional service makes Laguna Cliffs stand out. We are grateful that you enjoyed your stay with us and with the many activities we have onsite and within walking distance our resort truly caters to all kinds of travelers including families, couples and business travelers. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: A beautiful facility, an indifferent staff, and a world of fees
Summary: Judy and I had long wanted to stay here, and this spring we got our chance, using Marriott Award points.  The property, high above the harbor at Dana Point, is handsome and comfortable...reminiscent of a more relaxed and elegant lifestyle.  There's even a 1940 Ford Woodie at the entry, to complete the retro look.  Unfortunately, there are also resort amenity fees and valet parking fees totalling $55 a day, so don't go here on a budget.  You can buy lunch at the pool, but it'll take awhile to get it and your roast beef sandwich (pre-wrapped in a rather dry bun, suggesting it's been waiting for you) arrives without lubrication, and delivered to you by a bored, disinterested staff.  You almost have the feeling that the staff would prefer to be elsewhere.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our beautiful resort and the convenient location. We regret that your service at the pool was unsatisfactory and we will be sure to address this issue with our team. Your experience is very important to us and as you will read from previous reviews, our staff is known for their excellence in friendliness, attentiveness and professionalism. We hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule.

Summary Heading: Great views, comfy bed and good service
Summary: Was here for conference and fully enjoyed the experience.  I did not upgrade my room but still had nice little deck with view of ocean .  The bed was comfortable and service throughout the hotel was great.  I'd definitely come back for personal vacation!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope your conference was a success. Thank you for the wonderful compliments. We are delighted that you got a good night‚Äôs rest and that our staff service met your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back for a personal vacation. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed just one night, and we will likely be back.  The property is lovely, and we particularly enjoyed walking in the adjacent park to see the coastal views and the marina below.  Accessible to great walking and shopping areas, it is also easy to imagine spending a weekend without ever leaving the hotel.  The room was well apppointed, although the bed was oddly uncomfortable (linens were gorgeous, but maybe something about the mattress?). Staff was friendly overall, but the restaurant staff was standout in their performance.  It's good we found the restaurant (hidden downstairs) or we would have missed this dinner and breakfast opportunity to feel both warmly welcomed and completely taken care of.  The restaurant team as a whole took this rating from a three to a four.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that your dining experience was outstanding. We appreciate the compliments of the dining facility and staff and we will be sure to share these comments with our team. We are excited to welcome you back and we look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Web price of $159.00 really means $237.50 - A real scam
Summary: I always do my hotel shopping on the web and was thrilled to see a Dana Point hotel at such a great rate.  After $32.00 parking fee, a $25.00 resort fee and $21.50 of various fees...  My great advertised rate of $159.00 turned into $237.50.  Beautiful place but I rate it POOR because of the false advertising.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We were sorry to hear you were not aware of our parking and resort fees as we inform guests in a few different areas regarding these fees.  On the confirmation you received for your guestroom our parking and resort fee is noted under your room rate.  In addition, the parking and resort fee is noted on our website under Guest Services.  We do not like to surprise our guests with any fee so we clearly state them in multiple places. We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us and we hope that we may have the opportunity to serve you again in the near future.

Summary: My family and friends stayed here and had a wonderful experience, besides some things were a bit pricey for what you get which were some of my only downfalls about this place. The room was a little small, however, was still amazingly comfy(big shout out to housekeeping our rooms were clean and always stocked. I have had some bad experience else where with that)  The staff was very kind the minute we arrived especially valet. They were always smiling and very apologetic whenever it took to long for the car to arrive.  You have to check out the gym my husband and friends claimed it was outrageously nice ! My friends and I also enjoyed playing tennis as well of course as the spa. I cannot stress about how nice the views are and a very short walk to the harbor with many eatery's as
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that we provided you with a "Wow" experience from the moment of arrival to departure. We are happy to hear that you had a great experience and completely satisfied with every area you visited at the resort. We thank you for sharing your experience with us and we look forward to welcoming you and your friends the next time you visit California.

Summary: This is a beautiful spot in a fantastic location.  The staff was always friendly and ready to help.  Common areas were immaculate however individual rooms were in need of a slight refreshing.  Nothing scary - just chips in furniture and such.  Make sure to enjoy the patio!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We thank you for your compliments regarding our location and staff service. Our staff is quite exceptional and their goal is to provide an unforgettable experience for all of our guests and we feel that this goal was accomplished during your stay with us. We hope you visit us again the next time you visit Southern California.

Summary Heading: Amazing with a view, immaculate room, great staff
Summary: What a great place... the staff was so nice, room immaculate and comfy.  Great stay!  So close we walked to the beach, restaurants and shops.  Great ocean breeze and view.  Amazing.  The staff went out of their way to make us feel welcome.  Very kind and inviting. (A special thank you to Ellie who was so welcoming!)  The hotel was lovely and the location was so nice.  Great views of the ocean and can easily walk to Doheny Beach and lots of shops and restaurants close by in Dana Point Harbor.  Felt like the price of the room was great too!  Will plan another trip here soon.  Next time we will bring the kids!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and we appreciate your compliments regarding our welcoming and professional staff. We couldn‚Äôt agree with you more, we have the most courteous and caring staff here at Laguna Cliffs. Your stay is extremely important to us and we take great pride in the level of service we provide to our guests to make this happen. We are happy that you enjoyed the harbor and marina and we look forward to welcoming your children on your next visit. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: My entire family (7) visited last year and had a tremendous time.  Staff was very courteous.  Views were awesome and weather was fantastic.  Very kid friendly.  Short walk to the beach.  We will definitely return.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We appreciate your wonderful compliments and we are delighted that your entire family enjoyed their stay with us. We can‚Äôt wait to welcome you back and provide another ‚ÄúWOW‚Äù experience. We look forward to seeing you all soon.

Summary Heading: Great property with excellent service, but not quite perfect
Summary: We were checked in by Brian and he was awesome.  Too bad it was literally his last day, as he got an even better job at at a nearby surf company - and boy did he look the part.  We arrived to our room and it wasn't very large (SoCal don't you know) but was very plush in a tropical sort of way.  Clean with a nice balcony overlooking the pool area (not all rooms have balconies).  The bed was very comfortable, but the mattress was older and has "ruts" from where previous guests have slept.  They must not turn them very often - if at all.  Still comfortable even if you are reminded that many others have slept in that same bed.  The A/C in the room was great and the TV worked fine.  I've seen bigger in lesser Marriott's (like the Fairfield Inn of Hays, KS) but it had a good selection
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. It sounds like you were able to enjoy many amenities of the resort and local attractions. We are happy to hear that our friendly staff was attentive to all of our needs. We look forward to your visit next month and we hope that you are able to try the Vue Restaurant and Spa during your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Room Needs Some TLC but Ambience Great
Summary: The view is spectacular and the staff is Marriott professional and trained.  Especially good were the waitpersons in the dining/bar area.  They did seem on one night to be understaffed.  One hiccup occurred when I requested a sitting near the window for later that evening for a special occasion.  Keep in mind that I was doing business meals/meetings all day, so they knew me & I am a Lifetime Gold Member.  The one thing I believe is in the service industry you should never do is simply say "no" to a paying customer.  I worked it out later and a very kind waitperson & bartender comped a drink and brought a cupcake!  Good thinking.   Pool area is very nice and clean.  I did not have the opportunity to use the spa due to business.  Pricy to park a car, but in fairness, parking is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff. We thank you for sharing your experience with us and we are delighted to hear that we were able to fulfill your request despite the hiccup. We look forward to your next visit and we would definitely recommend that you experience the Spa. We know you will not be disappointed.  We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This Resort is in a great location overlooking Dana Point Harbor.  The room was clean but average.  The bed was old and had body ruts in it, so the middle of the bed was the high spot.  I was woken up several times by people yelling in the hallway throughout the night.  This is more of a family resort than a couples retreat, kids of all ages everywhere.  The pool was a zoo.  I was charged $32 for Valet parking a car that I did not bring.  I did confront the front desk who removed the charge with no question.  Overall I was hoping to have an enjoyable weekend away, but was left a bit disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our resorts location and cleanliness. We regret that you felt the resort was not conducive for a couples retreat. We find the resort to be a perfect fit for business travelers, couples, and families. We do apologize if there were too many people at the pool. The beauty of Southern California is the sunshine that is present year round and our guests take advantage of this amazing weather by being outside. We encourage our guests to utilize the two pools that the resort offers (one has a children‚Äôs splash zone and the other does not). We are happy to hear that we were able to correct your parking charge and we apologize for the inconvenience this may have caused.

Summary: Nick was terrific at check in. Demonstrating all the hotel's features. Ashley in the lounge was attentive and always smiling. Megan was a little swamped and hard to come by, but still overall the experience was decadent. Try the donut holes! really decadent. Trying the spa today.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star rating. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff and we will definitely share them with our team. I couldn‚Äôt agree with you more, the donut holes are my favorite dessert at the resort as well. We hope you enjoyed your spa treatment and we‚Äôre sure you left feeling relaxed and rejuvenated. We look forward in having you back the next time you are in Dana Point.

Summary: Stayed at the Lagune Cliffs Resort on 3-26-14 and I agree that the location and facility is gorgeous.  My issue stems from someone in the mandatory valet taking liberties with my car.  Went out for dinner the night I checked in and when my car was brought to me the next morning at checkout there was someone else's CD playing in the stereo, food wrappers on the passenger floor, and an empty orange juice container on the passenger seat.  None of these were mine.  As you can imagine, I am now worried who was been doing who knows what in my car??  I called the Desk Manager and she apologized saying she would look into it after talking to the Valet Manager and would call me back that day.  No call.  A few days go by and still no call.  So I call the resort back, get the same Desk
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to apologize for the experience you had with our valet service and deeply regret that you walked away from your stay disappointed and angry. We are very interested in learning more about this situation as our valet service is extremely professional and courteous and we have never received a complaint of this sort. It is quite puzzling to us. We take this very seriously and we would like to remedy the issue immediately. If you could please reach out to our Rooms Director, we would appreciate it. His number is 949-487-7517.

Summary: Beautiful property with magnificent views of the Pacific ocean.  Being platinum members we got free upgrade to the suite without asking for it. Wifi worked well, breakfast was plentiful for about $25 per person.  Rooms clean and room service was nice. would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We couldn‚Äôt agree with you more, the ocean views are magnificent. We thank you for the lovely compliments regarding our property, room service and speedy Wi-Fi. We hope you enjoyed your complimentary upgrade and we thank you for being loyal Marriott customers. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: This resort is located at the top of cliffs over looking the parks and harbor. Many restaurants, shops and the harbor are within walking distance. The walk back is a bit of a hike since its quite a steep hill or stairs to get back to the resort. The pool area is relaxing with good music playing. The two down sides of this resort are the walls in the room are thin... And the prices for food and drinks are ridiculously high! Other than that it is a beautiful place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the resorts close proximity to the harbor and marina. We hope that you were able to relax and unwind at our pools during your stay. We appreciate your feedback and will definitely take your comments into consideration. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: I've been coming here for years and I haven't wanted to review this place because I don't want people to know about it.  Sure there are the Ritz and Montage and St. Regis  down the street but I truly prefer the Cliffs based on price, accommodations and overall service.  If I had a complaint, it's that they don't give you enough pillows in the room unless you ask for it.  The pillows are somewhat older and flattens easily so if you want to prop yourself up to watch TV or work, you're out of luck.  But requests extra pillows in the reservation or call housekeeping and they will happily give you as much as you need.  Try this hotel at least once and I guarantee you will come back again and again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and for all of your wonderful compliments. We appreciate your recommendation to travelers and we too hope that everyone visiting the Orange County coast experience this resort at least once because we are just as confident that travelers will be back. We want to thank you for your review and for allowing your ‚Äúsecret‚Äù to get out. We look forward to welcoming you back to the resort soon.

Summary Heading: Too expensive for what you get.
Summary: We used marriott point for our week stay. We had to upgrade to the category 6 which we were told would be 15000 extra points. They ended up charging us 30000 extra points. Even the supervisor said it was 15000 but in the end the took double that. On top of that they charge a resort fee of $27.50 per day plus $32 per day parking. We ended up parking on the street but when we got the bill they had charged us double the parking for seven days. How does that happen?  No refrigerator or microwave in the room. They did have a one cup coffee maker but the coffee was bad. They advertise free yoga classes. The yoga class is actually at the community park nearby and not run by marriott at all. It was a nice hotel but they nickel and dime you. They could add a few amenities for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We apologize for the mischarges on your bill and we will address this with our team. In regards to having no refrigerator, we do in fact rent refrigerators upon request. Our ‚ÄúAt Your Service‚Äù Department or Housekeeping department are available to assist with any of those requests. We do in fact advertise that there are complimentary yoga classes in the park and do not state that the resort conducts the classes. We apologize for the misunderstanding. Many of our guests take advantage of the free classes and we have received nothing put positive feedback. Our resort fee includes many of the amenities you were addressing in your review including complimentary bike rentals, tennis equipment, boogie board rentals and high speed Wi-Fi in your guest room.

Summary Heading: Excellent service, views, location and property
Summary: Really, this resort provides exceptional value and location for your travel dollar. The only reason that I am not giving it a 5 star rating is that a property of this size and caliber should have immediate and consistent wi-if access in the rooms. The first night I arrived, I couldn't access the web, called the front desk and he eventually fixed my access, although it remained somewhat spotty during the duration of my stay. Wonderful views and wonderful balcony. Would recommend to couples, just ask for a quiet room away from the families because the hallways can get noisy and they do have an extensive marriott kids program, so be aware of the noise factor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and great compliments. We appreciate your comments regarding our ‚Äúexcellent service, views, location and property.‚Äù We apologize for the spotty internet service you experienced during your stay and we can assure you that this problem has been resolved. We hope you have a chance to visit us again soon.

Summary: Very nice located but hated the $32 parking fee and the internet not free does not work half of the time. Also ocean view is partial and they charge extra for it. Please read the small letters. My reservation read $129 and with parking and resort fees and taxes it was more than 200 ! First time I get disappointed of a Marriot property. Also beds were uncomfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort rates to be in line and are actually the most economical. We clearly state these fees so that our guests are aware prior to their arrival. In regards to your comments addressing our uncomfortable beds, we apologize if they were not to your liking. As you will read from previous reviews, the majority of our guests give us wonderful compliments and feedback regarding the comfort of the beds. Your opinion matters greatly to us and we appreciate your comments.

Summary: Just a quick twenty four hour overnight trip for us as part of a meeting where J. and I were hosted so it may seem to be petty of me  to complain about all the extras, as so many other reviewers have done, since I wasn't paying - more on that in a minute. First the good. The staff are friendly and eager to help - almost too much so. The hotel lobby and bar are modern and elegant and our room was entirely satisfactory, clean too, with a comfortable bed and superior linens. Unfortunately the chain hotel roots still  show a bit so that the hotel somehow lacks character. Our dinner and reception were staffed and catered by the hotel and to my surprise, given how many of these events I've experienced over the years, were really, really good. The food was excellent and the service was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for sharing your experience with us. We are happy to hear that you had a successful meeting and that you felt our catering staff was ‚Äúreally, really good.‚Äù We appreciate your compliments regarding the food and service levels and we will take it as a compliment that our staff was too friendly and eager to help. Your stay is extremely important to us and our staff provides exceptional service for all of our guests in order to ensure that you are comfortable and completely satisfied. We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: Great location for business meeting,  weddings,  or retreat.  Ocean View,  nice weather,  clean, comfortable rooms.  But to not have consistent wifi throughout the hotel,  including the room is analogous to not having water.   Pathetic.  There's no excuse,  esp when you are charged for it.  Their technology is outdated.  No business that needs wifi should be held here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our beautiful ocean view property and comfortable beds. We couldn‚Äôt agree with you more the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa is perfect for any traveler, whether it be for business, leisure, family getaway or wedding destination, we meet every customer‚Äôs needs. We want to apologize for any inconvenience our inconsistent Wi-Fi may have had during your stay. We know how frustrating it is to have spotty service and we want you to know that we in the process of improving our Wi-Fi connection right now. Thank you for your feedback. Your opinion is extremely important to us and we assure you, we will resolve this issue.

Summary: Our entire family stayed here for a wedding at a nearby location.  We had several rooms.  The front desk was able to place all of us on the same floor, which was terrific while getting ready for the rehearsal and the actual wedding.  Breakfast can get expensive, but there is a Starbucks in the lobby with nice seating.  There is no self-parking, so beware of the fees!  Wow, with several cars, these fees really added to our bill.  We are Marriott members, so did not have to pay internet fees, but this would also jack up your bottom line.  Staff was excellent.  My husband dropped a check from his jacket pocket and management put out an "all points bulletin" until the check was found!  We were so appreciative of their help.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you and your family enjoyed your time here at the resort. We are happy that we were able to accommodate the rooms for all of your family as you attended a nearby wedding. Thank you for your compliments regarding our staff service. Our care and deliverance goes above and beyond and finding your check is a prime example. We are happy that we were able to locate your lost check and host your wedding party at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: This resort is beautiful. It is very busy, but the check in was quick and painless, they accommodated our room request. The rooms are very nice, the bed quite comfortable. The atmosphere is relaxed and inviting. The food was hot, fresh, great flavor and priced competitively. The ocean is little walk but you can do it. The grounds can be walking friendly for the physically challenged. Parking fees are too high, especially for a paying overnight guest, however, it is a spectacular photographers dream and completely worth every penny spent. Saturday entertainment in the upstairs bar was great, I would go back for that again. If you want ocean experience and dining and shopping, leisure hanging at the heated pool, go for it. You won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review and for all your wonderful compliments. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We promise to continue to provide you with new, life-long memories. We can't wait for your next visit!

Summary: Nice hotel and we have been there many times but this visit was so different.  When we entered our room we noticed a loud humming noise coming from an exhaust fan outside.  We Immediately called the front desk and ask to change our room since we were staying two nights. They said they were sold out and could maybe move us tomorrow.  The noise kept us up all night and we were wearing ear plugs.  Called to complain and they Comped us a free pot of coffee. Wow! We decided to go home.  Poor customer service!  I will go to the Ritz next time!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We regret that you were having noise issues with the exhaust fan and we truly apologize that we could not switch your room because of our sold out situation. Please know that your comfort and experience is extremely important to us and we are confident that our staff would have been more than happy to switch your room if we had the guest room availability. We feel horrible that you had to leave and we will definitely look into the noise issue coming from your room and correct this immediately.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel in an amazing location
Summary: We only stayed one night, but we were just looking for a quick getaway, and this was terrific.  We arrived on a gorgeous March day with the temperature in the high 70s.  Great front desk service (Matt), a room overlooking the property with a partial ocean view, the usual comfortable Marriott bed, and a great breakfast in their restaurant-The Vue.  Short & sweet.  Looking forward to a return visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that we were your getaway destination. Thank you for your compliments regarding the resort and wonderful staff service you received during your stay. We are delighted that you enjoyed your partial ocean-view room and comfortable bed. We too look forward in welcoming you back for another getaway.

Summary: This is a nice place but do not be fooled by the reasonable room prices quoted - you will almost certainly end up paying a lot more. Taxes quoted are only 'estimated' so may be more. Valet Car Parking charge is $32 per day and is compulsory (no self-parking). Internet $13 per day. Before you know it your $245 room fee is over $300.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We understand that there are additional fees when staying at resorts and that is why we clearly inform our guests about these fees. We state these fees in a couple areas including your confirmation e-mail and our website under Guest Services. Thank you again for you feedback, we will take your comments under review.

Summary: Great location near the highway but close to the water.  The lobby looks new and the exterior of the building is well kept.  The rooms are in pretty good shape except my bathroom had a leaky shower head (dripped all night) and toilet and sink faucet!  The HVAC is also LOUD when it kicks on.  The bed and pillows were very comfy.  Valet is $32/night.  I'd probably stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. The views of the Pacific Ocean are quite breathtaking and we hope you enjoyed the scenery as much as we do. We want to apologize for the leaky fixtures in your guest room. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will notify our team immediately to make the appropriate repairs and we again apologize for the interrupted sleep this may have caused. Your comfort and experience at the resort is extremely important to us and we take very review very seriously. We want to assure you that we will address your concerns immediately. Thank you again and we look forward in having you stay with us in the near future.

Summary: Visited during the past week.  Conference happening nearby at The Ritz - so this hotel was packed with attendees.  Regardless, the capable staff made sure everything happened smoothly.  Andrea at the front desk is a superstar - she went out of her way to be sure we had a magical stay.  The hotel and grounds are immaculate.    Our room looked over the children's pool - very loud during the day but no problems in the evenings.  Next time, would ask for a different location.  The room was better than average.  Could not believe how comfortable the beds were.    Had dinner at The Vue.  It was very good - maybe not great.  Food and service were better than ok, but I guess I expected a little more?  Breakfast was superb.  Lots of fresh fruit.  Overall, can't wait to go back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. It brings us great joy to hear that our staff treated you like royalty. Your comfort and satisfaction is of upmost importance to our entire team and we want your experience at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa to fall nothing short of excellence. We are glad that you enjoyed your dining experience at Vue restaurant and we too look forward in having you back.

Summary: My husband & I just returned from the hotel, where we celebrated our 30th wedding anniversary. It was fantastic. The facility is spectacular & the staff is even better. We loved it. They had a great band playing in the bar on Friday & Saturday night, too. We can't say enough about this romantic, beautiful place. Will go back again.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your 30th wedding anniversary. We feel honored that you and your husband chose to celebrate this beautiful occasion at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are delighted to hear that your stay was fantastic and we are happy that you enjoyed listening to the bands in our OverVue Lounge. Thank you for all of your wonderful compliments and for your 5 star rating. We look forward to welcoming you back again.

Summary: Clean rooms, Excellent service, Great place to relax and get close to some good surfing.. Great meeting place for clients... Pull the trigger on staying here , Its worth it !! The ambiance and the fresh air was sooooo needed....
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We appreciate your compliments regarding our resort and we are delighted that you experienced our top notch service. We couldn‚Äôt agree with your more, the fresh ocean breeze and views of the Pacific are rejuvenating. Surfing is a must and the beach is just walking distance from the resort. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: My wife and I had a reservation at another hotel in Laguna Beach area but the rooms were not air conditioned so we had to find another place to stay.Saw the Laguna Cliffs ,which we never heard of,on the web and made reservation on the phone arriving 12 minutes later.  The front desk staff made us feel like we were their best guests coming back for another visit. They apologized for having only a room with two beds and not a  King Bed available. This was the week of Valentine's day. I found the room rates to be very fair.  Our room was clean and offered a great view of the dana Point Harbour and ocean. The A/C worked although the air blew parallel to the bed and not across it. The beds were extremely comfortable and the pillows were fine. Our room was in a wing of the hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted that you were first time visitors and hopefully future return guests of ours. We are delighted that you had a wonderful experience and that we were able to make you feel right at home. The city of Dana Point is truly fascinating and beautiful and it's great that you were able to visit the harbor and walk around the marina. We are happy to hear that you had the ‚Äúbest‚Äù deep tissue massage at our Spa. We are sorry for the inconvenience of the spotty reception of your Cable TV. We will have our team look into this immediately to fix the problem. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We appreciate your recommendation and we hope you visit us again when you are in the area.  We would love to welcome you back.

Summary: We had an amazing getaway here, enjoyed the spa so much, and the bar too, bought a package deal from their website. Great location, walked to the harbor for dinner. Everything was going well until we went to fall asleep. This hotel had THE WORST bed/pillows ever. Everything we had worked out at the massage the previous day was reversed in one night, my husband can barely walk or move because he is in so much back pain, and has to go see his chiropractor as soon as he gets home. We looked forward to coming again with our son, but afraid we wont be back, it was so bad. We came as our first get away from our 1 year old, and were hoping to get a full nights sleep and came away with maybe 3 hours between us and more tired than when we arrived.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your spa experience and the OverVue Lounge. We apologize that you did not sleep well. We know the importance of getting a good night‚Äôs rest and we are very surprised that you felt the beds were uncomfortable. As you can read from previous reviews, most of our guests compliment us on the comfort of our beds and praise us for giving them a wonderful night‚Äôs rest. We feel very bad that you did not experience a pleasurable night‚Äôs rest. Please note that we do offer different types of pillows and our ‚ÄúAt Your Service‚Äù department would be more than happy assist you with that at any time of the night. Thank you again for your feedback and we do regret that you both did not sleep well.

Summary Heading: Nice on the outside and terrible inside
Summary: I don't think you can find a better location for a Hotel.  The view from all over the hotel is just stunning.  I stayed at this hotel twice and on both visits I noticed small spiders in the bathroom.  The room felt like it was worn out.  The staff and service was OK overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We cannot agree with you more, the panoramic ocean views of the resort and just breathtaking. We will definitely look into the spiders you are referring to in your bathroom. This is the first we‚Äôve ever heard of this. Thank you again for your review and appreciate your feedback.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for a Coastal Getaway
Summary: Pros: close to harbor, restaurants, whale/watching---comfortable rooms, friendly, helpful staff ---good, but expensive food--- friendly, prompt valet service--good views--public park adjacent   Cons: Resort fee/ + tax 27.50  for services which as Marriott Gold Elite Members should be free--we protested and it was removed--never encountered this before in the Marriotts we've stayed in around the world --no other perks were offered  Valentines event in tent, outside our window, with loud music until midnight, disturbing
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the resort‚Äôs views and comfortable beds during your stay with us. We are happy that our staff was helpful to your needs and that you found the service to be prompt and efficient. We apologize for any inconvenience the music created during your stay. Your comfort is of upmost importance to us and we try to avoid any and all disturbances to our guests. Thank you for your review. We hope you visit us again.

Summary: Let me start off by saying it's a very nice hotel.  BUT I discussed with my significant other that I would like to go to Laguna Beach.  He booked the hotel.  Even though it's Laguna Cliffs, sorry it's not really even near Laguna.  It's in Dana Point, which is also very nice, it's just not Laguna Beach.  Upon check-out we got a final bill.   With a Valet Parking fee of $32.00.  And 2 Resort fees one for $25.00 and one for $2.50.  First of all you have no choice as to Valet Park and what is a Resort Fee anyway?  Why not just put those charges into your actual room rate?  Makes your Hotel Room cost look better. With this location I'm sure most travelers arrive vis their own car or rental car.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We apologize if you thought the resort was in Laguna Beach. Our resort is in Dana Point and there is no indication anywhere on our website or destination map that shows us in Laguna Beach. We are a short distance to Laguna Beach but we are proudly situated in Dana Point, CA. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.    We are sorry hear you were not aware of our parking and resort fees as we inform guests in a few different areas regarding these fees.  On the confirmation you received for your guestroom our parking  and resort fee is noted under your room rate.  In addition, the parking and resort fee is noted on our website under Guest Services.  We hope that this does not damper your stay in any way. Your opinion matters to us and we hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: Stayed here for a bday celebration.  Staff overall are courteous and helpful.  Room was clean and bright.  However, walls r a little thin so I was able to hear my neighbors tv pretty clearly.  Pool was nice, but the wait for the poolside service was too long (took ~30min to bring out what we ordered).  One thing I wad disappointed about- im a marriot silver member, stayed at the resort on my actual bday, but the front desk agent did not acknowledge any of that during the check in.  I wasnt expecting any upgrades or anything, but acknowledgement in little things like that is what makes the customer service experience different bw properties.    Overall, it's a solid 4.
Manager Response: Happy belated birthday. We want to start off by thanking you for choosing the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa for your birthday getaway and for being a loyal Marriott Rewards member. We are happy to hear that you found our staff courteous and helpful and enjoyed your guest room. We regret that your birthday was not acknowledged by our staff. Our team‚Äôs attention to detail is impeccable and we must admit that we are shocked that there was no acknowledgement of your birthday. Our team takes great pleasure in recognizing birthdays, anniversaries, engagements, etc. for all of our guests. We will be sure to bring this to our team‚Äôs attention as we believe this was an oversight. Thank you for stating this in your review, we will definitely address this with our staff. We again want to wish you a belated birthday and hope that you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: I recently stayed here two nights with my family (13-year old twin sons and my wife).  The property is open and inviting with great, panoramic views of the ocean.  Property- Clean rooms, comfortable beds.  There was a neat elephant sculpture display going on while we where there, with stories attached to read about real elephants around the world that had met serious challenges. Valet fees run about $35/day, in addition to $25 daily resort fees, that include some local activities.  For Elite guests, there is not much to offer.  I am a Lifetime Platinum member with Marriott, and instead of free breakfast( no Concierge lounge) I was given the opportunity to use the Eucalyptus spa and steam room???  Not too sure how that is a trade, but I never took advantage of the offer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and sharing your experience with us. We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. The Elephants do tell a great story and Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa proudly help sponsor the extinction of these Asian Elephants. Thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive staff. Your comfort and happiness is extremely important to us and our entire staff. We take great pride in making your visit with us pleasurable from arrival to departure. We hope to see you all soon.

Summary Heading: Three days in the New Year
Summary: We have stayed at many Marriott hotels, we are a Marriott rewards member and use the points many times. We even received a deal 3 nights for the price of 2. But this stay wasn‚Äôt anything special, the hotel/resort was nice enough the rooms were large and clean. The staff were friendly and helpful. Breakfast was plentiful in the restaurant, the food was good the service was quick. I guess the location was a problem, I was hoping to relax near the ocean. The hotel is up on the cliffs and the walk down and up can be trying, the weather was cool so we didn‚Äôt use the pool and there is nothing worthwhile in walking distance. I gave it an average rating, maybe it‚Äôs not fair but that‚Äôs how I felt‚Ä¶..It was Average
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for continuing to be a loyal Marriott member. Thank you for your compliments regarding the large and well-kept guest rooms and attentive staff. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your breakfast options and quick service in our Vue Restaurant. Our staff is here to make your stay pleasurable and comfortable and we are happy to hear that you experience that. We apologize that you did not like the geographic location of the resort, set up on the cliffs. Many of our guests enjoy the serenity of the resort being set on the cliffs yet within walking distance from the harbor and marina. We hope you took advantage of the quaint shops and site seeing opportunities that were within walking distance of the resort. We thank you for your feedback and we hope you visit us again in the future

Summary Heading: Great location, be aware of daily fees.
Summary: Million dollar views, accommodating staff, fine facilities.  Be sure to be aware of resort fees: $25, parking ($33 per day which can't be avoided since there is no other option), various Cali taxes.  Adds up to over $75.00 per night!.  Few perks for Elite Rewards.  Bottom line: This is more of a Resort than a Marriott.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments. We cannot agree with your more, the views are just priceless. We are delighted to hear that you are a Marriott Rewards Elite Member and loyal to the Marriott brand. We hope that our friendly staff and facilities provided a memorable and relaxing vacation for you. We hope you visit our ‚ÄúResort‚Äù again when you are in the area, we‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary: Loved this resort!  From the beginning of our stay right until the end.   All of the staff were very friendly and helpful in each department that we interacted with from the valet to front desk as well as housekeeping.   We loved the lounge area in the evenings with the live music, and the food was delicious as well.   We had a spectacular view from out window and I came home with about 10 pictures of the same shot because I couldn't get enough of it.  The location is in a great spot beside a beautiful park overlooking the harbor. I would go back in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us from the moment you arrived to the moment you departed. We wish you could stay with us longer but we do hope you consider us your home away from home. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and there are times where we cannot get enough of the views ourselves so we understand taking photos of the same spot. The views look like a backdrop to a movie and sometimes it‚Äôs hard to believe it‚Äôs real. We cannot wait to welcome you back to your second home. See you soon.

Summary: This was one of the most pleasant surprises that I have ever encountered with a Hotel. I was expecting a 3 to 3 1/2 star hotel. Upon arrival I was treated just like the nearby Ritz Carleton. The staff was as topnotch. The hotel was the nicest Marriott that I have ever stayed at anywhere. It has a very upscale feel for a Marriott. The location has stellar views from many vantage points. There is a small park next to the property that allows you a nice place to take a safe comfortable walk. If you stay here, you will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that your experience was topnotch. We have been told that we are a hidden gem and we are delighted that you discovered the resort. Our goal is to only excel and deliver an experience that leaves our guests with fond memories. We thank you for all of your compliments and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful location overlooking Dana point harbor
Summary: My husband and I were looking to stay at a marriott property in Orange County. This hotel fit the bill for a weekend trip. We loved the location overlooking Dana point harbor. We enjoyed a walk down there one morning. We were surprised that the parking was a mandatory $32 valet. Definitely didn't seem necessary for this caliber of property.  Only one minor complaint was housekeeping knocking on our door at 8:30pm the night before we were checking out.  We already had room service for the day, and thus didn't have the privacy sign on our door.  Just very surprised why she was trying to come in our room at that time.  There was a note on the nightstand explaining housekeeping comes between 9-5.  Otherwise wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you chose the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa for your weekend getaway. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of the resorts location to the harbor and marina and enjoyed a walk down the street. We regret that you were disturbed by one of our housekeepers at 8:30 pm. We will address this with our team to find out why they came to your room. It could have possibly been an innocent mistake and we hope that it did not pose an inconvenience to you in any way. We hope you and your husband visit us again the next time you visit Orange County.

Summary Heading: great location, but don't expect great service
Summary: We recently stayed here for 3 nights. We were planning a staying for 2 nights, but extended our stay an extra night because we really enjoyed the area and the hotel location.  LOCATION: Beautiful and peaceful location. Across the street from a small park with great trails for a morning walk. It is also a short drive to great restaurants and beaches.  HOTEL: We had to pay a resort fee, but it was too cold to use the pool of any of the amenities. The gym is really nice but is in a separate building with the spa.   ROOM: The rooms are standard rooms. At home feel with a comfy bed and a nice balcony. I loved their hand soap!    CUSTOMER SERVICE: To be completely honest, we travel about every other month, typically staying at 4 star and 5 star hotels, we are pretty easy to please and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We thank you for taking the time to address your concerns with us. We regret that you had an unsatisfactory experience with us during your stay. We can assure you that guest satisfaction is our top priority here at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. Our entire staff is trained on making our guests stay as comfortable and pleasurable as we can. As you can read from previous reviews, we receive the best compliments from guests regarding our high level of service. We are very disappointed that you did not experience this level of excellence during your stay with us. Your comments are very important to us and will be shared with our team to help us improve upon any shortfalls or inconsistencies. Our Resort is synonymous with providing an exceptional experience for our guests, so we were happy to hear you felt the location was excellent and we certainly hope you'll reconsider giving us another opportunity in the future to restore your faith.

Summary: Came in late and left early but what we saw of this hotel was great!  Rose Bowl weekend so lots of Sparty fans.  The hotel even had a Spartan silhoutte shining near the entrance.  Our room was beautiful, bed super comfy and really quiet.  Wish we would have stayed here longer.  Laguna Hills is to die for.  Absolutely loved the town.  We will be back....the next time Michigan State heads to Pasadena!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are delighted to hear that you loved Dana Point and the resort. We look forward to having you back and we want you to return too! We hope to see you soon.

Summary: This is a very nice looking hotel, from the outside it reminds you of the Hotel Del Coronado. We stayed at this hotel during an off season time and not very many people here during our stay. Upon check in we asked if there were any ocean view rooms available, the guy at the check in desk informed us they were available for an up charge of $60.00 per night. That was understandable in a busier time for the hotel, but customer satisfaction was not very high on this guys list. He never looked at us, didn't greet us with a welcome or even a hello, didn't smile once, showed us where our room was on a map and walked away. He truly was the only tool we met that weekend. The valet staff were really very nice to deal with, courteous and prompt. The room itself had updated decor, good size
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our king dining staff and great food at Vue Restaurant. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of the two outdoor pools and the 24 hour fitness center located near our spa. We wanted to address your concern about our Front Office agent. Your stay is of upmost importance to us and it would be our pleasure to upgrade your room at a minimal cost at any time, if occupancy permits. We offer that to all of our guests if we have the rooms available. We apologize if you felt that the agent was not attentive to you and your needs. As you will read from many past reviews, we receive many fine compliments regarding our exceptional front office staff service and we want you to know that we will address this issue with our staff immediately. It is our job to provide a warm and friendly welcome to each and every guest and we hope that you see this incidence as an exception and not the rule. Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa is known for its high level of service and your opinion matters to us. We look forward in welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Nice but bed was like a hammock!!
Summary: Just stayed for our 30th Anniversary..nice resort but the bed in room 3002 literally felt like a hammock. I was disappointed in the lack of restful sleep and the fact there was nothing special as a treat for our anniversary.  We rarely get to go away to a nice hotel so I guess I expected a descent nights rest. The staff was kind though..
Manager Response: Congratulations on your anniversary. We are sorry to hear that the bed was not to your liking. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will definitely have our staff take a look into this. As you can read from previous reviews, we receive many wonderful compliments regarding the comfortable beds and the good night‚Äôs rest our guests experience during their stay. Once again, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will fix this issue immediately. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: The location of the hotel is great if you enjoy the view of the pacific ocean every morning. My room was amazing and being able to open the balcony door every morning to enjoy the fresh air was amazing. The fact that it was zero below in NY and i was in high 70s every day made the stay even better. The restaurant food was good and not overpriced. The only thing that was a overpriced was the $32 fee for valet parking since its mandatory and you can not park in the street after 11pm. Also not a fan of the resort fee.... besides that, the resort was amazing and so peaceful!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad to hear that you woke up to the Pacific Ocean breeze every morning. The beauty of Dana Point is the spectacular weather we have all year long. There is nothing better than to be surrounded by panoramic ocean views. We are happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We hope you visit us again soon

Summary: This is a very nice hotel with a great view of Dana Point Harbor.  The staff was very courteous and helpful, especially the concierge and the spa staff.  The concierge had extensive knowledge of the local restaurants even down to San Diego.  The spa staff was very responsive even though we used it on Christmas eve day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We appreciate your compliments regarding our courteous and helpful staff. We want to make your stay as pleasurable as we can and your experience is extremely important to us. We hope you enjoyed your spa service and we hope to welcome you back the next time you visit Southern California.

Summary: The location of this hotel is perfect - a short walk to the beach and marinas. The property is beautiful and rooms are great. We booked a basic room for a very reasonable price and ended up with an ocean view and large balcony for no extra cost. Make sure to partake in the free yoga at the park across right next to the hotel. Would highly recommend!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We want nothing more than our guests to have a ‚Äúperfect‚Äù stay with us and we are delighted that you enjoyed your ocean view room and yoga class at the park. The resort has some wonderful amenities that our guests take full advantage of during their stay. We thank you for your recommendation and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My wife and I took our annual no-kids post-Christmas/New Years trip in December 2013 to Southern California, and decided to stay at this resort for three nights to start the trip before heading down to San Diego's Gaslamp Quarter for NYE.  We absolutely LOVED this place, and wished that we could have stayed longer.    There are shopping and eating options within walking distance from the resort (we typically avoid hotel restaurants in order to "get out".  Be advised, though, that the walk back to the resort is all uphill from wherever you return from...  The fitness center is full of up-to-date cardio equipment and weight-lifting options, and we also enjoyed the spa (especially the eucalyptus-scented steamroom!!).  Valet attendants were very efficient, and the front staff was
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We love hearing about what our guests did during their stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your 3 day visit with us and we too wish that you could have stayed longer. Thank you for your compliments and your 5 star rating. We hope you visit us again so we can provide another ‚ÄúWow‚Äù experience. See you soon.

Summary: I've seen this resort for years driving to the Harbor and to friends' homes but it took a Christmas Party in Dana Point to bring me here to stay and I was so very pleased. Driving up, the valet staff was warm and friendly and very helpful, offering suggestions on where to eat and directions on how to get there.  The front desk staff was an extension of that same hospitable charm.  Our room did not disappoint. Quite the opposite, it was clean, roomy, well-appointed and had a balcony and view that went on and on and on.  They had me at The VIEW!  I just couldn't get enough of that beautiful Pacific Ocean and I could look all I wanted from the privacy of my balcony.  That is where we sipped champagne, slow danced (yes danced) in the moonlight and spent an entire morning drinking
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star rating and review. We are delighted to hear that you discovered our gem and had such a memorable stay. You review is so touching. Thank you for sharing your experience with us and detailing your stay. We want nothing more than our guests to enjoy every part of our resort with such satisfaction. It sounds like we truly made an impact on you and we cannot wait to welcome you back.

Summary: I was just looking for a place to get away from everything for a week and what I found was so much more. From the moment I entered the elegantly decorated lobby I was enthralled by the aesthetic and the atmosphere. I was soon promptly greeted by the exceedingly friendly front desk staff who made checking in a breeze and provided some very helpful tips about getting around the local area. My room was exactly what I asked for, a clean quiet haven with a great view where I could relax and catch up on my reading. Being an avid swimmer, upon venturing to the pool area, I was pleased to find it clean and well maintained.      The hotel restaurant has an unbeatable view of the bay and they serve an excellent breakfast with a great variety of choices every morning. The lunch menu is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are so delighted to hear that we not only exceeded your expectations but that we were that exact ‚Äúget away‚Äù resort you were looking for. We received many fine compliments regarding our staff service and we are delighted that you experienced the superb service we provide to our guests. We hope you left feeling rejuvenated and relaxed. We look forward in welcoming you back for another get away.

Summary Heading: Wow, an unexpected oasis with a staff that treats you like family (in a great way)
Summary: Okay, so this is not a hotel you‚Äôd just stop-off and grab a room on your way down the PCH, but I wish those hotels were as great as this one!  I stayed here just one night and loved it!  I would confidently recommend this fantastic place to stay and here‚Äôs why.  The rooms are all situated so you get a nice view of the ocean or harbor, the beds are more comfortable then the Westin Heavenly beds (ouch because I‚Äôm an SPG loyal and thought Westin had the best beds in town).  Furthermore, the bathrooms are large and come with everything that a spa would have.  Aside from the great room accommodations, the staff made all the difference for me.  It‚Äôs not often that I stay at a resort & spa during my business travels, but this time I happened to be coming down with food poisoning or
Manager Response: Wow. Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. When you stay with us we feel like you are family and it is our responsibility to make your stay as comfortable and pleasurable as we can. Our staff takes great pride in making every guest experience a memorable one and we are delighted to hear that you had such a wonderful experience at our resort. We thank you for your fine compliments regarding our comfortable beds. We know how important a good night's rest is for you when you are away from home. Thank you for recommending our hotel to others and we look forward in welcoming you back to our family. Our home is yours. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: Stayed here one night and the accommodations were very clean and comfortable.   Balcony small but very nice view. The staff are courteous and very helpful.  I didn't use the pool so I can't review. The resturant view can't b beat. I would highly recommend this hotel.  Not luxury but clean and neat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your compliments regarding our courteous staff and great dining experience at Vue Restaurant. Thank you for recommending our resort to others. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: One of the Best Hotels Period
Summary: I have stayed all over, but this hotel was simply fantastic.  Located on a cliff in Dana Point, you drive uphill a large driveway where non-pushy valet attendants help as needed.  You have to valet park the car, which I never love, but after paying $40 a night in LA, $32 was a relative bargain.  The lobby is wonderfully decorated.  During our stay, they had very interesting decorated ceramic elephants throughout.  The front desk staff was very friendly and helpful.  You are charged a $25 a day resort fee, but with it you get to use bikes, surfboards, etc.  We used the bikes and it went off without a hitch.  There are two main pools.  Each have hot tubs.  The chairs surrounding the pool are very comfortable.  The views are great.  We had a casual dinner one night outside at the
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 star review. We want to thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us and for all the fine compliments. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of our complimentary bike rentals that are included in the resort fee and enjoyed the resorts close proximity to the park and marina. You mentioned that you travel a lot and to say that this resort is one of the best is a huge compliment to us. We look forward in welcoming you back.

Summary: The hotel is very nice especially if you are on the ocean view... we got a good deal on the room rates for a conference we had there... I loved walking down the park outside thr hotel overlooked the pier, and in the room we were in from you can see both sunrise ans sunset. Shoot for the balcony room... the other sides are a waste of time.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your ocean view room during your conference. We hope that your conference was a success and that you took advantage of the harbor and marina that are walking distance from the resort. We agree with you, our sunrise and sunsets are truly breathtaking. We hope to see you again soon during another business or leisure vacation.

Summary Heading: Hidden charges (or how to pay for a hotel twice with Orbitz and marriot)
Summary: Nice hotel recently refurbished. I paid 200 bucks for the room or orbitz so i thought "good bargain".......but wait.... to valet park the car costs 32 bucks a night...that's obligatory....so next time I will use the famous LA county public transport to get there(ha ha ha i am joking on that one )...then there is a "resort fee"...what do they mean by resort i wonder ? what will they resort to next to charge you a few more dollars perhaps ? Then continental breakfast for 22.18...total extra charges 80 buck for one night. Add that to the 200 bucks i paid for the room and we have a grand total of 280 bucks!!!! zoweee next time I'll stay at the St. Regis and save myself some nickel....
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding the grounds of the property. Thank you for your feedback regarding our parking and resort fee rates. We apologize if you were unaware of the valet fee and resort fees. For the guest‚Äôs convenience we state all of the fees on our website as well as the confirmation e-mail. We hope that this did not pose an inconvenience to you in any way as we like to inform all our guests upfront of any fees so they are not surprised. Thank you again for your review. We hope to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: My only problem was that I was there for one night and for business, so really didn't get a chance to enjoy the resort!! Staff were lovely and friendly and my room was spacious and comfortable.  There was no desk in the room, so for a business trip I had to use the chair and footrest (no big deal).  The view and the hotel are lovely and the pool area was very appealing with plenty of sun lounges.  The view from the restaurant balcony towards the ocean was gorgeous.  I would definitely go back for a few days to experience what this place had to offer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments regarding our lovely resort and friendly staff. We take great pride in the staff service we provide and we are delighted that you were able to experience this high level of service during your stay. We agree that our views are quite spectacular and we hope the next time you are here you can take advantage of the pools and spa.  We look forward in having you visit us again whether it be for business or leisure. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great view, nice bed, friendly staff, but just decent value.
Summary: My wife and I booked a room here as a one hire get away. We paid extra for an ocean view and it was beautiful. Overall the room was spacious. The bathroom however was small and dated compared to the last couple hotels we have stayed in. The staff was very friendly and professional, but mistakenly overcharged us, which was a minor annoyance and they quickly fixed the issue. Fortunately valet parking was in our package deal, otherwise it would have been $32, plus there is a $25 resort fee, which included free wi-fi, but the speed was a rather slow. The breakfast buffet was great, but the dinner menu was limited and expensive. We went to the Chart House instead and had a great time. So, our overall opinion was we enjoyed ourselves, but it was over priced when you add in all the
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you and your wife enjoyed your spacious, ocean view room. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff service and we will be sure to share them with our team. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fee and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We look forward in welcoming you back and hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Not what I expected for the price.
Summary: I got a room that I paid for with a living social deal.  The picture they had showed a hotel on a cliff above the ocean, so I upgraded to the full ocean view with a king size bed.  When I got to the room, I have to say I was disappointed.  The room was pretty small, the bath was something you would see in a best western, and my view was decent, but not what was shown in the ad.  The view is actually of Dana Point harbor and marina, and half of the view was cut off by the room next to us, so it was really only half a view. The balcony had barely enough room for my wife and I to stand on.  I know it's standard to pay for parking, but $35 a night?  Also, to order pay per view, it's $17.  I can buy the dvd for that!  On a positive note, the staff is really friendly, and as everyone
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our exceptional staff service. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful views of Dana Point harbor and marina. We regret that your room was not to your liking. As you will read from previous reviews, we receive great compliments regarding our ocean view rooms. Your opinion matters greatly to us and our ultimate goal is to provide a completely satisfactory stay.  We are happy to hear that you did enjoy the comfort of our beds. We hope you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: My husband and I visited here the week of nov. 10. We had an aewsome time here just relaxing and enjoying the beautiful view. The elephant parade was happening here at the time which was a real treat. And we thoroughly enjoyed listening to the blue moonies in the lounge on saturday night. I would highly recommend this hotel....great room, 2 nice pools with jacuzzi, and a wonderful view.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are happy to hear that you and your husband enjoyed the beautiful views of Laguna Cliffs. The elephant parade auction was a treat for all of us to host and we are delighted to hear that you were able to experience this event during your stay. Thank you for sharing your stay with us, your opinion greatly matters to us and our goal is to create a relaxing, warm and hospitable environment for all of our guests. We hope you visit us again soon. We look forward in welcoming you back.

Summary: The property is beautiful. Staff is outstanding. We too were upgraded at arrival. Beds were very comfortable. Dining room and room service was outstanding. They serve a to die for Rueben. The best part was the spa. Had a deep tissue message by Angela Rafferty and had to be the best one yet. I normally prefer a male and initially was disappointed I had a female but she knew her technique and was outstanding. I would fly to Laguna again just to have a massage by Angela.If you have the time you will not be disappointed to schedule a massage with Angela. She is the best. Wish she were located in Arizona. I would be there once a week.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We appreciate all of your wonderful compliments. We create WOW experiences for our guests every day and we are delighted that you were able to experience the high level of service the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa provides to its guests. We are so happy that you enjoyed your deep tissue massage. Angela is outstanding and we will be sure to share your review with her and the entire Spa team. We cannot wait to welcome you back for another WOW experience!

Summary: The room was great.  I was upgraded to a room with a balcony and ocean view.  The ocean is a bit of a distance away, but there are no building obstructing the view to the ocean.  Just a park with trees.    The bar was great and had a great view and patio to enjoy your beverage and food of choice.    The bed was so comfortable and makes you not want to get up.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are happy to hear that you were upgraded to an ocean-view room. We hope that you were able to enjoy the live music in our OverVue Lounge Friday and Saturday nights. We‚Äôve received many great compliments regarding the comfort of our beds and we are delighted to hear that you too had a good night‚Äôs rest. We hope that you visit us again soon.

Summary: The Laguna Cliffs Marriott is a great stay.  There was a surfing contest just a couple of blocks away and a good golf course close by.  I thought that the pricing was reasonable given the location and property.  Mandatory parking and resort fees were too much.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to watch the surfing contest during your visit. We hope you enjoyed your day of golfing. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fee and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rate and resort fee to be in line and are actually the most economical. We hope you visit us again soon. We look forward in welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Lovely but too full of themselves
Summary: We tried to visit the lobby art exhibit which benefits the Asian elephants today. Two security guards told us that we could not go in because we were not registered guests. Our friends who are guests there were waiting for us in the lobby. Ridiculous and rude treatment! . It is a lovely place but over the top stuffy. Won't ever stay there!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Unfortunately, the elephant parade auction was a private event and the organization that was putting on this event had their security team assisting in keeping this event private. We apologize if you felt that our staff poorly handled the situation. Your opinion matters greatly to us and your satisfaction is of upmost importance. As you will read from our past reviews, we usually receive many fine compliments from our guests and we hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule. We certainly hope you'll reconsider giving Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa another opportunity in the future to restore your faith.

Summary: After paying 32 bucs for mandatory valet parking and 20 bucs resort fee got sent to a remote spot in the parking lot to smoke a cig.  Understand california is kinda anti-everything but thought this was like being sent to the principals office.  No smoking on room balconies either.  This hotel should prob advertise this feature or warn depending on who your client is
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. Marriott is committed to providing its guests and associates with a smoke-free environment and is proud to boast one of the most comprehensive smoke-free hotel policies in the industry. Since its introduction in 2006, the policy has been implemented in more than 2,500 properties throughout the United States and has received praise from our guests.  Although smoking is not permitted within our hotel, guests are permitted to smoke in a ‚Äúdesignated‚Äù area away from the building.  Our resort‚Äôs non-smoking information is printed on both the key packet you received at check-in as well as being posted on all sliding glass doors within each guestroom. Thank you for your understanding. We hope that this did not pose an inconvenience to you during your stay.

Summary: This was the perfect stay. We went for my boyfriends birthday and it was such an incredible view and centrally located to the harbor and delicious food. We rode bikes around all weekend and ate awesome food. We would definitely visit again. Only disappointment was the restaurant "The Vue" inside the hotel. I will say we ate appetizers upstairs, behind the bar and sat outside. BEST calamari I have ever had and the cheese plate is the perfect combinations.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that you had a ‚Äúperfect‚Äù stay for your boyfriend‚Äôs birthday. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of our complimentary bike rentals and were able to ride around the city of Dana Point. Thank you for your compliments regarding the calamari and cheese plate offered in our OverVue Lounge. We look forward in having you back soon.

Summary: Stayed at the Dana Point Marriott Cliffs Resort for a long weekend.  The property and location is spectacular, but the rooms are average at best which is to say over priced.  Food and service at the resort was very good, however room service was terrible.  We ordered breakfast two mornings and although it arrived on time, all the food was cold and the coffee at best was just warm.  Notified the room service kitchen, but nothing was done to correct the situation nor were the meals deducted from our checkout bill.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our food and staff service at the resort. We apologize that you were not satisfied with your order from our in room service. We take every review seriously and will address your concern with our Food & Beverage team to assure that this does not happen in the future. We hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: We just held our daughter's wedding at this hotel and everything exceeded our expectations.  The location and view of course are great, and since this was a destination wedding, being within walking distance to Dana Point marina was very nice.  We had a large group staying at the hotel, and everyone enjoyed their rooms and the hotel service was outstanding.  We held 3 separate events at the hotel over the course of the weekend, and they were all executed flawlessly.  Excellent setup, food, service...  I would definitely stay at the hotel again.  And, I highly recommend it for an event!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments and 5 star rating. We want to congratulate you on your daughter‚Äôs wedding. Nothing means more to us then executing a ‚Äúflawless‚Äù event for our guests. We are delighted to hear that all of your out of town guests enjoyed their stay with us as well. We will share your compliments with our staff and look forward in having you and your family return for another visit soon.

Summary: We stayed here with our extended family - had 4 rooms - and we loved it!  Our room had the biggest balcony and best views, it overlooked the ocean and coastline which was amazing.  The pool/spa were very relaxing for adults and they had an area for the kids to play.  You could walk to the beach, we have 3 young kids and we managed fine going downhill but holding an infant (and all the beach gear) while walking uphill was challenging.  So if you plan to walk, pack lightly. The beach there was a bit rocky but the ocean water was really warm.  I do NOT like cold water and even I was playing in the ocean.  They ONLY offer valet parking no self parking so be aware of that.  Location is great - to save some money we dined at Stack Pancake House and also Bubba Kahuna's Pizza - Go to
