Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that you and your family enjoyed the two outdoor pools and that you visited Doheny State Beach during your stay. We enjoy hearing what kind of activities our guests partook in during their vacation. We are a basecamp between Los Angeles and San Diego and our guests find that our destination is ideal for visiting theme parks and other tourist attractions in both locations. We are happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed the resort‚Äôs views and all of the amenities we provide. We look forward in having you all back in the near future.

Summary Heading: third time still a charm. fabulous
Summary: This is my 3rd visit in 2 years.  This hotel rocks.  Beautiful grounds and property.  Outstanding personal and friendly service. Wonderful spa with unique treatments.  Right near Dana Point Harbor where you can take the ferry to Catalina Island. First stay was in a one bedroom suite with balcony and waterview. Very comfortable beds. Second was basic standard with  no balcony.  This time upgraded to a balcony with seaview. Great views of the water. Near markets and restaurants.  Restaurants at the Marriott are excellent. They run some fabulous deals at marriott.com.  Keep an eye on it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope to make every visit of yours as charming and fabulous as the first. We are delighted to hear that you are a loyal customer of ours and we appreciate your wonderful compliments. The resort offers exceptional amenities and we are happy to hear that you were able to enjoy the spa as well as our restaurants. We look forward to having you back real soon.

Summary Heading: I Take It Back - I Take It All Back
Summary: I reviewed this hotel back in 2009, and made sure to illustrate that this was a resort that seemingly catered to screaming children with the hope that it would properly prepare readers of what to expect.    We'd since stayed there for a wedding, and noticed that they were building a KIDS ONLY pool on the opposite side of the property.  This piqued our curiosity, so we figured we would give it another shot to see if this could be the relaxing resort it has the potential to be.  So we booked a night after the kids pool was completed, and it was fantastic.  Not sure if the staff had been upgraded too, or if the staff was simply more calm and focused in the absence of maniacal screaming children. It was like we were VIPs in a movie or something. People that I had never met before
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments. We are so delighted to hear that you returned to our resort and that that we completely changed your perspective from your first visit in 2009. We truly are grateful for your business and we are even more grateful that we were able to create new and lasting memories for you. We take great pride in our high service levels and all of our guests are VIP‚Äôs. Our job is to make sure that your stay is nothing but exceptional and we are happy to hear that we created this experience for you. We appreciate your positive feedback and we will be sure to share this with our team.  We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I recently stayed at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa with 2 friends.  THe Resort was lovely, and the service was great.  Our reservations were for 3 people, and there was onlly 2 coffee cups, 2 wine glasses, and not enough towels for three women.  This has happened in other hotels, but I find it unacceptable at the prices being charged.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us. We are delighted to hear that you and your friends found the staff service to be great. We apologize for the inconvenience of having to ask for any additional items for your room. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will address your concern with our Housekeeping department. Thank you for your feedback. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: I stay at this hotel a few times a year on business. It's usually when some of the other hotels in Laguna are full or the pricing is too exorbitant.  Be aware that this property is in Dana Point Harbor and not at all in Laguna.  The harbor is great for running and also has easy access to the 5 freeway.  The south side rooms are great if you get a room overlooking the harbor.   Ask for a room that doesn't have an adjoining room door otherwise it's noisy when there are folks in the other room.  The property used to allow you to self park but over the past couple of years they made it "valet only" which tacks on an additional $32 to the room price.  The "resort fee" is also a bit of a sham for business travelers.
Manager Response: We are happy to hear that we are your home away from home when you are traveling on business. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fee rates to be in line and are actually the most economical. We want to recommend our business traveler package, which includes the resort fee and valet parking. We look forward in welcoming you back soon for business or pleasure.

Summary: My wife and I ran away here for an overnight getaway pairing it with a local steakhouse certificate in San Juan.  We used our Marriott rewards points for this visit, upon our early arrival on Sunday, they gave us an upgraded room, with a view of the "Woody Car Show" going on at the park next to the property.  We enjoyed our views of the ocean, marina and listened to the great band playing for this event.  The linens and towels are first class as is the entire resort.  Going to the adult pool later, we enjoyed the entire area to ourselves, and Grant took care of our every need while we were there....from water to cocktails and towels.....great job.  Upon our return that evening, we were surprised to find that turn down service had been done which we didn't know about....they even
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our ‚Äúfirst class‚Äù resort and staff. We are delighted to hear that our staff took care of all of your needs and exceeded your expectations. Your comfort and pleasure is of upmost importance to us. We are at your service 24 hours a day and we hope you do take advantage of the spa during your next visit with us. We apologize that our pool bar was closed during your visit and we hope that our staff was able to get you and your wife the waters you requested in a timely manner. We look forward to welcoming you back for another getaway.

Summary: I recently spent a few nights at this resort for a business convention.  Many of the other reviews rave about the views and the proximity to the ocean.  While all of that is true the hotel is not as good for the business customer.  With that being said this is a very nice facility.  The issues begin when you arrive and have no option to park briefly to drop off a few items or golf clubs.  Everything is valet only at this hotel.  Not very helpful when you are dropping off lots of equipment or other items.  Then the valet has to bring you vehicle down anytime you need to put anything in it or get something out.  Don't get me wrong I don't begrudge a hard working valet his tip, but it got a bit out of hand!  We tend to meet with our customers in the lobby and then find a quiet spot
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback regarding our valet services and we hope that having a valet only option was not a great inconvenience to you during your stay. Our mission is to make your stay as easy and convenient as possible and having a valet only service allows our guests to have the pleasure of dropping off their vehicles and having us take care of the rest.  In regards to holding a meeting in our public space, our guests do use our outlets and if you are looking for more privacy to hold your meeting we have both event space and suites available for your use. Please let us know in advance so our staff can check for availability and set up these rooms according to your agenda. Please do not hesitate to contact our Sales and Catering office to reserve a meeting room for any upcoming conferences you may have.  We look forward to welcoming you back for your next leisure vacation.

Summary Heading: Little bit for everyone, all with a view.
Summary: Stayed a night while on business while most of the hotel was rented out for a convention.  Staff was attentive and pleasant.  The grounds are beautiful and the view was the real selling point.  The pool area caters to families with children with a separate wading pool and an area where the sprinklers can be controlled for them to run through.  There is enough adult space outdoors with plenty of sitting areas.  I didn't get a chance to use the spa services.  My party had dinner in the lobby bar because the main restaurant was closed during the week.  Breakfast was ordered off the menu.   Rooms were fine, but my mattress was too soft for my taste.  Some rooms were located a very long walk from the elevator.  Next trip to the area, I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that your business meeting was a success and that you were able to enjoy the pools during your visit with us. We hope that you have a chance to experience our Spa the next time you are in the area. We know you will leave feeling relaxed and rejuvenated. We look forward to welcoming you back for business or pleasure the next time you are in the Dana Point area.

Summary: For a brief stay to visit family we wanted to stay at the best place and Laguna Cliffs fit the bill.  It's pricey but worth it.  We had booked a room with an ocean view and were excited to think we could look out at the ocean.  Upon arrival, we inquired as to whether our room had a balcony and were told the ocean view was through a window only.  So really unless standing at the window, the view would be non existent.  The helpful employee suggested that we get a ground floor room with a patio, when outside we could see the ocean a bit over the trees.  This room was less money and we ended up with a room more inline with what we had hoped for. There are rooms with balconies and ocean view but they were not available.  The room was beautiful, spotless and equipped with a mini
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that your experience was amazing and that you found the views of the resort to be beautiful. Our OverVue Lounge provides a great panoramic scenery of the Pacific Ocean and our tapas menu is very popular among our guests. We hope you visit us again when you are in town to visit your family, we‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary Heading: You Will Never Tire of the View
Summary: Gorgeous property. Ideal location across from marina. Short walk to famous Doheny Beach, hotel will rent you a surfboard for a mere $10. Good restaurants within walking distance overlooking marina. Nice walking paths with beautiful views wherever you look. Hotel has music in lounge on Friday and Saturday nights. This past Saturday, lounge was sparsely populated. May want to rethink choice of performers. They were a bit out there and, although I am fond of progressive rock, they seemed almost to be playing to/for themselves.
Manager Response: We cannot agree with you more, the panoramic views never become tiresome to look at. The sunrises and sunsets are truly breathtaking. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed Doheny State Beach and the walking and jogging paths that are located near the resort. Thank you for your feedback regarding our live entertainment. Your opinion matters to us and we will share your thoughts with our team. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Are you kidding me?... in a good way
Summary: What a great hotel.  I stayed a week here for a conference.  The room...beautiful; the staff...exceptional; the food...wonderful too. This is the place to come for a romantic getaway or fun for the family.  With two pools, great balcony rooms and an incredible view, I couldn't have asked for a better location.  Just a short walk to the harbor and one has many dining options.  The hotel is valet only... so, be prepared for that, and the food/drinks are expensive... but not unexpected for a hotel of this class.  I loved it and will take my husband back next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are happy to hear that your conference was a great success and that everything from your room to our service levels exceeded your expectations. Our resort accommodates all guests; families, couples, conference groups, business travelers and such. We take great pride in the service levels we provide all of our guests and we are looking forward in having you and you husband visit us for a leisure stay.

Summary: Our recent 2 night stay at the Laguna Hills exceeded our expectations. We wished we could have stayed longer.  The resort, the room (2015) and the staff were great. Although the food in the lounge was pricey, the view was lovely and the food tasty. We are glad we stayed in Dana Point instead of other beach communities. The other communities were extremely busy. After a day of touring, we were happy to return to this resort because it was peaceful and quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that your recent visit with us was superb. We appreciate all of your fine compliments regarding the resort rooms and our staff. We hope to welcome you back in the near future for a longer stay.

Summary: Not quite a 4, but definitely a 3.5 rating.  The room was adequate (a bit on the small side), but the bathroom needs a massive upgrade.  Having a small balcony helps to make the room seem bigger.  The best part of the hotel is the concierge (Linda) who was very helpful and personable.  The restaurant food was also pretty good.  However, the hotel is really not close to anything.  Without a car, one is pretty much stuck on-site with little to do.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our attentive and personable staff. We have to agree with you, our culinary team is very talented and we offer a variety of menu items that will surely satisfy the pickiest of eaters. We hope you took advantage of the harbor and all of the shops and restaurants that are walking distance from the resort. We find that many of our guests enjoy the various water activities that are offered at the local beach. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: We reserved a room with a balcony view of the garden.  We also requested a room with 2 double beds and a sofabed.  When we arrived to check in, we were told we had been upgraded to an ocean view for free and since there was no sofabed in the room, they would bring us a complimentary roll away bed.  We were on the top floor of the San Clemente wing.    The room was very nice.  Clean and decorated in a modern beach them.  We had an adjoining room and the door between our rooms seemed to be paper thin.  We could clearly hear the women in the other room talking.  Awkward.  The view was slightly disappointing because the driveway was right below us and the ocean view was pretty distant and what we can mostly see was the harbor.  There was no balcony in this room either.  But, I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you spent your ‚ÄúGirl‚Äôs Weekend Getaway‚Äù at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are happy to hear that you found your room to be pleasant. We apologize for the disturbance of the Porsche Club event that was held in the park. Unfortunately, this was a city event and the resort did not have any control over the noise. We hope that this did not cause a great inconvenience to you and your friends. We always try and provide a comfortable environment for our guests and one with little or no disturbance. We apologize that your sleep was interrupted by the Porsche event. We look forward in welcoming you all back soon!

Summary: I've never encountered worse service than I did at the Vue (or whatever it's called) bar inside this hotel.. Place was empty, asked for the check, got it about 30 minutes later, and the price for their horrible tasting cocktails cost as much as the filet mignon at the Ritz down the street. Don't waste your money at this wanna be upscale hotel
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We regret that the service you encountered at OverVue Lounge was unsatisfactory. We want to apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered. Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests about our outstanding service and we hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule. We want you to know that we take every review seriously and we will be addressing your concerns with our food and beverage staff.

Summary: While attending a conference in Anaheim in the Fall of 2011, I decided to extend my West Coast visit by adding a vacation to the back of the conference for a few days.  I found this property on the web and it was all that I expected, and much more!.  My friend and I were treated like the divas that we are...the ocean view room was clean and beautiful.  The staff was extraordinarily kind to us and the food and drinks were excellent.  I cannot say that I have anything negative at all to say about our stay.  I shopped in the gift shops...had a full body massage...walked on the beach...attended the Woodie car show out back and had the best time ever!  I travel for my job a couple of times a year and I am so glad that I found the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Hotel.  As a matter of fact, I
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are so delighted that you found us on the web and stayed with us for the very first time. Your experience is very important to us and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed all of the resorts amenities during your stay. We can‚Äôt wait to welcome you back in the Spring. We look forward in creating another memorable experience for you. See you soon!

Summary: My husband and I live in the area but needed a little getaway, it happened to be in the middle of the week after a holiday weekend so the rates were amazing for this hotel.  They gave us a great room with ocean views, however, at 11pm a loud noise in wall started rattling and didn't quit,  they couldn't figure out what is was and ultimately put us in another great room and gave us a breakfast voucher for the next morning.  All in all it was great place to stay, the staff was great and very accommodating.  We will definitely go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you and your husband decided to stay at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa for a staycation. We apologize for the noise that was coming from your room and we are happy to hear that our staff was able to quickly resolve this issue for you and place you in another room. We look forward in welcoming you back for another staycation! See you soon.

Summary: We had a wedding in Dana Point, so decided to make a mini vacation out of it. We stayed at the marriott 3 nights. The hotel is wonderful. You can walk down to the beach, it has a pool, they were showing a movie on the park, and only a short drive to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that you stayed at our resort for a wedding in the area. We must agree with you that the location is quite perfect; walking distance to the marina and beach. We hope you were able to enjoy the complimentary movie in the park. We know that it is a very popular activity during the summer. We hope you found our resort to be a new destination spot for you to visit. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Resort! Great Hospitality! Breathtaking Views!
Summary: Beautiful Resort! Great Hospitality! Breathtaking Views! 9/9/2013  From the moment Valet opened our car doors and greeted us to the time they packed us up 2 days later I must say it was the very best stay we ever had at a Marriott property.  If your looking to stay in this area of California, look no further!  Its all right here at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa!  We travel a lot and always use Marriott.  Love, Love , Love this resort!  The staff was the best!  Everyone was extremely nice and friendly.  They knew  exactly what we were looking for in a room / Resort / Spa.  We did get a upgraded room overlooking the Marina / Ocean and all the shops and dining area‚Äôs down by the Marina. Breathtaking views!!!!!  We sat out on our balcony every evening.  Walked down to
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for the detailed review of your stay. We are so honored to have you as part of our family. We are grateful for your loyalty and we are delighted that you were able to experience the warm and hospitable staff that we have here at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are delighted that you enjoyed the comfortable guestrooms, the ocean views and our helpful staff.  We promise to continue to provide you with new, life-long memories. We can't wait for your next visit! Take good care in the meantime and we will see you soon.

Summary: Stayed here a few weeks ago with my husband, who was attending a conference. Thank heavens his company picked up the tab or else I would have felt seriously ripped off. It's not horrible but several issues make it feel much less than the four star resort it claims to be. I arrived on a busy Friday afternoon. The valet was very pleasant but I kept waiting for him to put his cell phone away and get my bag out of the trunk. He finally put the phone away but then started chatting with another valet. Ok, I'm a strong capable woman....I can get my own bag....I've just never had to at an upscale resort. The lobby was swarming with people and there were only two desk clerks available so the wait to check in was long. They were both pleasant. Our room was on the first floor, which is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and compliments regarding the resort grounds and our friendly and attentive staff. We apologize for the poor service you received from our valet and for your wait time during your check-in. Our valet staff do carry radios (that look like cell phones) to communicate with others on our property to make sure that our guests are well taken care of. They do not use their cell phones during working hours. Fortunately, the resort is busy during summer months and sometimes the wait time to check-in is longer than usual. We appreciate your understanding and hope that this did not cause a great inconvenience to you and your husband.  In regards to the cleanliness of the rooms, we are going to address this with our Housekeeping Managers immediately to be sure that the issues you addressed are taken care of in a timely manner and to avoid anything like this in the future. Our staff is extremely detail oriented and this is clearly below the standards of the resort and unacceptable. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.  We certainly hope you'll reconsider giving Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa another opportunity in the future to restore your faith.

Summary: We love staying at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott at least once a year.  It is so convenient to walk to local restaurants (as long as you can take the steep set of stairs!) and the view along the park is beautiful.  It's best to wait for a deal - sometimes they'll include the buffet breakfast, and we love their omelet bar.  The beds are comfy.  The pool is nice.  The workout room is my husband's favorite part!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that you are loyal visitors of the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are delighted that you visit us once a year.  We must agree, our fitness center is one of a kind and the equipment is state of the art. We thank you for sharing your experience with us and we look forward in welcoming you back next year.

Summary: We enjoyed our vacation stay at the Cliffs.  The room was nice and the service was outstanding. From the moment they opened our car door until we departed again it was first class.  We used the bar, pool, dinning, and guess services.  The food was great and again the staff was very pleasing.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and took advantage or the resort‚Äôs amenities. Our goal is to provide you with first class service from arrival to departure and we are happy that you experienced the high level of service our staff provides. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Stayed here for a conference, it was the most amazing view and location for a hotel. I felt like I had been to a vacation and not a conference for work! The conference was really well organized by the hotel and the staff was very friendly and helpful at all times.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that your conference was a great success and that you felt you were on a vacation during your business trip. Our goal is to provide the comfort and luxury to make you feel at home while away on business. We hope you visit us again in the near future for pleasure or business.

Summary: I want to start by saying that the staff was amazing especially Gene at the front desk. They all bent over backwards to make our stay enjoyable. The room was clean and our view of the pool and a little bit of the ocean from our balcony was worth it. The negative was the buffet dinner and breakfast. Though there were choices, some entrees were cold and inedible and when they ran out of fruit it was never replenished while we were seated. The big negative was the Resort Fee, which is really nothing more than a double tax. You don't get anything for it. The spa and it's amenities still cost money as does the child fun zone. I would have given a 5-star review if it weren't for that Fee.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that our staff was able to accommodate your requests and that they provided great service during your stay. We take great pride in the exceptional service our staff provides to all of our guests. We regret that you were not satisfied with the dinner buffet and breakfast. We will certainly share your observation with our staff. Our resort fee in fact includes such items as complimentary Wi-Fi in our guestrooms, complimentary rental of recreational items such as bicycles, surfboards, boogie boards, board games, etc.  The children‚Äôs splash zone and movie nights are complimentary for overnight guests. We hope this clarifies some of the inclusions in our resort fee. Thank you again for your feedback. We look forward in welcoming you back.

Summary: Were there for a 4 night stay at the beginning of August and had a fantastic time. Room was large  extremely comfortable and clean with wonderful ocean views. The hotel is in a fantastic position looking over the ocean with easy access to the beach and marina for restaurants etc. The resort fee includes bikes for 2 hours and this was great fun. Pools were lovely with great poolside service, comfortable loungers and table tennis. Outside bar/restaurant is lovely again with great views and heaters for the sometimes chilly breeze! Service throughout was friendly and professional - all in all a great hotel, a fantastic stay and hopefully a return visit soon!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent review and 5 star rating. We are delighted that you enjoyed the resort‚Äôs ocean views and comfortable rooms. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of the bike rental that is included in your resort fee. We enjoy hearing about guest‚Äôs experience and we thank you for sharing. We are looking forward to your return visit.

Summary Heading: Select oceanview rooms with care, and "GF" dining a "miss"
Summary: We went to the Laguna Cliffs Marriott for the 4th of July and reserved full oceanview with romance package and breakfast for three nights.  We arrived mid-day on the 4th, and the area was already quite busy.  The hotel valets indeed had their hands full with many simultaneous arrivals.  When I asked the valet whether we should take our luggage or leave it in the car (because check in isnt' technically supposed to occur until 4pm), he was flustered and said he didn't know.  When we went into the lobby, there was a bit of a wait, many people checking in, but that's to be expected.  Our room wasn't ready, so we went to have lunch at the OverVue.  When we went into the restaurant, we asked for a table outside, and we were led to a nice table and left with *one* menu, for two people.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate your wonderful compliments regarding our staff‚Äôs attentiveness and friendliness. We are delighted to heat that our Concierge team left a lasting impression on you and your girlfriend. We do want to apologize for any inconvenience the odor in your room caused you during your stay. We appreciate your bringing this to our attention and we will get this issue resolved immediately. We also want you to know that as you mentioned in your review, we do offer gluten-free bread as well as many gluten-free menu items. We take our guests dietary restrictions very seriously and do not mix our cooking utensils in any way. We have many guests that have allergies or have other dietary restrictions and it is our responsibility to provide the appropriate dishes that accommodate their requests. We apologize that our staff was not informative and we will address this issue immediately. We hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule.

Summary: Having a lovely Labor Day weekend at Laguna Cliffs.  Exceptional staff, views, and accomodations throughout resort.  Pool staff exceeds expectations.. Particularly Tyler, Lauren, and Alex!  Thanks for making this stay memorable!  Oh yes, and cannot forget Spencer at breakfast.  What a pleasure he was as he greeted us each morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you spent your Labor Day weekend with us. We appreciate your 5 star rating and we take great pride in our exceptional staff service. We cannot agree with you more, our staff service levels exceed our guests expectations and we are at your service 24 hours a day. We thank you for sharing your experience with us and we will be sure to let our staff know the wonderful compliments they received. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: We stayed one night to attend a nearby wedding. The staff -- the valets, front desk, and room service - were courteous and efficient. But we were disappointed by our dark and musty smelling fourth-floor coastal view room -- no balcony with a slider or french door, just a small bay window set too much high to see the water unless standing up directly in front of the window. Sitting in the cozy chairs underneath the windows provided no opportunity for any view at all. The personable front desk staff listened to our concerns and quickly switched us to the only other room available, a 2nd floor poolside room. Not particularly private or romantic, but at least brighter and no musty smell. At 10am the next morning, loud music began playing poolside and that ended our quiet morning.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope you enjoyed the wedding you attended. We appreciate  your fine compliments regarding our staff‚Äôs courteousness and efficiency. We are delighted that we had another room available that was to your liking. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review. In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fees to be in line and are actually the most economical. Thank you for sharing your comments and we hope your travels will bring you back to our resort.

Summary: My husband and I are currently travelling up PCH from San Diego to San Francisco and have  just spent 3 days at this Marriott resort and could not rate it too highly.  The staff are excellent, very friendly and attentive without being in your space.  The beds are the most comfortable I have had in a long time.  The room we had was excellent, very big with a lovely view of the pool.  We were there on a California Dreaming deal which we got through the Marriott website direct and it was extremely good value.  Included in this deal was free valet parking and breakfast.   The breakfast was buffet style but there was everything you could ask for.  Waffles and omelettes could be made to order with all other breakfast requirement there.  The waiting staff at breakfast were lovely and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We appreciate all of your compliments and for sharing your experience with us. We are delighted that you had such a wonderful experience at the resort and that you enjoyed the customer service our staff provided. We will be sure to share your compliments with our team. We cannot wait to welcome you back for another WOW experience! We are happy to hear that we were able to create such fond memories for you and your husband.

Summary: I have been visiting this hotel for years. The view is amazing and the customer service excellent.  The mandatory valet charge (they used to allow self parking which I liked) at $32.00 is too high,  and a high $25.00 Resort Fee is not good.  I have always found marriott business friendly but unfortunately there is no real business area except a small space that is shared with another business. If you want to use the computer it will cost you too much.  The travel zoo promotion used to include free parking and a breakfast-not anymore. It's such a beautiful place but the charges are too much for those things that should be less.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your being a loyal guest of the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We appreciate your compliments regarding our amazing ocean views and excellent customer service. We regret that you found the valet and resort fees to be high.  In recent parking and resort fee surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort fees to be in line and are actually the most economical. Our resort fee includes complimentary Wi-Fi access in the guest room and we have many packages that we offer that include breakfast and parking. We hope you take advantage of these packages the next time you visit us. We appreciate your feedback and we hope to welcome you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel and Friendly, Professional Staff
Summary: My husband and I stayed two nights (Thursday and Friday) at the Marriot for a wedding we were attending in San Clemente. Two things stood out: the comfort of the bed and the outstanding customer service. My husband commented that the bed was even more comfortable than our bed at home. The staff were friendly and professional. Before we arrived at the hotel, I had ordered two extra feather pillows that were delivered only five minutes after we arrived. Before we ran off to the wedding, I went to the lobby to get some muffins, and as I pulled out some cash to pay, the cashier smiled and said, "Don't worry about it."   One caveat: Valet parking is $32 a day in addition to the room charge, and it's billed each night. Yes, it's expensive for parking, but it is close to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We appreciate your lovely compliments and we are delighted that you found our beds to be so comfortable. We have many guests that have shared with us how impressed they are with our staff and the high level of service we provide to our guests. We hope you enjoyed your upgraded ocean view guest room. We are happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations. The next time you visit, I would like to suggest you try our Spa. We know you will not be disappointed. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit Orange County.

Summary Heading: Great location, comfortable room, great pool and yoga
Summary: We love staying at Marriott and this hotel was beautiful and had a great view of the ocean.  The rooms are on the small size so I would say 2 adults and 2 small children max.  We had two teenagers with us and we were falling all over each other.    I agree with the previous review that the initial price looks attractive but the price you pay is much higher.  It was even higher for us as we brought 2 cars!  $64 per night to park two cars is way overpriced.    The pool area is really nice and the lounge chairs were comfortable.  The pool wait staff asks you every 10-15 minutes if you want any thing.  The have complimentary yoga on the lawn overlooking the ocean which was delightful.  I love Dana Point but for this price I could have a condo with 2 bedrooms and free parking which
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are honored that you are a loyal Marriott vacationer and we are happy to hear that you enjoyed the resort and it‚Äôs beautiful ocean views of the Pacific. We are delighted to hear that you found our staff to be attentive and helpful. We hope you were able to partake in the Yoga classes in the park. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical. We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary Heading: A high class hotel which made our honeymoon extra special
Summary: My husband and I stayed at the hotel for 4 nights during our multi-centre honeymoon. We had just travelled from a beautiful hotel in Maui and the Laguna Cliffs Marriott did not disappoint. The staff were all fantastic, professional, friendly and helpful from the waiters at breakfast, the reception staff and a very helpful woman on concierge who helped us to make the most of our stay and visit some wonderful local places. We would like to say a special thank you to Matt Darst, the front desk supervisor, who arranged for us to have a surprise bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries as well as a card congratulating us on our marriage. It was a lovely touch that meant a lot to us. The hotel itself was beautifully finished to a 5* standard and I was impressed with the
Manager Response: Congratulations on your marriage. We are honored that you chose our resort to celebrate this special occasion. We thank you for your compliments regarding our staff. Our goal is to provide the level of service that exceeds your expectations and we are delighted to hear that we left you with fond memories. We hope that you visit us again the next time you visit the US.

Summary: Firstly the hotel is very nice, clean and well presented as I would tend to expect of a Marriott, and the staff who I encountered were both friendly and helpful.  The rooms are reasonable size although there was it could be noisy with very little soundproofing to either the bathroom or external to the room. When compared to other hotels in which we stayed the actual room price itself was competitive, however you then need to factor in additional costs of $32 per day (plus tip) for valet parking (there is no option of cheaper self parking), and also a $25 per day resort fee (this appears to have increased even from the $15 which I was quoted when booking, and which I had expected to pay). Even for a short stay, that equated to an additional $180 on top of the room rate, so beware!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We thank you for your compliments regarding our friendly and helpful staff. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking and resort fees.  In recent parking and resort surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking and resort rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We hope that you visit us again soon.

Summary: We just stayed AGAIN at this very nice property in Dana Point/Laguna California. What great people they have their! Everyone is very poised, polished, professional and delightful. They have a great location, great view and great rooms. We also enjoyed their casual indoor/outdoor Restaraunt called VUE. A very upscale Marriott that feels more like a Mini-Ritz Carlton. Can't say enough good about this hotel except, we'll be back again and again!
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your wonderful compliments and praise. We are so delighted that you visited us again and that you plan on returning to stay with us in the future. We are looking forward to welcoming you back and we appreciate your kind compliments regarding our staff. We will be sure to pass along the message as we take great pride in the service that our staff provides. We are here to serve you and make your stay as pleasurable as we can. We hope to see you very soon.

Summary: I have just returned from a multi-centre trip to the US with my family. We stayed at this hotel for 6 nights and loved every minute of it. I cannot believe some of the previous negative reviews are talking about the same hotel! This has to be the best Marriott I have ever stayed in (my husband is a gold member).   The hotel enjoys a lovely position overlooking the marina. It is close to a wealth of excellent restaurants - several of which we ate at. The outside appearance is quaint and pretty, with beautifully kept lawns and flower beds. The inside is open airy and modern. We had two ocean view rooms on the fourth floor, without balconies. We were offered a change to second floor on third day, but we declined as we were quite happy where we were. The bathrooms were quite
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your compliments and 5 star review. We are so delighted that we provided you and your family with such a wonderful experience. Our goal is create fond memories for our guests from arrival to departure. It is an honor to have had you stay with us for 6 nights. We hope we made Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa, you home away from home. We look forward in having  you and your family back the next time you are in the US.

Summary: This is a picturesque setting, high on the cliff with a vista across a stretch of grass and the bay.  It's quiet and is well positioned to get into Laguna Beach which is about 10-15 mins away.  The hotel has a great patio to sit and enjoy the view with friends and family.   The hotel is a popular place for weddings and functions but that doesn't deter from the warm and friendly service.  Breakfast at the hotel can be taken inside or on the terrace.  The food is varied and good.  The rooms to go for are the ocean views.  The ocean is a fair sight away but at least you have the privacy and the views to enjoy. There are lots of activities nearby, restaurants, dolphin and whale watching.  Bikes are available on a complimentary basis, but it's a bit of a hill together back to the
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments and 5 star rating. We always enjoy hearing about our guest‚Äôs experience with us and we appreciate you sharing all the fun activities you participated in during your stay. We hope to welcome you back during your next visit to the US.

Summary Heading: Don't be fooled by this "Pretty" Hotel...
Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel with my in-laws for a long weekend while we were attending a family wedding in the area. At first glance the hotel is very striking and the back drop of the ocean is beautiful. However, our first impression was immediately dismissed when we interacted with the front desk. My father-in-law had reserved 3 rooms, all with king beds and one with an ocean view for him and my mother-in-law. The person at the front desk told him there were no Ocean view rooms with a king size bed available as he had reserved online. They told him since he was not a Marriott Rewards member, those people get first dibs on the premium rooms and that he didn't actually reserve that type of room, he "requested" one. ??????? No apology was given and my in-laws were given
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We take every review very seriously and we are appalled that your experience with us was unsatisfactory due to our lack of customer service. We want to take a moment to apologize to you for any inconvenience you may have experienced and for the lack of empathy you received from our staff.  Our highest mission is to provide the exact service and facilities that our guests want, deserve, and expect and we clearly missed the mark. Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests regarding our excellent customer service and our attention to detail.  We hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule.

Summary Heading: 4 stars overall but staffs pulled it up to 5 stars!
Summary: This review is long overdue.  We spent the weekend here sometime May 2013 and had a great time.   The resort itself sits atop Laguna cliff; amazing view and pristine grounds.  At first glance, it‚Äôs truly a wow factor!  Everything here is impressive.  Staffs are all comfortable, friendly and accommodating.   My gold status was acknowledged upon check-in and my preferences honored.  We initially were upgraded to an ocean view room but we opted out of it since the room was not ready.  I preferred the early check-in (arrived a little after 1pm) than the ocean view room.   We wanted to get settled so we can start our day.  Our room was close to the pool; convenient since that is where we spent most of our time.  Our room was as expected of a Marriott brand ‚Äì pleasantly designed,
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We are grateful for your loyalty to the Marriott brand and we appreciate all of your fine compliments. We are delighted to hear that you were able to enjoy the Del Mar Pool and experience the excellent service our staff provides to all of our guests. We are at your service 24 hours a day and our attentive staff is here to make your stay as relaxing and pleasurable as they can. We promise to continue to provide you with new, life-long memories. We can't wait for your next visit! Take good care in the meantime and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Traveled with 2 year old and husband. 4th floor rooms -- any rooms without a balcony -- are entirely too small. The bay windows take up way too much space. You feel like you're in a room on a cruise ship.  Bathrooms need updating -- very small.  We moved the next night to a 3rd floor room with a balcony and view. The balcony helped the space issue, but the room itself was still smaller than a standard guest room.  Upon entering that room, I looked in the bathroom and the toilet was filthy, so I called down to the front desk and demanded to be moved (again).  They gave me the option to upgrade to a one bedroom, so I took a look at the suite before committing.  It was on the 1st floor, upon stepping off the elevator, the smell of mold was very strong. It felt wet - similar to an
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We apologize that you were unsatisfied with your stay.  We listen to every piece of feedback our guests provide us. Our highest mission is to provide the exact service and facilities that our guests want, deserve, and expect. Our job is not only to meet the guest‚Äôs expectations but to exceed them. I want you to know that we will be addressing your concerns with our team. We were fully committed due to our resort‚Äôs occupancy levels; however, we did place you in the best room type available and we regret that its location did not meet your expectations.  As I‚Äôm sure you are aware, we take great pride in providing a high level of service and quality to our guests and we apologize for any inconvenience you experienced during your stay.

Summary: Stayed at the hotel with my 3 sons and wife. Had a great experience. My wife and I did the 10:00 am yoga class. We swam in the pool and used the hot tub. It's a top notch hotel and a beautiful location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We are delighted to hear that you and your family had a great experience at our resort. Your opinion is very important to us and we hope we created wonderful memories for your entire family. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: We have loved staying here and can't wait to return, fantastic location, wonderful staff, great atmosphere. The views of the harbour and the pacific are are to die for. Best bed ever..can't find any faults..love it.staff cannot do enough to make stay as good as possible.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 star rating. We appreciate your loyalty to the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa and we are looking forward in welcoming you back. It brings us great joy to hear that your stay could not have been better. We are at your service 24 hours a day and we are delighted that we leave you with great memories each time you visit. See you soon.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Ocean View Location, Excellent Service, Great Restaurant on Site
Summary: The Laguna Cliffs Marriott overlooks Dana Point Harbor and was a fun mom/daughter  "staycation.."  The resort offers everything you need: great restaurants nearby, a wonderful spa, walking distance to the Dana Harbor and beautiful parks.  Yes there is a resort fee and parking fee, but to be expected at large resorts now days.  The attentiveness of the staff was perfection.  I haven't been disappoint staying at a Marriott. This resort is great for a romantic getaway, families, business, and friends.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments and 5 star rating. We are honored that you chose the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa to have a mother/daughter staycation. We are delighted that you took advantage of the resort‚Äôs amenities and we hope that you had a relaxing and rejuvenating experience at the Spa. We couldn‚Äôt agree with you more, the resort is ideal for all travelers alike. We take great pride in our staff service and we appreciate your compliments. We will be sure to share your comments with our staff. We are looking forward in welcoming you back for another great experience.

Summary Heading: Good with Family - good rooms and great property
Summary: We traveled with 2 other families and have 3 rooms.  The rooms are great, spacious and clean but the floors are very thin - I was on the 2nd floor and could hear everywhere the people staying at the 3rd floor room walked.  I probably wouldn't stay here again since there are so much beautiful properties at this area (VRBO homes).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you and your family stayed with us on your vacation. We hope you enjoyed the panoramic ocean views of the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We hope that you do consider us the next time you are in Southern California.

Summary: We were not sure what to expect when we booked the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa but any doubts were quickly gone when we arrived at this hotel.  It is a beautiful resort, well located with excellent facilities and we were really pleased that we had made the booking.  Our main disappointment was that we hadn't booked the hotel for longer - we spent two nights here in July accompanied by my son and his girlfriend.  Our rooms were very clean, well presented, each with a balcony and a sea view.  I looked at other reviews for this resort and I do agree that the resort fee along with a parking fee is hefty and these are costs which need to be factored into a holiday at this resort. It would be much better to have the option of a single resort fee which also includes parking
Manager Response: WOW! Thank you for the detailed review of your stay and your 5 star rating. We are delighted that you had such a wonderful stay and did not want to leave the resort. There is no compliment greater than that. We promise to continue to provide you with new, life-long memories. We can't wait for your next visit! Take good care in the meantime and we will see you soon.

Summary: We booked this hotel because it has a Spa and was close to the beach.  Upon arriving, it was paradise.  The grounds are clean, and it has an excellent view of the ocean.  The hotel is valet parking only, and the package we booked included the valet.  As we drove up, we were greeted and helped with our luggage, Check in was a breeze.  When checking in, Tiffany helped us with local recommendations, and upgraded us from the resort view, to a pool view at no cost! She highly recommended the Chart house steak & seafood house, we  made reservations through the Consierge which upgraded our seating to a VIP window seat table, printed out our menu's with our party name & gave us a complimentary lava cake dessert!  We enjoyed the Spa & got an hour long massage which was nice, grounds and
Manager Response: Thank you for the detailed review. We are delighted that you found your ‚Äúpiece of paradise.‚Äù We appreciate your 5 star rating and thank you for the wonderful compliments regarding our resort and staff. We enjoy hearing about our guest experiences and it brings us such great joy when our guests have an exceptional time during their stay with us. We look forward in welcoming you back soon.

Summary: My husband and I celebrated our anniversary here and Lauren B at the desk made it so special-she sent champagne and chocolate strawberries to our room with a sweet card, and made sure our dinner at the Chart House was special with a great table, personalized menu and complimentary dessert.  We felt very special and pampered, and will come back to Laguna Cliffs again!
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary! We are delighted that you and your husband celebrated this special occasion with us. We are happy to hear that our staff was able to provide a wonderful experience for you both on this special night. We hope you left with beautiful memories. We‚Äôre looking forward in creating more for you both on your next visit.

Summary: We just got back from staying at this hotel for the weekend.  We used Marriott points and had reserved a resort view room.  I had asked for early check in and when we got there at 2:30 our room wasn't ready so the front desk clerk gave us another room even better-a slight harbor view.  The room was a nice size and decorated fine with a decent bathroom.  We were on the 2nd floor very close to pool.  The pool service was great-they set up lounge chairs/umbrellas for you and of course you can order food/drinks from them as well.  There were actually too many pool attendants but it worked out fine.  The food/drinks by the pool were just ok and very expensive.  I expect to pay $12.50 for a mai tai in hawaii but not here-a bit much.  We ordered chips/salsa/guacamole and everything was
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We thank you for sharing your experience at the resort with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the pools and experienced your new favorite breakfast spot in Dana Point. We hope the next time you are visiting and need some relaxation you visit our Spa. We are sure you will not be disappointed. We do regret that you were not able to watch the Dodger game in your room. We will look into adding this channel to our cable televisions. Thank you for your feedback and we are looking forward to your trip back.

Summary: We flew our sons in from  SLC to celebrate their birthdays,we discovered this wonderful resort last year..so we knew what to expect,regarding staff ,views and amenities...our sons 29 and 33.. Had a blast and were just giddy with the ambiance of Dana Point,the beaches and the marina...also a couple excellent restaurants there in the marina On both trips the staff,food and experience was excellent..to make an impromptu cookout possible in the adjacent park,the kitchen loaned us utensils ,etc...everyone couldn't have been more accommodating ,free bicycles,yoga in the park...a view of the ocean  The open air lobby and wonderful weather of Southern California just encourages relaxation and a spirit of happiness...we stay at many different marriott properties throughout the
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for all of your compliments and 5 star rating. We are honored that you celebrated your sons birthdays with us. Your families wonderful experience at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa truly sets the tone for our resort. We are happy to hear that throughout all your travels and stays at various Marriott properties, we stood out to you. Your experience is very important to us and it brings us great joy to hear the wonderful memories we could create for you and your family during your stay. We are looking forward to your return visit from North Carolina.

Summary: We lived many years in this area before we moved to the desert, and this is the perfect hotel for us. We are a g'ma, daughter and two g'kids, 13 and 10.  Service is World Class from the Valet to Spa Staff. And they have made everything so convenient for the traveler who needs accessible facilities! In the winter, we like happy hour by the fireplace in the vue. In the summer, like this trip, the BBQ by the pool is irresistible!  Only disappointment was the wifi which kept going down. But Omigosh we can hardly wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments! We hope you have found a new home away from home. It brings us great joy to hear that you visit the resort throughout the seasons and we cannot wait to welcome you back for another WOW experience!

Summary: My wife and I had a phenomenal stay at the hotel when we wanted to get out of town for our 1st Anniversary. Maggy (concierge) went above and beyond to make us feel special, and couldn't have been better. All of the staff was great and even though there was a wedding happening that night, and a large car event happening the next day, everything was perfect.
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary! We are delighted that you spend your anniversary at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We will proudly share your wonderful compliments with our staff. We are happy that we could provide a level of service that exceeded your expectation and made your stay with us memorable. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Went for a business conference.  Hotel is older, but they have remodeled.  Nice view, but be warned it's not in Laguna Beach, it's much further in Dana Point.  The service was extremely good.  Very helpful and always kind.  Easy check-in and when I needed taxis all was taken care of.  The valets seemed to have a little attitude however.  The one downside is the food was just terrible.  Ate there several times for conference, and just horrible.  I didn't even eat one night because it was just bland and microwave kinda food.  They have a 'we serve Starbucks' bar, but it closes at 11am???  Room AC worked great and bed was comfortable.  One night electricity went out--not good.  All in all I wouldn't go there to vacation, but it was fine for business meetings (minus the food).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that your conference was a great success and thank you for taking the time to share your wonderful comments regarding our extremely good service and ease of checking in and out of the resort. We were also happy to hear that your guestroom was to your liking and that you found our beds to be very comfortable‚Ä¶a good night‚Äôs sleep is always of the utmost importance!  We regret to hear that you didn‚Äôt enjoy the food that was served during your conference. Please accept our sincere apologies and please be assured your comments will be shared with our Director of Food & Beverage so he can address this issue immediately.  We hold numerous conferences and events at our resort and have always received very high accolades regarding our food presentations. Unfortunately, the power outage was a multi-city power outage and was not something we had control over.  In regards to our Starbucks caf√©, even though the caf√© closes at 11:00 am we gladly serve Starbucks coffee in our OverVue Lounge all day long.  Once again, thank you for sharing your comments, we value your opinion and will be sure to share your experience with our team.

Summary Heading: Perfect for the Fourth of July
Summary: My daughter and I had such a great trip in April in this area, so we decided to go back for more and take in the art festivals. Dana Point didn't seem that far when we were staying in Laguna, and we decided we wanted a full service resort. The resort had everything you would want and they upgraded us to an ocean view at no additional charge. The room was comfortable and pleasantly decorated. Ocean view here us not the same as it was in Laguna Beach for sure. It's far away and there are many trees in the view. This is a lively resort with activities going on all the time along with the noise. Great breakfast buffet. Marina gave me an excellent facial! The reason for the lower score on service is due to the lackadaisical valet service. They act like they don't see you standing
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you spent your 4th of July weekend with us and that we provided everything you wanted to make your stay complete. We hope you found yourself relaxed and rejuvenated after your facial. We agree with you, the resort offers such wonderful amenities that it makes it difficult to want to leave the resort. We do regret that your valet experience was unsatisfactory. We take your comments very seriously and will address your concerns with our valet staff. Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests regarding our valet service  and we hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule.

Summary Heading: Nice for Dana Point, but would choose another location
Summary: First time out to Southern California with the family.  Wanted to get in a great beach stop for a few days.  While the resort itself is gorgeous, a few things would not make us go back...  1) Booked online and called to confirm room.  Asked for 2 beds in the room since there would be four of us, they were only able to give us a king with a pull out bed fit for one.  And they ran out of rollaway beds, so stuck with three people on a king...not ideal.  2)  As many have already pointed out, all the extra charges are not worth the added expense.    3) During our stay the hot water was not working for a period of time.  It was around dinner time, so after a day in the pool, it was either a cold shower or no shower.  Every time we called to get an update they kept just saying
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and regret that you were not completely satisfied during your stay. Unfortunately as stated at time of booking, rooms cannot be guaranteed and are based upon availability. We understand that during your stay our occupancy was high and we could not accommodate all of your requests. Please understand that our staff tries their best to ensure that all guest requests are met, however this is not possible at all times.  We are happy to hear that our maintenance team was able to fix your hot water and turn on the sound to your television. We thank you for your patience and for sharing your experience with us.

Summary Heading: Perfect base camp for Southern CA excursions
Summary: Dana Point and this hotel represent a perfect base camp for travelers planning excursions into both LA and Sand Diego.  We spent a couple days in the local area also and found it to be a worthy destination in its own right.  The hotel has maintained its original boutique feel and does not resemble a chain hotel.  There was even a conference our first day and we did not feel any impact from it.  The staff is exceptional; one of the best I have encountered.  The pool area is quite nice and family friendly.  The service is excellent and they offer daycare should you want to plan a couples event without the kids.   Our experience with the on-property Hertz counter was most disappointing.  I planned on avoiding the $32 valet parking by renting from Hertz and returning on the same
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We are delighted that you had such a wonderful time with your family at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We enjoy reading the activities our guests participated in during their stay and it sounds like you all had a wonderful time experiencing the different amusement parks and local restaurants. We agree that we are the perfect base camp between Los Angeles and San Diego. We appreciate all of your wonderful compliments regarding our attentive staff.  We do apologize for any inconvenience the Hertz Rental Car  service may have caused you. They are in fact a company that is not part of Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa but rather outsourced through a third party vendor, however they should still follow the same service standards of the Marriott. We will definitely bring this to their attention and we thank you for bringing this to our attention. We are looking forward to your next visit with your family.

Summary: After a rather challenging drive from Los Angele's holiday traffic, we arrived at the hotel to be "greeted" by a valet carparker who insisted we hand over our car keys. There were not any  other cars around. He could not be ruder or reasoned with. Not off to a relaxing beginning. This stressed my husband out as we had costly electronics, etc. in our car. We checked in and had a very pleasant looking room complete with a lovely view. We thought things were only improving. Unfortunately, not. We ventured out for several hours and enjoyed the town, scenery and walked the hotel property. We sat outside on the balcony and enjoyed a bottle of wine. Much later that evening, I had used the bathroom and noticed that the wallpaper was filthy. It was actually gross, as there were reminants
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to start off by apologizing for your unsatisfactory experience during your stay. We understand that you were inconvenienced and disappointed and we would like to speak with you in order to resolve this problem. Your experience is very important to us.  Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests and we hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule. Please contact us at your earliest convenience 949-487-7517.

Summary: Though the location of the hotel and it's surroundings are extremely pleasant, I felt that the extra charges tacked on the bill were not justified.  When one is paying quite a hefty price for a fairly average room (on the noisy poolside), then having to pay extra for valet parking, "resort" fee, and daily wi-fi is a bit much.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We thank you for your compliments regarding our beautiful ocean-view resort and the surrounding areas. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical. In regards to the resort fee, this fee does include Wi-Fi in your guest room. There is not a separate charge. Our resort fee also includes many other amenities such as complimentary activity rentals and shoe shine service. We hope this gives you more clarity regarding the fees.

Summary Heading: Great property away from the crowds
Summary: Very nice property with excellent accommodations . The staff was very attentive and professional. The only disadvantage that I found wad that your car had to be valet parked and every time you needed your vehicle the staff was waiting for a tip. Needless to say the parking was $32.00 per day. Other than that the hotel definitely met expectations .
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments pertaining to our beautiful resort and our attentive staff. We are ‚Äúat your service‚Äù 24 hours a day and we want nothing more than your stay to be superb from arrival to departure. In regards to our valet staff, please note that gratuity is not mandatory and to the discretion of the guest. Our staff is extremely appreciative of any gratuity that is given to them and we apologize if they gave you the impression that they were expecting it. We will be sure to address this with our valet team. Thank you again for your review. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Beautiful resort overlooking Dana Point Harbor.  Excellent resort, fabulous views........ However, beach right across the street at Doheny State Park not the best, pretty, but very rocky, lots of seaweed and twigs..... had to go too far out for good waves!  But views magnificent.  Walking distance to Dana Point Wharf shops and restaurants..........
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your rating of 5 stars. We are delighted that you enjoyed the beautiful views of the Pacific Ocean and Dana Point Harbor. We enjoy hearing about our guest‚Äôs experiences and the activities they took part in during their stay. We hope you enjoyed the beach and surfing in Dana Point. We‚Äôre looking forward to your next visit to Southern California.

Summary: These notes are intended to provide guidance for wheelchair users considering this hotel. If you are looking for comments on the hotel experience see the other reviews.   The hotel has a fine location at beautiful Dana Point. It is located high on a bluff with a steep set of steps leading to the beach and harbor area below.  The hotel is on many levels with steps but all areas of the hotel are wheelchair accessible- although you may have to follow a convoluted route to get to some places!  There are three steps up to the entrance, with gently sloping ramps on both left and right. The front doors are automatic. The reception area is fully accessible. Off reception is a bar/cafe area up a couple of steps,  with an outdoor seating area with fabulous views. Both are accessible via
Manager Response: We thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and will take your suggestions into consideration. Our entire resort is wheelchair accessible and we are grateful that with the assistance of our staff you were able to find your way around our property. We apologize that the bed was too high for your to comfortably get into. We want to provide a comfortable experience for all of our guests and we will be sure to address your feedback with our team to see if there is anything we can do with our bedding to better accommodate all of our guests. Your review is very important to us and we take it very seriously. We thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: My wife and I have stayed this location twice.  It is the perfect escape from the craziness of our lives in Los Angeles.  The property is beautiful and well maintained.  The rooms and bathrooms are typical Marriott sized but the views from the balconies, if you get a balcony, are exceptional. Views of the ocean allow for romantic sunsets.  We especially like this property because it is very family friendly.  One might expect a resort to be less for families but the staff goes out of its way to make families feel welcome.  There are two pools.  One is more for kids and families.  The other pool is more geared toward adults and is quieter.  Both pools have food and drink service.  One tip ‚Äì I suggest asking for a menu from the Overvue Lounge for food instead of the food that is
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We want to thank you for recognizing our resort as your favorite weekend getaway spot. We must admit, it is a hidden gem that is very peaceful and beautiful. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the pools and the ‚ÄúFamily Friendliness‚Äù that we provide. In regards to the noise from the wedding music, we do have a noise curfew so that we do not disturb our guests. We are happy that you enjoyed the music and found pleasure in listening to it. We are excited that you have become fans of the resort. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Not the best choice in the area
Summary: The Room-  Do not get the Executive suites! You can save a lot by getting two connecting rooms. The hotel has no floor plans or pics of this room online and now we understand why. Its a awkward setup. We wanted to invite friends back to the room and this room makes it impossible.  I wish I could upload pictures on here.  The Pool-   The hotel has two pools but you can't find a chair at either of them. We had to wait 4 hours to get a chair. Then when we requested to move the chair near our friends.... They said "Sorry, waiters have their sections and can't be moved".   We also waited over an hour for a hotdog and fish tacos at the pool. No one seemed to want to help us. Pool was run by collage kids who just wanted to blame it on someone else.  The Hotel-  The hotel is ok, at
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and regret that you were unsatisfied with the Executive Suite you stayed in during your stay. In regards to the pool service wait time, during busy summer months there may be times when guests have to wait longer for a chair because occupancy is high. However, we try our best to provide poolside chairs as quickly as it is requested. We do apologize if this caused any inconvenience to you during your stay. Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests and we hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule.   Thank you again for your review, your opinion is very important to us and we will discuss your concerns with our staff.

Summary: We had a great experience at Laguna Cliffs.  The only surprise (dah) was that it wasn't actually in Laguna Beach which I thought I was booking but at Dana Point.  Turned out fine.  From a medium sized city in Ohio to Cali, with all the people in Cali, I was actually pleased to away from the crowds of Laguna Beach, which is kinda like Pacific's Coast Myrtle Beach.  Besides, there are no Mariott's in LB, unless you can afford the Ritz.  Ok back to LCMRS.  Check in was fine and I love the "at your service" tag line. All staff was friendly.  I am sorry the last reviewer had a bad experience, but I know the valet staff was crazy busy, there always seem to be 5-10 cars being processed at Valet, and I always had a good and helpful experience.  The Valet Manager even likes the Browns!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being loyal to the Marriott brand. We appreciate your compliments regarding our resort and the services we provided to you and your family during your stay. It brings us great joy to hear that you did not want to leave and that you enjoyed your stay so much that you extended it for one additional night. We are ‚Äúat your service‚Äù 24 hours a day and it is our pleasure to provide you with an experience that leaves you completely satisfied. We appreciate all of your pointers you‚Äôve addressed for future guests and we hope you visit us again when you are in California.

Summary: We had a great girls weekend at Laguna Cliff Resort. We called the day before with our arrival time and were able to check in early. The room was fine, but the beds were too soft. There are two pools one with a kids splash zone, both had full service. These were not party pools at all. The staff was great with towels and and checking in on us. At night we went to the bar that had live music and fire pits. There weren't a lot of people there for a Saturday night, but we had plenty of good service. We ate at the breakfast Buffett the following morning and it was the best deal if you want coffee and juice with your breakfast. Call ahead for parking and resort fee. We paid $25 for parking and $25 for resort fee. Overall good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so delighted to hear that you spent your girls weekend with us. We are happy that we could accommodate your early check-in and that you enjoyed the pool service. Every Friday and Saturday night we have a band that performs in our OverVue Lounge and it brings us great joy to hear that you were able to sit outside near the firepit and take in the ocean views as you listen to music. We hope that the next time you have another girls night out, you keep us in mind. We‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary: This property was pretty nice.  I wasn't "wowed" but it was nice.  I think the resort fee and mandatory valet parking fees are a little steep but it is what it is.  The restaurants on site are over priced and very under valued.  The food is not great.  The rooms were very clean and up to date.  The pool area and poolside service were very good.  I would recommend this for families, but would say it is a bit overpriced for what it is.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Your opinion is very valuable to us. We appreciate your compliments regarding our pools and poolside service. We regret that our restaurant was not to your liking. We aim to please every guest during their stay and we hope that your experience at our restaurant did not have a negative impact on your overall experience. We hope you do visit us again in the near future.

Summary: Hotel had a great start as you up drive the motor court and find a beautifully restored 1941 Woody under the porte cochere with a surfboard in toe.  NICE.  The staff was ok, nothing to write about just pretty much average.  Our first room had a very small window with no view of the ocean and for the price we paid we expected a bit more.  A call to the front desk was immediately place and we were given a new room with a balcony and a fantastic view.   If you book a stay in this hotel beware to ask about the room prior to booking.  The view of the ocean from the hotel bar was amazing and only a few steps from the beach.  The breakfast buffet was really good and the Wifi was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our 1940 Woody is very popular and all of our guests love taking pictures right next to it. We are happy to hear that we were able to change your room to one that you liked . I must agree, one of my favorite spots at the resort is the OverVue Lounge as well. The panoramic ocean views are quite spectacular. We hope you took advantage of the beach and harbor that is within walking distance of the resort. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: This beautiful clean property is very family friendly -- really caters to kids!  Location is awesome -- within walking distance to beach and plenty of restaurants. The staff is very attentive and friendly.  The OverVue Lounge turns into a breakfast bar in the morning offering coffee and quick bites.  For lunch, they offer draft beer and great snacks.
