I would definitely recommend eating offsite for dinner since there are plenty of choices.  The very lumpy beds however need to be replaced -- woke up w/ a sore back every morning.  I would definitely return despite the bed situation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for the 5 star rating. Our resort is very popular with families because of the wonderful children‚Äôs activities we provide including our Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club movie night, which features a new movie every Saturday and is complimentary for all overnight guests with children.  The children‚Äôs splash zone at our Del Mar pool is another huge hit for all of the kids. We thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive and friendly staff. We strive to make every guest experience a lasting one and we are delighted that we did just that during your stay. We regret that the bed was not comfortable for you and left you feeling sore the next morning. We are very surprised to hear that because as you can read from previous reviews, we have received nothing but wonderful compliments regarding the comfort of our beds. We hope that this did not cause an inconvenience to you during your stay. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Luxury on the Southern California Coast
Summary: Now, let me start by saying that I have stayed in a couple of places on the Southern California coast including much esteemed places like the Ritz Carlton hotel in Laguna Niguel.  This place blows them away with aplomb.   Marriott has truly cracked the puzzle with this one.  Imagine a pleasant, mid-sized resort with gorgeous modern, sleek decor with a nice warm ambiance overlooking one of the great views the planet has to offer. Add to that, a warm, friendly staff and little touches like live orchids,  super-pretty landscaping and a great breakfast.  Now finally layer  in a wonderful, casual, warm family feeling and you begin to see why this place is special.  Nobody was stiff or rude to kids and you could tell that they love families.  In terms of business facilities, I did not
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your lovely review and rating of 5 stars. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and experienced our warm and friendly staff. We truly embrace every guest and our goal is to make each and every person leave with an everlasting memory. We are happy to hear that we created some a memorable experience for you and your family. We are looking forward to your next visit and we cannot wait to welcome you and your new favorite resort.

Summary: We can't wait to come back! Fantastic staff, especially the manger Tiffany!  Clean rooms with beautiful decor and comfy beds.  Great location with amazing ocean views...our only wish was that it was closer to a beach.  The hotel concierge gave us directions to a gorgeous beach near the Ritz Carlton.  We'll certainly be back with family and friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for your 5 star rating. We are delighted that you had such a memorable experience at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa that you are already planning your next visit with your friends and family. We will be sure to share your compliments with our team. We are looking forward to your arrival and we are excited to welcome your family and friends to the resort.

Summary: For the area, where there is not really a middle ground in terms of price, the Marriott is just fine.  Definitely not the Ritz but also not a beach shack.    We had requested an ocean view room with a balcony and although a balcony couldn't be confirmed while making the reservation, it was noted in our profile.  Upon check in, we were excited to hear that a room with a balcony was available but were disappointed when we saw the room and high wall that blocked most of the view (we believe our room was over a portion of the roof so not a balcony where one could lounge and look out).    The room itself was ok.  The beds were horribly uncomfortable and in desperate need of a refurbish.  The bathroom is updated but they could have done a better job.  The common areas were clean and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your feedback and comments.. We are delighted that you enjoyed sitting outside on the Vue Patio to have a relaxing evening. We appreciate your compliments regarding our great staff service at the Vue Restaurant. We do regret that you did not have the same exceptional service from our staff the next morning at breakfast. We take every review very seriously and your opinion matters to us. We will address your concerns with our Food & Beverage team and we will assure you that these issues are resolved immediately. As I‚Äôm sure you are aware, we take great pride in providing a high level of service and quality to our guests.  Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests and we hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule.   We hope you visit us again in the future.

Summary: Beautiful view! One BR suite. Great staff. Need to expand room service menu or have a grocery store on site being a resort. Not everyone has a car. The spa was amazing. I has two clients and myself and they worked us in for an amazing day of pampering. Thank you. The spa manager was amazing in taking care of my request and needs.  The concierge hooked me up with the best driving service. I will continue to use them. Look forward to my next stay with you all!
Manager Response: Thank you for your 10 star rating. We appreciate your compliments regarding our guest rooms, dining facilities, gym and our spa. We are delighted that you enjoyed the fireplaces in the lobby and Spa. In regards to the cost of Wi-Fi in your guest room, this fee is included in the resort fee. We thank you again for your review and we hope you visit us again when you are visit the United States.

Summary Heading: Stay here instead of Disneyland Hotels
Summary: Hotel is a short drive 35 minutes from Disneyland. 2 pools great staff and rooms. Excellent view nice rooms I could go on. Before you spend $350 or more per night for a Disneyland Hotel check this resort out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your wonderful compliments about our resort. The resorts location is perfectly centered between Los Angeles and San Diego. We have a family friendly resort with a Kid‚Äôs Club that is offered during the summer months and a children‚Äôs splash zone that is a popular hit with all the children. We have many activities both at the resort and within walking distance. We appreciate your recommendation to those traveling to Disneyland and we hope that you visit us again soon.

Summary: Pros: Good views from ocean room balconies, nice pool complexes, rooms well- appointed, most staff helpful and nice. Restaurant (dinner and brunch) and bar a bit expensive but nice views, OK service (slow); No- cover music bands weekend nights added to ambience outside on Patio (too loud inside for any conversation). Cons: Extra charges: Wi- Fi not free, mandatory $25/day resort fee, mandatory $32/day fee for parking (plus valet tip).  Tried a massage and the Spa and found it expensive (mandatory tip was included), but adequate/ average for this level hotel - nowhere near the poor service reported by other reviewers...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our ocean-view rooms, pools, guest rooms and our helpful staff. Our resort is truly one of a kind with its panoramic ocean views and casually sophisticated vibe. Our staff does an exceptional job in providing our guests with exceptional service and following through with any requests. We do provide live entertainment on Friday and Saturday nights and most of our guests can enjoy the music both inside and outside of our OverVue Lounge. In regards to the resort fee, Wi-Fi is included in the resort fee so there is no additional charge to use the internet. We apologize for any confusion with the Spa gratuity. Spa gratuities are 100% optional and can be adjusted at any time on the final bill. We include the gratuity for the guest‚Äôs convenience but it is not mandatory. We again apologize for any inconvenience this may have brought you. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: We love staying at the Laguna Cliffs! The grounds and view are beautiful! Staff are very pleasant and helpful. The rooms are very clean and roomy. They have bikes, boogie boards etc to rent. In walking distance to the harbor, which have several restaurants, boating excursions and you can also catch the Catalina Express! Close to Laguna Beach. The best is to just relax by the pool.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and lovely compliments about our resort. We enjoy hearing about your experience and we are delighted that we met all of your expectations. We agree, our location is truly perfect. There are many nearby activities that are offered at and within walking distance of the resort. We hope you have a chance to visit our spa the next time you visit. You will surely be relaxed and rejuvenated. We‚Äôre looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: First time visit for my wife and I, and we will surely return. While not directly on the Pacific Ocean, the views are breathtaking over the Harbor and Marina below. The staff did an excellent job. We had dinner the first night in the Restaurant, it was the best meal of the trip, with attentive service. The rooms are clean, and well maintained. This is a value compared to the five star resorts down the PCH.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed your very first visit with us and will be returning in the future. We hope you enjoyed the beautiful panoramic ocean views of the resort. Thank you for your compliments regarding our staff. Our job is to be attentive to each guest‚Äôs needs prior to arrival and we are happy that you experienced the exceptional service from our staff. We are looking forward to your second visit here.

Summary: Just completed a 3 night stay at this hotel and everything was great from start to finish.  Checkin was a breeze and they accommodated us by moving us to a room on the 4th floor that had a view of the coastline.  The room was quaint and perfect for two people.  The bed was comfortable, the furnishings were very nice and in good shape except for the area at the bottom of the desk where the chair legs appear to have scuffed up that area.   The bathroom was small but not problematic.    The hallways were in good shape and we witnessed ongoing painting and maintenance of scuffs, etc.     The pool and grounds a lovely and the view is fantastic.   I found it to be totally relaxing.     The level of service stood out the most.  Every single person we encountered said hello and asked if
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We are happy to hear that you stayed with us for 3 nights and experienced our outstanding service from arrival to departure. We anticipate our guest‚Äôs needs and our goal is to make your stay as pleasurable and comfortable as we can. We are delighted to hear that we accomplished this during your stay. Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We are glad that you were able to enjoy the amenities of the resort and take advantage of our complimentary bike rentals that are included in the resort fee.  We hope to see you again real soon.

Summary: This was a big birthday for my wife and I choose the Laguna Cliffs Marriott to spend the night. I used my Marriott points for the room and noted the special occasion.  When we checked in they upgraded our room to an ocean view room with a balcony.  Lauren B from the front desk also send up champaign and chocolates to our room. What fantastic treatment by the hotel staff, we love this hotel resort and plan on coming back. I highly recommend this property, it is top notch is so many ways.  Thank you, James
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for rating the resort with 5 stars. We want to wish your wife a happy birthday and we are delighted to hear that we were able to make this day special and memorable for the both of you. Thank you for recommending this resort to others and we appreciate your compliments. We hope you and your wife visit us again in the near future.

Summary: My first visit to the USA and I fell in love. Nothing better than a horrible journey to walk into a hotel and be given great service to start of your vacation. We asked for adjoining rooms and was pleased that we got them, they also put us on the ground floor as my friend had a baby with her.   The rooms were beautiful and the beds....so comfortable. The view was of the park and you could see the ocean.   The breakfast .... Not just any breakfast, you are absolutely spoilt for choice. The eggs Benedict were very filling.  The service was faultless. The pool area was wonderful to lounge around in.  The only thing I would say that its a tad expensive on the food and drink side.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for rating the resort with 5 stars. We want to welcome you to the United States and we are very happy to hear that we not only made a great impression for your first visit but that we were able to create fond memories for you. We appreciate your compliments and we hope that we can create many more great memories for you the next time you visit the United States.

Summary: We checked in at approx 4pm Memorial weekend and stayed for two nights. The room we were given was lovely, one of their newly furnished rooms that overlooked the pool and ocean. The room was great, large with a sitting area and a balcony to breakfast, have coffee or just simply take in the view. The grounds to this hotel are stunning and the property throughout beautifully appointed. The location is a walk down to the Marina where there is an abundance of restaurants and shops and if you walk a little further you will be on the beach, in fact some of the restaurants are situated near the beach with ocean views. We new there was a $25 resort fee but there usually is a resort fee in hotels with such beautiful grounds and location. We didn't mind too much as Wifi is included in
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review of your visit. We appreciate your wonderful compliments. It was our pleasure having you with us and we are so glad you took advantage of our incredible surroundings. We couldn't agree more that our resort is situated in just the perfect location, high on the cliffs overlooking the Pacific and  walking distance to the marina and beach. Our team is outstanding and they look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy another fun filled with more sun, relaxation and pampering by the pools. We enjoyed creating memories for you and your guest and we look forward in creating more for you in the near future.

Summary: My wife and I spent the night here in celebration of our anniversary.  We live in the area so we were just looking for a relaxing night away from the kids.  We were not disappointed.  The hotel is very nice as was the room.  We requested an ocean view and had a wonderful view of the harbor and ocean.  The balcony was a little small and only had  two high chairs rather than lounge chairs.  If we go again, we'll clarify our request.  We had dinner and breakfast at the hotel's restaurant "The Vue".  While the food was decent and priced about what you would expect for a resort hotel, the service was fantastic for both meals.  I will definitely recommend this hotel to any friends coming in to town.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and happy anniversary! We are delighted that you chose our resort to celebrate your special day. Thank you for the wonderful compliments regarding the outstanding service you received from our staff. We take great pride in the outstanding service we provide to our guests and we thank you for recommending our resort to friends and family. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I am giving this hotel 4 stars primarily on location, as well as beauty of the grounds and nearby park.  The setting of the hotel is superb and the hotel, itself, is a beautiful site atop the cliff/hill.  That said, everything else about the hotel is typical Marriott.  Nothing special about the rooms or facilities.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding the resorts beautiful grounds and ocean views. The location is quite superb with breathtaking panoramic views of the Pacific. We hope you and your guest had a lovely experience and we would love to welcome you back.

Summary: It looks from the outside fabulous. It is also a very nice looking hotel. Unfortunately, it is totally overpriced. The room I was given was at the very back of the hotel in an adjoining building. My view was that of the traffic down below. In comparison to other hotels I felt the room was rather small. I do not think the hotel was even close to being half filled, unlike a previous review I have read I was not offered an upgrade. Given that this is an overpriced hotel that would have been nice. There is a $25.00 resort fee which basically lets you have Wifi and the use of the pool. It is a nice pool and the staff of the facility is extremely friendly. I suppose I could have found a parking space on the street, but would have had to drag bags up a hill, so for $36.00 I let them
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our ‚Äúextremely‚Äù friendly staff and nice pools. We regret that you felt the resort was overpriced. Our resort fee of $25.00 is stated on all confirmation e-mails and we apologize for any miscommunication with the fee. Our restaurant does in fact have an ocean-view but on very rare occasions it may be obstructed due to fog or an event on property that has special requests. Another area at the resort that captures the ocean- view quite beautifully is our OverVue Deck which sits above the Vue Restaurant. We want to thank you for your feedback. Your opinion is extremely valuable to us and our goal is for every guest to be completely satisfied during their stay.

Summary: This is one of the nicest hotels I have ever had the pleasure of staying at. The views are great, the room was huge and beautiful. We were even upgraded to a suite at no additional cost and we even got the hotel on Hotwire for half the normal price.  We have stayed at several JW Marriots and this is just as nice and plush as those. The food was top notch and the drinks were great. It is only a short walk to the Marina where there are many stores and lots of restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments and for rating the resort with 5 stars. We are delighted to hear that the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa is the nicest hotel you‚Äôve ever stayed at. Our goal is to provide an exceptional experience for each and every guest and we are happy to hear that you were extremely pleased with everything during your stay. We hope that you and your wife visit us again soon. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: It was wonderfully relaxing and enjoyable stay. Found all the staff to be helpful and understanding. The room was very clean. It had a balcony with a beautiful view over looking the Lantern Bay Park and the Dana Point Harbor. I especially enjoyed the continental breakfast that included a chef that would make customized omelets. While there we took advantage of The Spa. It was a relaxing and rejuvenating after busy day site seeing! I would certainly return for another stay if the opportunity arose.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments regarding our staff and beautiful resort. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our Spa. The omelet station is one of my favorites as well and we thank you for sharing your experience with us. We hope you do return again soon.

Summary: Perhaps it's the tone set by the mandatory $32 per night valet parking.   The eagerness to offer $5 glasses of juice to the kids at breakfast ("Juice?" with bright smile, what kid says no?).  The internet fees.  Booking by phone at $209 per night, then hearing at check-in that's just for the first night, $219 thereafter...  I admit it kind of sets me on a defensive tone.  The hotel is very beautiful, the rooms comfortable, the pool is incredibly nice with a gorgeous view.  I can't give it a bad review.  One thing that bothered us however is that there's no northern entry/exit door.  The shops and restaurants and pier are to the northwest, but the hotel has only service entry that way (I tried entering after a walk up the hill and was sent out to the parking garage).  The lobby
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. Your opinion is very valuable to us and our goal is to have every guest‚Äôs experience with us, an exceptional one. In regards to the parking fees, in recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical. We apologize if this was an inconvenience to you.   Please note that if occupancy permits, we do offer our guests a shuttle service that will take them to and from the harbor. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: Beautiful location! Once you arrive you really don't need your car- which is good because it is all valet. Parking is a bit expensive, but in line with other area hotels. The partial ocean view gave us a nice view over the lawn and park to the ocean. The balcony was a great place to have morning coffee. The room was very clean and nicely furnished, and the bedding very comfortable and crisp. The lounge had live entertainment both nights. The hotel was just a set of stairs away from the harbor, and several waterfront restaurants. A whale watching company offers sunset cruises if you feel like a few hours out on the water.  Doheny beach is a easy walk away. Great way to spend a weekend.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and for rating our resort with 5 stars. We are delighted that you enjoyed the ocean and park views from your guest room and that you enjoyed the d√©cor. We are happy that you enjoyed the music in our OverVue Lounge. Our live entertainment is every Friday and Saturday nights. I would highly recommend the Sunset Whale Watching Cruises too. We hope that you visit us again soon.

Summary: My husband and I planned a weekend getaway. We loved the hotel grounds, the restaurant was ok, rooms were standard. However the valet parking was quick but yet the 29.00 a day fee plus tipping becomes a bit much,especially if your just making a quick run to the store. I would recommend this hotel based on the hotel grounds and the location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you and your husband had a weekend getaway at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the beautiful, panoramic ocean views of the resort. We will be sure to share your compliments regarding our efficient valet staff with our team. We hope you visit us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Beautifully positioned to view Dana Point.
Summary: This hotel had a quaintness to it, although it had everything there, and somewhat large, it was also quaint.  It was in a great location.  The kids loved it.  There was their breakfast bar area that has beautiful views and it was so nice to have a cup of coffee there and take in all the views.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments and for rating the resort with 5 stars. We are delighted that you enjoyed your cup of coffee in our OverVue Deck overlooking the Pacific Ocean. It‚Äôs the best way to start of your morning. We are happy to hear that your kids enjoyed the resort as well. We hope that they were able to play in the Splash Zone. We are looking forward in welcoming you back.

Summary: Attended a conference, but only stayed one night.  The staff (e.g. front desk, concierge, valet parking, etc.) was uniformily very friendly and helpful.  I had a standard room on the second floor which was spacious, and there was a small patio.  The bathroom had no bathtub but the walk-in shower was large.  The beds were fine, but the air conditioner was a little noisy.  The hotel is not on the beach but a short walk down a driveway and across the street (all about 350 yards away).  There is only valet parking (about $30/day) and a "resort" fee is also normally charged but, because of the conference, those were waived for our conference attendees.  We also received a group rate, which was very reasonsable.  The facilities are attractive and well maintained.  Overall, while my
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope that we could make your conference a success and we are delighted that you enjoyed your stay so much that you wanted to stay longer. We hope that you have a chance to visit us again soon for a vacation and enjoy the Spa and resort amenities that Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa has to offer. We thank you for your kind compliments and we hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: This hotel is very beautiful and surprisingly kid friendly. The welcoming and capable staff made our stay very enjoyable. We stayed in a suite and it was a nice room but not at all worth the $800/night price tag. The suite was really on the small side, no balcony, with only two windows. We have stayed in Marriott suites before and this room did not measure up at all. We would have been better off getting two connecting rooms with balconies.   The location of the hotel is excellent. We took the ferry to Catalina island and the dock was a 5 minute walk from the hotel.  The beach is a quick stroll down the hill. The hotel does seem a bit isolated because of it's location perched on a hill.   The hotel seems to host quite a few conventions and weddings but still manages to keep a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for complementing our staff on their excellent service. We take great pride in the high service levels the staff at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa brings to its guests and we will be sure to share your compliments with our team. We enjoy hearing the activities are guests participated in during their stay and we are so delighted that you were able to visit Catalina Island during your vacation. The resort definitely caters to all kinds of travelers including families, couples, business travelers and vactionists. We regret that our suites were not to your liking. Your opinion is very important to us. We hope that you do visit us again soon the next time you are visiting Southern California.

Summary Heading: Beautiful but not too close to water
Summary: Ok so the thing about Laguna Cliff, CA is that the Ritz Carlton has the best spot around!  That $500+ per night is worth it but if you don't have it the Marriott Laguna Cliffs offers similar amenities with a bit more reserved charm.  The pool area and spa are wonderful and the outdoor lounge/restaurant is a great atmosphere!  Being up on the cliff you feel on top of the world but I wish the view of the water was a little bit more!  Still spectacular!  The balcony on the room was very charming and the bathroom shower head was amazing!  The king bed was a true luxury and clean is an understatement however the hallways smelled a little like mold but it is by the water!  For a much more affordable stay on the cliff with a short  ways to the beach and small walk down the hill or bike
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the two outdoor pools and our spa. We hope that you took some time to pamper yourself with one of our signature Spa treatments. The location of the resort is quite spectacular, overlooking the Pacific Ocean and walking distance from the beach and marina. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you would recommend our resort to others, that truly is the biggest compliment that someone can give us. We hope you come back to visit us again soon.

Summary: I just stayed two nights and will definitely return.  The view is lovely!  I found the price-point for my room to be very reasonable, considering the prices at nearby 5-star properties are easily double.  The hotel and grounds are well-kept, the decor is stylish, and the finishes are in line with a 4-star hotel.  The bedding is very comfortable and of high quality.  I dined at both Vue and OverVue and found the food/drinks/dessert to be fine, but not great.  The prices are "resort-typical", at $60 for two flavored martinis and two lunches.  There are some good restaurants by the harbor across the road and are worth the walk.  Keep in mind all resort parking is valet at $32/day.  I would absolutely recommend this resort!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your kind compliments about our resort. We can‚Äôt agree with your more, the panoramic ocean views are breathtaking. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the comfort of our beds and the beach chic d√©cor. Thank you for highly recommending our resort. We hope that you visit us again when you are here in Dana Point.

Summary: We spent a few days here and were delighted at the location. The hotel sits on the cliff overlooking the harbor and has beautiful ocean views. The restaurant was good and the staff was friendly. At the time of stay there was a wedding gong on so the front desk area was busy but the girl we dealt with was very accommodating, she actually upgraded us to an ocean view room. I would recommend the hotel to any couple wanting to get away for the weekend, business men who want a place to go for a quick meeting outside with beautiful views, or even wedding planners looking for a place to hold an event.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recommendation and all of your compliments regarding our resort and it‚Äôs attentive staff. We are delighted to hear that you were upgraded to an ocean-view room. We hope you enjoyed the spectacular panoramic ocean views of the Pacific during your stay. We have to agree with you, the resort is perfect for a couple‚Äôs getaway, a business retreat, a wedding or a family vacation. We are happy that we can accommodate all of our guests needs and make every visit a unique one. We hope you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: Huge and beautiful hotel looking out over the Pacific Ocean and harbor area.  Wonderful pool area and nice restaurants.  Excellent beds and clean large bedrooms. Large grounds for walking dogs or playing with kids.  Ten minute walk to the harbor and harbor restaurants.  Good seafood at the wharf plus boat and bike rentals.  The hotel has an excellent staff and and great service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments and for your rating of 5 stars. We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us and that you experienced our exceptional service levels and our attentive staff. We find great joy in hearing about our guest‚Äôs wonderful experience and we appreciate the time you took to write your review. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful setting for a well appointed recently renovated Marriott.
Summary: This recently renovated/updated Marriott is very nice. Rooms are Marriott clean and equipped. The beds comfortable. The hill top location and tennis, pool and other amenities set this apart from a typical hotel-as the name says this is a resort. Very nice Marriott property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments and review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our renovated resort with all of the amenities it has to offer.  We are delighted that you felt it stood apart from the other hotels you have visited and we hope that we left you completely satisfied. We appreciate your compliments and we hope that you visit us again soon.

Summary: We visited Dana Point for the whale festival in March. Fabulous location, we were able to walk to a lot of places! Our room was clean and great. Would definitely recommend! We had a very short trip but we'd definitely love to take a longer trip soon, the hotel is just beautiful. Only compliant is bird poop on the chairs by the pool, but that can only be controlled to a certain point.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope you enjoyed the Festival of the Whales during your stay. The location of the resort is just perfect, walking distance from the harbor and marina, yet set high on the cliffs for a peaceful and serene setting. We appreciate your feedback and we will definitely look out for the bird‚Äôs messes. We hope that you do visit us again soon for a longer vacation.

Summary: I had stayed here once before but it was years ago. I remember it being nice, but clearly my memory is going as this is an outstanding hotel.  The staff is nice, attentive, but not in-your-face obnoxious.  They want to help and are intent on making your staff pleasant.  As a frequent Marriott guest, I got upgraded to room 217 which was a suite with two balconies, both of which had beautiful views.  The bed was comfortable, the internet worked, the shower was nice, and it was quiet and tranquil.  I ate in the restaurant and submitted a separate review - it was very good.  The spa/workout facility was an A+.  Valet parking was prompt.  My room rate was cheap - $170 but I failed to read the fine print and they get you for a resort fee.  So, with that added in and the valet was also
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and your rating of 5 stars. We appreciate your compliments regarding our attentive resort and valet staff. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of our fitness center and rated it an A+. Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We enjoy hearing our guest‚Äôs experiences and we aim to please every single guest and leave them with exceptional memories. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel for 4 nights and really enjoyed the hotel.  Check-in was very smooth.  The person at the front desk also presented our children with a basket of toys from which they could choose which was a nice touch.   The rooms are were clean and comfortable. The mattresses had feather beds on top of them which were very comfortable as well. If they are too soft, you can always take them off.   The view is abosultely amazing.  You are standing on a cliff overlooking the marina (which is in walking distance) and the ocean. Beyond the hotel grounds is a public park where groups come to do yoga (while staring at the ocean), walk dogs, etc..   While the weather was a little chilly while we were thre (62 degrees) the children were still able to swim (the pool is heated) and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments and we are delighted that you had a wonderful  4 night stay at the resort. We love hearing about our guests‚Äô experiences and we are happy to hear that your children enjoyed the heated pools. We hope they were able to spend some time in the Splash zone as well. The French toast is one of my favorites at the Vue Restaurant as well and the buffet items are very delicious. We appreciate you sharing your experience with us and we are looking forward in your return to Southern California.

Summary: I was a guest of this resort for two nights in March 2012 for a conference.  Every employee I met was courteous and attentive, from the parking valet attendant, the check in, the waiters, and the hotel maids. It appeared that this property is well managed with good employee morale.  The room was approximately 300 square feet with a king bed with a smaller partial ocean view.  The hotel itself appeared it was built during the 1980.s architectural design and still retain some of the feel of the eighties, but it was well kept.  Banquet food was provided by the conference catered by the hotel, service and quality of food was better than most other similar conferences that I have attended.  All in all a relaxing place to be for couples and families.  I would return and recommend this
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you very much for your wonderful review. We appreciate the rating of 5 stars and your great compliments regarding our exceptional staff. We thank you for your recommendation and we hope that your conference was a success. The beauty of the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa is that it accommodates both the business traveler and as you mentioned, couples and families that want to stay at the resort for a leisurely vacation. We are delighted to hear that your experience from arrival to departure was superb. We hope that you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Beautiful view, good location if you are fit.
Summary: I have a ton of mixed feelings about this resort. It has a beautiful location, with a ton of things to do if you go and search them out. The base price of the room is a value but the $32 per day parking and $15.00 (+$1.50 tax) resort fee add another almost $50.00 a day to your rate.  Very close to Dana Point Harbor which has shopping and dining but be aware it is 118 steps up and down. The service was very friendly and they seemed to be sponsoring internships for European college students which was great but not always as attentive as it could be. The pool was nice if just a bit cold and the little kids seemed to enjoy the splash zone despite some of it being out of order.  A pretty enjoyable trip to Orange county and hope to come back and maybe the little minor things can be
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our beautiful ocean-view resort and our courteous staff. We hope you took advantage of the walking distance to the Dana Point Harbor and it‚Äôs quaint shops.  We apologize that the Splash Zone was not working during your stay. We assure you that we are working to get this fixed in a timely manner to not inconvenience any of our guests. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: I travel to Southern California regularly and had been looking for a nice hotel half way between LA and San Diego. Well I have now stayed at the Laguna Cliffs on two occasions and have decided this is my regular hotel for all future business trips. To put it simple...they care -The staff is  is always attentive -The quality of the Hotel is great I highly recommend staying in this hotel if you find your self between LA and San Diego!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for rating our resort with 5 stars. We are humbled by your compliments and for choosing our resort and your favorite in Southern California. Our staff is truly exceptional and their attention to detail does not go unnoticed. They care about each and every guest and their goal is to make your stay as enjoyable and comfortable as they can. We truly appreciate your compliments and are looking forward in having you stay with us for all of your business trips.

Summary: Our four night stay was generally disappointing. And that's from a pro-Marriott fan that's an awards level member. Although we paid for a water front room, our original room didn't even have a balcony, so we dropped down to the third floor and had one. Unfortuntely, it was smaller than the couch in the room. It merely had two chairs and a very small table. Then, to add insult to injury, our view was monopolized by a gigantic white special event tent which remained there until the last afternoon of our visit. Great water view! Costs were more like NYC than SoCal - parking at $32 per night; room service ice only at $19; martini at the bar for $17; resort fee at $16.50. We planned to eat at the hotel restaurant but when we saw it's prices, we went across the street for about 1/2
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our kind staff. However, we do regret that you were disappointed with your stay. Our goal is to create an environment for our guests that exceed their expectations. Your comments and opinion are very important to us and we will share them with our team to ensure that we don‚Äôt miss the mark in the future. Thank you again for addressing your concerns.

Summary Heading: Relaxing Hotel in a Good Location
Summary: We spent four nights at this hotel. The rooms are large and have couches allowing us to spread out. The hotel is on a cliff which provided great views. Adjacent to the hotel is a beautiful park and marina area with restaurants. We were able to leisurely walk to dinner. Also, it has excellent an excellent exercise facility. If you eat at the hotel it's a little pricey - but aren't most hotels.  We used Dana Point as our home base. It was easy to travel to both L.A. and San Diego for the day.The pool area (there are two pools) was just ok; I've seen better. Overall, though, I recommend staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: We are delighted to hear that you stayed with us for four nights and that you enjoyed your large room and the comfort of the furniture. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of our state of the art fitness center and the restaurants in the harbor. Our team is outstanding and they look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy the resorts amenities as well as the local beach and marina. We enjoyed creating memories for you and look forward to creating more for you in the near future.

Summary: My wife & I enjoyed walks around the park and the nearby harbor.  The 118 step staircase was quite a climb, though.  Strengths included professional staff and clean, comfortable room.  If you drive, be prepared to valet your vehicle.  No self-park on the property.
Manager Response: We thank you for taking the time to write your review. We are delighted to hear that you and your wife enjoyed the beautiful ocean views of the resort and the walks along the nearby park and harbor. It is quite pleasant to be able to walk from the resort to the marina and enjoy the quaint shops that surround the harbor. We will be sure to pass along the compliments that you gave about our professional staff. We hope that you and your wife will visit us again soon.

Summary: First time to this area. The people working here are wonderful. They all know how to make you feel welcome. We had a couples massage that was world class. As good as we've ever had. If you do nothing else at this resort get a massage.  The major drawback is the room. We had an upgraded room with an ocean view. The room lack drawer space. So if you are here for awhile. You will live out of a suitcase. There is zero shelf space in the bathroom. You either use the floor or take up what limited drawer space. Overall the room is not much for what you are paying for. We are moving on to another local Marriott resort today and I am looking forward to better things.  We will get another couples massage there. Just doing comparison shopping.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and welcome to Dana Point, CA. We are happy to hear that you visited the city for the first time. We hope your entire stay was pleasurable and that you were able to get some site seeing time. Thank you for your compliments regarding our attentive and friendly staff. Our staff is truly exceptional and they care for our guests needs and want to make your stay as pleasurable and comfortable as they can. We apologize that we did not have enough space for your clothes. We hope you took advantage of the spacy dresser drawers. Thank you for your comments and we hope you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: This is a real hidden gem.  It's a step down from the neighbors up the road ( Ritz/St. Regis) but you can stay for 1/3 the price.  The grounds are very nice with 2 salt water pools ( one in each building) have plenty of seating and are close to all the rooms. The rooms are modern and decorated very well.  Bathrooms are Marble and provide top notch bath products.  In addition to a small bar/coffee area above the minibar all the rooms have a small fridge as well.  But if you get you need some fresh air just step out on the patio.  That said the patios do vary dramatically, on this visit i had a room with the standard patio ( small but great view).  Your best bet is to ask for one of the end of hall units with direct ocean views.  on a previous visit i had a end unit with a large
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments regarding our resort. Ironically, we too describe our resort as a ‚Äúhidden gem.‚Äù We are happy to hear that you also feel that our property stands out from other hotels you‚Äôve visited. The panoramic ocean views are quite spectacular and we are pleased that you were able to enjoy your balcony as you took in the ocean breeze and views of the harbor. Our recently renovated resort has impressed many guests like yourself and we appreciate your compliments. Thank you for recommending the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We hope to see you again real soon.

Summary: Very nice property, clean, friendly! Valet parking ONLY - $32/night!  A tiny dinner in the bar-  restaurant was closed during the week - almost $60 with tip for a mini salad, a small piece of chicken, and glass of wine (lower end of menu).  Wifi - $13/day.  Beautiful location, though; just prepare to feel robbed.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding out clean property and friendly staff. We regret that you felt the price point was too high in our restaurant, we hope that this did not in any way negatively impact your stay. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  Our wifi charges are included in the resort fee. There is no additional charge for using wifi at the resort. We thank you for your comments and we hope that you visit us again.

Summary: This hotel is a perfect escape for a weekend getaway. Driving up the road and onto the hotel grounds creates a feeling of shedding away the hectic day to day and brings you into an oasis of ocean breezes and laid back attitude. The rooms feel spacious and private with bright beach decor. The check in staff are great and accommodated my special requests to make my stay that much better. The views are great and the proximity to the park is great and makes the place feel bigger than it is. I would go back for a weekend away for sure.
Manager Response: We couldn‚Äôt agree with you more. The resort is situated in a perfect location. Peacefully placed on the cliffs, yet close enough to walk to the beach and harbor. We are delighted to hear that your staff was able to accommodate your requests and make your stay even better. We are looking forward in having you back for another weekend getaway.

Summary Heading: Excellent Stay, Friendly Staff, Comfortable Room
Summary: We only spent one night here and it was very enjoyable. We had a ground floor room with a nice courtyard view and patio. Room price included valet parking (which is normally a whopping $32 a day, and there are no self-parking alternatives), and breakfast for two.   One thing I noticed about my stay is the staff. Everyone seemed to be very friendly and helpful. Not that I am a major cynic, but it seems that finding friendly and helpful hotel staff is more challenging than it used to be.   Room and bathroom were nicely furnished, comfortable,and very clean. Bed and linens were exceptionally plush and comfortable.   Breakfast on Friday morning was very good. We had a choice of the buffet or an "up to" price from the menu. We opted for the buffet. Lots of selections, including a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate you rating of 5 stars. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the comfortable beds and the buffet in our Vue Restaurant. We are delighted to hear that you were blown away by the service and attention to detail that our staff provided you during your stay. Our gratification comes from providing our guests with exceptional service and making their stay memorable and enjoyable. We are pleased to hear that we did just that. We appreciate your time in writing this review and we hope that you come back to visit us again soon. Thank you.

Summary: Our family had a delightful weekend at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa to celebrate my birthday.  We rented 5 rooms, all of which were excellent.  We had a private room for our dinner Saturday night.  The room, service and food were perfect.  Sunday morning we enjoyed the breakfast buffet on the patio.  Our son compared it to staying at the Hotel Del Coronado but with better rooms and a magnificent view. We live in San Diego and Orange County so this location was good for alll of us.  We will return!
Manager Response: Happy belated birthday. It brings us such joy to know that you chose the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa to celebrate your birthday with your family. We thank you for the compliments you gave to our staff. We have an exceptional staff that raises the bar for guest service and our goal is to make your stay as pleasurable and comfortable as we can. We hope we created memories that will last you a lifetime. We are looking forward in making your visits a home away from home. We hope to see you soon.

Summary: On a cliff above the Harbor. Fantastic view over harbor and ocean. Rooms a bit small but clean and nice. Breakfast has amazing choices. Patios equipped with comfortable lounge furniture. Service excellent, very helpful and quick.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments. We are delighted that you enjoyed the breakfast options of the Vue Restaurant. We hope you were able to enjoy the panoramic ocean views of the OverVue Lounge. Our staff‚Äôs attention to detail is impeccable and they are at your service 24 hours. We hope your stay was memorable and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Beautiful hotel in an upscale part of California. Wonderful views from the restaurant and lounge, as well as from our ocean view room. And the service was above and beyond. The restaurants were expensive but delicious, especially the breakfast buffet. The only reason I gave this beautiful resort a 4 star, is because it's not quite as close to a beach as we would have liked (a 5 minute walk to the harbor, which has plenty of restaurant choices). But it was central to everything that we were there to see (Camp Pendleton, Disneyland, and Laguna), so actually the central location was fine, as long as you have a car.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments regarding our resort. We are grateful that you enjoyed the panoramic ocean views of the Pacific Ocean while visiting our resort. The ocean views from the guest rooms are quite amazing and we are delighted that you were able to experience the beauty of Laguna Cliffs. Our location is just perfect, halfway between San Diego and Los Angeles and walking distance to the beach and harbor. We hope you enjoyed your time exploring the Dana Point area. Your compliments regarding our staff service is very much appreciated. The staff here at Laguna Cliffs takes great pride in their job and for creating a memorable vacation for all of our guests. We go above and beyond to make your stay a special one. We hope you have a chance to visit us again soon.

Summary: Hotel was awesome, staff was great and the views were incredible. Close to the harbor with a lot of good restaurants and shops to visit. Don't miss the sunsets, on site restuarant is a bit pricey but overall the property is definite must see.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for rating the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa with 5 stars. We are delighted that you enjoyed the beautiful panoramic ocean views of the resort. Our sunsets are truly breathtaking and if you follow us on Facebook, you will see how many beautiful sunsets we capture on a daily basis. Thank you for recognizing our excellent staff and their impeccable service. We take great pride in serving our guests and your stay is the most important thing for us. We hope you come back soon and see a few more sunsets along the Pacific Ocean.

Summary: Large property with beautiful views.  Children's pool is really fun. Lots of options for kids to run around and play.  Walking distance from the harbor, with plenty of restaurant options. The resort itself has dining options as well, though the food isn't great and is overpriced. Clean hotel and room, although we had to get housekeeping to unclog the bathtub - my pet peeve! The hotel only has valet parking, and sometimes we had to wait  around ten minutes for our car.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding the beautiful ocean views that surround the resort. We are delighted that your children enjoyed the Splash Zone and activities the resort has to offer for children. During summer months, the resort also provides a Kid‚Äôs Club and complimentary movie nights that are both huge hits with the children. Children will receive a red carpet entrance to our amphitheater style seating, Pacific Learning Center, where they will be pampered with popcorn, drinks, candy and snacks. The children will also receive a movie night ticket where the next morning they can enjoy a complimentary breakfast, which includes chocolate chip pancakes. Children and adults both have a great time.   We apologize for any inconvenience the bathroom clog may have brought  to you during your stay but we are happy that we were able to fix the issue quickly and efficiently. We know that these disturbances can cause a damper during your stay but we hope that this wasn‚Äôt the case. Thank you again for your review and we hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Gorgeous lobby, very friendly and helpful staff, immaculate grounds for strolling and soaking up the sunshine, amazing pool, incredible outdoor dining, clean and beautiful rooms with killer views of the ocean... Really, what more could you ask for?   This hotel is incredible. We booked a standard room / standard rate, and the room we stayed in was well above our expectations. After a professional and very friendly check (front desk staff was amazing!), we got to our room and discovered a stunning view of the ocean (see photos) and a sliding glass door that opened to a cute little patio with two chairs for watching the sunset. Wow. We knew this hotel was on the beach, gorgeous location, etc., but never thought we'd get such an incredible view room!   The room was spotlessly clean
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We are delighted that you rated the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa with 5 stars. We are extremely happy that your stay was  pleasurable and amazing and above your expectations. Our staff is truly exceptional and we are delighted that you were able to experience the high level of service we provide to all of our guests during your stay. We take great pride in the level of service we bring in ever outlet of the resort. Your stay is very important to us and we make sure that we do not fall short on any scale. We are looking forward to your return. Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments.

Summary: Have stayed at this hotel twice now and the service and Staff are teriffic. The both restaurants are very good. Pools are fantastic and the grounds and views from the property are spectacular. Short walk (steep hills) to the waterfront and plenty of places to eat. Am looking forward to my next stay in Dana Point
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your wonderful compliments regarding your stay. We are delighted to hear that this was your second time visiting our property. The greatest compliment for our resort and staff is to know that a guest has returned for another visit. Our job is to make your stay as pleasurable and comfortable as we can and we are grateful that we have provided this type of atmosphere for you during your visits. We are looking forward to your next visit and we will guarantee nothing short of  excellence.

Summary: Have stayed at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa a few times.  Love the atmosphere, staff, food, views, and beds. I sleep better when I stay here than any other place away from home. Great size fitness center with just the right type and amount of equipment.  The only hotel I look forward to when traveling on business. Next time I'll try the spa.
Manager Response: Thank you for rating the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa with 5 Stars. We are delighted that our resort is your home away from home. That is one of the best compliments we could have received. Our goal is to make your stay as comfortable, enjoyable and pleasurable as we can while you are away from your own home. Our staff is at your service 24 hours a day to be sure that you are well taken care of. We hope you do try our spa the next time you visit, we know you will not be disappointed. We are looking forward to your next visit and hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Recently updated, very comfortable and clean, great service
Summary: I was here for a work conference for a week and found the hotel itself to be very nice. The room and bed was very comfortable and the food was good too. It is a great location to take off for a walk along the water but if you want to shop or go to restaurants, you really need a car. There are plenty of wonderful restaurants only 5-10 min drive.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope your meeting was a great success. We are delighted to hear that we made your conference week comfortable and pleasant. There is nothing more important to us than to make your stay as pleasurable as we can. We must agree that the walk along the harbor and beach are both serene and breathtaking. We hope that you were able to enjoy the Vue and OverVue Restaurant at the resort during your stay. We are looking forward to your next visit, whether it be for business or leisure.

Summary: I recently stayed at this location (2/9/2013) and was extremely letdown of the overall value. Mind you, I typically spend about 15k in travel each year so I've seen a number of quality hotels and this one did not make the grade. First, I paid for an ocean view but found it was more a partial as the trees in the park took up 75% of that view. Additionally, I reserved a room with a king size bed only to be told they were out of them and had to settle for two full beds. One thing I found extremely odd was that I had to be issued a key to open the mini bar. I found that a slap in the face in regards to the clientele that frequent the resort.  The rooms seemed due for an upgrade and bathroom tiny. It may be better for other rooms but room 214 was a complete letdown.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We regret that we did not meet your expectations during your stay. During high occupancy, we do our very best to accommodate each and every guest‚Äôs request, however, there are times when we are not able to provide the preferred type of bed due to occupancy levels. Our priority is to fulfill and meet all of your needs but unfortunately, there are times where we cannot grand every request. We appreciate your understanding and patience. In regards to the mini bar key, we provide a key to every guest upon check-in, in order to protect the usage of underage drinking. We apologize if you found this offensive. We take every review seriously and we will share your feedback with our management team.

Summary: Went to this spa with a family of 5 ladies for a birthday celebration facials experience. We were welcomed warmly by the staff and escorted to the changing area. We were all escorted by very friendly staff into the rooms for our facials. The facial was great, she addressed concerns and did an excellent job in making me feel relaxed and rejuvinated. After the facial we all met in the lounge area and relaxed with some lemon water and then changed to our bathing suits to enjoy the sauna and hot tub. It was a great day for all of us as we don't always have the opportunity to get together all in one place often. Highly recommend the services. The staff was very friendly and kind.
Manager Response: Happy belated birthday! We are delighted to hear that you and your family celebrated your birthday with us. It sounds like you all had a fabulous time spending the day together and rejuvenating. Our staff is truly exceptional and we are happy that you were able to experience the warmth and friendliness first hand. Your experience is very important to us and we appreciate your rating of 5 stars. A day of pampering with the ladies is priceless and we are happy that we were able to help create these wonderful memories for you and your family. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: This is one hotel/resort that lives up to its rating.  The service was excellent and the staff seems to genuinely care about the hotel's guest.  The website pictures do not do the hotel and it's surroundings justice. Both the exterior and interior of the property is impeccably maintained, though the air conditioning system and the bathroom toilet in the room could both function better and quieter.  The food in the restaurant was very good with an excellent breakfast buffet.  I benefited from a package that included free valet parking and free breakfast.  I would go out of my way in Southern California to stay here again.
Manager Response: Wow. Thank you for your wonderful review and for our 5 star rating. We appreciate your compliments regarding our attentive and friendly staff.  As you experienced they are at your service 24 hours a day and they want to make your stay as comfortable and pleasurable as they can make it. We are delighted that you took advantage of our packages we offer on-line because they truly are a great deal. We are looking forward in you visiting us again soon.

Summary: Visiting Southern California when temperatures were just above freezing has made this review kinda hard to put in perspective. When the cold weather is affecting the what could have been great outdoor activities.  I was part of a huge entourage that descended onto Laguna Cliffs and was impressed with the hotel's layout, amenities, proximity to the wharf and overall surroundings. The hotel is equipped with a lovely outdoor pool and heated jacuzzi. As its name implies, it has spa facilities, though I did not get a chance to check it out. The rooms are as of Marriott standards and the bed is the highlight of the room as it was comfortable and cosy. Cleanliness of the hotel was top notch. The staff were cheerful and always willing to stop to help if needed. Overall, this is a classy
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us. We are so pleased that you felt the hotel was gorgeous with impressionable amenities. We aim to please our guests in every way. We are glad that you could experience the variety of things to see and do in our resort. Our staff is one of a kind and their courteousness and attention to detail never goes unnoticed. The beauty of Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa is that it not only hosts successful meetings but it also accommodates guests who want to enjoy a relaxing, oceanview getaway. We are looking forward in having you back soon.

Summary: Alice and I went down to Laguna for a quick anniversary weekend. The plan was to go whale watching and have a nice romantic evening in Dana Point. When we arrived at the resort we were greeted by the most wonderful employee that I have ever encountered. Lauren B was not just pleasant, but when I mentioned we were there to celebrate our 30th anniversary, she went way above and beyond. She upgraded our room, and sent champagne chocolate covered strawberries to our room.  The best part was the handwritten card that she sent with it.  For thirty years we have been going on anniversary weekends all over southern California none have compared with this. We may have stayed in better hotels or in better locations, but we have never been treated like this by any employee.  Lauren was
Manager Response: Happy 30th Anniversary. We are extremely pleased to hear that you had a memorable and pleasant stay at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. It warms our hearts to hear that you encountered  the most inviting and genuine experience from our staff than you have at any other resort you‚Äôve visited.  That is truly an honor and we feel very fortunate that you chose to celebrate this special day with us. We will definitely share your wonderful compliments with our staff and we are delighted that we could make your visit so special. We hope that you return again very soon. Thank you.

Summary: This is a fabulous hotel with gorgeous views of the Pacific Ocean from a hilltop in Dana Point above the wharf.  The rooms are well appointed and the staff very pleasant.  The entire city of Dana Point and close by cities of San Clemente, Laguna Beach, Newport Beach and others are just treasures.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for ranking our resort as 5 stars. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you took in the beautiful ocean views that surround the resort. We have been told that our resort is a ‚Äúhidden gem‚Äù and we are very proud that you feel it is a treasure as well. We are looking forward to having your back to visit us again.

Summary: Stayed here for Christmas Eve & Christmas Day.  Decor was tastefully festive.  The property is in an absolutely gorgeous location atop a bluff in Dana Point overlooking the blue Pacific & the Dana Point Harbor.    Weather is a non issue (it was quite chilly  by So Cal standards) when it comes to the sea.  Upgraded to an ocean view with a nice weather sheltered patio with nice high enough chairs to be able to see over the wall & take in the beautiful views.  Between! The hotel & the sea, there is a park, so it is truly idyllic and away from traffic etc.   Unfortunately, someone forgot my room service breakfast.  My quick card was picked up, no one contacted me with questions...so it just appears to have fallen through the cracks.  Christmas morning about 7 AM I was awakened by
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you stayed with us on Christmas Eve and Christmas Day. Our resort is situated in a perfect location atop the cliffs of Dana Point and walking distance to the beach. We‚Äôre glad that you enjoyed the delicious breakfast buffet at our Vue Restaurant. The options are quite delightful. Our staff is truly amazing and their service levels are outstanding. We will pass along the compliments to our team. We regret that you did not receive your room service breakfast, our staff is very detailed orientated and this comes to a surprise to us. Please note that this was an exception and not the norm. We are looking forward in having you return.

Summary Heading: Guests are nickel and dimed for everything
Summary: I stayed here on business for 3 days and even though the staff was very friendly, I felt nickel and dimed for every little thing at this hotel. Which did not lend this hotel to feel very welcoming. I would definitely not want to stay here again. Nor would I recommend someone having their business partners stay here - I mean who charges $1 / page to print at the business center or chargers $5 / 10 minutes of internet at the business center. They must not be charging much per room or for food and need to make up the difference....?
Manager Response: We thank you for your feedback and regret that you were not satisfied with your charges at the Business Center. We outsource our Business Center and the pricing is not determined by the resort. We appreciate your comments and thank you for your review.

Summary: Just got back from a one night stay at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott.  It's been about 10 years since visiting here last and they done some very appreciated upgrades/facelifts to the lobby and common areas.  If you're looking for a fairly price high-end resort between the 5-star resorts of Laguna Beach (Ritz, Monarch, Montage) and Carlsbad (La Costa and Aviara), the Laguna Cliffs is a great choice.  I booked a single room for a single night so did not try out any of the Spa features.  However, the room and restaurant (Vue) were very much to my liking.  Look for occasional special offer packages that feature the room, valet parking, and breakfast for two bundled.  That is the true cost of the resort as the nickle and diming of resort fee, valet parking, etc. etc is accounted for.
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate your time in writing this review and for recognizing our resort as the "Best Luxury Resort between Laguna Beach and Carlsbad" . We are delighted that you chose our resort for your one night stay. We do have some wonderful packages as you mentioned and we are grateful that you took advantage of it. We appreciate your loyalty to the Marriott brand and we hope that you don‚Äôt wait another 10 years to visit us again. We‚Äôre looking forward in having you back and hopefully you will have the opportunity to use our amazing Spa during your next visit.

Summary: This is a great hotel for your business trip.  I appreciate the in room coffee, comfortable ammeneties and most of all the EXCELLENT internet connection.  There is a fee for the internet but it is worth it because the connection is great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and we are happy to hear that your business trip was successful and pleasurable all at the same time. We are here to provide you with the amenities and comfort you are seeking when away from home. We are very pleased to hear that you experienced ‚Äúexcellent‚Äù internet service during your stay. Our connection and bandwith exceeds many resorts in the local area and we understand the importance of having a strong and consistent internet connection when traveling. Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We hope to see you again for business or pleasure the next time you are in the area.

Summary: Really great staff! They were sweet to switch me to a room that had a large patio and a view to die for. Much appreciated since I am from a colder climate!   Though the room had a great outside patio, the room was a handicap suite and the shower didn't work. Told a maid but pehaps she didn't understand enough english to get it fixed. Used the bath instead.  My one and only complaint is though the food is served beautifully it really doesn't have much taste?  Hot tub was great! :) You have to walk down to the harbor, good restaurants and honestly better food at a better price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our ‚Äúsweet‚Äù staff. We must agree with you, our staff provides exceptional service with a smile that shows they truly care. We cannnot be happier that we were able to upgrade your room to an ocean-view with a patio. We are delighted that you enjoyed the hot tob and that you were able to take advantage of the harbor that is walking distance from the resort. We apologize that the shower did not work. Please note that our ‚ÄúAt Your Service‚Äù staff is available 24 hours a day to assist you with anything you need during your stay. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Spent Saturday night there for my GF's 40th BDay! What a great property and great staff! Upgraded us to  a pool/ocean view and late check out! From the minute we pulled up we were well respected and taken care of. The bar/lounge has been very nicely and modernly redone with fireplaces, pits, tv's AND OCEAN VIEWS!  I was seriously considering the Ritz Carolton down the street but I am so happy we stayed here, unpretentious and beautiful! Will be back again when the weather warms up!
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your wonderful compliments regarding our staff and renovated resort. We are very pleased that you were impressed with our newly designed OverVue Lounge. We are honored that your girlfriend celebrated her birthday at our resort and that our staff was able to provide a pool/ocean view guest room with late check-out. Our goal is to provide excellent service and to create memories that you will always remember. We are happy that you chose our resort to celebrate this special occasion and we are looking forward to welcoming you back in the Spring and Summer months.

Summary: Stayed at the Marriott Laguna Hills in mid-January and was expecting an above average hotel but was a little dissapointed.  I stayed in room 346 and the room was a litte awkard.  It was a corrner room but only had windows on one side.  I was also expecting a small balcony so that I could enjoy the view of the Pacific ocean, but the windows were eye level and didnt provide the view that I was hoping for.    The hotel did offer an above average fitness center and the service was great, but the property just seemed a little tired.   Another knock against the hotel is the lack of conceairge lounge.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review and compliments regarding our newly renovated fitness center. We take great pride in our service levels and we appreciate your compliments regarding our great staff. We regret your guest room did not meet your expectations. Please note that at any time if you are unsatisfied with the location of your room and occupancy permits, we will be more than happy to change your room. Thank you again for your review and comments.

Summary: My teen daughter and I had a wonderful one-night get away here.  In January, mid-week, the place was very quiet and so relaxing.  Dana Point is away from the bustle of Laguna Beach which was perfect for us. Service was excellent, the buffet was delicious and the view inspiring.  We had a picnic at Lantern Park overlooking the beach, and then took the short walk down to the beach.  The staff provided towels and directions to everything we needed.  I didn't like the resort fee or mandatory valet parking, but the staff did everything it could to make our stay perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and rating of 5 stars. We hope we accomplished your desire for everything to be perfect. It brings us great joy to hear that you and your daughter had a wonderful stay and that we provided the rest and relaxation that you were looking for. We hope that you enjoyed the park and beach during your visit and we are looking forward in having your visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Loved it - coming back in summer!
Summary: We stayed one rainy evening as a fun staycation over the holidays and had a great time. The rooms were terrific - well appointed and clean with great beds. The service was great as well. Everyone on property was very helpful and excellent with our little girls (2 and 4). Food was tasty as well, if a but pricey.   While it's a Marriott, it definitely has a non-corporate resort vibe (this is not meant to be a knock on Marriott as I am a satisfied gold elite business traveler). But just a note if the chain hotel affiliation might scare you off, it's not cookie cutter.   Will be back for fun in the pool this summer!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and rating of 5 Stars. We are pleased to hear that you had a ‚Äúgreat‚Äù time. Thank you for your compliments regarding our ‚Äúterrific‚Äù rooms and ‚Äútasty‚Äù food. We listen to all of our guest comments and we are happy to hear that our staff service and attention to detail met your expectations. Our goal is to provide excellent service to all of our guests and we take great pride in reading how well our guests are being taken care of by our outstanding staff. We hope you do come back in the summer to visit, we know your children will enjoy the Kid‚Äôs Splash Zone and Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club. Thank you again for your review.

Summary Heading: I want to move to Dana Point
Summary: Just spent 5 lovely days at this wonderful property. Our room had a view of the grounds and the harbor. We were in room 2005. It was a very comfortable room with nice amenities. The staff was very helpful. The food at the hotel is very good and on the expensive side. The location of the hotel is convenient to just about everything. Although it was not beach weather, it sure beats the weather in Oregon.
Manager Response: We would love to have you as a new resident of Dana Point. Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are delighted that we became your home away from home these past 5 days. Our goal is to provide excellent service levels that all of our guests anticipate. We hope you took advantage of the resort‚Äôs close proximity to the beach and Dana Point Harbor. We are looking forward to your next visit to Dana Point and we hope that the beautiful, sunny Orange County weather cooperates.

Summary: This property is has ocean view rooms. The quality of the resort is excellent. I have stayed here several times and have never been disappointed. The staff are helpful. It's location in Orange County is near the PCH and allows for easy access. It's worth the money and ask for an ocean view room. It's worth it!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments and for the 5 Stars you‚Äôve given our resort. We enjoy hearing what our guests are fond of when they visit Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. The quality of the resort is ‚Äúexcellent‚Äù and we are very grateful that you have been a loyal guest to the resort. We try to achieve the highest level of service to all of our guests at all times and we are very proud that you have experienced this qaulity of service consistantly throughout your visits with us. We are looking forward to your next visit in the new year.

Summary: My husband and I were in Southern California for 5 days for a wedding in September.  The Laguna Cliffs Marriott was a convenient and nice stay.  The staff was friendly and the grounds were really beautiful with two nice pools.  The "Vue" restaurant at the resort had a playful menu and the food was good.  I took advantage of the Starbucks bar in the lobby each morning and took daily strolls through the gorgeous paths, down to the marina.  We booked the "California Dreaming" package, which included valet parking and really impressive breakfast daily - a great value!  A group of family members also stayed that week, all of the guest rooms were standard and clean, most had incredible views and really nice balconies.  I would stay again and recommend this hotel to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you booked the ‚ÄúCalifornia Dreaming‚Äù package, it is one of our most popular packages and our guests continue to give us wonderful comments regarding the great value this package offers. We love hearing about our guests adventures and activities when they visit Dana Point. We are happy to hear that you took advantage of the beautiful scenery around the property and walked the trails that surround the harbor. We have to agree with you, the views are absolutely breathtaking. We thank you for recommending the resort to your family and friends and we are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Ritz-Carlton Quality and Service, Wonderful Place to Relax
Summary: I have stayed at the nearby Ritz and this place is just as wonderful at a fraction of the price.  This location has a wonderful and thoughtful staff.  The location is right across the street from the beach, which is a very easy walk.
