The resort's restaurant (Vue) has a wonderful chef who has worked with local organic farmers to develop a very special menu and unique dining experience.  Our Server (Erika) was awesome.  She was knowledgeable of the specials and menu items, and was quick with a smile.  A very pleasant smile I must add.  I drink a lot of water with my meals and they kept my glass full.    The rooms were AWESOME!!!  I love my home, and I like the furniture that I have put in my home.  This hotel's furniture is classic, elegant, and chic.  I wanted to take the
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review and for rating our resort with 5 stars! We truly appreciate the time you took to describe our resort and your experience. Your compliments are very humbling and we are very proud that as an avid traveler you enjoyed and experienced all of our outlets from the restaurant to our spa. We are delighted to hear that your spa treatment was the best you‚Äôve ever had. Our staff is truly exceptional and we are pleased that they provided superb service during your stay. Your comfort, experience and opinion is very important to us. Thank you again for your wonderful compliments. We will be sure to share your review with our entire staff.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel on a Saturday night for a side trip from my vacation in San Diego.  Although the hotel is named Laguna Cliffs and may, in fact, be in that area do not think you are staying in or near Laguna Beach. This is actually Dana Point and Laguna Beach is about an 8 mile car ride away.  That said, the hotel property is lovely situated on a cliff.  Our room was stylishly decorated with a balcony overlooking the pool.  While the woman who checked us in stated we had a pool and water view - it would have been the water in the pool and not the ocean.  The hotel staff was excellent and very welcoming at check in.  Unfortunately, we did not get to use the spa due to time constraints.  The only Con I truly see is the mandatory valet for $29 a night and the resort fee.  Using
Manager Response: We are glad that you chose the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa as your mini vacation destination on your way up from San Diego. Our staff aims to provide excellent service to all of our guests and we are delighted that you experienced their warm welcome upon arrival. We hope that the next time you visit you are able to enjoy the beautiful Spa that will leave you feeling rejuvenated and relaxed from the moment you walk in. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  Thank you again for your review and we look forward in welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Best location in Dana Point to Stay
Summary: My wife and I stayed over ad the Marriott Cliffs Resort the week after Christmas. This was a getaway from Chicago weather in December and the 66 degrees and Sunny weather was nice. The resort sits on top of a hill with a commanding view of the Pacific and is right next to a city park with a short walk to restaurants on the pier as well as the city beaches at the bottom of the entrance drive.   It is a major resort so we were pleased it was off season and their was only one night with a wedding that brought a crowd to the adjoining  conference. Ballroom.  It would be a spectacular location for business meetings, but I liked the place with low volume of customers in the restaurant and elevators. It is a large hotel property but since it is only three stories high you don' feel
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and 5 stars. We greatly appreciate your compliments. We are happy to hear that the weather was sunny and perfect for your arrival. We hope that you enjoyed the city of Dana Point and the beautiful ocean views from your guest room. We are delighted that you took advantage of the amenities the resort provides including the fitness center and the Spa which was recently awarded ‚ÄúBest for Romance‚Äù by Spa Finder. We look forward in welcoming you back in the new year.

Summary: We are currently on vacation and staying here with another family.  We both we're upgraded to rooms with ocean views.  Our room rate includes parking and buffet breakfast which is super-nice.  Staff is kind and room is good quality, cozy beds, quiet, clean.  Pols are warm and the location is excellent.  Only negative is rooms are kinda small but they are well-appointed.  Breakfast is dynamite.  We're having a great time here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your 5 stars. We are happy to hear that you are enjoying your time here at the resort with your family and friends. Thank you for all your wonderful compliments regarding our Staff‚Äôs kindness and the quality of the rooms. We hope that you are able to continue to take advantage of the pools and harbor activities that are walking distance from the resort. We are always at your service and we would be delighted to assist you in any way that we can during the remainder of your stay. Welcome.

Summary: Due to my gold status, we were upgraded to an ocean view room, which was quite nice. The room was well decorated, but the bathroom is small and very basic, and noise from the hallway is rather pronounced. Note that there is a daily resort fee and valet only parking ($29/night). The breakfast buffet is good, but relatively expensive. Dinner service was ok, although the restaurant was deserted on Saturday night at 6 pm. The hotel is within walking distance (down 100+ stairs) to the Dana Point harbor, which has some decent restaurants and small shops.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your loyalty to the Marriott brand and we are delighted that you were able to be upgraded to an ocean view room. We thank you for your compliments regarding our breakfast buffet. The close proximity of the resort to the harbor is perfect for strolls along the beach or  marina. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Yes great location and pleasing view of the harbor. Room very nice bit on the small side for being upgraded do to status. Thinking I would not like the other room if this was and upgrade. On Bussiness did not eat at the property nice bar.
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our ‚Äúgreat‚Äù location and ‚Äúnice‚Äù bar. We hope you are able to visit us again for a leisure stay and dine at our Vue Restaurant and OverVue Lounge. We know you will be very pleased.

Summary: this is an ok hotel. good location. friendly staff. needs a little attention to detail, i.e. mold in the shower. also be aware of the add on fees. $29 valet and 16.50 resort tax and fee daily! ..............
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location and the Weather Helps
Summary: Pros: Our family had a wonderful time.  We enjoyed hanging at the pool and soaking in the large hot tub, playing at the tennis court (came with rackets but we brought our own), the bike rides from there along the beach, the breakfast was perfect, and yeah, it was cold and pouring in Seattle and warm and sunny in Dana Point, go figure Cons: The fold out single bed frame was badly bent so the mattress sagged at one corner.  My son tried to sleep on it but it messed up his night of rest.  We had them come in and fix it the next day which made it better but for such a nice place it seemed a bit odd.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you had a wonderful time here at the resort. We are happy to hear that our sunny California weather enabled you and your family to partake in  outdoor activities.   We are delighted to hear that we were able to fix the fold out bed for your son. Thank you for addressing the issue with our staff and allowing them to correct it in a timely manner. Your comfort is very important to us and we are here to provide you with the services you need to make that possible.

Summary: Great location, rooms standard size but nicely remodeled. I do not know that I would call it a resort. Front desk staff was friendly and helpful as was the valet parking staff. I understand the reason for exclusive valet parking being near the State Park Beach but guests should not have to pay 29.95 per day for parking. The main dining room was closed during the week but the casual lounge is very nice and has a limited menu, pricey but available. No shortage of restaurants outside.The staff in the lounge and the dining room for breakfast could use some training on service and being friendly. Breakfast came with the room package but when the server brought the check for signature he said " This is where you put the tip" I understand that you might want to lead the guest in that
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our great location and our friendly and informative front desk and valet staff. Our staff is here to provide excellent service in all areas and anything below that is unsatisfactory to us. We are delighted that you enjoyed the pools and the facilities throughout the resort. We‚Äôve designed the property to give guests a casual yet sophisticated feel. Our ocean views are quite spectacular and we must agree with you that our remodel has allowed us to embrace panoramic ocean views from all areas of the resort.  In regards to your experience in our Vue Restaurant, we deeply regret that you felt you were forced to leave a tip. Our employees are highly trained professionals and they are here to inform our guests . Please be assured that we will address this issue with our staff.   Thank you for addressing your issue at the Spa, as previously mentioned our staff is here to make your stay as comfortable and pleasurable as they can. We are very disappointed at the way the payment was handled. We will address this with our Spa staff immediately. Our service levels should always be consistent and there is no excuse for the unsatisfactory experience. We do include a 20% gratuity for the guests' convenience, but this can always be modified per preference and should have been handled discreetly, contrary to what you described. Technicians are licensed professionals by the state of California and are associates of Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. They do receive a commission per industry standards, and this is due to their experience, education, and extensive training. We agree that a tip of any amount should always be accepted graciously. Anything other than that, is far below our standards. Again, please accept our sincerest apologies and be assured that we will follow up on all feedback.

Summary: After reading the great reviews on Trip Advisor, we booked this hotel for a one-night stay as it was close to Mission San Juan Capistrano.  As a mother of two young girls, I don't have time to write reviews, except I was so disappointed with our stay.  We arrived there around 7:30pm, and got settled in to a room on the first floor, which had a patio with a peek-a-boo view of the harbor. The room's decor was contemporary and nice.  Unfortunately, we didn't realized until 9:30pm that the sofa-bed was unmade. Upon further examination, we looked at the mattress and discovered a HUGE urine stain on top.  I flipped the mattress over and found dried feces. For our "inconvenience," the credited us a whopping "$15," the resort fee.  Beware there is also a  $29.95/day valet parking fee.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I should preface this by saying that this whole weekend was a surprise to me, so I was blown away when we pulled up to this gorgeous property! We had a wonderful pedicure, and then received an upgrade on our room (Marriott rewards are awesome!). The room was gorgeous and we had a great view.   The bed was AMAZING!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that not only were you surprised but that we were able to make your weekend ‚ÄúMagical‚Äù. It brings us great joy to hear that everything was wonderful and that you enjoyed your stay from beginning to end. Our job is provide you and your guest with everything that will make your stay as comfortable and amazing as we can. We‚Äôre glad that you enjoyed your upgraded room with the amazing views. Thank you for your 5 Star review and we hope that you visit us again soon.

Summary: My Family and I stayed here August 12th to the 16th, 2012. I picked the location because of it is in between San Diego and LA. I thought about the Ritz Carlton up the road but decided this property was closer to Restaurants and the Harbor. Our room was on the 1st floor and was near the more "kid" pool (there are 2, one is more adults and the other has kids). We were at the end of the hall and it felt out of the way and quiet. The room was large and had a sofa bed that helped since all 4 of us were staying in the same room. The first thing you notice is the expansive property with rolling hills. The Hotel sits on a bluff and is not on the Ocean which really did not matter to us. We were out most of the time and only spent 1 day at the pool which was nice. Highlight of the stay
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for the 5 stars. We are delighted that you and your family chose our resort for your vacation. The resort is halfway between San Diego and Los Angeles and it does give many of our guests the ability to travel South or North in a timely manner. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the quietness and peacefulness of the rooms. The resort‚Äôs location on the bluffs allows for the tranquility to sustain throughout. We‚Äôre glad that you enjoyed the whale watching experience and that you were able to see four whales during your adventure. There are many activities in the Harbor that our guests enjoy, including kayaking, snorkeling, paddle boarding, etc. we‚Äôre very glad that you were able to take advantage of these opportunities. We are happy that our staff was there to create wonderful memories for you and your family. We are looking forward to your next visit when you are in the Dana Point area.

Summary Heading: Room Location Will Make a Difference
Summary: This hotel does have a nice location overlooking Dana Point Harbor and the ocean. Nice park nearby for those who like to walk or run. Marina is a good spot for a run, restaurants and a few nice gift shops.   Hotel was remodeled recently and the public areas are quite sleek, modern and plush. Restaurant and bar offer stunning seating areas with views to Catalina if weather cooperates.  Our room was the biggest reason I rated average. We were told we were "upgraded" to a partial ocean view. The room was so close to the elevator you could hear it going all day, night long. As prior reviewer, it is not a quiet property. We would have asked to be moved but our stay was for one night only and we were there for a private event so figured it wasn't worth the move to a quieter location.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments regarding our ocean views and close proximity to the Dana Point Harbor and Marina. The Harbor provides many options to our guests who would like to engage in outdoor activities as well as provide guests with quaint restaurants and shops for those who want to do a little shopping. Our very own OverVue Lounge delivers panoramic ocean views that will leave you breathless. We hope you enjoyed the stunning views on the outdoor deck.   We regret that you were not satisfied with your room location. We highly recommend the next time you are unsatisfied that you please ask our Front Office representatives to change your room, if occupancy permits, they would be more than happy to change the location of your room. Our job is for you to feel comfort in your room and get a good night‚Äôs rest.   We thank you again for you review.

Summary: My relatives graciously booked me a room here while I was in California visiting family, and I felt so well-looked after and pampered! The location itself is gorgeous; my room had an ocean-view, and was very clean, as was the entire hotel. The staff in general are very warm and accommodating, and were unfailingly friendly in their service--they never seemed put-upon. Of particular note is the dining experience. On less-hurried days I enjoyed a few meals on my own here before meeting up with my family, and was completely won over by the charming waitstaff and appetizing food. This hotel does it all, from satisfying comfort food to delicious, elegant creations; I even suggested my family join me for dinner here one night, and we weren't disappointed; the staff was adept at
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your wonderful compliments regarding our resort‚Äôs location and it‚Äôs cleanliness. Our goal is to create an environment where you feel right at home. We are delighted to hear that we accomplished this for you. Our friendly staff is known for their kindness and attention to detail. They take great pride in providing the highest level of service to each and every guest. They enjoy their job and it shows. Thank you for your compliments regarding our talented culinary team. I do agree that the food is delicious and the creations are elegant. We are happy to hear that your relatives were able to join you for dinner at the resort. We hope to see back on your next getaway!

Summary: My husband and I decided last minute on a Thursday to book a one night (Saturday) trip to this hotel as there was GREAT weather in SoCal. There was a great web price of $296.10 for an oceanfront room.  I called the hotel on- site reservation number and spoke with Catalina to see if there was a better rate available.  She said there wasn't so,I booked the one night stay with her and told her it was our anniversary.  I also asked her to note our request for early check-in. We got to the hotel @noon and were able to get a great room right away.  Room size was big as was the size of the bathroom. We spent most of the time down at the two great pools where our server/bartender took great care of us.  Shortly before dinner, we received a lovely bottle of champagne and chocolate
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary! We are delighted that you and your husband spent your anniversary with us. Thank you for the wonderful compliments regarding our staff service. We try and accommodate all of our guests needs and we are happy to hear that you were able to accommodate an early check-in and a late check ‚Äìout. We agree that the pools are just spectacular and the ocean views are very easy on the eyes. We know how special an anniversary celebration is and we hope you enjoyed the bottle of champagne and chocolate covered strawberries. Thank you again for your compliments and we hope to see you and your husband again real soon.

Summary: I stayed here with friends for a weekend of fun but the hotel almost ruined it for us. The walls are thin in this place so expect to hear everything from all four sides of the wall. The pool areas were crowded and the service was horrible.
Manager Response: We regret that you experienced noise while you were in your guest room. Our job is to ensure our guests are comfortable during their stay and we regret that you and your friends did not experience the high level of service and comfort we are known to provide to all of our guests. Thank you for your feedback. We will address your concerns with our staff.

Summary: Thia is a beautiful property, with a warm and friendly staff.   The rooms are very comfortable with a small balcony.   The food was delicious and our meeting room more than adequate.  If you prefer, It is only a short walk down to the harbor and a choice of several restaurants.  A bit pricey, but a wonderful overall experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments regarding our ‚Äúwarm and friendly‚Äù staff, the comfort of our rooms, the delicious food and the meeting space. We hope that your meeting was successful and you return for work or pleasure the next time you are in the Dana Point area. We thank you for your review and look forward to your next visit.

Summary: I recently stayed 5 nights at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa.  It was spotlessly clean, the room was very comfortable.  I wish the bathroom was a little bit bigger,  but I'm used to small bathrooms at many Marriott properties.  The area was gorgeous, very relaxing, and peaceful.  I will definitely go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you stayed with us for 5 nights and enjoyed the serenity the resort has to offer. The area is gorgeous and I am sure you enjoyed the panoramic views that surround the resort. We are looking forward to your next arrival.

Summary: I have been to the hotel twice and it's a nice get away. They seemed to indicate both times that  we were in an upgraded room with ocean views, but honestly I liked the room they gave my kids with a large balcony better. I will ask next time. We ordered room service by the pool and it was quite good. The pool looks fun for younger kids, with the play surf boards. The gym was well outfitted. Check out Stacks for breakfast - not too far of a walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very happy to hear that this was your second visit to our resort. Please feel free to ask for a room with a balcony the next time you visit and if occupancy permits we will be more than happy to change your room for you. We are delighted to hear that you were able to take advantage of our pools. The weather in Southern California is quite spectacular and laying in the sun in October is quite a gift. The children love the splash zone at the Del Mar Pool and it‚Äôs one of a kind in California. We hope you visit us again when you are the Southern California, we‚Äôd love to welcome you back.

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights for a business trip.  Particularly, after a long flight from the east coast and the long drive down from LAX, the staff were friendly and helpful.  Aside from the view which was absolutely breathtaking, I didn't get to use many of the amenities available - being that it was a work trip - except for the gym facilities, which were absolutely wonderful, especially after a long day at work.  The availability of a fully stocked coffee machine/mini-bar in the room was great.  In the AM I was able to sit on my patio/porch looking out at the Pacific Ocean - what a lovely way to start my work-day! There were several nice restaurants for eating in the vicinity (almost walking distance) - easy to get to going down the hill to the harbor, but not as easy on a full
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments. We are so happy to hear that our staff was able to make your stay at comfortable as they could after a long flight from the east coast. Flying for business is never easy and we are so happy that you were able to take advantage of our state of the art fitness center. We know that being away from home could be difficult and so we try and make the resort as comfortable and peaceful as we can for our guests. I must agree with you, there is nothing more spectacular than waking up to views of the Pacific Ocean to start your day. We hope the amenities in the room helped you get your day started off feeling fresh and rejuvenated. We are looking forward to your next stay and we hope that you are able to take advantage of the pools and spa the  next time you are in Southern California.

Summary Heading: The Best Place to Stay in Dana Point!
Summary: My husband & I love the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa!  We always stay at this hotel whenever we need to go to this area for business.  Everyone at this hotel is very nice, friendly, and eager to please!  As with any upscale Marriott property, this hotel has those fantastic and comfy king size beds!!  Their breakfast buffet is really good.  Also, if the weather permits, it is so nice to have your breakfast at their patio overlooking Dana Point Harbor.  A great way to start your day.  This hotel has a wonderful park (Doheney Park)  right in front of the hotel overlooking the ocean.  By the harbor, there are several nice restaurants where you can dine.  Also, you can take a boat ride at the harbor to take you to Catalina Island.  We can't wait for our next trip to OC so we
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments about our resort. Our staff is truly amazing and we are delighted that you experienced their genuine care first hand. We are happy to hear that your business meetings are held at our resort when you are in the Dana Point area. We have the most attentive staff that will go miles to make sure that your meeting is a success.   The resort is situated in a perfect location, overlooking the Pacific Ocean and the Dana Point Marina. We hope that you stay with us again when you are visiting Dana Point for both business and pleasure.

Summary Heading: Relaxing views and a great choice for OC and San Diego accessibility
Summary: Relaxing views of the Pacific coast.  Great place to decompress.  This is by no means the cheapest place to stay, but it is worth it.  The location is great in that it is very accessible to both Orange County and northern San Diego points of interest.  If you would like to go to places like Legoland, Disneyland and all the other points of interest in between, this is a great choice of place to stay.  And if you just want to decompress, this is the place to be.  The views are enough to soothe the most frayed of nerves.  If you want activities, there is enough of it nearby.  If you want to jet ski, kayak, boogie board, surf, it is all within walking distance.  If you want a low key picnic, there is a park in front of the hotel that has amazing views.  Lots of options for food from
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We are delighted to hear that you feel refreshed and pampered after every stay with us. Thank you for making our home yours every year. We are so honored that you stay with us once a year and enjoy it each time you visit. It is our job to make you feel right at home and provide you with great service, dining options and comfort. We agree with you in that we are truly a ‚Äúgem‚Äù located on the bluffs of Dana Point. We are looking forward in seeing you next year.

Summary: Laguna Cliffs knocked it out of the park! Fantastic beds, view, buffet breakfast and courteous staff! Better than I expected. The only drawback is that it is a bit of a drive to Laguna Beach. But since there is little traffic and you're driving along the pch it's not bad.
Manager Response: Wow. We are just delighted that everything was fantastic and that we knocked it out of the ballpark for you! That is our goal each and every time. We strive for perfection and we are happy to hear that we did just that. Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Resort .. Better for leisure than business
Summary: Stayed 4 nights for a business conference held on site ! Rooms , restaurant , pool service and spa ate all fabulous , staff friendly .. Business facilities and service a little disorganised , more geared for leisure .. But would definitely recommend for vacation .. Great restaurants and the harbour within walking distance
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate all your compliments regarding our staff, wonderful service, rooms, restaurant and spa. We truly are the perfect resort for leisure and business guests. I‚Äôm sorry to hear that you felt that the facilities and service were a bit unorganized for your meeting. We hope that you addressed your concerns with our staff and we were able to remedy the situation. We find that our resort is compatible for couples, leisure guests, families and business/corporate meetings.  We hope that the next time you return for business you experience this as well. Thank you again for your review and we hope that you visit us again for both leisure and business in the future.

Summary: As many others have stated, this property is very VERY nice. It is spacious and gives you a feeling of being beach side even though its a bit of a walk away. The views of the ocean are wonderful and the staff did a great job of making my wife and I feel important and welcome.   Our room was large by Marriott standards and included a balcony facing the ocean. The only issue we had during our stay is that the drain in the bath tub was very slow and you ended your shower standing in a few inches of water. Maintenance came and "fixed it" but unfortunately the water still didn't drain fast enough to elim the issue. Didn't ruin our stay thought..  Oh and the restaurants and bars are great! Who doesn't love Starbucks in the morning!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our staff and how they made you and your wife feel important and welcomed. Our job is to make your stay a memorable one and we are delighted that we made this happen for you and your wife. I must agree with you in that there is nothing like drinking Starbucks in the morning and to enjoy it while looking outside to ocean views, is priceless. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed the Vue Restaurant and OverVue Lounge. We hope you and your wife will return very soon.

Summary Heading: Pleasant location for conference and family time
Summary: My family enjoyed the beautiful outdoor pool and play area while I was at a conference in the resort.  The views are lovely.  It is a quick walk to the beach and a short drive to San Juan de Capistrano Mission. Conference facilities were nice, but the sound system could have been better (I assume this was provided by the hotel). Although I had specified that there were two adults and two children staying in our room, one two occasions I had to request that we be provided with four bath towels rather than three in our room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted to hear that your family enjoyed a mini vacation while you attended a conference at the resort. It truly is the perfect resort for families enjoying a leisure vacation or a destination to hold a  conference. The location is quite perfect, close proximity to the beach, shops and harbor and views that will leave you breathless.  We regret that you were not satisfied with the sound system. Please note that we do have an AV staff on property and if there‚Äôs ever an issue, they are here to help. Our job is to provide you with all of the tools you need to make your meeting successful.   We hope to have you all back real soon.

Summary: Stayed at this property last weekend and I was very surprised to find that this moderately-priced resort is not only beautiful, but it's staffed with great people who really care about their guests. I strongly recommend this place if you are going to travel to the Dana Point area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments regarding our ‚Äúbeautiful‚Äù resort and our attentive staff. Our staff takes great pride in making each guest experience unique to their needs. Our job is to make your stay enjoyable and memorable. We thank you for recommending our resort to travelers. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel as part of a wedding group of approx 25 people.  Front Desk:  Staff we really good, helpful and very accommodating. being such a large group they were busy but checked us all in about 10 mins...brilliant considering only two members of staff were doing this.  Entrance is nice, very spacious and open, as soon as you walk in you get that formal relaxed feeling, which is just what you need when preparing for a wedding the next day.  Rooms:  Stayed in a room for 4, was clean spacious and had a balcony. The hotel had also provided us with an extra roll away bed which was very thoughtful. after arriving from Vegas, i personally found the rooms slightly smaller (understandable) however in terms of cleanliness and feel it was miles ahead.  The balcony was ok,
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We are very delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and that we were able to accommodate your requests. Our staff is extremely attentive and efficient and we are happy to hear that you were checked in, in a timely manner. We are happy that you enjoyed our OverVue Lounge and that our Restaurant Manager was there to accommodate your wishes.  In regards to you having to sign the receipt. If the bill was charged to the room or if you paid with a credit card, it is standard policy to ask for a signature on the receipt. We apologize if this brought any inconvenience to you and your friends. We are so happy to hear that our staff was there to make your experience ‚Äúgreat.‚Äù We hope that you visit us again when you are in the Southern California region.

Summary Heading: Will book here again next time I'm in town!
Summary: Traveling on business, but wanted to enjoy the area as well.  Great company discount so I booked this hotel, walking distance (down a steep hill) to the marina with a bit of shopping and several restaurants.  The hotel is 25 years old, but it's not evident anywhere other than where they've posted it on their FB page.  Great room with comfortable bed, great sheets, pillows, and towels.  Everything super clean and in great condition.  Check in was fast and easy, and I was given a free upgrade (great view of the water) for my 5 nights just for asking.  Room service twice for dinner; okay food but not spectacular.  We had breakfast each morning in Vue outside on the patio overlooking the harbor/marina; the buffet is consistently wonderful -- fresh made omelets and waffles, full
Manager Response: Wow, thank you for your review. We are so delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay during your business trip. Thank you for your wonderful comments about our resort guest rooms, location and Vue Restaurant. I agree with you, my favorite place to sit is on the patio outside overlooking the Pacific Ocean. It‚Äôs so peaceful and relaxing to sit outside and enjoy the morning breeze as you‚Äôre having your first bite of the day. We are delighted that you enjoyed the breakfast options the Vue Restaurant offers and we are looking forward to your return visit in a few weeks. Thank you for choosing us again, we will certainly make your stay another memorable one.

Summary Heading: Great staff, nice views, "East Coast" style with comfortable rooms.
Summary: I recently attended a conference at the resort. As a Marriott gold member I was upgraded to a top floor ocean view room. Nicely furnished with pretty (albeit distant) ocean vistas. The staff were enthusiastic and friendly. There is a very charming park just outside the gates with even better ocean views. I only had breakfast and one catered lunch at the hotel--but both were fine. Valet parking is expensive but quick and convenient. The surrounding area within walking distance is great (at least west towards the ocean)--some restaurants, a marina and a nice sandy beach with gentle waves perfect for kids, beginner surfers and paddle surfers. But be warned:  the hotel's ocean views come at the price of a steep hike back up from the beach--plenty of huffing and puffing in store! My
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you had a pleasant stay with us during your business trip. We are so pleased to hear that our staff was able to upgrade your room to an ocean floor room. Our views are quiet spectacular and we hope you enjoyed it as much as we do! The location is perfect for families, couples and business travelers alike. As you mentioned, there are many children activities around the resort including the Ocean Institute in the harbor. Thank you for the compliments regarding our staff. They take pride in making each guest experience one that is nothing short of excellence.   In regards to your late check-out, we apologize if 1:00 pm was not late enough for you. Our staff is here to accommodate your needs as best they can and sometimes due to occupancy levels they are unable to accommodate a later check-out. We are happy that you took advantage of the pools after your stay and we hope that you return for another visit soon.

Summary: We stayed here and were nicely surprised with the room quality and overal facilities.  The room we had was clean and well appointed with one of the best beds we have ever slept in. We ate in the hotel and the food was good and not too expensive.  I would have given 5 stars however, 1- the cost of parking your car. and 2. I wanted to use the internet to check one email as I was waiting on an exam result back in the UK.  The hotel wanted to charge me $15 or $20 to use the business room.  I advised that we were checking out in 10 mins and that I only wanted to check one email.  I asked if the reception could do it and was told no and that I had to pay the business fee.  I think this was bad customer service as it would have taken 30seconds to check.  Come on Laguna $15 to check one
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you enjoyed the cleanliness of the rooms and the quality of our beds. We must admit you are not the first person who has been delightfully surprised at the comfort of our beds. We hope you were able to get a good night‚Äôs rest.   In regards to the internet fee in our business center, we regret that the cost was an inconvenience to you. The resort fee does include free Wi-Fi in the guest rooms should you decide to bring your laptop next time. We do have to be fair and consistent with all guests using the internet in the business center and unfortunately are unable to make exceptions. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We hope that this too did not put a strain on your stay in any way. We thank you again for your comments and we are looking forward in having you back when you are visiting the US.

Summary: Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa has everything.  We only live a few miles away but have gone there for an overnight getaway and frequently go for Sunday Brunch, which is awesome.  The hotel itself looks out over Dana Point Harbor.  It was an expensive getaway, but worth the cost.  The view is spectacular.  The accomodations are fantastic.  The service is superb.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments about our resort. We truly appreciate you sharing the positive experience you had here. We cannot disagree with you, the views are fascinating and the service is impeccable. Our staff takes great pride in what they do and it is very well reflected in their service levels. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Incompetant, Rude young adults are the Night Staff here!
Summary: They get 3 stars for being in Dana Point! And the location! But, the night staff, are young adults that are pompous and arrogant/which make them appear classless. They can't even afford to stay in a resort on their own salary!! If they had better attitude,weren't scolding to their elders, I would stay again,...Maybe Ill try again next year, Hopefully new staff will exist~ Do wish they offered complimentary wifi, shuttle service to local airports, and free parking however...
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very surprised that our staff would behave in this manner. We have received many praises for our customer service and both our day and night shift staff. Most of our reviews complement our staff and their kindness as well as attention to detail. We are quiet amazed that something as you described took place at our resort. We will address these issues right away and we know that this will not occur again. In regards to complimentary wifi. The resort fee does in fact cover the cost of wifi in your room. Thank you again and we hope you consider our resort again next year.

Summary Heading: You get what you paid for..
Summary: Locations is fantastic!! Staff is very friendly and willing to help. Pool was nice.  Service there and the other places where quite nice. Room was very clean and spacious!  The only issue was that you are forced to valle the car.. Ok this is fine but REALLY $29 a day is a bit much..consider like $10-15 a day bit more reasonable..  Other than this issue stay was good!!!  Would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very proud of the service our staff provides to all of our guests and we are happy to hear that you experienced this high level of service during your stay. Thank you for your compliments about our pools and rooms. We are happy that you enjoyed the spaciousness and cleanliness of the resort. We hope you were able to take advantage of the amenities we provide at our pools. We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.  We thank you again for your review and we are looking forward in welcoming you back.

Summary: We stayed here during the Doheny Days weekend.  First time for all of us.  Property is beautiful!  Up on a hill with a great view.  We were upgraded to pool view room with partial ocean.  Room is small and the a/c barely worked.  That weekend was super hot and there is one vent on the corner of the room and we were just dying.  Air barely cooled down even at night!  Bathroom sink leaked so we had to call maintenance person to come fix it.  Went down to the bar Sat night to hang out with friends and wind down after the concert.  Sat on the deck for 20 minutes and no server came up.  This was about 11:30pm.  So we walked into the bar and sat there for 20 more minutes while we got ignored by both bartenders.  Unbelievable!!!  I had to literally flag him down!  They blamed it on a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We deeply regret that your first experience with us was a disappointment. It saddens us to hear that you did not experience the quality of service the Laguna Cliffs Marriot Resort & Spa is known for. Our resort has received many compliments and praises because of our staff and the poor service you received is unacceptable and we will address it with our staff immediately. We thank you for bringing this to our attention. We hope that you are aware that your experience is not the standard but an exception and we hope you this experience does not affect your impression of our resort.  We thank you again for your comments.

Summary Heading: Pool service was terrible and server call me a name.
Summary: I was there September 7 thru September 9 2012 and went to the pool with my grandson and no one served us.  I had to ask for a waitress.  All they could do was talk to each other and forget about the all the other guests.  On both friday and saturday than on saturday the waitress call me a name because I told her she wasn't getting a tip.  If I was that Hotel U would of fired her on the spot.  I had to ask every time I wanted something I had to go get a waitress.  Isn't it their job to serve us? The guest at the hotel?  That is my understanding.  You pay a lot to stay at this hotel and they treated me like I was garbage.  It was the most worst experience I have ever had. So if you stay there be prepared for no service at the pool area.  It was the worst experience ever and they
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We want to start off by apologizing for the unsatisfactory service you received at the pool. We are very surprised that our staff would behave in this manner because as you can read from other reviews we have received, our service throughout the resort is highly praised and well received. We will immediately address your concerns with our staff and be sure that this does not happen again.   In regards to your request for a room with a balcony, we do our best to accommodate all of our guests requests, however due to occupancy levels we may be unable to provide a specific room a guest has preferred.    Our Vue dinner buffet was over after Labor Day and we regret that you were unable to try this delicious buffet. We immediately removed all of our advertisement for this buffet after Labor Day. However, we hope you enjoyed the variety of dinner options our Vue Restaurant provided.   We take every review seriously and we regret that your experience was not above standard.

Summary: All in all a good value. We were very picky about our rooms, and the checkin girl was very accomodating and allowed us to walk through our candidates. The location is great, the views are terrific, you have to walk a bit to get to the harbor, but that's probably a good thing. Parking is vallet only AND they charge $29 a day, so add that to the cost of the stay. But they treat you like a million bucks. Nice experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so delighted to hear that you were pampered during your stay. Our staff service is top notch and we strive to exceed our guests expectations with each encounter. We are so happy to hear that you experienced the accommodating and friendly service we provide to all of our guests. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: My bf and I stayed here right after the Labor Day rush for one night on his free Marriott Points and we were both blown away! Despite the fact that this was free for us, we were treated like regular guests. Everyone from the valet service to the concierge to the pool attendants to the front desk staff were awesome. The pool was great, we were served snacks while lounging and waiting to be checked into our room early! The room was beautiful with a view of the ocean and were accommodated with a fridge that was promptly brought to us within 5 mn of the first phone call. The food at the pool is a bit pricey (19 bucks for an omelette!), but was good since we were starving. A Ralph's was in walking distance to stock up if you're on a budget;) We had free use of bikes, surf boards and
Manager Response: Wow! We are so delighted that we made your stay so ‚Äúamazing‚Äù and memorable. Thank you for being such a loyal Marriott Rewards member. Everyone is our guest and we appreciate that you are loyal to the Marriott brand. We are grateful that as a couple, you were both able to enjoy all the amenities the resort has to offer. We can‚Äôt agree with your more, our staff is superb and they are here to make your stay not just enjoyable but comfortable and memorable. We are pleased that we accomplished that. We hope that you were able to try one of our spa facials or massages while you stayed with us. The experience will surely bring you back for more. We now have fitness classes for our guests, which include Yoga, Meditation, Boot camp and much more. We are so happy that you and your boyfriend were able to get away from the hustle and bustle of LA and experience the tranquility that awaits you and the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Had a good, but not great, stay at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott.  The property itself is in good shape and sits on a bluff. It's about a 5-10 minute walk straight down a hill to get to the beach or harbor. You can also walk to restaurants and shops along PCH. The rooms are average size and most look out over one of the 2 pools with views of the ocean in the distance. The beds were very comfortable. The front desk staff was especially helpful as was the staff at the adult pool.  Now the negatives: My bill was incorrect at check out and it took almost 30 minutes and having to speak to 3 differently people to get the problem resolved.  The biggest negative was the valet only parking at $29 a day. I mentioned how ridiculously high this was, somewhat jokingly, to one of the staff
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We agree that our resort is in an amazing location, sitting on a bluff overlooking the Pacific Ocean. We are walking distance from the beach and marina and just high enough where you get a cool ocean breeze and a sense of tranquility. We are happy that the comfort of the beds were to your liking.   We regret that you had to wait 30 minutes to have your bill corrected but we are pleased that everything was taken care of. As you mentioned, our front desk staff is very helpful and they are there to accommodate your needs.   In regards to your comments about our parking fees, the parking rates are in fact ‚Äúcompetitive‚Äù to the other resorts along the coast. We are very fortunate to have our resort situated on the bluffs and near Doheny State Beach and harbor but unfortunately it does not give our guests many options to park their vehicles. We apologize for this inconvenience.

Summary: We would return to this resort, great location, everyone was really nice and the pool was perfect! dont waste your money at the St Regis or Ritz, this hotel is just as good for a fraction of the cost!
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments about our resort and staff. We are so delighted that you enjoyed your stay with your family. We hope are looking forward to your return visit.

Summary: Rooms were great - very nautical, clean. we were on the first floor (room 1012) facing ocean with patio. It was very serene.   Food was great until the pool side waiter brought us turkey burgers instead of veggie burgers. I kept telling him it was turkey and he insisted it was veggie. Bit into it and needless to say almost passed out. Spit it out cause it was indeed turkey.  As strict vegans this was VERY disheartening but Liza, the Pool Supervisor handled it great and before i knew it the turkey dead animal flesh burger was gone and we had vegan replacements.  Pool Cabana was great. so inexpensive. VALERIA & GRANT went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable and that our drinks/ food arrived pool side in a timely manner. Service was SOO good in fact that we stayed
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments. We are so delighted that you enjoyed our cabana‚Äôs and poolside service until sunset. We deeply apologize for the mix up in your food order and we are happy to hear that this was promptly corrected. We definitely understand how important it is when you have a dietary preference and we do accommodate all guests needs as best we can. We are glad that you also enjoyed the vegan dishes our culinary team provided for you at the Vue Restaurant. We can‚Äôt disagree with you, we too are amazed at how lovely the views and grounds are at this resort. The panoramic ocean views are just breathtaking. We thank you for your compliments in regards to the great service we provide in all of our outlets. Our staff is very well trained and each interaction is very special to each one of us. We ALL want our guests to feel special and leave with memories that they will last a lifetime. We hope we made this trip special for you. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: The location is excellent.  The views are gorgeous.  The room product is a bit tired and needs a facelift.  The public areas are great.  The valet service is exceptional....the guys are on their game.  Front desk staff could use more training on suggesting local areas and describing their own property.  We weren't even told there was a pool, let alone 2 pools on property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We will have to agree with you on the resorts location and ‚Äúgorgeous‚Äù views. The panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean are just breathtaking. Thank you for your compliments regarding our valet service. Our team works very efficiently in providing our guests with quick and superb service. In regards to our front desk staff, we will be sure to address your concerns with our team. We regret that no one informed you about our pools. We hope the map on the key packet helped you locate some of the great amenities the resort has to offer.  Thank you for your review.

Summary: We just returned from a wonderful weekend at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott. As a family, we were so impressed by the beautiful and clean grounds, tentative and courteous staff and not to mention the gorgeous views! The pool staff, especially Taylor, were beyond attentive and accommodating. They were consistently available to make sure we were as comfortable as we can be by providing complimentary cold water,mixed nuts and unbelievably free massages poolside!!!! Alicia and Brandy at the front desk were so professional and made us feel like we were welcomed and cared for. As an added bonus, the beds were heavenly comfortable! We absolutely loved this hotel and can't wait to go back again. My 8 year old didn't want to leave. I would highly recommned it for families and or an adult
Manager Response: We are just delighted that we could make your weekend a memorable vacation. Our mission is to make your vacation as comfortable and pleasant as we can. We are so happy that you had a chance to experience the wonderful amenties and the great service that our pool staff provides. We're glad you enjoyed the poolside massage. We hope your son/daughter was able to watch one of the two movies that was showing this weekend at the resort. Children just love the popcorn, snacks and theater style seating in this room. You are welcome and cared for and we are at your service at all times. We‚Äôre looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Average resort at best, please read if you have kids and want a nice place to stay. NOT worth the $$!!!
Summary: Just finished a one night stay. Resort is average at best for the rate. Spend and extra $75 and stay at a REAL Resort like the St Regis.   Rooms: very small. We were two rooms away from the ice machine as well but near the adult pool which was the nicest part of the room. We had a king bed with pullout sofa. Barely any room to move with the sofa out. Probably the smallest room I've ever stayed in at $300 a night. For an average hotel and not being in NY city....  Adult Pool: SLOOOW service. And I mean 45 min to an hour to get food. Just awful fish tacos and you can get a better burger at Burger king. Also someone spilled a smoothie in the pool which looked like throw up and they didn't clean it out. They could've at least scooped it up. Saying they could call engineering to
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and comments. We take every review seriously and we will address these issues with our staff. We regret that you experienced an average stay with us because our goal is to have you experience not just an ‚Äúaverage‚Äù stay but an  ‚Äúexcellent‚Äù one.

Summary: Took the kids for Spring Break with 2 other families and although the weather was not accomomodating the hotel was superb.  Took the train to San Juan Capistrano and rented a car to the hotel, although a taxi would have been fine since we were on foot the entire time.  Kids brought their razor/scooters and had a great time.  Poolside was excellent, views are beautiful, food was excellent and local restaurants and atractions are well within walking range.  This hotel occasionally runs specials and is much more affordable if you are lucky enough to catch one of these specials.  Rooms were beautifully decorated with designer fabrics, comfortable and nicely spacious.  Would go back again anytime.
Manager Response: We would love to have you back anytime! We are happy that you spent your Spring Break with us. We hope your friends had as great of a time as you and your family did. The train station makes it so easy for guests who don‚Äôt want to drive and is truly a quick trip from San Juan Capistrano to Dana Point. We are glad that you enjoyed the pools and the wonderful attractions at the harbor. Your stay is very important to us and we are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: This is a gorgeous property:  gorgeous views, lovely decor throughout every part of the property.  It's simply hard not to like staying at a place that's so well-appointed and has such stunning views from multiple vistas.  I arrived very late on a Sunday night.  I was promptly met by the valet, and check-in was friendly and efficient.  I liked my room a lot.  I was on the top floor, where the rooms have large bay windows but no balconies.  To her credit, the agent verified my comfort with no balcony.  I really liked my room; its decor was WAY above the average Marriott, with understated style that felt appropriate to the seaide location and California in general.  The bed was wildly comfortable.  The internet worked very well.  I opened up the bay windows (they had screens) and
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We are happy that you had such a wonderful stay. When our guests are comfortable and content we believe that we have done our job correctly. We are delighted that you enjoyed your guest room and the amenities of the resort. We are pleased that you received great service from all of our outlets. The views of the Pacific Ocean impress us each and every time we sit out on the OverVue Deck as well. We are happy that you were able to enjoy the views while having a peaceful dinner outside.  We‚Äôre looking forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Great banquet staff, poor lobby staff.
Summary: My wife and I attended a wedding at this resort (we did not stay here)...the staff was excellent in the appetizer, dinner, and drinks service but the banquet set up staff was lacking in preparation and quality.  The ceremony was still being set up as guests arrive (including sound system and decorations).  There was debris from trees all around...even got caught on the bride's dress!  Not excellent! The appetizers were delicious and the wait staff was excellent, very professional.  They moved around well and made sure everyone got a chance at the appetizers.  The bartender was great...his name was Brooks.  He was quick making drinks, knew his stuff, and was friendly but professional.  My wife asked for a drink recommendation from him and a woman (banquet manager) stepped in
Manager Response: We thank you for your review. We understand that in some areas the service level was not to your satisfaction. Our staff is known to provide excellent customer service and give attention to detail. We are disappointed that you did not receive this quality of service from our entire team. These concerns will be addressed and we will be sure that a change is made immediately. In regards to you handling the bell cart, it is our job to provide this service and in order to be ensure your safety, one of our bellman should always be driving the bell cart. Sometimes due to occupancy levels we cannot provide immediate service and there may be a wait time. We regret that you had to wait 30 minutes for the bellman. We understand the inconvenience this may have brought to you and the groom‚Äôs family.     On a positive note, we are happy that you enjoyed the wedding and that your vegetarian dinner was to your liking. We will also be sure to recognize our staff that provided the great service you mentioned above. Thank you again for your comments.

Summary Heading: In one aspect, better than Ritz and St. Regis
Summary: and that is, it is an easy nice walk from Laguna Cliffs to wonderful restaurants and taverns, some of which are set right on the harbor edge.  If that's not important to you as a hotel guest, and you can afford the difference in price, than I would suggest staying at either the Ritz-Carlton or St. Regis, which are, let's face it, on another level of luxury and service entirely.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our proximity to the beach and Dana Point Harbor is one of the many great features of our property. As is our panoramic ocean views and the exceptional service that our staff provides to each guest.

Summary: We were here for a wedding and we had the most wonderful time.  The hotel staff service was excellent, from the valet, maid to the front desk. We had the breakfast and valet included in our room charge and this was very helpful. The breakfast buffet was fabulous.  Even had lox and and omelet station and they would also make eggs to order.  The service in the restaurant was fabulous too.  I cannot say enough about the stay we had. No complaints whatsoever!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments about our service, staff and breakfast options. We can‚Äôt tell you how delighted we are that you had such a nice stay at our resort. We hope that you can visit us again on your next leisure vacation. We realize how important it is to our guests that we provide the highest level of service and it brings a smile to our face knowing that we did just that. Thank you again for your review. We hope to see you soon!

Summary: Lets be honest, 9 times out of 10 when you are staying on or very near a beach, you are paying for the location, not necessarily the hotel or the service.  That being said, we had a nice stay at Laguna Cliffs, many high points, a few mediocre/low points.  Lets start low and end high.    The service was constantly ok.  My friends, husband and I all picked up on a certain sense of apathy and/or take my sweet time mentality around the resort.  Customer service definitely needs to be kicked up, especially from the upstairs bar staff (although all of our run-ins with the front desk were fantastic).  The other low point is thin walls.  My husband and I love to sleep in on the weekends, and we were both woken up every morning.  If you don't like to sleep in, this shouldn't be a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the resort and found the views and the location to be breathtaking. We must agree with you‚Ä¶we do too!   We do want to apologize that you and your husband were woken up every morning. We want to take care of our guests and that means making sure that they get a good night‚Äôs rest, every night they are here. We will also be sure to address the customer service that you received in our OverVue Lounge. All of our staff is extremely well trained and our job is to be at your service at all times. It disappoints us to hear that you did not receive the level of service that we expected.  We will address your concerns with our staff.   We hope that you do visit us again and explore the property and the city of Dana Point the next time you are in town.

Summary: Apparently the hotel is newly renovated and our room was nice, but if we had been paying for it instead of using points, I'm not sure I would  have been totally thrilled with our stay.  We were there for a "romantic" 25th Wedding Anniversary visit and our room, while it was an "ocean view" was also directly above the family pool on the second floor.  We felt that this spot was better suited to family vacationers than couples overall.  There were several other options that I would explore before staying at this Marriott again.
Manager Response: Happy 25th Anniversary and thank you for your review. We regret that you did not like your ‚Äúocean view‚Äù room because of its location next to the pool. Please know that if occupancy permits, we would be more than happy to change your room at any time to better suite your needs. We also provide many ‚Äúcouples‚Äù activities including couple‚Äôs massages, dining options at the resort which include live music on Friday and Saturday nights.  The Dana Point Harbor (which is walking distance from the resort) has various outdoor activities as well. We hope that our Concierge was able to provide you with great suggestions.

Summary: Just spent two nights with our three sons at this hotel.  Amazing setting and so peaceful.   We were lucky not to experience the noise other reviewers commented on.  Service was good although the breakfast buffet menu was poor compared to other hotels we have stayed in.  Even the Marriott in San Diego had a much more extensive choice of food.  Like all these chains, everything comes at a price ie valet parking, resort fee etc, but we had a great stay and despite our rather cramped room for the five of us, with absolutely no view at all, we had a great stay and would definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments and your review. We are very excited to hear that your family had a wonderful time at the resort. We hope that your three sons were able to enjoy the Kid‚Äôs Splash zone and the Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club.  In regards to your comments about the room being too small. Please know that we have suites and connecting rooms that will accommodate five people very comfortably. Thank you for your recommendation. We are looking forward in having you and your family return.

Summary: The hotel is in a nice location, but the rooms and service are average and nothing too great. It is a good price though. Good recommendations for the beach (1000 Steps Beach--awesome if you are willing to take a hike up and down about 300 steep stairs). The family pool is extremely crowded and not very clean. Children are welcome in the adult pool, but noise isn't.   We were situated in a tiny room with a view of the driveway and park across the street, and we upgraded to a room by the adult pool entrance with a porch. On the last night, my parents and I were sitting in our room reading with our door open, and we hear people yelling curse words and dirty terms; they were very drunk, and there were children at the pool. My father kindly told them to stop please, but they kept
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We wanted to start off by apologizing for the noise of the wedding guests. We are very happy to hear that our front desk staff was quick in changing your room. Our security team also does a great job in handling all situations quickly and efficiently.   We sincerely hope that your experience at the Laguna Cliffs Resort & Spa will not be ruined forever.  We want you to know that some situations are not in our control and we do our very best to address every and all concerns a guest may have. I hope you find that we did that in this situation. Your impression of the resort is very important to us and we want you to know that we will address your concerns with our staff. Thank you again for your review.

Summary Heading: Lovely pool, sun loungers and pool side service
Summary: We booked a basic room with resort view but were upgraded to a room with pool and ocean view on top floor.  A balcony would have been nice but would have been more expensive. Had to ask for bathroom fan to be turned down on the roof as was on all the time and noisy in the night.  This was done.  Dinner outside on terrace was pleasant, fixed price menu good value compared to a la carte.  Breakfast with omelette station and fresh fruit.  I was impressed with the pool attendant service escorting us to our sun loungers.  The loungers were wide with comfortable mattresses. Delicious pool side menu and smoothies prepared in outside kitchen alongside.  Quick service. Lovely grounds where weddings take place by view.  Steep steps or zig zag ramp down to harbour for a few shops and boat
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are glad that you had a comfortable stay with us and enjoyed the pool and the service our staff provided. Our Vue Restaurant provides guests with the option of sitting indoors and outdoors. I‚Äôm so happy to hear that you sat on the terrace enjoying the ocean views. It‚Äôs one of my favorite spots at the resort. We hope that you had a chance to take a walk along the harbor and visit it‚Äôs many shops. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Can't wait to go back! Customer service amazing!!!
Summary: We just stayed for 5 nights with a travel voucher to celebrate my 15 year wedding anniversary (champagne, card and chocolate covered strawberries were sent to the room)...my husband was called away on business and only stayed one night and the other 4 was just the children and I. This was a first for me and felt very safe and comfortable.  Ariel at the front dest was above and beyond accomodating in putting us in the perfect room with children (134). She felt bad it did not have a view but having the patio and to walk out to the pool was perfect! I am going to request this room every time. The room was very clean and comfortable. I was also concerned about the $29 daily parking but we upgraded to a package which included parking/breakfast. Totally worth it.  We had two sets of
Manager Response: Happy Anniversary. Wow! Thank you for the lovely post! We enjoy creating memorable getaways for our guests and we are so delighted that we did just that for you and your children. We assure you that our resort will provide the same level of comfort and safety we did the first time, on your next visit. We are confident that we will shower you with excellent service each time you are here. There‚Äôs nothing better than feeling relaxed and rejuvenated when you are on vacation and we are delighted that we were able to accomplish that. We hope that your friends enjoyed their stay as well and we hope the next time you visit you can pamper yourself with a spa service. See you soon!

Summary: Nice hotel, but as others have mentioned, pricey.  Valet parking is convenient, but expensive at $29 a day  There is a parking garage that must have been used for self parking at some time..  We had a nice room with a view of the pool & ocean.  Great view of the harbor.  There are shops and several restaurants in the harbor area.  Drinks are expensive as well.  We only had lunch and drinks at the hotel and they were good.  The pool service is fantastic!  In fact service in all areas of the hotel was prompt an friendly.  We didn't try the spa or have breakfast at the hotel.  There is an I-Hop nearby as well as McDonalds and several other restaurants/fast food places.  There was a concert in the part right below the hotel on Sunday afternoon.  We sat outside on the terrace and had
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We regret that you found our resort to be pricey.  I appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.    We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your room and the beautiful views that surround the resort. Our resort is situated  in a beautiful location, along the coast, and overlooking the Dana Point Harbor. We are so happy to hear that you were able to enjoy the scenery and music while having some drinks on our OverVue deck. It‚Äôs personally one of my favorite spots at the resort. Thank you for your compliments in regards to our service. Our staff is truly amazing and they take pride in giving each and every guest the attention they deserve. Our job is to be at your service and provide you with comfort from arrival to departure. We thank you for your review and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: The view from the hotel is lovely (if you don't face the ocean, you look out over the hotel buildings and plastic plants). Our room was very comfortable, with a large bathroom. We stayed here 5 nights and booked a special rate which included breakfast & valet parking. The breakfast buffet was very nice, although the selection never varied during our stay. Valet parking was quick & efficient. The property charges a $15/night "resort charge" (providing free internet service), which we learned about when we checked out. It seems like a rip-off to tack that on to an already pricey room.
Manager Response: We thank you for your review and we are happy to hear that you found our resort to be lovely and the rooms to be comfortable. We are happy that you were able to stay here on a special rate. During our summer months those rates are hard to come by. We do regret that you were not aware of the $15 resort fee. It is stated upon booking as well as on your confirmation e-mail. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: We stayed one night at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott as we worked our way down the coast from Los Angeles to San Diego. The hotel setting is fabulous but the real story of this hotel is the people and there great service and attention to detail. When we checked in our room wasn't, Brandy at the front desk provided us with drink and dessert coupons while we waited, a nice touch. The hotel has an excellent pool with ocean view. The grounds are beautiful with a nice walking or jogging path. I wish we had stayed longer at this hotel.
Manager Response: We hope you a nice vacation driving along the coast. We are so delighted that you chose our resort as one of your destination stops. We thank you for your compliments in regards to our staff and their attention to detail. Our job is to make your stay with us as comfortable and pleasant as we can and we are delighted that you experienced this upon check-in. I must agree with you, our ocean views are quiet spectacular and the walking and jogging trails are very peaceful and beautiful. We hope you come back next time for a longer visit.

Summary: I first stayed at this hotel when I was 13 and it was called The Dana Point Resort and it was amazing back then. I recently returned to this property and it was great to see all the upgrades and how modern the hotel has become. This is my favorite hotel I have stayed at and I am a very frequent traveler. The quality and service at this property is by far the best I have experienced. It's sad to read reviews that complain about elevator noise or people who don't like their view. What are you going to do sit and look out the window like a psycho the whole time your their. Here's a tip, go to the front desk and tell them, they will fix your problem. Keep up the great work guys. Your management is great, your staff is awesome, your room service was fantastic. Loved the selection in
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your review. We are so honored that you came back to our resort. Thank you for your wonderful and thoughtful comments about our resort and staff. We are so grateful that you have experienced the wonderful service levels our staff strives to achieve with every single guest. It IS our job to ‚Äúfix‚Äù the problem and we do just that 24 hours a day. We are at your service and we are proud to be a part of such a wonderful team who truly cares about each guest‚Äôs needs. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the recently renovated property and all of the fine amenities it includes. We want to thank you again for your review and we hope to welcome you back real soon.

Summary Heading: Gorgeous views, comfy rooms, great bar...
Summary: Was here for 2 nights on a work visit. While the views from my room were only so-so, the property was gorgeous, the views from the park-like setting (and adjacent park) were fantastic and the bar and bar-staff was outstanding. I'll come back here for a mini-vacation (and I'm not a huge Marriott fan).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and wonderful compliments about our resort. We are happy that you had the opportunity to enjoy the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. I can't disagree with you, our panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean are quite breathtaking. I also enjoy the views of the OverVue Lounge and the indoor/outdoor seating that is available.   We hope that the next time you visit for leisure, you request an ocean-view room so that you can see the views from your room as well. We're looking forward to your vacation visit..soon.

Summary Heading: Our new family get away spot!!
Summary: This place is absolutely gorgeous!!  Our 2 year old had so much fun the first time we had to come back for a 2nd time!  There are 2 pools which is perfect to separate the adults with kids from the adults that want to just relax and not have splashing and a lot of noise.  Andrea checked us in and was as pleasant as can be.  She offered my son a toy from a basket which he took a good 20 minutes to choose.  She thanked us for coming back and asked if we were celebrating anything special.  We told her it was our anniversary that month but since we have a 2 year old and work full time we decided to celebrate as a family.  We enjoyed the day relaxing by the pool watching our son enjoy the water play area.  It was also nice that they had a pool that was only 2 feet deep so we didn't
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We want to start off by wishing you a belated happy anniversary. We are delighted that we have become your new vacation spot. We are happy to hear that your son has enjoyed our resort as much as you and your husband. What a joy to welcome you all back.   Our staff is all about service and we are happy to hear that you experienced the high level of service and our attention to detail. We hope you enjoyed the chocolate covered strawberries in your room and we hope we made your anniversary a memorable one.   We are happy to hear that you enjoyed sitting out on our Vue Patio to enjoy your morning breakfast. I cannot agree with you more about the great live bands that perform in our OverVue Lounge every Friday and Saturday nights. The ambiance is so pleasant and listening to live music while enjoying the views of the coast isn't too bad either.   We are looking forward in welcoming you all back soon!

Summary Heading: NOISY, expensive way to be kept awake all night
Summary: Although the vista is beautiful, this hotel is missing all the real amenities necessary for a hotel.  The walls are paper thin--easy to hear all conversations in the hall.  My room was two down from the elevator and I could hear the elevator ding every time it arrived.  The air conditioning compressor cycles on (loudly) and off.  Currently, listening to a band outside my window doing Beach Boy renditions and all I want to do is get some sleep after getting no sleep last night.  Also had GI issues after eating the banquet last night as did one other member of my group.  WOULD NEVER COME HERE AGAIN.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. You are a valued costumer and we sincerely apologize for the noise issues you experienced during your stay. It deeply saddens us to hear that you did not get a good night‚Äôs rest because of the elevator, the air conditioning and the guest conversations. We do have a city curfew policy and all bands outside the property must cease all noise by 10:00 pm . Our goal is to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible and we regret that we did not meet your expectations. We will address this with our staff and make the appropriate changes as necessary.

Summary: I paid for a "pool view" and as a Marriott Gold member asked for an upgrade. The first room #4008 - to even see the pool you had to walk to the windows, move 2 chairs, table and floor lamp and strain your neck to even see the "kids" pool - but you could sure hear them!  They moved me the next day to an Pool/Ocean view - which was even worse - it was a corner room - again you had to walk to the balacony, move the 2 chairs and table around to sit - also the "kids pool" and no view of the ocean - what a "rip off" for  $450.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review.  As a Marriott Gold Member you are one of our most valued guests and we regret we were not able to offer you an upgrade.
