We were fully committed due to our resort‚Äôs sold out position; however, we did place you in the best room type available and we regret that its location did not meet your expectations.  As I‚Äôm sure you are aware, we take great pride in providing a high level of service and quality to our guests and we were truly sorry to hear that this guestroom's location put a damper on your stay with us.  Usually we receive many fine compliments from our guests and we hope you will look upon this incident you experienced as an exception and not the rule.

Summary: This is a nice hotel, well located, set back but still overlooking the ocean. Excellent for families as they have a kid's pool and a children's activites room and, I assume, they have some children's programs. Rooms are comfortable. Room rates are fair, but costs begin to add-up with valet parking (only), breakfast, (high especially for families), resort fee (even at $15 per day it still adds up and its taxed) and internet package of $12.95. Close to other activites as well. Service is mixed. Some staff offer information voluntarily, but often you have to ask. At check-in it would have been nice if they had enquired if I wanted a newspaper, did I have a rewards number, reminder there is a safe in the room and do I need the mini-bar key, there is turn down service,etc. The
Manager Response: We thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with your family. We do have a Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club that is open during the summer months. It‚Äôs filled with hands on activities. Each day is a different theme (ie., Magic Monday, Chef for a day, etc.) and we find that children never want to leave. We also provide a movie night for all of our guests who have children between the ages of 5-12. Children enjoy turning in their ticket stubs at a mini box office and as they walk into the amphitheater style meeting room they are treated to popcorn, snacks and drinks.   We regret that you had to ask for more information about amenities that we provide. We will address this with our front office staff. We hope that all your questions were answered and that we provided everything to make your stay as comfortable as possible.   We thank you again for you review and we are looking forward to your return visit.

Summary: The Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort was absolutely beautiful. The room was spacious and had a great view of the ocean. The pool area was gorgeous. It was nice to be able to sit outside and not be surrounded by loud, rambunctious people. The hotel staff was phenomenal, they were very attentive and would bring anything that you wanted.  **My one complaint would be about the valet parking. This hotel does not have its own parking lot, as it is up on a hill. There is a daily fee of $29 to have the valet service. I did not have a problem paying for the valet, the issue was that I was unaware that the hotel did not have parking. It would have been nice when I made my reservation over the phone six months prior to have been informed about the parking situation and the fee for the valet
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments in regards to our ocean views, ‚Äúphenomenal staff‚Äù and gorgeous pools. We agree that our property is very beautiful. We are happy that you had a chance to experience the wonderful staff that we have at this property. They enjoy providing each guest  with an exceptional level of service.   We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.    We are sorry to hear you were not aware of our parking fees as we inform guests in a few different areas regarding these fees.  On the confirmation you received for your guestroom our parking fee is noted under your room rate.  In addition, the parking fee is noted on our website under Guest Services.    Once again, we appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us and we hope that we may have the opportunity to serve you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Laguna Cliffs vs Ritz Carlton... here's what you get..
Summary: I could not get into the Ritz and had the opportunity to stay here.  The price was about half of the Ritz... now what you get is in some cases is more and other cases less than what I would have received at the Ritz.  I got to stay at the Ritz down the road as well and here's my comparison... 1.  Service at Laguna.. good but more of the "it's over there" and a point than a "let me show you" and "my pleasure."  The only exception was the very nice waiter who notice I spilled a little orange juice on my lap and he brought a glass of water and an extra towel - nice.   2)  location- mixed.. the beach is nice and close and beautiful to the Ritz with even a golf cart to take you down a walkway.  For Laguna Cliffs, you are walking distance to the boat dock and restaurants 3)  Price..
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write your detailed review. We appreciate your comments and feedback. We hope that your travels will bring you to the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa in the near future.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a Family Getaway and Romantic Hotspot
Summary: First the location. Off the Pacific Coast Highway, walking distance to Doheny State Beach (good surfing or boogie boarding), the Dana Point Harbor (restaurants and marina and day trip to Catlalina), 6 miles to Laguna Beach for more restaurants. Close enough to shops. Easy accessibility and centralized location to the rest of OC and San Diego activities. They also have a shuttle that can bring you to the beach, marina, and even Laguna. Then the views. Gorgeous! Gorgeous! overlooking the Pacific and the Lantern Bay Park. If you don't mind paying extra, I highly recommend getting a room facing the ocean as the property stops where the Lantern Bay park starts. Green, green, colorful flowers, then blue, dotted or lined with boats depending on your vantage point.  Activities. There
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate all the wonderful compliments that you‚Äôve stated about our resort. We agree that this property encompasses everything one would want at a resort and more. We are very delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. We regret that you were able to hear the guests in the room next to you. We apologize if that brought you any inconvenience at all. As you noted we are glad that you couldn‚Äôt hear any other noise outside of your room except for the neighbors. Thank you again for your wonderful review.

Summary: Stayed for 2 nights in oceanview room. Great views and nicely finished interior.  In easy walking distance to Dana Point Harbor and some very nice restaurants. No self parking adds to your bill which is a pain for people who have 2 or 3 vehicles.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are very delighted that you stayed with us for two nights. We hope that you enjoyed the ocean views from your room and throughout the resort. We recently renovated the property and we thank you for your compliments in regards to the interior of the property. We hope that the parking bill was not an inconvenience to you in any way. We try and make it very clear on your reservation confirmation of all the fees so there are no surprises. The parking fee is noted under your room rate and on our website under Guest Services.  We hope that you visit us again real soon.

Summary: Just stayed at the laguna cliffs marriott.  Wonderful room with great location right off of PCH.  Great spot to get to anywhere.  Staff was friendly and harbor was great.  Has a cool vibe!  Wasn't the least expensive on the list, but would pay to stay there again.  Our first trip to the beach cities area of california, but it won't be our last.
Manager Response: We hope this is not your last visit to the beach cities of California but one of many. Thank you for your review. We are delighted that your first stay to Southern California was with us. Thank you for your compliments in regards to our staff and location of our resort. Our staff is exceptional and we truly take pride in the great levels of service they provide to each and every guest. We are glad that you were able to enjoy the harbor. We hope you took advantage of all the water activities they provide. We are looking forward to your return visit.

Summary: Well, What can I say. We were looking for a hotel by the sea that was also far enough away from the madding crowd to relax but not completely isolated. This hotel was welcoming, quiet and set in grounds that allowed you to wander at times without bumping into anyone. There were also enough acitvities going on that, if you wanted to, could keep you busy for days. We chose to use the tennis court and swimming pool often.  The beach is down the hill (there is a shuttle to use if you want) which we foudn clean and friendly. Our son spent hours throwing the soft ball to his dad and relaxing by the water edge. We had a ground floor room which had a patio onto the pool. It is a wee bit south of LA and LAX but still can drive up and check in within about an hour so not bad. It is also
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate your compliments and are very happy to hear that you enjoyed the pools and tennis courts. We are delighted that you were able to take advantage of the amenities we provide at the resort. Our resort is situated halfway between Los Angeles and San Diego, so it‚Äôs in a perfect location for those wanting to travel South or North. We do have amazing views of the Pacific Ocean and we are very fortunate to be located only walking distance from the beach and park. We hope you come back to visit us again soon.

Summary: We visited this Marriott in early June 2012.  It was great escaping the heat of the Phoenix desert.  The views are gorgeous!  I enjoyed being at the top of the cliffs, and surrounded by beautiful gardens.  We stayed for 3 nights and the property was surprisingly very uncrowded.  We had a lovely suite overlooking the pool.  We enjoyed swimming and relaxing in the beautiful cabanas (which you don't have to pay for to use).  The hot tub was lovely as well.  We were happy at the number of restaurants that were just a short walk away...and 118 steps down the hill.  It is a great walk, and the exercise is a plus.  There were about a dozen rabbits in the park as we walked to dinner each evening and my son enjoyed chasing them.  We walked down the long hill to Doheny State Park one day
Manager Response: We would love to be your annual destination for you and your family to escape the heat of Phoenix. We want to thank you for your review and positive comments about the resort. We are delighted that you enjoyed the suite and our pools. The resort is in a perfect location, walking distance to the harbor and shops and we also have some wonderful hiking and biking trails. It sounds like you and your family enjoyed the nice weather on your Surrey. We also provide Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club for children to attend to for ¬Ω day or full day sessions. Children really enjoy the daily themed activities. We also have movie nights every Saturday during the summer months. Children are able to watch a movie while enjoying popcorn, drinks and snacks. It may be something your son would enjoy the next time you are staying with us. We‚Äôre looking forward in seeing you all back next year.

Summary: Way over priced, Terrible service!  Looks great, with a fantastic location its just too bad they have terrile service, terrible food. DO NOT STAY HERE if you want to enjoy a luxury vacation. If you want to stay in a room overnight go ahead and book.
Manager Response: We regret that you were not satisfied with our service and did not like the food. We would like to know what happened in more detail so we can address this issue. Please feel free to e-mail the resort directly at information@lagunacliffs.com.  Thank you for your review.

Summary: My wife and I booked what we were led to believe was an ocean view room at the Marriott in Dana Point.  We went down to Orange County to witness the birth of our new grandson.  We checked in and was given a room with high windows that you have to stand up to see the view.  The room was a small odd shape.  Very small and not comfortable.  I complained to the front desk as it was apparent that we were given one of there "last minute rooms"  I told the guest clerk that the room was of the Motel 6 standard.  They said they had nothing more available.  I even said that I would pay for a suite upgrade.  Still nothing.  The next day, I got them to change the suite to one that a a tiny balcony and bigger windows.  Although the grounds and looks of the hotel were very nice, what's inside
Manager Response: Congratulations on your new grandson. We truly regret that you were not satisfied with your room. Unfortunately, we try and accommodate every guest as best we can and if we are sold-out we don‚Äôt have the flexibility to change the location of your room. Please know that if we had any additional rooms available we would have been able to switch you and your wife to a room that was to your liking. Although, it is a great to be sold out, it is to our disappointment that you and your wife did not like your room. Thank you for your review and we appreciate your feedback.

Summary: We were very pleased with the appearance of the hotel and our room was clean and spacious. We visited the spa, which was lovely. However, upon returning from the spa the power went out. I understand that this is not the resort's fault, nor is it under their control. However, appropriate customer service is under their control and they were lacking it. Several employees were rude and incompitent.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and feedback. We appreciate your compliments of our rooms and spa facility. We do apologize for the inconvenience the power outage brought to you. As you stated, it was a city outage and out of our control. Our staff did their best to accommodate every guest. However, we take every review seriously and we are disappointed that you were not satisfied with the customer service that you received. Please know that we will address this with our staff. Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary: We have never been disappointed with a Marriott and this location is no exception. The rooms are lovely, clean - and when requesting a top floor-- usually quiet. We stayed in room 4018 with a view of the pool and partial ocean view. We stayed here at Christmas time in 2009 - the main bar/gathering area has been remodeled since then and greatly improved - I believe the room windows (maybe some anyway) have been changed out from wood to aluminum (better look)  It would be nice to be able to have a self-park option - I think they used to. We paid cash at the bar and still got charged for the bar tab on our final bill - guess they are used to people just putting stuff on the room. They promptly took care of that without any grief. Sleep quality: our mattress had a feather topper on
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy that you were able to enjoy a quiet room on the top floor with a partial ocean view. With the amazing weather we have in Dana Point, I‚Äôm sure you experienced some beautiful views. We are delighted that you made it back here to see the newly renovated resort as there are many changes that we made. We apologize that you were charged twice for your bar tab but we are glad to hear that the error was resolved immediately. We are happy that you had a ‚Äúgreat stay‚Äù and would love to have you back.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel recently for several nights on our first trip with our baby who was 9.5 months old when we arrived. The staff were all very friendly especially the guys working the valet parking. They would ask us where we were going and if we needed directions, etc. They were also cheerful and didn't have any attitude. One complaint would be what other reviewers have already stated, valet parking is mandatory. That being said, however, they are extremely fast in getting your car. You don't have to wait around 5 minutes. I found our room with a King bed to actually be quite spacious for a standard room. It also had a small love seat and a balcony. Even if you balcony doesn't overlook the pool, a look into the hills is still quite pleasant. We ordered a play yard for our
Manager Response: We thank you for your review. While we are delighted that you enjoyed your spacious room and beautiful room, we regret that your location was far from the elevator. If occupancy allows and rooms are available please note that we would be more than happy to switch your room for you and your family. We agree that our resort is located in a perfect destination,  walking distance to Dana Point Harbor and beautiful Lantern Bay Park. We encourage all guests to take advantage of both. We appreciate your compliments on our valet staff and we are grateful that your car was ready for you quickly. Thank you for your feedback. We hope to see you and your family back soon.

Summary: This Marriott property successfully meets the demands of both business travelers and vacationing families, which can be difficult to do!  Front desk manager, Taylor, was helpful to us and overall service is quite positive.   If room location is important to you, i.e. near or far from family or adult pool or away from the conference rooms, etc.  I recommend sharing your requests ahead of time.  There is much to do close by... from walking along the marina down to the Oceanographic institute, renting kayaks/standup paddleboards, beautiful 'hidden' beaches a few miles up the PCH... be sure to get out and explore.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We couldn‚Äôt agree with you  more. Our resort accommodates couples, families and most certainly business clientele. We are very proud to be able to meet the needs of all of our guests and it is our job to make every stay memorable and comfortable. We are very close to the beautiful Dana Point Harbor and all of its lovely shops and restaurants as well as the variety of activities that the harbor has to offer. There are even beautiful hiking trails that are nearby if you just wanted to take in the ocean breeze and panoramic views of the Pacific Ocean. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope you come back to visit again when you are in the area.

Summary Heading: Always good to be at Laguna
Summary: Great Marriott property with 2 pools and close walk to beach. If you need a roll away and you are going to check in late, call ahead and make sure they save one for you!  Our 1st night they were out. Not a good situation for our 16 and 10 year old kids!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy that you enjoyed the two pools and the close proximity to the beach. We regret that we didn‚Äôt have a roll away for you on your first night and we hope that did not cause a huge inconvenience. We hope that your children were able to utilize the roll away during the rest of your stay. Please note that we try and accommodate all of our guests the best we can and we apologize if we ran out of roll aways on your first night. We hope you and your family will visit us again.

Summary: One of the best Marriott hotels I have stayed in for service. The hotel is located between Laguna and Dana Point and is in driving distance of the Laguna beaches. The rooms are nice, the restaurant is good, the pool service is fabulous and the hotel has got a casual yet classy feel about it. I recommend this hotel for any travelers, primarily for the great service.
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments on our service. We take great pride in our service levels and we are not shy to state that we rank in the top 5% for customer service with Marriott's Nationwide. Our goal is to be "At Your Service" at all times. We are delighted that you experienced this and we are looking forward in your return visit.

Summary Heading: The perfect staycation in Southern California!
Summary: We live in Huntington Beach but we were "hotel sick" and needing to lounge by a pool with cocktail service. Upon arrival, the hotel is impressive. Very lighthouse, Hotel Coronado looking. The service was great from arrival to departure. We were even upgraded to an ocean view room. Thank you Marriott Rewards! We took advantage of the kids club for our son. He LOVED it! They kept him busy with projects, games, and served him lunch. They also have a fun scavenger hunt that takes the kids all over the hotel collecting stickers for their activity book. The Del Mar pool is fabulous. Great splash zone for the kids. Delicious cocktails and food service. There is also a smaller pool which seemed to be more for those who enjoy a little more peace and quiet away from the kids. We took our
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you're looking for a resort that is perfect for children and adults alike, look no further... This place has it all: ocean views, gorgeous, perfectly manicured grounds and the most comfortable beds - take it from this insomniac. The staff is top notch. Everyone, from the concierge to the bellman to the housekeeping staff is friendly and welcoming. Two standouts: the Overview Lounge where you can have cocktails, listen to soulful R&B, while children can nosh off a tasty kid's menu. The Marriott also has a Scavenger Hunt a clever way to get the family aquainted with the hotel. Mykids enjoyed meeting the staff and learning about their jobs. Also, if you need alittle r&r, don't pass up the Kids Club! You have your choice of a morning or afternoon session. The kids loved the arts
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your wonderful compliments. We appreciate your review. We are so delighted that your children experienced the Kahuna Laguna Kid's Club, scavenger hunt and Splash Zone. When we hear that your children and your spouse enjoyed the resort equally, we know we've done our job right! Our goal is to make your stay has inviting and pleasurable as we can and we thank you for complementing our staff that provided this service to you. We can't wait to have you back for another R&R stay.

Summary: I can't say enough about this resort.  We stayed for 2 nights over July 4th and everything, from check-in to check-out was wonderful.  Even though the resort seemed to be completely booked, you never felt like it was.  Lots of families and kids but everyone seemed well behaved and respectful.  This is the first time I have ever stayed at a resort where they had enough staff to handle everything.  There seemed to be at least 3-4 people at all times folding towels at the pool, setting up the chairs, cleaning up, etc.  The same goes for the restaurant, lobby, valet, etc.  This resort definitely got it right to make sure that all guests were taken care of.  They even set up chairs on the lawn to view the fireworks and had free popcorn.  Kudos to the management and staff.  Pros:
Manager Response: Thank you for your detailed review. We appreciate your compliments and we are happy to hear that our service levels exceeded your expectations. Our goal is to have every guest feel that they are the "only" guest staying with us and for that reason we have a very attentive staff that is "At Your Service" at all times. Thank you for spending your 4th of July with us! We are so happy that you experienced the service levels of our pool staff. We hope you enjoyed the 4th of July BBQ and we are looking forward to your return.

Summary: Had a fantastic girls' getaway at Laguna Cliffs. The hotel is in a beautiful location, across from a park, marina and beach where we took some lovely walks. Staff was very helpful and friendly. The room was tastefully decorated, spacious and quiet. We enjoyed the pool, where staff put terrycloth covers on the lounge chairs, brought towels and served us ice water. We were able to get a great deal on the room, which included valet parking and a delicious breakfast buffet with an omelet bar. Would definitely go back!
Manager Response: We are thrilled that you had a great girl's getaway! Thank you for your compliments about our guest rooms. With the renovation, we tried to make the rooms comfortable with a  beach chic d√©cor.  Our pool service is quite amazing where our only goal is for you to relax while we take care of the rest. We are looking forward to your next stay with us.

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel with a beautiful view!
Summary: We stayed here just one night for a wedding and I wish we could have stayed longer. The hotel is set up on a cliff with beautiful views of the ocean and harbor below. Our room was on the third floor and had pretty bay windows that opened. It was so nice to sleep with the fresh sea air coming in. The room was large and decorated very nicely. We went to the pool bar for a drink before getting ready for the wedding. Drinks were very pricey, but they made them strong. We also used the lobby bar after the wedding, they had live music and an outdoor patio with heaters if you wanted to get away from the music. All of the staff members that we talked to were great. I would love to come back to this hotel for a longer visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you enjoyed the wedding you attended and your stay with us. The nice breeze that comes into the room is quiet perfect. Thank you for your compliments on our staff and OverVue Lounge. We have live entertainment every Friday and Saturday and as you mentioned we have indoor and outdoor seating to accommodate all guests. We are happy that you were able to experience our resort for the first time. We are looking forward to your next ‚Äúlong‚Äù visit.

Summary: I stayed at Laguna Cliffs for just one night.....definitely wish it could have been longer.  The rooms were quite comfortable and everyone was helpful and informative.  The views at Dana Point were incredible.  The hotel had the "stairs to the sea" that you could go down and then walk to the many lookout points.  I would definitely stay at thie Marriott Resort again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind comments about our resort. We too hope that next time you will stay with us longer. We are very happy to hear that you were able to walk down to the harbor and visit their quaint shops. The views are quite spectacular from the resort and harbor and we are glad that you enjoyed them just as much as we do. Thank you for your review and we are looking forward to your next stay.

Summary Heading: Location, valet, and finishes were good; just shy of luxury
Summary: This was my second visit to this property. The location and grounds are great.  The valet staff was friendly and efficient.  Rooms include robes and turndown service. The only drawbacks were some minor items that prevented the stay from being similar to a typical luxury resort, namely the bathroom finishes feeling a bit more 4-star than 5-star and the ice machine being broken on my floor for two of the four nights.  Unfortunately, despite receiving a confirmation from our travel agency that I had a king room, I was given a room with two doubles at check-in.  This is understandable since I checked in 3-4 hours early.  However, the option to wait for a king room was not extended even after I inquired about the availability of king rooms.  This is a good alternative to higher
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy that this was your second visit to the property and we hope that you visit us again soon. Thank you for the compliments on our valet staff and the amenities of our guest rooms. We regret that the ice machine was broken on your floor. Please feel free to call ‚ÄúAt Your Service‚Äù for any requests that you may have. They are available 24 hours a day and would be happy to provide you with a bucket of ice. Please note that we take every review seriously and we will be sure to address your concerns to our front office staff. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: This hotel was near  short stay. Dan point is a lovely area on the coast, totally different from Laguna beach and Huntingdon beach. It has a small port and quaint restaurants along the side of it. The hotel sits on a cliff overlooking the coast and offers great views. The breakfasts were first class and from the restaurant, you can sit in or out, you could see open spaces and the sea. One of the best buffets we've had in the USA. The bar area was similar, with great views and firepits for the evening to sit round when it got cool. The only downside for us was the constant conferences and delegates which we had to walk through every time we came from our room to the main area. A room in the first block from reception would have sorted that! Nearly forgot!! The pool was lovely and
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so delighted that you enjoyed the city of Dana Point. It is a very quaint and beautiful town. Thank you for complementing our Vue Restaurant. We are happy that you enjoyed your breakfast and were able to take in the views of the Pacific Ocean while dining.   We apologize for any inconvenience the location of your room might have caused during your stay. Our job is to make your stay as comfortable as we can.   We are delighted that you experienced the outstanding service our staff provides and we hope that you were able to enjoy the poolside amenities we offer.   We hope you visit us again next year.

Summary: I've stayed at a lot of Marriott's and this would could use a little more customer-friendly training.  Beautiful property, but my experience was summed up by my last exchange this morning when I needed to make an adjustment to bill ... and I wasn't even asked how my experience was.  This was after no hot water this morning for a shower.  Even though I had complained, there was no acknowldegement that the mini-bar patrol took a small pack of cheese from my bar and left it out to rot ... not a rouge drink, note you, but a small package of cheese I need when I become hypoglycemic.  I was traveling alone and was passed over three times -- several times on each occassion -- in getting restaurant service ... once when it couldn't have been more obvious I wasn't waiting for anyone
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We regret that you did not experience the high quality of service that we provide to all of our guests. We understand that your shower did not have hot water and please note that our ‚ÄúAt Your Service‚Äù department is available to reach 24 hours a day. We will be more than happy to have the problems fixed immediately.   We do not take any review lightly and we will be sure to address your concerns with our food and beverage department. We currently have a dinner buffet available at the Vue restaurant Tuesday-Saturday and we provide a tapas style menu in our OverVue Lounge every night.   In regards to our shuttle service, we do provide transportation to and from the harbor upon availability. We regret that this service was not available during your stay. Thank you again for your review.

Summary: This Marriott was amazing!  My wife and I are Marriott reward members and have stayed at a number of their properties.  We especially love Camelback Inn in Scottsdale.  This Marriott beat Camelback with their customer service last weekend. This was the  best Marriott customer experience I have ever received in my life!!!  I had planned to stay at a nearby property as something different for my wife and I.  Ya know, get away from the resort experience.  A little more quaint experience.   It was a disaster! And the other property had absolutely no clue what customer service was about.  We felt as if we were doing them a favor staying with them.  I called the Marriott and said, " I want to come home".  And then our experience started,.......reservations found a property 1.5 miles
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your detailed review. First and foremost...welcome home to your Marriott family! We are delighted that we made your visit with us not only one that will be memorable but one that you will never forget. We take pride in making every guest feel as happy and comfortable as we can. We truly are "at your service." We are pleased to say that we rank in the top 5% for customer service for all Marriott's nationwide. We try and make every guest experience better than the next. Thank you for your compliments and for your review. We are looking forward to you and your wife's next visit with us.

Summary: Spent a few days in Dana Point to do some beach hiking and sun worshipping, and thankfully made this resort our home base. The hotel and rooms are absolutely lovely and maintained to an impeccable standard...nuff said on that...it is beautiful to look at, comfy to be in, and you instantly relax when you cross the threshold. The location was perfect for our outdoor activities. Several great trails and parks are right off the grounds. The harbor and Doheny Beach are across the street. Strand Beach is super close with a great nature reserve trail to hike on the way, and a free trolley will take you to Laguna Beach up the PCH a bit. What we may remember as much as our time spent in reverence to nature, however, is the incredible staff at this resort. They are the best we've seen.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our resort as your home base. We are delighted that our resort was perfect for your getaway. Thank you for your wonderful compliments regarding the guest rooms. Your comfort is very important to us. Our staff has a goal in mind for every guest and that is to provide the highest level of service they can, to each and every person that walks into and out of the resort. It is our joy to have every guest walk away with nothing but great memories and we are delighted that you experienced a cheerful visit and a sense of importance from our staff. We have recently incorporated a resort fee that will include wifi and we hope that this will eliminate the ‚Äúding‚Äù from our service. Thank you again for your review and we are looking forward in seeing you again soon.

Summary: I love this place.  We have stayed here many times.  The service is great and the location is walking distance to the harbor.    I also had my wedding here and Sandy and her crew made sure everything went smoothly... not to mention the food was fantastic.  The restaurant is also a place to visit even if you are not staying at the hotel.  Thank you for making all of our experiences memorable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Congratulations on your marriage and we are so delighted that you made us a part of it! Thank you for your compliments about Vue, we have a very talented culinary team and we are so happy that you were able to try the delectable items on the menu. We hope to see you both again real soon and we hope to create more memories.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a family vacation
Summary: We stayed at the Marriott for four nights with our 3 year old son. The hotel is very nice and everything looks brand new. From the lobby and the swimming pools to our room, the entire place is beautiful and in tip-top shape. It is evident that the hotel was remodeled in 2010. Besides liking the hotel itself, we also had very positive interactions with many of the staff members. Our son played their treasure hunt (collecting stickers from different parts of the hotel) and everyone was very friendly and caring and the hotel concierge Ms. Lu went out of her way to answer our questions regarding activities and restaurant suggestions. We had the daily breakfast buffet in their restaurant and the selection was very good, especially the fresh fruit. The only thing we were not very
Manager Response: We thank you for your review and for choosing our resort for your family vacation. We are happy  that your son enjoyed participating in the scavenger hunt. We highly recommend our Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club as well for all children. They have themed activities every day and all children are invited to movie nights on Saturday‚Äôs. We thank you for your compliments of our staff and the services we provided during your stay. We hope we made your trip to the beach and pool as relaxing and comfortable as we could. We regret that you didn‚Äôt enjoy the dinner options. We have a great dinner buffet option in our Vue restaurant that offers a great selection of food for children as well as adults. Children really enjoy the Mac and Cheese station as well as the chocolate fountain. We hope that you and your family are able to try the buffet the next time you visit. Thank you again for review.

Summary: Great location, fabulous property and incredible staff.  I have spent 20 days in the hotel over the past 2 years.  Can't say enough good things about it.  The hotel is atop a hill overlooking Doheny Park with great views of the ocean.  The outdoor areas take full advantage of the wonderful views.   Staff is friendly and helpful and this extends from the GM down.  Wouldn't stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind compliments. We are so delighted that you‚Äôve stayed with us over the past 2 years. It is our pleasure to provide excellent service during your visit with us. We are honored that you‚Äôve made us your home away from home. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Good place to use a base for exploring the Dana Point area.  They did a very nice job on the renovation.  Our room, 311, had a balcony that overlooked the Pacific and the grounds where they hold the outdoor weddings.  I used the fully equiped work out room and it was in great condition.  The breakfast in the Vue was off a buffet, but the service and the food was very good.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the compliments on our renovation. We too are very happy with the transformation. We are delighted that you were able to use the fitness center. All our of our equipment is state of the art and brand new. We are very happy that you enjoyed the food and service of our Vue Restaurant. We hope you are able to join us again real soon and do a little more exploring.

Summary Heading: Not bad but not worth $250 a night.
Summary: The quality of the Hotel is defiantly there but not worth $250 a night. It is not in the heart of Laguna either. There are other Hotels with better placement. They were pretty deciving about the room when my wife booked. They made it seam like we would be RIGHT on the beach. Not the case at all. This place is set quite far off the beach on a big hill making walking all the way to the beach very hard. Wont stay here rver again after seeing the lay out of Laguna, its to far from the heart.  The staff gave us a rushed check in not explaning the Hotel amenities like the pool,gym or activity. For $250 I want a warmer welcome and better customer service!
Manager Response: We regret that you were misinformed about the location of the resort. We are just steps away from Doheny Beach and Laguna Beach is about 10 minutes away from our resort. Our resort is in the city of Dana Point and we apologize if you were misled into believing that it was in the city of Laguna Beach. We thank you for your comments and we want you to know that we take every review very seriously.

Summary: My company hosted a rewards event here over a long weekend. My husband and I used our Marriott rewards for an extra night stay and received a free breakfast voucher. The hotel stay was above our expectations as the setting is stunning. The staff was friendly and very attentive and the food was wonderful. We enjoyed our view of the hotel flower gardens overlooking Lantern Park and Dana Point Harbor. There was so much to do within walking distance. I would have given the resort 5 stars except a couple of things irked me. There wasn't a vent in the bathroom so it got too humid and the fee for parking was too high at $29 per day.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy to hear that you and your husband decided to spend an extra night at the resort. We thank you so much for the kind comments about our friendly and attentive staff. Our staff is quiet amazing and they provide exceptional service to all of our guests. The location of the resort is only walking distance from the beach and harbor.   We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.    We hope to see you both again real soon.

Summary: My husband had a conference here and I tagged along--lucky me!  We stayed 4 nights and I wish it could have been more.  The hotel is quite lovely--sitting on a hill overlooking the Pacific Ocean and the marina.  The pool area was wonderful--lots of waiters wondering around to bring you water or take your drink/food orders.  They also are quick to put towels on the chairs as you arrive.  While I was alone--no kids--I did see many kids enjoying themselves at the pool--there is a kids shallow pool and water play area.  In addition, there was a ping pong table.  It felt like I was on a cruise!  The views were out of this world!  I also took advantage of the fitness center--great equipment.  The grounds are well kept--lots of room to walk and explore.  It is located right near a
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your wonderful compliments. We are very delighted that you were able to join your husband on his business trip and take advantage of the wonderful amenities the resort has to offer.   Our resort is in a beautiful location, high on the bluffs overlooking the Pacific Ocean. It truly is a perfect destination for families, couples or just a weekend getaway. Thank you for your positive comments about our fitness center and Kid's splash zone. Children love the outdoor area at the Del Mar Pool.   We are always "at your service" and we are grateful that you were able to experience the high level of service that we offer our guests.   We are looking forward to your next visit in sunny California!

Summary: Just spent 2 nights with my two young boys. We loved it!  - pool area is amazing, for kids & adults. I've never actually relaxed at a pool w/my kids till now; - kids club was great; - service was, without exception, very good & always friendly; - felt like everyone was working hard to ensure we had a great time; - gym was top notch; - room was lovely, stylish and spacious; - site is terrific.  Looking to get out of town for a few nights in a spot where you & kids will have fun? Found it!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! It was our pleasure having you and your two boys with us and we are so glad you took advantage of the Kahuna Laguna Kid‚Äôs Club and the Kid‚Äôs Splash Zone. We are a kid-friendly, family fun resort and we are so delighted that you were able to experience a resort that you were able to enjoy as much as your children. Our team is outstanding and we look forward to welcoming you back to enjoy another family fun weekend. We hope to create more wonderful memories for you and your children.

Summary: This Marriott is a bright clean hotel perched up on a hill overlooking the marina and Pacfiic Ocean.  The property is a respite with everything for a restful visit.  Young waiters wander the pool areas with drinks and taking food orders.  The property is immediately adjacent to a public park and unlike many higher end resorts it is within easy walking distance of restaurants.  A few down the hill next to the marina are good and less expensive, so if you're up for exercise consider a walk for a snack or meal.  My only annoyance was that I was charged a daily mandatory "resort fee" that included internet but nevertheless was charged despite my having booked through a third party that requires full payment in advance (or perhaps not fulll payment).
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the resort and that you were pleased with the cleanliness and views of the grounds. Our location is quite amazing with views of the Pacific Ocean and Dana Point Harbor and walking distance to the beach. We regret that the third party you booked with did not inform you of the resort fee. Thank you again for your review and we hope you come back to enjoy another restful weekend with us.

Summary: Wish this place had residences because I would move in! Excellent service, especially at the pool! I have never had staff set up my chaise loung with monogrammed chair covers and extra towels! Loved the ease of borrowing a bike from the bell stand. Loved having drinks on the upper lounge deck with our own tower of fire to warm us while enjoying the gorgeous view!! Really had a good time. Only negative was that the retail store on site did not have any cute "laguna cliffs Marriott" tshirts, I would have loved to advertise for them! Loved our renovated room with ocean view and balcony. Just fabulous!!
Manager Response: Wow‚Ä¶thank you for your wonderful compliments. Even though we do not have residences, we hope to make our resort your home away from home. We are so delighted to hear that you enjoyed the amenities that we offer as well as the attention to detail that we provide to every guest. We have two pools that are full service and our job is to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as we can. We hope you enjoyed your bike ride along the harbor and beaches that surround us. Our OverVue Lounge is a big hit with all of our guests. We hope you were entertained by the live music we offer Friday and Saturday nights. We‚Äôre looking forward to your return.

Summary: Booked on line two rooms same price ,charged different at the check out ??Manager out to lunch ???to make the adjustment ???Then ONLY VALET PARKING at $30/day???
Manager Response: We regret any inconvenience you may have experienced during your stay. We will be sure to address your concerns with our staff.  We appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for a 4 day mini vacation over Memorial Day week end.  The area is high priced with the Ritz Carleton at about $500 a night minimum, and the St. Regis in the $400's and the Montage at over $500 a night. We got our room for $235, while not cheap was an incredible value.  The property is really well taken care of and updated a couple of years ago.  Staff was incredible, views were incredible and the breakfast buffet was very nice if you buy it as part of your package.  Its about $23 if you don't include it at the time of booking.  Fairly easy walk to Dana Point shops and harbor.  The $29 a night valet parking and $15 a night resort fee adds to the cost, but it is still so much cheaper than the other places in the area.  We have stayed at many many hotels
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience at our resort. We are so delighted that you and your wife were able to experience a mini vacation in Southern California. With so many resorts to choose from we love hearing that this was by far one of the best you‚Äôve traveled to overall. Our rates are spectacular with an amazing ocean view you can‚Äôt beat. What adds to the superiority of our resort is the level of service we provide to all guests. We truly want to make every guest‚Äôs experience, one they will never forget. Thank you for the compliments. We hope to see you and your wife again real soon.

Summary: Location, atmosphere, food & service are all tops at this Marriott Laguna Cliffs in Dana Point.  We live close by, and happily recommend this location for friends and family who visit our beautiful area in S. Orange County.  We often go there with friends and enjoy a meal at the beautiful VUE restaurant, or we just go to enjoy a drink in patio with awesome appetizers.  We also had our daughter's wedding at this location.  That was three years ago; people still talk about it.  One of the best venues for weddings.  Their wonderful staff  helped make that special night a magical one.
Manager Response: Wow, thank you very much for your great compliments! We are so happy that you continue to recommend our resort to your family and friends. We feel honored to have hosted your daughter‚Äôs wedding here three years ago. Hearing that we created lasting memories puts a smile on all of our faces. We hope to create more in the coming years.

Summary Heading: Great resort with outstanding views, very friendly staff, and nice rooms
Summary: The hotel is located on a bluff above the Dana Point Harbor.  There is a beautiful park sloping down in front of it that creates a spectacular view out over the harbor and ocean.  The room was very nice and clean, a good size, with a very comfortable bed and nice patio to enjoy the beautiful views.  I brought my bike and got up in the mornings and rode up and down Pacific Coast Hwy.  Nice ride, but if your not used to hills, don't try it or be ready to ride very slowly.  I used the gym too and the equipment in it was outstanding.  Top of the line ellipticals, treadmills, stationary bikes, weights, etc.  One of the best equipped at a hotel I've seen.  The food was good at the various restaurants and the buffets we had during our business conference were very good.  The wait staff
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your kind compliments. We are delighted that you were able to experience all the amenities the resort has to offer while on your business trip. We have many guests who enjoy bike rides along the harbor and beach. It is a spectacular view! Our fitness center has recently been renovated with all new equipment. Thank you for the wonderful feedback on the machines. We will be sure to share this with our staff. We hope you were able to enjoy the pools as well. We appreciate your kind comments about our staff. We truly take pride in the level of service all of our staff members provide to our guests. We are ‚Äúat your service‚Äù at all times.   We hope to see you back again real soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Location -- Good for Couples, Families & Business
Summary: We stayed here for a business trip and loved the location.  The grounds are gorgeous, the pool was fantastic it is located next to a state park and not far from the Harbor.  The service was wonderful as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are so happy that you enjoyed your business trip at our resort. Our resort is truly situated in a perfect location a top the cliffs, yet walking distance to the beach and harbor. We too believe that it is a hidden gem that is ideal for businesses,  a couples getaway and families. We hope to see you again for business and/or pleasure.

Summary Heading: The Laguna Cliffs Marriott is just beautiful and worth the trip
Summary: We rode our bikes from Newport to the Laguna Cliffs Marriott. They couldn't be more gracious. They asked if we wanted our bikes stored for the night and took them away. Our room was beautiful and the views from the hotel are just amazing. I have stayed there many times before for work but this time is was for pleasure. They recently renovated the hotel and it really restored the hotel to a lovely place to stay. Everyone there is really caring and they take care of their guests. It is a beautiful venue for weddings, parties, or just to go for their spectacular views.
Manager Response: What a beautiful day it was to go bike riding! We are delighted that you enjoyed the newly renovated resort. We do have an amazing location, situated atop the cliffs and overlooking the Pacific Ocean. What a great way to start and end your bike ride all along the coast. Thank you for your kind comments. We take pride in ‚Äúcaring‚Äù for our guests and we hope to see you soon for business and/or pleasure.

Summary Heading: Laguna Cliffs Marriott earns it's resort name
Summary: My wife, kids and I stayed there this weekend - and look forward to a return visit.  The staff are very friendly, helpful and chatty.  The food was excellent.  The hotel has a great location on the top of the hill overlooking the marina and ocean.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We hope your children attended the movie nights we have at the resort every Saturday during the summer months.  Thank you for your great compliments about our friendly staff and our excellent food and location. We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: My wife and I stayed here in May 2012 and loved it.  The room was a nice size, had a balcony and was adorned with beautiful furniture.  It rests atop a cliff and offers ocean views.  At the bottom of one side of the cliff is a marina.  My wife and I did a whale watch trip on a catamaran and had a great time.  Everything about the hotel was clean and upscale.  The lobby was so welcoming and attractive.  Valet was timely and everything was just right.  We ordered room service one night and the food arrived in 10 minutes!  My only complaint was the layout.  It was a little confusing and at some points we had to walk through a conference/seminar area.  It was a little awkward in that we were wearing shorts and t-shirts walking through a crowd of suits and ties as they were on some
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments and feedback. We are delighted that you enjoyed our renovated resort with all the new furniture and d√©cor. We are pleased that you were satisfied with our valet and room service teams.   We apologize that you felt awkward walking through the resort during a breakout session. All groups realize that our guests will be walking around in comfortable clothing and that some guests are here for leisure vacation and not business. We hope that this takes away any awkward feelings that you may have experienced.   We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: We had a fantastic stay at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott. We had a few complaints with the location of our room, etc. but the hotel staff was prompt and more than happy to take care of any concerns we had. They have a Lincoln Navigator that takes you down to Restaurants for no fee which was really convenient in the cold. The bellman/driver Frank was amazing. He was a great guy that helped us multiple times and was not afraid to demonstrate his hip-hop skills! (he's in his 60s).  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for you review. We are pleased that our staff was able to accommodate your request and change the location of your room. Our bellmen are amazing and we‚Äôre delighted that you were able to visit the harbor during your stay.   Thank you for recommending our resort. We appreciate your compliments and look forward in seeing you soon.

Summary: I had the most wonderful time at this resort over Memorial Day weekend.  The grounds are beautiful!  We have a young son, who was able to enjoy all of the kids programs offered, including the Kahuna Laguna Kids club and the family movie night.  The staff who run all of the childrens programs are so kind and clearly enjoy spending time with the kiddos.  This resort knows how to take care of familes, from free Otter Pops at the pool, to scavenger hunt maps upon check-in. They even had chocolate chip cookies and milk delivered to our room at bedtime for our son!    The spa is lovely and was uncrowded the day I had my masssage.  They will automatically include gratuity on all of your spa treatments, good to know going in.  We only had breakfasts at the Vue restaturant, but they were
Manager Response: Thank you for your compliments. We are so happy that you spent your memorial weekend with us!  We are delighted that your son‚Äôs ‚Äúfavorite vacation‚Äù was here at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort & Spa. We take pride in spoiling the children with Otter Pops and scavenger hunt maps.  Our Kid‚Äôs Club program is quite amazing. We offer family movie nights and daily themed activities for kid‚Äôs such as Magic Monday and Chef for the day throughout the week and weekends.   We hope you enjoyed your spa treatment and were able to enjoy the  outdoor patio after your treatment.   We are looking forward to seeing your all back again next summer.

Summary Heading: Beware EV owners, this is not the hotel for you.
Summary: The hotel is beautiful inside and out, not doubt.  But for all you electric vehicle drivers out there, think twice before booking at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott.  They will do everything to have you go somewhere else.    I was so happy to take my first trip in my new EV this past Saturday.  On my way to the hotel I called to ask about charging for my car.  It takes no special equipment, only a regular 120-volt wall plug.  This is where my fabulous weekend took a wrong turn.  I was scolded like a 5-year-old repetitively by the woman on the phone who said, "You should have never booked a room here if you had an EV. You can't call on your way here expecting us to help you."   I wanted to say, "I'm asking for a plug, not a gold toothbrush," but instead I apologized and said, "My car
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments. We apologize for any inconvenience you experienced charging your vehicle at the resort. We value every guest and our job is to accommodate your needs. We are very happy to hear that one of our staff members greeted you upon your arrival and assisted in getting your car charged immediately. Your needs are very important to us and we take pleasure in assisting our guest any way that we can.   Please be assured we are an Eco-Friendly Resort and we truly appreciate your contribution to the environment. We value your feedback and your concerns will be discussed with our staff.

Summary: I attended a business conference at the Laguna Cliffs Marriott.  I was pleasantly surprised by its beautiful location, the wonderful weather, but mostly by the kindness and outstanding service provided by its staff - they were prompt, attentive and made sure all my needs were met.  The room was clean, spacious and with a great view.  I plan to go back soon, this time for pleasure.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your compliments. We appreciate your review. Our job is to bring the finest level of service to you and your colleagues. We are delighted that we provided that level of service to all of you.   Our location is quite spectacular and the views are just breathtaking. We like to think of our resort as the ‚Äúhidden gem‚Äù along the Southern California Coast.   We are looking forward in your next leisure visit.

Summary Heading: Sun, Sea, Romance, and Excercise Too!!
Summary: We chose to celebrate a milestone birthday here and we weren't disappointed in this resort. The room we had was on the first floor looking out towards the ocean and a large park (which were used for three weddings while we were there (two nights & three days).  The resort sits by itself on top of a hill and is surrounded by many trails to go for long walks down to the marina that has many shops to explore and places to eat.  There's even Yoga in the nearby park everyday at 10:00.  There's entertainment in the lounge, and dining both inside and outside.  We had the breakfast buffet for $21.95 which was very good.  After breakfast we had facials at the spa.  The spa is beautiful!  The facial was excellent and relaxing.  Just what we needed before heading into Laguna Beach for
Manager Response: Happy belated birthday! We are pleased that you celebrated your birthday with us and enjoyed a little pampering at our spa. We are delighted that you enjoyed the amenity that was in your room upon your arrival from Laguna Beach. It is our pleasure to make your stay special and memorable. We hope you were able to listen to the live entertainment we provided in our OverVue Lounge during your visit.  We hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great Location and Breakfast, Resort Fee
Summary: Had a wedding in Newport Beach so got a nice rate including Breakfast.  The location is excellent, walking distance to the wharf and restaurants, even with a stroller.  The room was tiny, with a balcony that fit 2 chairs and nothing more.  The beds were SUPER soft, almost too soft and the crib that they brought did the trick.  Breakfast was superb and included in our package.  Otherwise it would have been superb AND pricey.  The resport fee of $15 was a shock to me as i wasnt aware of it when i booked.  There was no mention of it when i checked in.  The manager kindly removed it but it really bugs me even as I write this review.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you chose to stay at our resort after the wedding you attended in Newport Beach. We are glad that we could make the bed comfortable for you and your family.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast in our Vue  Restaurant.   We regret you did not see the resort fee on your reservation. It is located on your confirmation page.   Thank you again for your review.

Summary: As soon as I entered this resort , I felt in love with it straight away.  The resort is situated at Dana Point which is a very beautiful area in the Orange County.    The resort is at the top of the cliff with an amazing view of the Pacific Ocean with beaches and harbour.  There is also a nice park just below the resort and you could see people having barbecue party and dog walks during day and night.    During my stay, the weather was so cold and I could not jump into the Pacific Ocean.   But many guests in the hotel did surf in the Pacific Ocean even it was freezing.  The resort outlook looked a bit like a Disneyland resort.  Whole building is built with wood.   Each room with a nice balcony and decoration.  I love their setting as well as bathroom amenities!  I did not have
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Our resort is in a remarkable destination where it overlooks the Pacific Ocean and is walking distance to the Dana Point Harbor. We are delighted that you were able to enjoy the beauty of the tranquil park, which sits in the front of the resort. I enjoy people watching as well and our location allows guests to do just that. From surfers to dog walkers, you can see it all as you soak in the sun.   We are glad that you liked our newly renovated rooms and bathroom amenities. Please know that it is not required to book a  spa appointment  in advance. We are more than happy to accept appointments the day of, if we have availability.   We are looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: Stayed here for business for a few days.  It was very quiet and it seemed like the hotel was maybe 1/3 full.  The hotel sits above the Harbor up on a hill right next to a park.  It is a beautiful location and there seemed to be quite a bit of activity going on around the hotel next to the park and the Harbor when I arrived on Sunday.    The rooms were nicely updated and were your standard Marriott rooms.  The bed was very soft and comfortable.  I had hard time getting out of it every morning.  I used the wireless and it worked at all times and was great to get some work done.  I had a room that overlooked the family pool and the harbor.  What a great view.  Unfortunately the weather was too cool to enjoy the pool.  There were some kids playing down at the family pool one
Manager Response: Thank you for your great review and wonderful compliments. We are so happy that you enjoyed the views of the resort as much as we do. It is quite spectacular to be able to see the harbor and the Pacific Ocean as you walk throughout the resort.   We are happy that you tried the turkey sliders in our OverVue Lounge, personally one of my favorites as well. We have a very talented culinary team and our OverVue Lounge menu has a variety of foods to accommodate all the array of tastes. Our menu changes seasonally and we hope you are able to come back again to try something new next time.   Thank you again for your great review.

Summary: We stayed a couple of nights at The Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa recently and it was a very nice experience. The hotel is very nicely decorated and there are two fantastic pools with hot-tubs. The beds were extremely comfortable and the sunday morning breakfast buffet was one of the best I've had in any hotel! An amazing selection of fresh and wonderful breakfast food. The breakfast alone was worth the stay! The only downside was that there doesn't appear to be a dedicated restaurant in the hotel for dinner....you have to eat in the bar (which had giant sports screens and was very chilly) or in your room...the room-service menu food looked unhealthy and overpriced, typical for most big hotels. But with that one caveat, I would definitely recommend this hotel as a very
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We are delighted that you had a nice experience at the hotel and that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet in our Vue Restaurant. We regret that the OverVue Lounge was chilly for you. Please feel free to let one of our employees know if you need the windows closed at any moment. We do get a nice breeze from the ocean and we would like you to be as comfortable as possible.    In regards to the room service menu. We also offer a ‚ÄúFit For You‚Äù section in our room-service menu that offers healthy food choices. We hope that you were able to order something that was to your satisfaction. Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: we stayed here for two nights friday to sunday.  the hotel grounds are nice, with a nice view. everything else was really overpriced though, no restaurant choice except for the vue /overvue. the food was not even worth the price. the drinks were ok. the service was nothing extraordinary except for the spa service.   the valet parking ONLY is ridiculous. i cant believe they dont have an option of having an open parking space. and then you have to wait forever to get your car ready because "they were too busy". or you have to wait almost an hour to get something from your own car. i would love to have the access to my own car without 1)bothering anyone else and 2) without having to wait an hour. that was pretty stupid.   overall its just average. i've always liked marriott and
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and regret that you were not satisfied with the parking at the resort. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may have brought to you. Our highest mission is to provide the exact service and facilities that our guests want, deserve, and expect. For safety reasons we only allow valet and associates to enter the parking structure unattended. Thank you again for your comments. We will be sure to address your concerns with our staff.

Summary: Stayed in room 2024 for 3 nights with my wife and 2yr old daughter.  Nice updated room.  The bed was a little too soft for my taste but the linens were of high quality. The bathtub had a couple stains and the drain was slow but overall, the bathroom was nice. We had a nice view of the pool. BUT we were also right above one of the entry gates to the pool. Every time someone opened that gate, it would slam shut. It sounded like someone was crushing a soda can in our room every few mins. So if you get a room with pool view, make sure you get one that's in the middle of the wing. That way, you're farther from the crashing gates.  All the front of house staff were great. After calling for my car, the doorman and valet's always had my car waiting as soon as I got to the front drive.
Manager Response: We sincerely regret that you were disturbed by the noise of the gates near the pool. Please feel free to let one of our front office staff members know of any disturbances you may have during your stay. We will try and resolve the issues to the best of our ability.   We are delighted to hear that our front office staff, bellman and valet were ‚Äúat your service‚Äù during your family vacation. It is our job to make your stay as comfortable and pleasant as we can.   I appreciate your feedback regarding our parking fees and will certainly take your comments under review.  In recent parking surveys we‚Äôve conducted with our fellow resorts located on the coastline, we have found our parking rates to be in line and are actually the most economical.    Thank you for your comments and we hope you visit us again.

Summary Heading: Surpassed my expectations! Wonderful resort with upscale amenities.
Summary: My partner and I decided to extend our vacation after wedding in Temecula. Had a wonderful stay!  Rooms in Capistrano wing were updated and very clean with an excellent view.  Outdoor pools are wonderful.  Great trendy bar and restaurant.  Good value for price per night. You'll pay much more for staying up the road directly on the beach.  This hotel is in Dana Point which is a few miles S of Laguna Beach.  Just to note - there is a $29 valet charge (mandatory) so be sure to add that into your price.   In conclusion, I would defenitely recommend to friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful compliments. We are very happy to hear that we surpassed your expectations. We are glad that you were able to experience the OverVue Lounge and take advantage of the pools. We are grateful that you chose our resort as your extended vacation getaway with your partner. We hope you stay with us again real soon.

Summary: We've spent a weekend with family there and it is a perfect weekend getaway place. Beutiful hotel - clean, great maintenance, wonderful design. Everything was "above and beyond" expectations. The only thing is you need to walk down the steep hill if you want to get to the harbor. Walking back can be an issue for some people, so drive your car.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great compliments! We are so happy that you stayed with us on your weekend getaway. It is our job that we provide a level of service that is ‚Äúabove and beyond‚Äù your expectations. We hope you and your family visit us again this summer.

Summary: For our first anniversary, my husband and I planned a weeken in Catalina.  However, due to very unsual stormy weather, all the boats to the island were cancelled on Friday and Saturday.  Not wanting to go back to San Diego, we called around to various hotels and explained our situation.  The Laguna Cliffs gave us an unbelievable rate and had our room ready when we checked in an hour later into our top floor oceanfront view room.  The weekend could not have been as perfect as it was though without assistance from concierge Lou (a woman).  We spoke to Lou while on the road and explained that we wanted to go somewhere really special that night for dinner and were foodies (so ocean views weren't very important to us).  We told her to pick a place and surprise us.  She picked the
Manager Response: Wow! Thank you for your wonderful compliments of our staff and resort. We are so happy that we were able to turn around an almost not so perfect getaway into a memorable anniversary. We are delighted that our Concierge was able to recommend some wonderful activities and restaurants that met your expectations. We are very proud of our staff and their goal is to make every guest leave with a smile on their face and a memory in their heart. We are very happy that we were able to accomplish that for you and your husband. We hope you both come back to visit real soon.

Summary: Went to a concert at the Coach House so we spent the night here.  We were greater in our room with a nice card, fruit and cheeses.  The rooms are not square which was completely refreshing.  The next morning we rented bikes from them an took a nice bike ride.  The grounds and the sliders in the bar were both great!  We'll stay next time we go to a concert at the Coach house!
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay at the resort. We are delighted that you enjoyed the amenity that was in your room upon arrival. We hope that you are able to visit the OverVue Lounge again on your next visit. Thank you for the compliments and we hope to see you again real soon.

Summary Heading: Inconsistency in service keeps this resort at mediocre.
Summary: My wife and I are world travelers. For personal and business we have been all over the world. We were reserved to stay at Laguna Cliffs Marriott Resort and Spa for 5 weeks in March and April. But we cut the stay short after 2 weeks.  The grounds are immaculate and the area is gorgeous. It's located right next to a park overlooking the Dana Point Marina. Has 2 heated pools plus kids pool, jacuzzi and play fountain for the kids. The staff were friendly to us and at level expected of a 4 star hotel. Rooms were comfortable with large LCD TV, nice desk with plenty of plugs and bed was comfortable with large pillows.  Robes and hair dryer are provided. All at a 5 star hotel level.  But here is what was wrong. The bed, although comfortable with nice high count sheets became lumpy after
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and feedback. We listen to every piece of feedback our guests provide us. Our highest mission is to provide the exact service and facilities that our guests want, deserve, and expect. We are very happy that you enjoyed the amenities the resort has to offer. We are delighted that your children were able to play in the Splash Zone. We are very excited that you enjoyed the Sunday Brunch and the breakfast items that were provided.   We sincerely regret that your request was never resolved. Please do not hesitate to call our ‚ÄúAt Your Service‚Äù department any time of day if a request was not completed. We are here to provide the level of service that you expect. In the future please to not hesitate to ask for new sheets or towels at any time. It is our job to provide consistency throughout your entire stay in all of our outlets. We will address all of your concerns with the appropriate managers. Thank you for your detailed review.

Summary: Our four-day stay at this property was "second to none!"  This resort was imacculately kept inside & out, beautifully designed from the smallest to the largest details and held our hearts and minds through-out the entire visit.  Beyond the beauty we found an even more significant feature- SERVICE!  Every staff member treated us with the utmost excellent, genuine and efficient service we have ever experienced.  My wife and I would return to Dana Point "in a heart beat" to do nothing but stay three days at this resort.
Manager Response: Wow.. we appreciate your comments and wonderful compliments. We provide a fine staff that we take pride in. They take every guest‚Äôs visit and make it their own. It is our job to make your stay enjoyable and memorable from the moment you arrive. It would be a pleasure to have you and your wife visit again. We are very glad we could make your trip to Dana Point a memorable one. We are looking forward to your next three day visit.

Summary Heading: Renovation was well worth the wait!
Summary: The multi-million dollar renovation was well needed and looks great. The guest rooms are modern and elegant. All rooms with balconies have a view of the Ocean. My only complaint would be their weird hours and closings of the one and only full-time Vue restaurant. During the off season, the Vue restaurant closes for dinner and sometimes closes for lunch. You are asked to go to the bar on the lobby level, but its loud and service is not the same as the restaurant. I can say I have never been in a major hotel chain that did not have a full-time 3-meal restaurant always in operation. What's even more puzzling is that they will rent the restaurant to groups for lunch or dinner -- closing it to guests staying in hotel. Transient guests (not with a group) who don't want to walk down
Manager Response: Thank you for your positive comments and your great feedback. We are very happy that you enjoyed the newly renovated resort with the new d√©cor. We apologize for any inconvenience the hours of the Vue Restaurant may have brought to you. We do provide our guests the option of dining in our OverVue Lounge. The OverVue Lounge menu is available from 11am- 12 midnight. In addition guests can order from the Vue lunch menu everyday from 11am-5pm and the In Room Dining menu can be served during operating hours as well. Our job is to provide the same level of service in every outlet of the resort. We will only offer the restaurant for groups when the Vue Restaurant is closed. We hope to have the restaurant open 7 days a week for breakfast, lunch and dinner in the near future. We appreciate your patience.   We do offer a complimentary shuttle service to and from the Dana Point Harbor. We hope you were able to utilize this amenity we provide for our resort guests.Thank you again for your comments and we will address your concerns with our staff.

Summary: We stayed here over the weekend and had such a beautiful time!The hotel was spotless and centrally located with a beautiful view of the Pacific Coast!  The staff was incredibly nice and so accommodating.  The only drawback was they only had valet parking so you have to pay the valet fees.  The marina was a short walk away with some shops and great restaurants.  Would definitely go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great compliments. We are so happy that you were able to enjoy the resort and the beautiful views of the Pacific Ocean it has to offer. It is our job to provide you with excellent service and we are pleased that you experienced the warmth of our staff. We hope to see you back real soon.

Summary: I attended a conference here for business. The room was very nice. I had a view of the back driveway and fire hydrant which wasn't great but other than that, it was a very nice resort. I'm sure my experience would have been different if it had been a vacation. The hotel staff was great- they took us short distances and picked us up which was appreciated. I would stay here again but try to get a better view!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you had a successful conference and you enjoyed your stay at the resort. We too hope you come back for a vacation. I might suggest upgrading to an ocean-view or partial ocean-view room, it is breathtaking. Thank you for sharing your comments. We hope to see you here again real soon.

Summary Heading: Excellent Vacation Spot - Perfect in Every Way
Summary: I had an excellent experience at Laguna Cliffs.  At Check-in I was given great service and attention, my room was perfectly appointed.  Yes, the only parking available is valet, but the valets take great care of you each time you need your vehicle.  So, plan this cost in to your stay, then you will not be surprised and just enjoy the extra service.  I enjoyed breakfast each day at the upstairs coffee service where Liz served coffee with pleasant conversation and local knowledge as well as a limited menu for those not needing the big buffet downstairs.  In the afternoon, there is often exercise available in the adjacent park - yoga, or boot camp classes.  Also, ask around about the great walking trails along the cliff, very beautiful and empty.  Walk down to the harbor and tour
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time in writing this wonderful review. We are very pleased that your visit was perfect from arrival to departure.
